story:
Empty walls are all around us, why not take advantage of all that space? From one stand-alone panel to an arrangement of multiple ones the length of your wall, our magnetic accessories can be placed anywhere on the panels surface, creating functional spaces you never knew you had.

Our shipping pledge to you: January 2021 shipping to US, Canada, and Mexico Addresses or 100% of your money back.

We have limited stock for this early bird campaign that will ship starting December 2020, and completely by January 2021, we guarantee it or 100% of your money back, so buy now with confidence! Once we sell through this initial stock we will be shipping exclusively to the United States, early exclusive perks will no longer be available and each perk will have an updated new ship date.


Products

 

Frame set (Holds itself):

3 different sizes frames from an ultra-large format to show off, to more standard sizes. Use them to display art work, or your favorite photographer (you). From family portraits to elephants smiling, display your life on the wall.

 

Chunk Planter (15 lbs):

These floating planters are awesome! Hand crafted from a single recovered solid wood chunk! Use them to build up your vertical garden as high as your wall allows. Each piece is naturally different and unique. This planter can also be used as a stylish storage space for remotes, keys…You name it. 

 

Bottle stones (holds one standard wine bottle):

Inspired by river stones, we created a unique bottle holder that suspends your bottles midair. As with river stones, each piece is meticulously polished into a non-repeatable shapes and patterns. Show off your wine collection in a truly unique way!

Note: This bottle holder functions using pressure, meaning, the bottle head will have a tight fit, therefore, installation may damage the cork capsule (the metal thing covering the cork) and is not compatible with wax capsules. One size only, will fit most but not all wine bottles.

 

Cutting board (5 lbs):

Made from reclaimed solid walnut wood, this is a must have for any kitchen. This magnetic cutting board also serves as a knife rack! Each cutting board has one-of-a-kind grain and color patterns and is finished with olive oil making maintenance a breeze. Cutting boards are finished with natural olive oil making them food safe.

 

Shroom Shelves (15 lbs):

Carved out of a single piece of wood, these shelves were inspired by the fungus that grows on tree trunks. Use these as decorative objects, or one of a kind display stands for that hot dog eating trophy. Add an extra layer of excitement to your wall by staggering multiple shelves into a pattern of your choice!

 

LC Expandable Shelves (20 lbs each​):

Use your walls as a canvas with this modular shelving system. Each set comes with 2 L shape pieces and 1 C shape. Create large shelving structures for huge objects or smaller ones for those tiny valuables. The metal shelves are individually hand shaped by master craftsmen and finished with our special sauce.

 

0 Gravity book shelves (20 lbs each​):

The printed word is becoming a rarity in the digital age. Yet, there is an undeniable charm to holding an actual book in your hands. We look to commemorate books, exhibiting them naked, showing nothing other than books themselves. Use the 0 gravity shelves to show off your own collection!

 

Key chain (holds itself with some keys and cash):

No more misplacing keys. Get home and simply throw them on the wall to find them waiting for you. With the added perk of serving as a money clip, keep your cash and keys in the same place!

 

Lumio (holds itself):


Lumio is an American product featured on the popular tv show Shark Tank. It’s magnetic backing works perfectly with our walls. Makes for a great night light, cordless and a great addition to your walls. Stack up on lamps and build up incredible light fixtures!

 

Speakers (holds itself):

Music on the go! A pair of Bluetooth wireless speakers, with battery life of up to 6 hours. Effortlessly place them anywhere on your wall and just as easily move them around.
“Without music life would be a mistake “ Friedrich Nietzsche

 

Hive Lights (holds itself):

A modular light touch system, each set is sold with 10 individual lights and one light with an AC plug. Link them together to achieve a wide range of shapes, touch each individually to light modules individually! Add or remove modules as desired to build up a great light sculpture!

 

Mag Set 5, 15, and 25 lbs: 

Bring out your creativity, whether to finally find a place for that TV remote, or for tackling a larger project, use the mag set to make your valuables compatible with your walls.
The set is composed of different intensity magnets to tackle any of your ideas! Magnets, metal and fingers don’t get along! Our magnets are super strong, they should be handled with care, this set is intended for handy people. Please use with care.

 

Big NS wall (110 lbs):

Our big panel format serves perfectly as a stand-alone object or can be easily installed with other panels to quickly transform an entire wall. This makes these panels perfect for kitchen, office, living, or bedroom spaces. Whether you want to add a design element to a room or tidy up a space, these are the panels for you. Our panels are built with FSC and recovered wood and are available in various finishes.

 

Small NS wall (55 lbs):

Our small panels are perfect for those odd spaces. Transform a column into a functional space in your home or use them on that wired wall in your kitchen for some extra functional space. Perfect for gifts, they also work great to complete a full wall, helping to fill those smaller spaces. Our panels are built with FSC and recovered wood and are available in various finishes.

 

Accessory installation

 

 

 


 

Directions

  1. The blueprint works for all our walls. Consider if you’d like a vertical or horizontal installation.
  2. Aligning the top right corner of the blueprint to where you would like the top right of the wall to be installed.
  3. The A and C sections of the blueprint are for the Small Wall panel, A for vertical installation, and A and C for horizontal installation. The A, AB and C sections are for the Large Wall panel, A and AB for vertical installation and A and C for horizontal installation.
  4. Insert one of the included pins through the upper left corner of the blueprint into the drywall to hold the left side in place.
  5. Level the blueprint using the bubble level included by adjusting the left side up and down.
  6. Once aligned, insert the second pin through the right upper corner.
  7. Align the wall mounts onto the blueprint outline. 
  8. Screw into the four corners of each wall mount.
  9. Tear off the marked blueprint edges.
  10. Place your N+-S wall panel onto the anchor of the wall mounts and center it.
  11. If the panel is leveled, move on to step 13, if not, remove the bubble level from your blueprint and place on top of the wall panel.
  12. Using the Allen key included, adjust the metal wall mount by removing the wall panel and turning the screw clockwise or counterclockwise the to lift or lower the left or right wall mounts until leveled and aligned with other wall panels.
  13. Repeat as many times as needed if installing multiple panels.
  14. Enjoy your walls.
 

 

Our magnets

We have manufactured our magnets using the latest in Halbach magnetic technology, allowing us tot maximize the magnet’s strength while reducing it’s size.  

Note: Want to learn more on Halbach construction see link below:

 https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Halbach_array.

 

Show off your space transformation #MyNSWalls.

 

 

 

Warning:This product has been designed to allow a do it yourself installation, however, the wall panels and accessories are heavy and if not installed properly or if misused they may cause physical harm. Please use common sense, make sure you follow installation instructions and if something is wobbly or looks off contact us prior to use. In no event shall our company be liable for any direct, indirect, punitive, incidental, special consequential damages, to property or life, whatsoever arising out of or connected with the use or misuse of our products. You are assuming responsibility and risk for your installation and use of our products.
story_txt:
Empty walls are all around us, why not take advantage of all that space? From one stand-alone panel to an arrangement of multiple ones the length of your wall, our magnetic accessories can be placed anywhere on the panels surface, creating functional spaces you never knew you had.Our shipping pledge to you: January 2021 shipping to US, Canada, and Mexico Addresses or 100% of your money back.We have limited stock for this early bird campaign that will ship starting December 2020, and completely by January 2021, we guarantee it or 100% of your money back, so buy now with confidence! Once we sell through this initial stock we will be shipping exclusively to the United States, early exclusive perks will no longer be available and each perk will have an updated new ship date.Products Frame set (Holds itself):3 different sizes frames from an ultra-large format to show off, to more standard sizes. Use them to display art work, or your favorite photographer (you). From family portraits to elephants smiling, display your life on the wall. Chunk Planter (15 lbs):These floating planters are awesome! Hand crafted from a single recovered solid wood chunk! Use them to build up your vertical garden as high as your wall allows. Each piece is naturally different and unique. This planter can also be used as a stylish storage space for remotes, keys…You name it.  Bottle stones (holds one standard wine bottle):Inspired by river stones, we created a unique bottle holder that suspends your bottles midair. As with river stones, each piece is meticulously polished into a non-repeatable shapes and patterns. Show off your wine collection in a truly unique way!Note: This bottle holder functions using pressure, meaning, the bottle head will have a tight fit, therefore, installation may damage the cork capsule (the metal thing covering the cork) and is not compatible with wax capsules. One size only, will fit most but not all wine bottles. Cutting board (5 lbs):Made from reclaimed solid walnut wood, this is a must have for any kitchen. This magnetic cutting board also serves as a knife rack! Each cutting board has one-of-a-kind grain and color patterns and is finished with olive oil making maintenance a breeze. Cutting boards are finished with natural olive oil making them food safe. Shroom Shelves (15 lbs):Carved out of a single piece of wood, these shelves were inspired by the fungus that grows on tree trunks. Use these as decorative objects, or one of a kind display stands for that hot dog eating trophy. Add an extra layer of excitement to your wall by staggering multiple shelves into a pattern of your choice! LC Expandable Shelves (20 lbs each​):Use your walls as a canvas with this modular shelving system. Each set comes with 2 L shape pieces and 1 C shape. Create large shelving structures for huge objects or smaller ones for those tiny valuables. The metal shelves are individually hand shaped by master craftsmen and finished with our special sauce. 0 Gravity book shelves (20 lbs each​):The printed word is becoming a rarity in the digital age. Yet, there is an undeniable charm to holding an actual book in your hands. We look to commemorate books, exhibiting them naked, showing nothing other than books themselves. Use the 0 gravity shelves to show off your own collection! Key chain (holds itself with some keys and cash):No more misplacing keys. Get home and simply throw them on the wall to find them waiting for you. With the added perk of serving as a money clip, keep your cash and keys in the same place! Lumio (holds itself):Lumio is an American product featured on the popular tv show Shark Tank. It’s magnetic backing works perfectly with our walls. Makes for a great night light, cordless and a great addition to your walls. Stack up on lamps and build up incredible light fixtures! Speakers (holds itself):Music on the go! A pair of Bluetooth wireless speakers, with battery life of up to 6 hours. Effortlessly place them anywhere on your wall and just as easily move them around.“Without music life would be a mistake “ Friedrich Nietzsche Hive Lights (holds itself):A modular light touch system, each set is sold with 10 individual lights and one light with an AC plug. Link them together to achieve a wide range of shapes, touch each individually to light modules individually! Add or remove modules as desired to build up a great light sculpture! Mag Set 5, 15, and 25 lbs: Bring out your creativity, whether to finally find a place for that TV remote, or for tackling a larger project, use the mag set to make your valuables compatible with your walls.The set is composed of different intensity magnets to tackle any of your ideas! Magnets, metal and fingers don’t get along! Our magnets are super strong, they should be handled with care, this set is intended for handy people. Please use with care. Big NS wall (110 lbs):Our big panel format serves perfectly as a stand-alone object or can be easily installed with other panels to quickly transform an entire wall. This makes these panels perfect for kitchen, office, living, or bedroom spaces. Whether you want to add a design element to a room or tidy up a space, these are the panels for you. Our panels are built with FSC and recovered wood and are available in various finishes. Small NS wall (55 lbs):Our small panels are perfect for those odd spaces. Transform a column into a functional space in your home or use them on that wired wall in your kitchen for some extra functional space. Perfect for gifts, they also work great to complete a full wall, helping to fill those smaller spaces. Our panels are built with FSC and recovered wood and are available in various finishes. Accessory installation  


 

 Directions
The blueprint works for all our walls. Consider if you’d like a vertical or horizontal installation.
Aligning the top right corner of the blueprint to where you would like the top right of the wall to be installed.
The A and C sections of the blueprint are for the Small Wall panel, A for vertical installation, and A and C for horizontal installation. The A, AB and C sections are for the Large Wall panel, A and AB for vertical installation and A and C for horizontal installation.
Insert one of the included pins through the upper left corner of the blueprint into the drywall to hold the left side in place.
Level the blueprint using the bubble level included by adjusting the left side up and down.
Once aligned, insert the second pin through the right upper corner.
Align the wall mounts onto the blueprint outline. 
Screw into the four corners of each wall mount.
Tear off the marked blueprint edges.
Place your N+-S wall panel onto the anchor of the wall mounts and center it.
If the panel is leveled, move on to step 13, if not, remove the bubble level from your blueprint and place on top of the wall panel.
Using the Allen key included, adjust the metal wall mount by removing the wall panel and turning the screw clockwise or counterclockwise the to lift or lower the left or right wall mounts until leveled and aligned with other wall panels.
Repeat as many times as needed if installing multiple panels.
Enjoy your walls.
  Our magnetsWe have manufactured our magnets using the latest in Halbach magnetic technology, allowing us tot maximize the magnet’s strength while reducing it’s size.  Note: Want to learn more on Halbach construction see link below: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Halbach_array. Show off your space transformation #MyNSWalls.   Warning:This product has been designed to allow a do it yourself installation, however, the wall panels and accessories are heavy and if not installed properly or if misused they may cause physical harm. Please use common sense, make sure you follow installation instructions and if something is wobbly or looks off contact us prior to use. In no event shall our company be liable for any direct, indirect, punitive, incidental, special consequential damages, to property or life, whatsoever arising out of or connected with the use or misuse of our products. You are assuming responsibility and risk for your installation and use of our products.

story: Campaign
story_txt: Campaign

story:
The Pitch 

Pool Safe® was an idea that was dreamt up as a solution to protect kids and families from the tragedy of accidental drownings. Too many times in recent years there has been a spike in kids getting into backyard pools and falling in. Watching these stories on the nightly news and knowing the heartache this would cause the parents made me take stock and see if I could use my skills to come up with a solution to add a further layer of protection to the backyard pool. At the end of the day if Pool Safe® can save just one child's life and spare another family from the heartache of losing a child then it'll all be worth it. I'm hoping you can help get Pool Safe® to market by early 2018 and make this dream a reality. 

The Breakdown (Where your early contributions are going)

To be honest I am unsure of the total cost to bring the final product to market but I have been given a 'ballpark' figure from the development team of $100000 as a good indicator of final development costs and initial production of 2500 units. This includes all software, hardware and manufacturing engineering, retooling of production machines, industrial design and Australian standards accreditation. The following components will be developed to full production levels should we reach the campaign goal. 

  1. Silicone wristband with inbuilt proximity sensor and vibration motor
    • The moulded silicone wristband will be developed with a local Australian wristband manufacturer (http://www.aacidsolutions.com.au) in conjunction with the development team from Genesys (http://www.genesysdesign.com.au/). The final design will be lightweight, durable and comfortable to wear. 
  2. Integrated, low voltage proximity pool lock and gate sensor 
    • The low voltage electronic lock, with incorporated electronics, solar charge and battery backup will be designed in conjunction with the wristband and Genesys to provide a proximity activated locking system. If the wristband is not within 2 metres of the gate then the electronic lock can not be opened. Also incorporated into the locking system is a sensor which will cause the wristband to vibrate if the door is opened or not correctly closed for whatever reason. 

I am also investing every dollar I have to make Pool Safe® a reality which amounts to a further $25000.

Perks

This campaign provides contributors with access to the first Pool Safe® off the production line and the knowledge that your contribution might save a child's life. All money raised in this campaign will be used to get Pool Safe® to market. What I can guarantee you is that I will put my heart and soul into this product and will not stop until I get this product to you guys...whatever it takes!

Please Help Get the Word Out!

Share, share, share! Even if you can't contribute to this campaign but love the idea of Pool Safe® please tell your friends, family or anybody you think could help get Pool Safe® to market. The more people that know about Pool Safe® the more chance we have to improve pool safety and make Pool Safe® a great success story.

story:
The Beams Chair is the first wooden I-beam chair in the world. It is very lightweight (only 4.5kg) yet extremely strong, elegant, and comfortable. Industrial style has been gaining popularity in recent years. It brings an interesting touch to a living space with sharp lines and simple form and with the appreciation of raw and rustic materials. With the Beams Chair, transforming a space to more modern and sophisticated industrial style becomes an easy task.




Inspired by the steel I-beams of the Golden Gate Bridge in San Francisco, the Beams Chair is made from wood I beams, which reduce the weight of the structure  while enhancing the strength of the chair.



Why I-beams? It is not a coincidence why we decided to use the I-beam as the main element in our design. I-beams are not only one of the major elements in industrial style, but they are also extremely strong and durable yet light-weight.

Why wood? Metal is cold and heavy; plastic is indifferent and artificial. However, wood is natural and gives a welcoming sense of warmth.

 


Beams Chair 1.0 was created in 2012. It was selected by the 2013 IMM Cologne [D3] Contest, one of the most prestigious international furniture design competitions for emerging designers in the world. At that time, the Beams Chair was produced by Bächer Bergmann GmbH. The production process of the Beams Chair 1.0 is shown below.

 

We have taken three years to refine the design of Beams Chair with feedback from imm Cologne. Now, the Beams Chair is more comfortable and ergonomic than ever. 


MORE COMFORTABLE

Comparison between Beams Chair 1.0 & 2.0 - Small adjustments improve the experience of Beams Chair.


MORE BEAUTIFUL

These elegant and beautiful chairs are 
mostly constructed with solid wood.


QUALITY 

To achieve outstanding quality we selected A Grade Ash from North America. Every part of Beams Chair 2.0 is precisely cut on 5-axis CNC machines. Our master craftsmen take pride in their quality work.

Now in the end of 2015, we have the confidence to say Beams Chair 2.0 is comfortable, beautiful, and also with high quality.



It is easy to style your living space with Beams Chair. Here are a few examples. More can be viewed in the gallery. 



Beams Chair will add clean lines and sophisticated feel to your living space and transform the dynamics of the interior to a modern and fluid feel. If you would like to decorate your home/office in industrial style, Beams Chair is an easy solution. Please support our campaign so we can keep producing quality furniture in industrial style for you.


EAJY designers Eric and Johnny were college buddies. They dreamed of having their own furniture brand so they came to Germany to further their study and hone their skills. Along the way their designs had been selected by 2012 and 2013 IMM Cologne [D3] Contests. Their confidence grew and finally founded EAJY Design Studio in 2015. Beams Chair is the first industrial style product that they put on the market.



Detail about Beams Chair





We ship worldwide. Free Shipping to Europe, North America (Canada, US, and Mexico), and Asia (except Pakistan and Yemen)









1.Do you ship worldwide?

Yes, we ship worldwide with free shipping to Europe, North America (Canada, US, and Mexico), and Asia (Except Pakistan and Yemen).

2.How do I choose more than one perk?

The Indiegogo system is not set up to choose multiple perks at one time. If you would like to choose more than one perk, you will need to select each one separately. If you face difficulties, please email info@eajy.de and use “Ordering problems on Indiegogo” as the subject line.

3.Can I choose different colors in two- or Four-chair perk?

Yes. Even though the Indiegogo system is not set up to allow that, you still can choose a perk first and then send an email to info@eajy.de by indicating “Color Choices on Indiegogo” in the subject line. The default color choice for the two- or four-chair perks is natural.

4.How can I submit a bulk order, if I need a large number of units?

For all bulk order inquiries, please email info@eajy.de and use “Bulk Order Inquiry" as the subject.

5. When will the order be delivered?

We will do our best to deliver the order to you as soon as possible. The first batch of 200 chairs will be shipped around March, 2016 (see the estimated schedule above).

6.Will I be able to get a refund?

Pre-orders are not refundable. By making a contribution to this campaign, you acknowledge that you understand that you are contributing to a work-in-progress and not making a direct purchase. For more details please see Indiegogo's Terms of Use.

7.What should I know about the shipping? 

Items are shipped via DHL. For Non-EU buyers, please note the following:

Import duties, taxes and any other additional customs charges are not included in the purchase price of the order. The client is responsible for covering these costs.

Please check with your country’s customs office to determine what these additional costs will be prior making a purchase.

These charges are normally administered and collected by the delivering freight (shipping) company or when you pick the item up - please do not confuse these charges for additional shipping charges.


8. What should I do, if I submit a pre-order but do not receive a confirmation email?

Please refer to this article on How to Know if Your Contribution is Successful. If it doesn't help, then you may need to contact  info@eajy.de.

9.There was an error with my contribution. What happened?

Please refer to this article on Common Contribution Errors. If it does not help, please contact info@eajy.de.

10. Whom should I contact, if I do not see the answers to my questions here?

For other inquiries, please send an email to info@eajy.deand we will be happy to serve you and answer your questions ASAP. Please not that we are a small team, so please be patient with us if we do not respond right away. Thank you!

story:
What Is Nixie?

A Nixie tube, or cold cathode display, is an electronic device for displaying numerals or other information using glow discharge. The glass tube contains a wire-mesh anode and multiple cathodes, shaped like numerals or other symbols. Applying power to one cathode surrounds it with an orange glow discharge. The tube is filled with a gas at low pressure, mostly neon and often a little mercury or argon.

Features

  • Light, durable and affordable
  • Matte black dyed wooden frame
  • Easy to use
  • Three buttons for settings
  • Dimmer button for RGB colour adjustment
  • Two tubes show hour
  • Two tubes show minute
  • And a dot shows second

Ways You Can Help

You can buy the product, donate or share this page with your friends.

story:
Barkyn Home

Life with your dog is meant to be simple so leave the stressful parts to us. With Barkyn Home your dog's favorite food is delivered at your doorstep when you need it while monitoring your dog's health through one powerful app connected to the device.

Our crystal ball says “You need this magic in your life”? Ready to start?

The magic you needed in your life!

With Barkyn Home you'll give a better life for your dog, and make more time for cuddles, more time for walks, more time for love.

 

A better health journey through sophisticated AI

With one of a kind technology, Barkyn Home prevents diseases, keeps track of your dog’s habits and connects you directly with a vet through video, voice or text messages. Telemedicine made easy.

  • Predicts obesity and diabetes propensity
  • Real-time telemedicine with vets for ANY and ALL issues
  • SOS hospital bookings and 'we're on-the-way' heads-up
  • Personalized daily tips and training programs
  • Learning and optimization of feeding habits

 


Automatic orders (bye-bye online check-outs)

This smart container understands your dog’s eating habits and predicts the exact day you’ll need a refill: good-bye last minute orders!

  • Works with Barkyn food 
  • Learns your dog's eating habits
  • Calculates when you need a refill
  • Automatic food refills
  • Notifies you when it's meal time
  • Tells you if you’re over or under feeding 

 

 

Beautiful piece of design

Barkyn Home sits perfectly in any room division: looks good, feels good, is good.

  • Great materials
  • Soft, sleek opening
  • Resistant like a rock, light as a feather
  • Capacity for 17kg of food
  • Safety lock for naughty dogs to prevent food steeling  

 

 

Skins: an extra "je ne sais quoi" to Barkyn Home

Give it an extra touch of personality to Barkyn Home by choosing a skin. It's a 5 second task that gives an additional edge to the device. 

 

Why we need your help?

To get the magic into every pet-family's home we need your help!

We already have our first Barkyn Home prototype, but we want to make it deliverable and affordable to all families.

This is where your support comes in: help us fund the production process to cut back production costs and make it possibile for all pet-families' budgets.

Our goal? 100 000€. 

Believe in us now and enjoy some really cool perks. Love the idea? Share it with your family and friends too!

 

How does this work?

It's very simple as we developed Barkyn Home to make your life easier while improving your dog's health.

  • You support us today by pre-ordering Barkyn Home. Shipping is thought to begin in September, 2021 (to all European contries - iep iep hooray!).
  • When Barkyn Home starts shipping, you'll then need to choose one of our Barkyn food plans, which is tailored-thought for your dog.
  • We'll ship Barkyn Home and the food you picked directly to your door. Food is delivered and charged on a monthy basis or when you need it. The magic starts then!
  • Barkyn Home will learn your dog’s eating habits. By doing so, we'll ship more food as you need it, when you need it. Of course, you'll always be notified before the shipment and you can personalize the whole experience if needed. You'll ever run out of food and you’ll never need to worry about online check-outs again.

Tells you if you’re over or under feeding 

 
 
Beautiful piece of design
Barkyn Home sits perfectly in any room division: looks good, feels good, is good.

Great materials
Soft, sleek opening
Resistant like a rock, light as a feather
Capacity for 17kg of food
Safety lock for naughty dogs to prevent food steeling  

 

 
Skins: an extra "je ne sais quoi" to Barkyn Home
Give it an extra touch of personality to Barkyn Home by choosing a skin. It's a 5 second task that gives an additional edge to the device. 

 
Why we need your help?
To get the magic into every pet-family's home we need your help!
We already have our first Barkyn Home prototype, but we want to make it deliverable and affordable to all families.
This is where your support comes in: help us fund the production process to cut back production costs and make it possibile for all pet-families' budgets.
Our goal? 100 000€. 
Believe in us now and enjoy some really cool perks. Love the idea? Share it with your family and friends too!

 
How does this work?
It's very simple as we developed Barkyn Home to make your life easier while improving your dog's health.

You support us today by pre-ordering Barkyn Home. Shipping is thought to begin in September, 2021 (to all European contries - iep iep hooray!).
When Barkyn Home starts shipping, you'll then need to choose one of our Barkyn food plans, which is tailored-thought for your dog.
We'll ship Barkyn Home and the food you picked directly to your door. Food is delivered and charged on a monthy basis or when you need it. The magic starts then!
Barkyn Home will learn your dog’s eating habits. By doing so, we'll ship more food as you need it, when you need it. Of course, you'll always be notified before the shipment and you can personalize the whole experience if needed. You'll ever run out of food and you’ll never need to worry about online check-outs again.

story:
Overview

ARDEN: THE ALL-IN-ONE SMART HUB

We wanted to give everyone control of their home security and smart home. That is why we created Arden. Arden connects to any TV with an HDMI input and connects to 3rd party devices like cable boxes, AV receivers, and more. Allowing our device to overlay information, camera overlays and other content on whatever you are watching without interrupting viewing.  Arden can also interface with all your smart devices. With full Play Store access, customers can download all their favorite apps and interact with them natively on their television. This feature opens up a wide range of possibilities. Features like overlaying notifications when your smart alarm trips a sensor, to reminders on the screen when one is set using the Amazon Echo. We are also developing a way to overlay any app on  Arden unobtrusively, the same way we overlay cameras. Allowing you to control home automation platforms, individual devices and more while you watch tv.

Next Gen Video Security 

VIDEO SURVEILLANCE OVERLAY USING ALEXA

Arden's home security features are unmatched. It allows users to see their surveillance cameras around the house without interrupting what they are watching. Heard a strange noise outside or just want to see a specific camera? Voice control each of your cameras by name using the Amazon echo or Google Home. Cameras display in a picture in picture window and do not block what you are watching. Each window can be resized and will display anywhere on the screen you want them to. You can also display multiple cameras simultaneously.  Allowing the system to actively track a persons movement as they move around your home. 

 

Surveillance for the whole family

Its important to each parent that their loved ones are safe. When an Arden unit is connected to each television in the home, each family member can see whats going on around them. Now when the kids are watching cartoons, they too can see when a stranger walks on the property. If that happens, they can contact their parents and take action in advance if needed.

Arden.ai Packages

Artificial Intelligence Analytics

Arden.ai is an ai based video security system. We created packages using hardware and software to make the best smart home surveillance system on the market. With our Arden,ai packages, we bundle real time person detection, animal and vehicle detection, intrusion detection and more. We also link Arden smart hubs to each television to overlay cameras once an ai rule is triggered. For example, if a person is detected on the driveway camera, Arden will instantly show the affected camera on any television in the home. Doing so autonomously allows your home to keep an eye out for welcomed and un-welcomed guests, even when you can't.

Combined with Alexa integration, Arden.ai packs features no other system on the market can collectively match. Built using Sighthound, one of the most advanced ai sdk's on the market, Arden.ai ensure customers are always aware of whats going on around their home. With mobile app access, users will be able to view events based on people, cars, animals and more. Preventing wasted time searching through hours of footage looking for a specific event. Soon we will be adding other features to make Arden.ai even more powerful.  
Arden.ai tracking a person as he walks around the home on multiple cameras and displaying overlays on the Arden Smart hub.
 
Overlay any App or Home Automation Platform

Control home automation platforms like Control4,  Smartthings, and more on your tv without interrupting what you are watching. Arden is able to display native apps on screen and allow users to interact with them. You can even assign voice commands to display them. This feature also allows us to integrate with proprietary platforms like Ring or Nest. Allowing users to overlay live video from each platform while the user watches tv.

Customisable and Expandable Hardware
Arden.ai can be upgraded to fit your needs. From expandable Ram(up to 32gb), M.2 SSD, to an internal HDD. Our Arden.ai V2 unit comes with an i5 processor and is completely fan less. The V3 version has an i7 processor and both units can be configure to fit your needs. Small form factor allows the units to fit in tight spaces and can be hidden from view. Perfect for customers wanting to hide their hardware away from prying eyes. 
 
Smart Device Notifications and Alerts
Login to all your iot devices and have them display notification right on your tv. From security alerts from your smart alarm, to reminders from our echo devices. All can display unobtrusively on your television in any room. See when every your door opens or when the kids open the pantry door. The possibilities are endless.

Full Remote Support

Both Arden and Arden.ai hardware have full remote support capabilities. We can set up and configure your devices remotely just in case you have difficulties doing it. We also provide service and support plans to assist you in integrating devices, setting up advances commands, configuring ai events and more. Arden is a growing platform and we will be adding new and exciting features over time. 

Integrator and Installer Friendly

We made sure that Arden was end user friendly but also Installer friendly. With remote access and features tailored especially for integrators, Arden provides a very unique opportunity for professionals to install our system and device in customers homes. We will have dealer pricing for dealers who purchase our dealer perk. Your email will be saved in our portal and once  launched, it will be used to access special pricing, access to our solutions center, the ability to send your customers interactive information overlays and more. 

 

 

PAIR ARDEN WITH ALL YOUR SMART HOME DEVICES

Arden is designed to work with all smart devices. We've designed custom Amazon Echo skills to control all of Arden's features via voice. 

 

What's In The Box

Specs

  • Arden Android 6.0 Marshmallow
  • Quad-Core 64-bit Processor
  • HDMI 2.0a
  • HDMI IN
  • Bluetooth 4.0
  • 5G Dual-Band WiFi
  • 1 Gbps Ethernet
  • 4K@60fps
  • High Dynamic Range(HDR) Support
  • 3D Support
  • HD Audio (up to 7.1CH Support)
  • 1xUSB3.0, 2xUSB2.0
  • MicroSD Card Reader
  • SATA III Connection
  • Aluminum Construction

Our Team

Our mission is to provide technology solutions that outshine any potential competition. We strive to give consumers the best product for their money and we take pride knowing that our system improves a users day-to-day life. From revolutionary home automation solutions to business services unlike any other, Jetsons Living will be your first step into the future.

Our Progress

Arden and Arden.ai are currently being enjoyed in customers homes in central Florida. We already have an established customer based who have been using our system and we are ready to take it to the masses. We also have a few customers in other states and 3 countries. 

Please contact office@jetsonsliving.com for any additional inquiries.

story:
BUY NOW HERE : WWW.THEYESCOM.COM

Shipping update.

We have already started shipping and mass production. Will receive your Chopbox quite soon!

 

PRODUCT REVIEW VIDEO BY SUPERBACKER @brollandboardgames

Instead of needing up to five single-use gadgets and tools in your kitchen the ChopBox combines all five into one amazing cutting board. You’ll never need to find or store smaller single-use tools like a food scale or kitchen timer again and will have more room for storage and organization in your kitchen.

Germs & Bacteria in the Kitchen 

Did you know that knife blocks, drawers, and even regular cutting boards harbor tons of bacteria and germs?
 

It seems like no one talks about it, but the hidden germs in your kitchen is very real.

 The Doctors Eat This, Not That Daily Meal . Cooking Light, Dr. Oz, Yahoo! 

The revolutionary ChopBox makes sanitizing your knives and cutting surfaces easy and brings germ-free cooking to your kitchen with a built-in disinfecting UVC light in the cutting board.

Here is some research from Columbia University Irving Medical Center on the efficacy of UV light on germs and bacteria:
Article titled “Can UV Light Fight the Spread of Influenza?”: https://www.cuimc.columbia.edu/news/can-uv-light-fight-spread-influenza

Notable quote from this article: ​“Scientists have known for decades that broad-spectrum germicidal UV light, which has wavelengths between 200 and 400 nanometers (nm), is highly effective at killing bacteria and viruses by destroying the molecular bonds that hold their DNA together. This conventional UV light is routinely used to decontaminate surgical equipment.”

Columbia University Irving Medical Center Video titled “Narrow Range of UV Safely Kills Drug-Resistant Bacteria”: ​https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jSWhEubyRoY

Here is an article by PhoneSoap, known for their bestselling UV light device cleaner: “How Does UV Light Kill Bacteria?”: ​https://www.phonesoap.com/blogs/news/how-does-uv-light-kill-bacteria

Here is an article from Genetic Engineering & Biotechnology News, “UV Light That is Safe for Humans but Bad for Bacteria and Viruses”: https://www.genengnews.com/topics/translational-medicine/uv-light-that-is-safe-for-humans-but- bad-for-bacteria-and-viruses/

Here is a timelapse video from Sci-Inspi of UV effects on bacteria:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z4qrnMlhbpE 

KILL 99.99% OF GERMS AND BACTERIA WITH EVERY USE.

Traditional knife blocks and cutting boards with gouges and scrapes can harbor harmful bacteria and germs. But who thinks to sanitize their knife after grabbing it? Now you can place your knife in between the two cutting surfaces and activate the small but powerful 254nm UVC light to sanitize up to 3 knives at once AND both cutting surfaces at the same time! Just one minute of UVC light exposure is guaranteed to kill 99.99% of germs and bacteria.

The 254nm UVC light used in the ChopBox is small and has a limited angle with only a small gap in the boards when in use. It is 100% safe for all humans to be around and near this light. The UVC light will automatically switch off when you separate the two boards or you can press the second button on the control panel to turn it off. You will receive no negative side effects from this UVC light  

DOUBLE UP YOUR SPACE AND AVOID CROSS-CONTAMINATION

With two cutting surfaces, you can switch between raw meat and seafood to other foods without ever having to worry about cross-contamination. You can also use the smaller cutting board for food scraps, as an area to store cut foods, and for transferring your chopped food to the stove.

The main cutting surface is replaceable. Buy parts via Kickstarter, or You will receive a survey after the campaign is over to add on replacement parts. or form theyesco store /Amazon after the campaign.

BUILT-IN DIGITAL SCALE WEIGHS UP TO 6.6 POUNDS

The built-in scale is part of the cutting board on the left hand side. You can measure your ingredients in grams, ounces, pounds, kilogram and the scale weighs up to 6.6 pounds. Always get the exact right portion!

The middle button on the control panel is used to switch between grams, ounces, pounds, kilogram with a single long-press. 

The scale features a tare function. To zero out the scale for a bowl or other vessel, just place the bowl on the scale and press the third (middle) button on the control panel to zero out the scale so that you're only weighing the goof, not the container.  

9 - HOUR KITCHEN TIMER

Your food will come out perfectly every time with our 9 -hour digital kitchen timer built-in to the ChopBox. Unlike traditional kitchen timers which can only go up to 59 minutes, the ChopBox timer has a longer readout and can be set for up to 9 hours, 59 minutes and 59 seconds, so even big meals and slow cooker meals can be set on this timer.

DUAL INSET KNIFE SHARPENERS 

It’s tough to remember where you put that small knife sharpener or know you’re using the honing steel type of sharpener correctly, so we made it easier than ever by putting two knife sharpeners right on the side of the cutting board. They are easily accessible and simple to use.

There are two different knife sharpeners built into the ChopBox. One is made from diamond stone and the other is made of ceramic stone, so you can pick your level of sharpness.

For more information on the diamond and ceramic knife sharpeners, see this from Wuesthof: https://www.wuesthof.com/international/knowledge/honing-und-sharpening/sharpening/index.jsp

The sharpeners are replaceable. Buy parts via Kickstarter, or You will receive a survey after the campaign is over to add on replacement parts. or form theyesco store /Amazon after the campaign.

GROOVE FOR CATCHING RUNOFF

There is a groove surrounding the cutting surface on the larger cutting surface for catching any juices from falling off and onto your counter, clothing, or floor. Just another small feature to make this the best cutting board you’ve ever used.

USE SECOND BOARD AS PRESENTATION PLATER

In addition to food preparation, this smart cutting board is a perfect food presentation platter for parties and guests! With two clean uniform surfaces, you can use it as two separate food serving surfaces or as the perfect cheese or charcuterie board with the second surface coming out from the bottom to hold cheese knives and catch any drips.

THE BATTERY LASTS UP TO 30 DAYS ON A SINGLE CHARGE

The ChopBox has a large battery inside [3000 mAh] which charges quickly. With just one hour of charging you get up to 30 days of regular daily use of your smart cutting board.

COMPLETELY WATERPROOF FOR EASY CLEAN UP

IPX is a waterproof rating system that refers to the ability of an object to resist water. For example, IPX0 means something is not water resistant at all, such as a book. IPX2 means your object is protected from “some water drops when the device is tilted up to and including 15 degrees.” The rating goes up to IPX8, which means your object is protected even if it is dropped in over 3 feet of water and is fully waterproof.

The ChopBox is rated IPX7, meaning it is fully waterproof and can withstand being in water up to 3 feet deep! 

We do NOT recommend putting the ChopBox in a dishwasher, as the high heat in dishwashers warp and break down all natural cutting boards over time

DURABILITY TESTED AND HIGH STRENGTH 

ChopBox is​ incredibly strong​!​ It holds up to 150 pounds of weight.

Bamboo is completely natural and organic and is considered a “low maintenance wood,” meaning it is very hard and dense, so it keeps water out of the wood itself so it will not warp or crack as other woods can.

Other woods like maple, walnut, or cherry require regular maintenance with mineral oil or beeswax to keep it from cracking and warping. Bamboo is also resistant to knife scarring, due to its hard density and is known for its durability and affordability.

UPDATE OF CHANGED 

100 % RECYCLABLE AND REPLACEABLE PARTS

We are listening to you! Because of comments and great ideas from our backers, we have made a couple of changes that will make the ChopBox even better! These changes should not delay the scheduled shipping dates and are already in process.

Sustainability is a priority for our us, so to increase the lifetime of our products, we have redesigned the main cutting board to make sure some parts are replaceable.

We are happy to announce that you WILL be able to purchase the following replaceable parts from either Kickstarter or from our Theyesco store on our website after the campaign is over.

The following REPLACEABLE parts will be available for purchase SEPARATELY:

*Main Cutting Board Surface

*Knife Sharpeners

We will be also creating tutorials to make the replacing process easy.

Thank you to our backers for the great suggestions, we are excited to make the ChopBox even better and make it last for a lifetime.100 % RECYCLABLE AND REPLACEABLE PARTS

Natural bamboo construction and easy-to-replace parts.


We love the environment and want to be conscious of our environmental footprint, so the ChopBox is made out of completely recyclable bamboo and can be recycled after easily removing the internal electronic components.

We also pack and ship in recyclable materials to make it easy for you to be socially conscious, too! 

Natural cutting boards are better for you. Sharp knives on plastic cutting boards create knicks in the plastic, which means that small pieces of plastic can and do end up in the food you are cutting. 

See some of the pictures below from our molding and production process. We want to make sure we will be able to ship the ChopBox on time and have already begun the molding process before this campaign has even launched. It is now in the production stage and we can’t wait to get yours to your home.

Our designer and mechanical engineer in PCBA factory

We've completed the design for manufacturing & assembly (DFMA) reviews for the product. The next step is to create the tools necessary to manufacture the different plastic parts of ChopBox. We plan to finish the whole tooling process by the end of September. We have will a trial production run in October and will be testing the product again before we do mass production. Our first batch of 2000 units will start in early November and we predict the larger production run of around 25000 -35000 units (depending on the orders from Indiegogo) will start shipping at end of November and beginning of December.

Injection molding

 

One of our top designers at The Yes Company is a skilled home chef, and as a designer and inventor, he is obsessed with efficiency and great design. He started to see smaller issues, like not being able to find the gadget he needed while cooking or having to buy and store more things to get the job done. 


Then he learned about the bigger problems: How many germs can live on a cutting board and on knives and the risk of cross-contamination when cutting raw meat.

When sharing his story, our team went into overdrive to find a solution. If he was having these problems, there was no doubt in our minds that other home cooks were experiencing the same.

So, we set out to solve every single problem he presented us with and more. 

In addition to solving common kitchen issues, we at The Yes Company decided to take it even further and create a smart kitchen appliance out of natural, organic materials - good for you, good for the planet, beautiful design.
 

With a first of it’s kind bamboo-skin LED, we created a way to insert an LED backlight into bamboo without marring the gorgeous natural bamboo coloring so it blends right into the board until you’re ready to use it.

We wanted to design a smart, creative, useful product to make cooking a delicious homecooked meal easier and more efficient, all while saving you time, money, and hassle. The key thing for us in the design process was to make something that was useful and had all the features you need while including the electronic components to give you the efficiency and smart capabilities. 

We love how the ChopBox came out and can’t wait for you to try it!

Now you won’t have to buy and store a bunch of small gadgets, you can have one beautiful piece that has everything you need.

 

SHIPPING DETAILS

Many people are asking about the high cost of shipping. We have been working with many shipping services to try to get the best prices for global shipping and Container shipping is currently the best rate. We know it is pricey, and a big part of that is due to the weight (over 6 pounds!) of the cutting board plus the weight of the packaging. We are continuing to work with shipping companies and will change services if we find one with a better price. In the meantime, we have significantly discounted the ChopBox more than we originally planned to in order to make up for the higher shipping costs.

As a design company, we have gotten dozens of products through the production process helping third-party designers and retailers, and we’ve learned a lot about this process. This experience has led us to be more knowledgeable and have a better grasp on timelines. We promise to work our hardest to bring you the best possible product to you in the proposed time frame. 

 

 

 

  • What shipping service we are using?
  • Most of the rewards we have listed (except the SUPER FAST DELIVERY), will use Container shipping to ship to the destination country or city and then use the local post office or shipping services to get the ChopBox to your home. We are using Container to ship this product because it is not a small and light product, and including the packaging, it will be around 3.5kg (7.7 pounds), and the box is fairly large. We want you to have a cheapest shipping cost possible and this is how we can do that.

 

  • How long does it take to ship to our place?
  • We will ship it via Container. For US residents, it will take 30 days for standard shipping. For the EU, it will take 40 days for standard shipping, plus another 3 - 5 days for local delivery to your door by local shipping services.

 

  • Is there VAT, duties or fees related to shipping?
  • For container shipment order to US EU AU CA CN HK SG area, we will pay the tax.
  • Kickstarter rewards are gifts that you receive in return for your donations. They are different from ordinary sales/purchases. Our courier had worked on dozens crowdfunding projects which went smoothly through fulfillment. Under our arrangement, it won't entail additional costs for you under most circumstances. Despite that, the fact we're shipping directly from China may still impose a chance for further inspection and determination by the customs. The VAT, duties and fees vary by country. Please message us about the specifics.

 

  • What's the warranty?
  • We provide a 12-month warranty on Kickstarter orders, same as retail.

 

  • Why bamboo?
  • Bamboo is completely natural and organic and is considered a “low maintenance wood,” meaning it is very hard and dense, so it keeps water out of the wood itself, which also means it will not warp or crack as other woods can. Other woods like maple, walnut, or cherry require regular maintenance with mineral oil or beeswax to keep it from cracking and warping.
  • Bamboo is also resistant to knife scarring, due to its hard density and is known for its durability and affordability.

 

  • What are the dimensions of the cutting board?
  • 17.9” x 11” x 1.2”

 

  • How heavy is the cutting board?
  • 6 pounds

 

  • Is it dishwasher safe?
  • No. In fact, all organic and natural cutting boards will warp and degrade in dishwashers due to the high heat. And chemical cleaners can effect food safety. It is waterproof and you can clean it with soap and warm or hot water.

 

  • How do you sanitize knives?
  • When you place the second cutting surface on top of the first, there will be a slim gap between the two surfaces on the right side of the cutting board. Simply slide up to three knives sharp-side first into the gap, leave them for one minute, and let them be clean and sanitized!

 

  • Do all cutting boards harbor bacteria?
  • Yes! The scars left on cutting boards can be a breeding ground for germs, and tht is especially dangerous with plastic-based cutting boards. No one wants bits of plastic in or on their food. Because of the way you use the two cutting surfaces to sandwiched together to sanitize your knives, it also sanitizes BOTH cutting surfaces.

 

  • Why are there two knife sharpeners?
  • There are two because they are for differing amounts of sharpness. One is a diamond stone and the other is made from ceramic stone.

 

  • How do I wash the scale after putting meat on it?
  • The same way you would wash the rest of it, even the scale component is waterproof.

 

  • How long can the timer be set for?
  • The timer goes up to 9-hours and makes a sound when it is done.

 

  • How often do I need to charge the cutting board?
  • The cutting board has a small Micro - USB charging port on the left side by the scale/timer. You only need to charge once the right side of screen’s battery bar lower to 10-20% or so for 3 hours for it to be fully charged.

 

  • When will the smart cutting board be delivered?
  • We have moved into the production stage and we will have the first 2000 units of cutting boards ready around the first week of November. The rest of the orders will be fully finished by the end of November, and they will ship out right away.

 

  • What is the return policy?
  • We have a 30-day return policy. If your ChopBox is defective or a manufacturer error after opening, you can return it for a refund or exchange. However, if it is working properly, it cannot be returned once it is opened and used, due to potential cross-contamination issues. The ChopBox does have a one year warranty for any issues you experience in the first 12 months.

 

  • Can I buy more than one ChopBox? What about add-ons?
  • Yes, you can buy it through our survey later integrated with backerkit.
story_txt:
BUY NOW HERE : WWW.THEYESCOM.COMShipping update.We have already started shipping and mass production. Will receive your Chopbox quite soon! PRODUCT REVIEW VIDEO BY SUPERBACKER @brollandboardgames  Instead of needing up to five single-use gadgets and tools in your kitchen the ChopBox combines all five into one amazing cutting board. You’ll never need to find or store smaller single-use tools like a food scale or kitchen timer again and will have more room for storage and organization in your kitchen.  Germs & Bacteria in the Kitchen Did you know that knife blocks, drawers, and even regular cutting boards harbor tons of bacteria and germs? It seems like no one talks about it, but the hidden germs in your kitchen is very real. The Doctors Eat This, Not That Daily Meal . Cooking Light, Dr. Oz, Yahoo! The revolutionary ChopBox makes sanitizing your knives and cutting surfaces easy and brings germ-free cooking to your kitchen with a built-in disinfecting UVC light in the cutting board.Here is some research from Columbia University Irving Medical Center on the efficacy of UV light on germs and bacteria:Article titled “Can UV Light Fight the Spread of Influenza?”: https://www.cuimc.columbia.edu/news/can-uv-light-fight-spread-influenzaNotable quote from this article: ​“Scientists have known for decades that broad-spectrum germicidal UV light, which has wavelengths between 200 and 400 nanometers (nm), is highly effective at killing bacteria and viruses by destroying the molecular bonds that hold their DNA together. This conventional UV light is routinely used to decontaminate surgical equipment.”Columbia University Irving Medical Center Video titled “Narrow Range of UV Safely Kills Drug-Resistant Bacteria”: ​https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jSWhEubyRoYHere is an article by PhoneSoap, known for their bestselling UV light device cleaner: “How Does UV Light Kill Bacteria?”: ​https://www.phonesoap.com/blogs/news/how-does-uv-light-kill-bacteriaHere is an article from Genetic Engineering & Biotechnology News, “UV Light That is Safe for Humans but Bad for Bacteria and Viruses”: https://www.genengnews.com/topics/translational-medicine/uv-light-that-is-safe-for-humans-but- bad-for-bacteria-and-viruses/Here is a timelapse video from Sci-Inspi of UV effects on bacteria:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z4qrnMlhbpE KILL 99.99% OF GERMS AND BACTERIA WITH EVERY USE.Traditional knife blocks and cutting boards with gouges and scrapes can harbor harmful bacteria and germs. But who thinks to sanitize their knife after grabbing it? Now you can place your knife in between the two cutting surfaces and activate the small but powerful 254nm UVC light to sanitize up to 3 knives at once AND both cutting surfaces at the same time! Just one minute of UVC light exposure is guaranteed to kill 99.99% of germs and bacteria.The 254nm UVC light used in the ChopBox is small and has a limited angle with only a small gap in the boards when in use. It is 100% safe for all humans to be around and near this light. The UVC light will automatically switch off when you separate the two boards or you can press the second button on the control panel to turn it off. You will receive no negative side effects from this UVC light    DOUBLE UP YOUR SPACE AND AVOID CROSS-CONTAMINATIONWith two cutting surfaces, you can switch between raw meat and seafood to other foods without ever having to worry about cross-contamination. You can also use the smaller cutting board for food scraps, as an area to store cut foods, and for transferring your chopped food to the stove.The main cutting surface is replaceable. Buy parts via Kickstarter, or You will receive a survey after the campaign is over to add on replacement parts. or form theyesco store /Amazon after the campaign.  BUILT-IN DIGITAL SCALE WEIGHS UP TO 6.6 POUNDSThe built-in scale is part of the cutting board on the left hand side. You can measure your ingredients in grams, ounces, pounds, kilogram and the scale weighs up to 6.6 pounds. Always get the exact right portion!The middle button on the control panel is used to switch between grams, ounces, pounds, kilogram with a single long-press. The scale features a tare function. To zero out the scale for a bowl or other vessel, just place the bowl on the scale and press the third (middle) button on the control panel to zero out the scale so that you're only weighing the goof, not the container.    9 - HOUR KITCHEN TIMERYour food will come out perfectly every time with our 9 -hour digital kitchen timer built-in to the ChopBox. Unlike traditional kitchen timers which can only go up to 59 minutes, the ChopBox timer has a longer readout and can be set for up to 9 hours, 59 minutes and 59 seconds, so even big meals and slow cooker meals can be set on this timer.  DUAL INSET KNIFE SHARPENERS It’s tough to remember where you put that small knife sharpener or know you’re using the honing steel type of sharpener correctly, so we made it easier than ever by putting two knife sharpeners right on the side of the cutting board. They are easily accessible and simple to use.There are two different knife sharpeners built into the ChopBox. One is made from diamond stone and the other is made of ceramic stone, so you can pick your level of sharpness.For more information on the diamond and ceramic knife sharpeners, see this from Wuesthof: https://www.wuesthof.com/international/knowledge/honing-und-sharpening/sharpening/index.jspThe sharpeners are replaceable. Buy parts via Kickstarter, or You will receive a survey after the campaign is over to add on replacement parts. or form theyesco store /Amazon after the campaign.   GROOVE FOR CATCHING RUNOFFThere is a groove surrounding the cutting surface on the larger cutting surface for catching any juices from falling off and onto your counter, clothing, or floor. Just another small feature to make this the best cutting board you’ve ever used.USE SECOND BOARD AS PRESENTATION PLATERIn addition to food preparation, this smart cutting board is a perfect food presentation platter for parties and guests! With two clean uniform surfaces, you can use it as two separate food serving surfaces or as the perfect cheese or charcuterie board with the second surface coming out from the bottom to hold cheese knives and catch any drips. THE BATTERY LASTS UP TO 30 DAYS ON A SINGLE CHARGEThe ChopBox has a large battery inside [3000 mAh] which charges quickly. With just one hour of charging you get up to 30 days of regular daily use of your smart cutting board.COMPLETELY WATERPROOF FOR EASY CLEAN UPIPX is a waterproof rating system that refers to the ability of an object to resist water. For example, IPX0 means something is not water resistant at all, such as a book. IPX2 means your object is protected from “some water drops when the device is tilted up to and including 15 degrees.” The rating goes up to IPX8, which means your object is protected even if it is dropped in over 3 feet of water and is fully waterproof.The ChopBox is rated IPX7, meaning it is fully waterproof and can withstand being in water up to 3 feet deep! We do NOT recommend putting the ChopBox in a dishwasher, as the high heat in dishwashers warp and break down all natural cutting boards over time
DURABILITY TESTED AND HIGH STRENGTH ChopBox is​ incredibly strong​!​ It holds up to 150 pounds of weight.Bamboo is completely natural and organic and is considered a “low maintenance wood,” meaning it is very hard and dense, so it keeps water out of the wood itself so it will not warp or crack as other woods can.Other woods like maple, walnut, or cherry require regular maintenance with mineral oil or beeswax to keep it from cracking and warping. Bamboo is also resistant to knife scarring, due to its hard density and is known for its durability and affordability.  
UPDATE OF CHANGED 100 % RECYCLABLE AND REPLACEABLE PARTSWe are listening to you! Because of comments and great ideas from our backers, we have made a couple of changes that will make the ChopBox even better! These changes should not delay the scheduled shipping dates and are already in process.Sustainability is a priority for our us, so to increase the lifetime of our products, we have redesigned the main cutting board to make sure some parts are replaceable.We are happy to announce that you WILL be able to purchase the following replaceable parts from either Kickstarter or from our Theyesco store on our website after the campaign is over.The following REPLACEABLE parts will be available for purchase SEPARATELY:*Main Cutting Board Surface*Knife SharpenersWe will be also creating tutorials to make the replacing process easy.Thank you to our backers for the great suggestions, we are excited to make the ChopBox even better and make it last for a lifetime.100 % RECYCLABLE AND REPLACEABLE PARTSNatural bamboo construction and easy-to-replace parts.We love the environment and want to be conscious of our environmental footprint, so the ChopBox is made out of completely recyclable bamboo and can be recycled after easily removing the internal electronic components.We also pack and ship in recyclable materials to make it easy for you to be socially conscious, too! Natural cutting boards are better for you. Sharp knives on plastic cutting boards create knicks in the plastic, which means that small pieces of plastic can and do end up in the food you are cutting.  See some of the pictures below from our molding and production process. We want to make sure we will be able to ship the ChopBox on time and have already begun the molding process before this campaign has even launched. It is now in the production stage and we can’t wait to get yours to your home.Our designer and mechanical engineer in PCBA factory

 


 
We've completed the design for manufacturing & assembly (DFMA) reviews for the product. The next step is to create the tools necessary to manufacture the different plastic parts of ChopBox. We plan to finish the whole tooling process by the end of September. We have will a trial production run in October and will be testing the product again before we do mass production. Our first batch of 2000 units will start in early November and we predict the larger production run of around 25000 -35000 units (depending on the orders from Indiegogo) will start shipping at end of November and beginning of December.Injection molding One of our top designers at The Yes Company is a skilled home chef, and as a designer and inventor, he is obsessed with efficiency and great design. He started to see smaller issues, like not being able to find the gadget he needed while cooking or having to buy and store more things to get the job done. Then he learned about the bigger problems: How many germs can live on a cutting board and on knives and the risk of cross-contamination when cutting raw meat.When sharing his story, our team went into overdrive to find a solution. If he was having these problems, there was no doubt in our minds that other home cooks were experiencing the same.So, we set out to solve every single problem he presented us with and more. In addition to solving common kitchen issues, we at The Yes Company decided to take it even further and create a smart kitchen appliance out of natural, organic materials - good for you, good for the planet, beautiful design. With a first of it’s kind bamboo-skin LED, we created a way to insert an LED backlight into bamboo without marring the gorgeous natural bamboo coloring so it blends right into the board until you’re ready to use it.We wanted to design a smart, creative, useful product to make cooking a delicious homecooked meal easier and more efficient, all while saving you time, money, and hassle. The key thing for us in the design process was to make something that was useful and had all the features you need while including the electronic components to give you the efficiency and smart capabilities. We love how the ChopBox came out and can’t wait for you to try it!Now you won’t have to buy and store a bunch of small gadgets, you can have one beautiful piece that has everything you need.  SHIPPING DETAILSMany people are asking about the high cost of shipping. We have been working with many shipping services to try to get the best prices for global shipping and Container shipping is currently the best rate. We know it is pricey, and a big part of that is due to the weight (over 6 pounds!) of the cutting board plus the weight of the packaging. We are continuing to work with shipping companies and will change services if we find one with a better price. In the meantime, we have significantly discounted the ChopBox more than we originally planned to in order to make up for the higher shipping costs.As a design company, we have gotten dozens of products through the production process helping third-party designers and retailers, and we’ve learned a lot about this process. This experience has led us to be more knowledgeable and have a better grasp on timelines. We promise to work our hardest to bring you the best possible product to you in the proposed time frame.    
What shipping service we are using?
Most of the rewards we have listed (except the SUPER FAST DELIVERY), will use Container shipping to ship to the destination country or city and then use the local post office or shipping services to get the ChopBox to your home. We are using Container to ship this product because it is not a small and light product, and including the packaging, it will be around 3.5kg (7.7 pounds), and the box is fairly large. We want you to have a cheapest shipping cost possible and this is how we can do that.
 
How long does it take to ship to our place?
We will ship it via Container. For US residents, it will take 30 days for standard shipping. For the EU, it will take 40 days for standard shipping, plus another 3 - 5 days for local delivery to your door by local shipping services.
 
Is there VAT, duties or fees related to shipping?
For container shipment order to US EU AU CA CN HK SG area, we will pay the tax.
Kickstarter rewards are gifts that you receive in return for your donations. They are different from ordinary sales/purchases. Our courier had worked on dozens crowdfunding projects which went smoothly through fulfillment. Under our arrangement, it won't entail additional costs for you under most circumstances. Despite that, the fact we're shipping directly from China may still impose a chance for further inspection and determination by the customs. The VAT, duties and fees vary by country. Please message us about the specifics.
 
What's the warranty?
We provide a 12-month warranty on Kickstarter orders, same as retail.
 
Why bamboo?
Bamboo is completely natural and organic and is considered a “low maintenance wood,” meaning it is very hard and dense, so it keeps water out of the wood itself, which also means it will not warp or crack as other woods can. Other woods like maple, walnut, or cherry require regular maintenance with mineral oil or beeswax to keep it from cracking and warping.
Bamboo is also resistant to knife scarring, due to its hard density and is known for its durability and affordability.
 
What are the dimensions of the cutting board?
17.9” x 11” x 1.2”
 
How heavy is the cutting board?
6 pounds
 
Is it dishwasher safe?
No. In fact, all organic and natural cutting boards will warp and degrade in dishwashers due to the high heat. And chemical cleaners can effect food safety. It is waterproof and you can clean it with soap and warm or hot water.
 
How do you sanitize knives?
When you place the second cutting surface on top of the first, there will be a slim gap between the two surfaces on the right side of the cutting board. Simply slide up to three knives sharp-side first into the gap, leave them for one minute, and let them be clean and sanitized!
 
Do all cutting boards harbor bacteria?
Yes! The scars left on cutting boards can be a breeding ground for germs, and tht is especially dangerous with plastic-based cutting boards. No one wants bits of plastic in or on their food. Because of the way you use the two cutting surfaces to sandwiched together to sanitize your knives, it also sanitizes BOTH cutting surfaces.
 
Why are there two knife sharpeners?
There are two because they are for differing amounts of sharpness. One is a diamond stone and the other is made from ceramic stone.
 
How do I wash the scale after putting meat on it?
The same way you would wash the rest of it, even the scale component is waterproof.
 
How long can the timer be set for?
The timer goes up to 9-hours and makes a sound when it is done.
 
How often do I need to charge the cutting board?
The cutting board has a small Micro - USB charging port on the left side by the scale/timer. You only need to charge once the right side of screen’s battery bar lower to 10-20% or so for 3 hours for it to be fully charged.
 
When will the smart cutting board be delivered?
We have moved into the production stage and we will have the first 2000 units of cutting boards ready around the first week of November. The rest of the orders will be fully finished by the end of November, and they will ship out right away.
 
What is the return policy?
We have a 30-day return policy. If your ChopBox is defective or a manufacturer error after opening, you can return it for a refund or exchange. However, if it is working properly, it cannot be returned once it is opened and used, due to potential cross-contamination issues. The ChopBox does have a one year warranty for any issues you experience in the first 12 months.
 
Can I buy more than one ChopBox? What about add-ons?
Yes, you can buy it through our survey later integrated with backerkit.

story:
Hi there! We're Misen.

We design and make premium kitchen tools at fair prices. To preorder our Dutch Oven and make it a reality, click Back It. Or read on!

 

 

 

 

All backers receive 7qt Dutch Oven base and their choice of grill OR traditional lid.

 

 

 

 

Why Remake a Classic?

 

 

The Misen Dutch Oven offers premium durability, updated features, and superior cooking — at a reasonable price. 

The dutch oven is a workhorse. It can sauté, sear, boil, fry, bake, and braise, from the stove, to the oven, to the table.

Unfortunately, premium dutch ovens that last a lifetime are insanely expensive and overpriced. And cheaper, low-quality ones are prone to chipping and scratches — making them useless in just a few years.

We think there should be a better option. Premium quality and durability that will last forever, but sold for a fair and honest price.

 

 

 

 

 

It's Built to Last a Lifetime

 

 

High-End Protection Against Chipping & Cracking

We used 4 layers of enamel (the strongest enamel available) to prevent chipping, scratching, and cracking. It’s the luxury brands’ secret to life-long reliability.

Cheaper brands have hand-dipped enamel, creating uneven coatings that crack and chip more easily. Our modern spray application ensures an even coat that’s consistent down to 0.02 mm. Zero imperfections make for a lifetime of toughness.

 

 

Superior Durability: The Ball Drop Test

 

 

We dropped a 2 lb. metal ball from a 3 ft. height into each dutch oven to simulate metallic impact.

 

We wanted to make sure that our dutch oven was the most durable on the market, so we put it to the test.

We dropped a 2-pound steel ball from 3 feet in the air to simulate the dutch oven owner’s worst nightmare: a hard metallic impact. Cheap dutch ovens chipped and flaked almost immediately. But drop after drop, Misen's enamel coating remained chip-free and outlasted the competitors. Including the most expensive ones.

 

 

 

Our enamel outperformed the cheap brands, and matched or exceeded the expensive brands.

 

 

All-In-One Versatility

 

 

Grill Lid Makes This Dutch Oven Even More Versatile

Dutch ovens can already do almost anything in the kitchen. We wanted to make ours even more versatile.

So we designed a grill top lid that provides the same tight seal as our traditional lid, but can also be used alone as an indoor grill. The same premium cast iron and enamel layers help create a nearly-nonstick grilling experience and perfect browning.

If you prefer the traditional knob-style lid, don't worry — we offer those too.

 

 

 

Bonus Silicone Lid

 

 

Extra Versatility and Protection

This added silicone lid creates an airtight seal on your Misen Dutch Oven — handy if you’re using the grill top lid and base at the same time. It’s highly durable, PFOA-free, oven-safe, and made from platinum-grade silicone.

Plus, it stacks neatly between the lid and base when you’re storing them away. 

 

 

 

Compatibility

 

 

 

It's Honestly Priced

 

 

 

Premium durability, at a fraction of the price.

We don't think you should have to choose between wildly expensive “premium” pieces and the lower-quality cheap dutch ovens.

Luxury brands are durable, but carry unnecessarily high price tags thanks to clever branding. By working closely with our factories and selling directly to you, we're able to offer the same quality (or better!) at a much more reasonable price.

Our goal was simple. Create the most durable dutch oven possible, and sell it for a price that’s fair and affordable.

 

 

It's Easy to Care For

 

 

Nearly Nonstick, Zero Maintenance Needed, Dishwasher Safe 

Our enamel is smooth enough to be nearly nonstick without any maintenance.

Most messes just need a gentle soak and scrub to wipe away. Our dutch oven is also dishwasher-safe (though we’d prefer you hand-wash)!

 

 

Key Features

Thoughtful design updates to a classic piece make this dutch oven even easier to use at home

 

 

Design Process

 

 

The Millimeters Matter 

We spent over 18 months researching and developing the Misen Dutch Oven. We asked questions and received tons of feedback from our community on what they liked (and didn’t like) about these pieces.

We didn’t want to reinvent the wheel. Dutch ovens are already amazing cookware pieces, but we found a few small ways we could update the traditional design for an even better cooking experience.

Finally, we’ve got something we’re proud of. Design and tooling are complete, and we’re ready to go into production. But we need your help to make it happen!

Help make the Misen Dutch Oven a reality by picking a reward tier below, and backing this Indiegogo!

 

 

Rewards Tiers
