story:
Primo Ager is the world’s most advanced professional-grade dry aging system for your home. It’s fully automated, so you don’t have to worry about babysitting your steaks. Finally, you can have high-end, steakhouse quality, premium dry-aged meat at home, without the hassle or risk. 

No ridiculous markups or complicated systems — just delicious, tender steaks. Age up to 100 lbs of meat safely, effectively, and professionally with only 3 sq feet of space.

Primo Ager is fully automated and ensures your meat is always of the highest quality and safety standards. Temperature, humidity and air flow are strictly regulated and controlled by the integrated smart system and can be easily tracked and modified from the mobile app. Receive live updates directly to your phone and know exactly when your meat is ready to eat. 

No setup needed. Primo Ager is ready to go out of the box! It doesn’t need a water supply or even much space to operate. Simply plug it in and start aging. Professional dry-aging has never been this easy.

Every professional chef agrees — dry-aged meat just tastes better. From the concentrated flavor to the unmatched tenderness, a dry-aged steak is what separates the ordinary from the extraordinary. Each bite will have significantly more flavor and better texture.

Dry-aging works by naturally breaking down the meat in a hyper-controlled environment. Humidity and temperature are closely monitored and regulated to prevent the growth of health-hazardous bacteria and mold and allow beneficial internal enzymes and fermentation to break down the meat.

Moisture is drawn out, concentrating the meaty flavor. Natural enzymes found in the meat disassemble the collagen and connective tissues that make the meat tough, tenderizing it without sacrificing its integrity. The fat also begins to oxidize, adding another layer of intoxicating umami, while the fermentation contributes exotic nutty, buttery, and aromatic flavors. 

The result is a beautifully dry and tender steak that boasts a highly concentrated flavor enhanced by the sweetness and umami of broken down fats.

From Gordon Ramsay to 21 Michelin-starred chef, Alain Ducasse, top chefs around the world swear by a well-aged steak. There’s no denying it — dry-aging is the best way to prepare your meat.

With all the hype around dry-aging, you’d expect people to try it at home. And they have. There is a problem though. The typical refrigerator isn’t built for dry-aging. 

There’s no ventilation, no humidity regulation, and the temperature fluctuates every time you open the door or change what’s inside. Plus, all the other food and fridge smells start to bleed into your meat. No one wants a steak that tastes like old fridge.

All these factors combine to promote spoilage, rot, and the growth of life-threatening bacteria and mold that render your meat completely inedible. 

Some people have recommended wrapping your meat in cheesecloth or paper towels to absorb the moisture. However, this simply does not work. In fact, J. Kenji López-Alt, author of The Food Lab, conducted a very thorough experiment using this method to “dry-age” at home. The results? 



This is impossible with most typical home setups. The only way you could easily get a safe-to-eat dry-aged steak was at a high-end butcher shop or premium steakhouse. Till now.

Primo Ager is a professional dry-aging system made for your home. It’s designed and engineered with professional-grade technology, materials, and processes to ensure you always get safe, high-quality, premium dry-aged meat with every use. Best of all, it’s fully automated — making the dry-aging process simple and easy.

With Primo Ager, you can turn your locally bought ribeye into a tender, flavor-packed delicacy, transform your tenderloin into a rich, robust beefy beauty, and bring your T-Bone to its fullest potential.

Enjoy the full density of meaty flavor, mouth-watering umami, and unique aromas that range from buttery corn to smooth cheese. 

Let your teeth sink into your steak like butter and experience the rare, pure sensation of zero resistance tenderness. Feel the blend of broken down fats and soft protein melt in your mouth. This is pure perfection in meat form.

 

Why settle for supermarket meat? Now with Primo Ager, you can easily get steakhouse quality in your own home. No markups, no reservations, no crowds — just your kitchen, a bottle of wine, and some candles for the perfect date night. 

Serve up a quality steak that tastes just like Chef Ramsay would prepare himself, and save yourself hundreds to potentially thousands of dollars along the way.

A steakhouse dinner for two, some sides and a nice bottle of wine can add up pretty fast at any quality restaurant. With the Primo Ager System, you will be able to save money by bringing quality meat into your home and letting Primo Ager prepare it perfectly at the touch of a button.

Primo Ager is specifically designed and engineered to have every feature work together for the ultimate dry-aging experience at home. Every single aspect and detail is refined to ensure the highest quality meat and safest process. This is the Primo System.
 

24/7 Real-Time Monitoring & Self-Regulating System

Primo Ager’s smart self-regulating system measures and monitors the temperature, humidity, and airflow in real-time as well as how much meat is stored at any given moment. It will then automatically adjust as needed to optimize your aging process for the highest-quality meat, safest environment.

Maximized Storage Capacity

Primo Ager boasts the largest dry-aging fridge capacity for its size. With only 3 feet of floor space, Primo Ager can store up to 100 lbs (45kg) of meat at a time, without compromising surface exposure. 

Combined with our exclusive optional patented partition racks, you get maximum dry-aging storage with minimal space.

High Precision Temperature Regulator

A powerful, high precision temperature regulator prevents temperature fluctuations and ensures your meat stays at a safe and optimal temperature throughout its entire aging process.

Smart Integrated Humidity Control

Primo Ager’s smart integrated humidity control is fully automated and ensures proper drying occurs without the growth of unwanted bacteria or mold. Unlike other systems, no external water supply is needed — making setup a breeze.

Commercial-Grade Air Jet Booster & Compressor

Primo Ager uses a high-powered air flow system meant for full, professional, large-scale operations. A commercial-grade real force, evaporator-type fan keeps air circulating at a healthy rate throughout the entire dry-aging process.

The large-capacity compressor, jet booster, and condenser work together to ensure all the meat in Primo Ager always gets the proper air flow and oxygen exposure.

UV-C Sterilization Air Filter

Primo Ager integrates a UV-C light to kill any bacteria and mold that might be floating around inside. The light sterilizes everything and purifies the air that circulates through the system, so your meat stays safe and unspoiled.



Unlike low-quality DIY systems, our UV-C light is not actually visible to the user. We did this to maintain professional dry-aging standards and conduct. UV-C light can be harmful to humans if exposed directly and can also disrupt the dry-aging process. 

The UV-C light in Primo Ager is located in the internals where the air gets compressed, funnelled, and recirculated. From here, the light can completely sterilize the full air supply in Primo Ager without affecting the aging process or potentially harming you.

Industry Standard Insulated Door

Primo Ager’s industrial standard insulated door seals your meat for maximum control over temperature, humidity and air quality. The door keeps the circulating air contained and regulated. It also prevents external contaminants from entering. This ensures efficient energy usage and effective quality regulation.

Automated Cloud-Enabled Logging & Notifications

Primo Ager is also smart. Cloud technology inside Primo Ager logs all your meat and tracks their dry-aging process. When your meat is ready to cook, Primo Ager will alert you via the mobile app. 

You can also see on the app how long each individual piece in Primo Ager has been aging. Set timers and logs hands-free with Amazon Alexa and Google Home smart integration. Ask Alexa to tell you when your ribeye is ready. Primo Ager is fully integrated with the latest in cloud technologies. 

Check your meat anytime, anywhere. Always know when your steak is prime and ready to go.


 

LED Notification Touch Panel

An external EZ-touch LED notification control panel allows you to check the air quality, temperature and humidity inside Primo Ager without opening it. Through the intuitive touch interface, you can fine tune details and specifications as needed to ensure your meat is aged how you want it.


Optional Proprietary Partition Racks

Our advanced proprietary meat racks prevent cross-contamination while giving you flexibility in storing full or half-sized racks of steak. The unique design maximizes your meat’s surface area exposure to air while minimizing the space needed for storage. This allows you to age more meat simultaneously, while ensuring each piece gets the air exposure it needs to dry-age properly.

Primo Ager’s high quality regulatory system isn’t just great for dry-aging meat. It creates perfect environments to store and age all your favorite cheeses and wines. 

Presets for each category are pre-programmed in Primo Ager, so you can switch settings instantly from the front door panel or the app whenever you want. If you want more control, you can tweak the temperature and humidity as needed.

Bring out the flavor of your cheese. Increase the value and richness of your wine overtime. With Primo Ager, you can safely and easily age meat, cheese and wine in a fully automated system. Get 3-in-1 versatility and premium quality all from a single, powerful, easy-to-use device.
 

It’s time to take your steak dinners to the next level. Primo Ager brings high-end, Michelin-star quality meat to your kitchen without the hassle, markup or wait.

Entertain your dates and your guests with premium, exquisite dry-aged steaks in your own home, anytime.

In order to offer the best possible deal on Primo Ager, we are holding off on finalizing shipping rates until after the campaign. Our current shipping quote per unit is about $300 USD, but we're working hard with our partners to reduce this, which is why we're charging after the campaign ends.

This will allow us to give the best possible industry-standard rate, calculated as close as possible to the time of shipment.

Shipping, handling and other local fulfillment charges vary from country to country. We will collect these costs in our pledge manager (BackerKit) in the months following the campaign via a post campaign email survey. You will have the opportunity to provide your shipping address, make changes if you move, etc. at that time.  Please see below for more on taxes and custom duties.

Campaign backers are responsible for any taxes or customs duties levied by their own countries.  Because you, the backer are responsible, please check your country's import duties before purchasing. 

We can currently deliver to US, Canada, Singapore, Hong Kong, Thailand, Australia and New Zealand.  Please check back on our website for more countries, or reach out directly to info@primoager.com

We are 4 entrepreneurs with backgrounds in food production, equipment manufacturing and technology engineering. In our work life, we are business people. But once we get home, we are a group of enthusiastic home cooks. 

Like many home cooks, we are always trying to improve the way we cook, from experimenting with new recipes, to learning about technology that would help us make great meals for our families.

A few years ago, we encountered something truly wonderful in a restaurant: dry-aged beef. However, we were shocked by the price; dry-aged steaks are truly a luxury product. We decided that we would put our heads together and look for a way to make dry-aged beef ourselves.

One of the things we have access to is commercial kitchen products. We asked ourselves, “could we get a commercial-grade dry ager for our homes?” Unfortunately, we found that these machines are huge and would not be practical for our apartments. Even machines that were developed for home use would take up too much space. The other obstacle was price — we were not prepared to spend so much money on a machine that would take up so much space.

Our solution was to put our professional knowledge to work: we built a space-saving, reasonably priced dry ager for the home cook. We created a dry aging refrigerator that gives the user an optimal amount of room for meat, while being small enough to fit in the room. 

Primo Ager is versatile enough to accommodate other functions. It is controlled through our phones and is hygienic. Most importantly, it is reasonably priced, so that any home cook will feel confident that they are buying a high-quality product at a great price point. 

We want Primo Ager to be affordable for anyone to enjoy restaurant quality dry-aged beef in the comfort of their home. 

Primo Ager was created in partnership with a professional kitchen equipment manufacturer with more than 30 years of experience and knowledge of equipment production for a vast variety of businesses across the US, Europe and Asia, covering global brands, chain hotels and restaurants. Using our design and engineering expertise and their manufacturing experience, we created an amazing unit that is not just beautiful to look at, but practical and effective for dry aging.
 
Our philosophy is to create contemporary style appliances that are easy to incorporate into daily life. Whether you are a hardcore meat lover or just like enjoy a good steak, Primo Ager is perfect for you and your home. In the next 3 years, we want to be able to extend our product line from our dry aging fridge to other smart AI kitchen home appliances.

1. Dashdorj D, Tripathi VK, Cho S, Kim Y, Hwang I. Dry aging of beef; Review [published correction appears in J Anim Sci Technol. 2016;58:28]. Journal of Animal Science and Technology. 2016;58:20. Published 2016 May 19. doi:10.1186/s40781-016-0101-9. Retrieved from https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC48...

2. Ducasse, Alain. THE CHEF; Steak With Style: Easy Does It [Published 2002, Feb 27]. Retrieved from The New York Times https://www.nytimes.com/2002/02/27/dining/the-c...

3. Johnson, Troy. How Dry-Aging Takes Meat from Ordinary to Extraordinary: Meatmaster Pat LaFrieda explains the magic of dry-aging beef… [Published 2016, July 26]. Retrieved from Robb Report https://robbreport.com/food-drink/dining/how-dr...

4. Kenji López-Alt, J. The Food Lab: Can I Dry Age Beef At Home? [Last updated in Serious Eats. 2019, Oct 24; Published 2013, January 15] Retrieved from Serious Eats https://www.seriouseats.com/2013/01/the-food-la...

5. LaFrieda, Pat. Ask Pat LaFrieda: Can I Dry Age At Home? [Published 2011, Dec 20] Retrieved from Serious Eats on Youtube https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LzFfqzEB7R4

6. LaFrieda, Pat. Like Intense Beef Flavor? Dry Aging Is For You [Published 2014, Sep 12]. Retrieved from Gear Patrol https://gearpatrol.com/2014/09/12/dry-aged-beef...

7. Mckay, Brett and Kate. A Guide To Dry-Aged Beef [Last updated in Art of Manliness. 2020, Jan 2; Published 2018, September 28]. Retrieved from Art of Manliness https://www.artofmanliness.com/articles/a-guide...

Primo Ager is the world’s most advanced professional-grade dry aging system for your home. It’s fully automated, so you don’t have to worry about babysitting your steaks. Finally, you can have high-end, steakhouse quality, premium dry-aged meat at home, without the hassle or risk. No ridiculous markups or complicated systems — just delicious, tender steaks. Age up to 100 lbs of meat safely, effectively, and professionally with only 3 sq feet of space.Primo Ager is fully automated and ensures your meat is always of the highest quality and safety standards. Temperature, humidity and air flow are strictly regulated and controlled by the integrated smart system and can be easily tracked and modified from the mobile app. Receive live updates directly to your phone and know exactly when your meat is ready to eat. No setup needed. Primo Ager is ready to go out of the box! It doesn’t need a water supply or even much space to operate. Simply plug it in and start aging. Professional dry-aging has never been this easy.Every professional chef agrees — dry-aged meat just tastes better. From the concentrated flavor to the unmatched tenderness, a dry-aged steak is what separates the ordinary from the extraordinary. Each bite will have significantly more flavor and better texture.Dry-aging works by naturally breaking down the meat in a hyper-controlled environment. Humidity and temperature are closely monitored and regulated to prevent the growth of health-hazardous bacteria and mold and allow beneficial internal enzymes and fermentation to break down the meat.Moisture is drawn out, concentrating the meaty flavor. Natural enzymes found in the meat disassemble the collagen and connective tissues that make the meat tough, tenderizing it without sacrificing its integrity. The fat also begins to oxidize, adding another layer of intoxicating umami, while the fermentation contributes exotic nutty, buttery, and aromatic flavors. The result is a beautifully dry and tender steak that boasts a highly concentrated flavor enhanced by the sweetness and umami of broken down fats.From Gordon Ramsay to 21 Michelin-starred chef, Alain Ducasse, top chefs around the world swear by a well-aged steak. There’s no denying it — dry-aging is the best way to prepare your meat.With all the hype around dry-aging, you’d expect people to try it at home. And they have. There is a problem though. The typical refrigerator isn’t built for dry-aging. There’s no ventilation, no humidity regulation, and the temperature fluctuates every time you open the door or change what’s inside. Plus, all the other food and fridge smells start to bleed into your meat. No one wants a steak that tastes like old fridge.All these factors combine to promote spoilage, rot, and the growth of life-threatening bacteria and mold that render your meat completely inedible. Some people have recommended wrapping your meat in cheesecloth or paper towels to absorb the moisture. However, this simply does not work. In fact, J. Kenji López-Alt, author of The Food Lab, conducted a very thorough experiment using this method to “dry-age” at home. The results? This is impossible with most typical home setups. The only way you could easily get a safe-to-eat dry-aged steak was at a high-end butcher shop or premium steakhouse. It’s designed and engineered with professional-grade technology, materials, and processes to ensure you always get safe, high-quality, premium dry-aged meat with every use. Feel the blend of broken down fats and soft protein melt in your mouth. This is pure perfection in meat form. Why settle for supermarket meat? Now with Primo Ager, you can easily get steakhouse quality in your own home. No markups, no reservations, no crowds — just your kitchen, a bottle of wine, and some candles for the perfect date night. Serve up a quality steak that tastes just like Chef Ramsay would prepare himself, and save yourself hundreds to potentially thousands of dollars along the way.A steakhouse dinner for two, some sides and a nice bottle of wine can add up pretty fast at any quality restaurant. With the Primo Ager System, you will be able to save money by bringing quality meat into your home and letting Primo Ager prepare it perfectly at the touch of a button.Primo Ager is specifically designed and engineered to have every feature work together for the ultimate dry-aging experience at home. Every single aspect and detail is refined to ensure the highest quality meat and safest process. This is the Primo System. 24/7 Real-Time Monitoring & Self-Regulating SystemPrimo Ager’s smart self-regulating system measures and monitors the temperature, humidity, and airflow in real-time as well as how much meat is stored at any given moment. It will then automatically adjust as needed to optimize your aging process for the highest-quality meat, safest environment.Maximized Storage CapacityPrimo Ager boasts the largest dry-aging fridge capacity for its size. From here, the light can completely sterilize the full air supply in Primo Ager without affecting the aging process or potentially harming you.Industry Standard Insulated DoorPrimo Ager’s industrial standard insulated door seals your meat for maximum control over temperature, humidity and air quality. story:
The Skarp Razor is the future of shaving for Men & Women!


At first glance, the Skarp Razor looks like a traditional razor. But that is where the similarity ends.

The Skarp razor is powered by a small laser which cuts through hair for an incredibly close shave without irritating or damaging the skin. There are many benefits to using the Skarp Razor including:

Shaving has been using essentially the same technology for 5000 years. To make any real progress, we needed to take a radical new approach. 

2 Billion razors or razor heads are thrown away each year in the US alone! Due to the hazardous nature of the blades, they can't be sorted & no individual municipality or district produces enough to make specialized collection cost effective. So they end up in land fills & garbage dumps. 

Many areas of the world are experiencing a drought & paying high prices for water. As these droughts become more common & severe, water usage becomes more restricted.

Even though the Skarp Razor can be used with water, for example in the shower, it doesn't require any water. Which will help you feel better about keeping that lawn green or having that next water balloon fight!

Design

Together with designers, we created something we believe you will love using every day.

The prototypes we created were built from 6061 aluminum & feel really wonderful in the hand.

Our Founders

Morgan Gustavsson MBBS, has been working in the medical & cosmetic laser industry for three decades.

He invented & patented IPL (Intense Pulsed Light) in 1989, which is still a preferred method of hair removal & dermatology treatments to this day.

Morgan had the idea for a Laser razor in 2001. However the laser technology at the time was not available. He soon realized that his idea was a little ahead of its time. 

He spent the next decade investigating & made a breakthrough in 2009 with a wavelength that could cut any color hair.

In 2013 Paul Binun joined the effort & working solution was developed. They made quick progress and knew they had something special.

Our Lead engineers manage a very talented team


Why we need your support

The demo below was made using our working prototype in our lab. The fiber you see in this video is made free hand in our lab using limited resources.

The production model will be using a high performance precision manufactured fiber, only possible with mass production automated machinery.


The fiber in the above video can only be mounted with rudimentary means, this mean it’s not robust. The production model will have a fiber rigidly mounted along the entire cutting edge which will enhance performance by many orders of magnitude. The laser beam is contained inside the fiber & is well below eye safe levels. 

Notice the flashes as it cuts. This is the shaving light escaping the fiber into the hair. The light never enters the skin & will not cause any skin damage. Sometimes the hair is cut but lightly fuses back onto the hair shaft. This is resolved by gently brushing. 

Your support will enable us to secure the high performance & rigidly mounted fiber that can only be manufactured through mass production.

Here's an interesting video on fiber manufacturing for those interested



Advisory board

We also welcomed Christopher Zachary, MBBS, FRCP, Professor & Chair at UCI, as an advisor to Skarp. Professor Zachary brings with him decades of experience in the field of cosmetic lasers, a stellar reputation and the resources of University of California, Irvine.

How it works

Wavelengths of light had already been discovered that could cut through dark hair, but finding a way to cut light hair was proving incredibly difficult.

After years of research & development, they discovered a chromophore in the hair that would be cut when hit with a particular light wavelength.

Chromophores are particles that absorb certain wavelengths (colors) of light. 

This chromophore they identified is shared by every human, regardless of age, gender or race. 

Our team has made incredible progress, but to start mass production, we require capital.

We have identified manufacturing partners and have preliminary agreements in place. We are in the beginning stages of manufacturing, and thats where you come in as an early supporter.

The Skarp razor is powered by a small laser which cuts through hair for an incredibly close shave without irritating or damaging the skin. There are many benefits to using the Skarp Razor including:



Shaving has been using essentially the same technology for 5000 years. To make any real progress, we needed to take a radical new approach. 
2 Billion razors or razor heads are thrown away each year in the US alone! Due to the hazardous nature of the blades, they can't be sorted & no individual municipality or district produces enough to make specialized collection cost effective. So they end up in land fills & garbage dumps. 

Many areas of the world are experiencing a drought & paying high prices for water. As these droughts become more common & severe, water usage becomes more restricted.
Even though the Skarp Razor can be used with water, for example in the shower, it doesn't require any water. Which will help you feel better about keeping that lawn green or having that next water balloon fight!
Design
Together with designers, we created something we believe you will love using every day.
The prototypes we created were built from 6061 aluminum & feel really wonderful in the hand.
Our Founders
Morgan Gustavsson MBBS, has been working in the medical & cosmetic laser industry for three decades.

He invented & patented IPL (Intense Pulsed Light) in 1989, which is still a preferred method of hair removal & dermatology treatments to this day.
Morgan had the idea for a Laser razor in 2001. However the laser technology at the time was not available. He soon realized that his idea was a little ahead of its time. 
He spent the next decade investigating & made a breakthrough in 2009 with a wavelength that could cut any color hair.
In 2013 Paul Binun joined the effort & working solution was developed. They made quick progress and knew they had something special.

Our Lead engineers manage a very talented team


Why we need your support
The demo below was made using our working prototype in our lab. The fiber you see in this video is made free hand in our lab using limited resources.
The production model will be using a high performance precision manufactured fiber, only possible with mass production automated machinery.

The fiber in the above video can only be mounted with rudimentary means, this mean it’s not robust. The production model will have a fiber rigidly mounted along the entire cutting edge which will enhance performance by many orders of magnitude. The laser beam is contained inside the fiber & is well below eye safe levels. 
Notice the flashes as it cuts. This is the shaving light escaping the fiber into the hair. The light never enters the skin & will not cause any skin damage. Sometimes the hair is cut but lightly fuses back onto the hair shaft. This is resolved by gently brushing. 
Your support will enable us to secure the high performance & rigidly mounted fiber that can only be manufactured through mass production.

Here's an interesting video on fiber manufacturing for those interested


Advisory board
We also welcomed Christopher Zachary, MBBS, FRCP, Professor & Chair at UCI, as an advisor to Skarp. Professor Zachary brings with him decades of experience in the field of cosmetic lasers, a stellar reputation and the resources of University of California, Irvine.

How it works
Wavelengths of light had already been discovered that could cut through dark hair, but finding a way to cut light hair was proving incredibly difficult.
After years of research & development, they discovered a chromophore in the hair that would be cut when hit with a particular light wavelength.
Chromophores are particles that absorb certain wavelengths (colors) of light. 
This chromophore they identified is shared by every human, regardless of age, gender or race. 
Our team has made incredible progress, but to start mass production, we require capital.
We have identified manufacturing partners and have preliminary agreements in place. We are in the beginning stages of manufacturing, and thats where you come in as an early supporter.

We really need your support, and we hope you will join us in the shaving revolution!
Shaving has been the same for 5000 years, it's time to bring shaving to the 21st century.
With the Skarp Razor, there's never a dull moment!



Risks and challenges
Due to the size of the micro components involved, there will be un-known levels of fine tuning required for automated production in high volume. However we have taken this into consideration for our projected delivery of March 2016.
Similarly when ramping up delivery of key components, quality control could become a challenge & is of high priority to us.
The special optical fiber we are ordering with your support is the first of its kind. Everything first time can have un-known risks.
Many have asked us to show a closer shave with the prototype shaver, and we would love to, but can’t. Here is why.
The prototype in the demo video can’t cut much closer because the hand-made fiber in the prototype breaks when lightly bouncing it off the skin. It’s made of glass and is very thin. It also can’t be mounted with the necessary support to prevent that. The hand drawn fiber that you see cutting hair in the videos has an un-even surface that doesn’t uniformly couple the laser light into the hair over the whole cutting region. 
Your support will allow us order the new factory made fiber. Please see the time line in the campaign.
The new fiber design can be mounted rigidly & supported to prevent breaking. It also couples the hair-cutting laser 'blade' evenly into the hairs.
The new fiber design has an extremely hard surface. We expect it to take several years to wear it out with normal use, but that can’t be tested until we have made it. 
Morgan Gustavsson & his team have decades of experience with bringing new technologies, cosmetic & medical products to market successfully.
Bio

Morgan Gustavsson, MBBS, is Co-Founder & CEO of Skarp Technologies.
He has been a pioneer in the medical & aesthetic laser device industry since working as a medical doctor in the 1980’s. This includes expanding clinical frontiers with medical and surgical lasers in the 1980's and 1990's & in 1989 inventing, patenting and in 1990 exhibiting the first IPL (Intense Pulsed Light) in the world, later becoming a multi billion dollar industry.
In the last decade he has invented the TRASER technology (light amplification by spontaneous emission of radiation) for laser surgery, on which he holds ten recent US patents and has published several articles in peer reviewed scientific journals.
Articles can be found at: http://dx.plos.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0035899
His previous positions over almsot three decades include:
CEO Rockport Consulting Services, Inc. Innovation in new light sources. Clinical investigation. Strategic partnerships.
Chief Scientist Venus Concept Ltd
Director of Advanced Innovation Syneron, Inc
Head of special R&D Lasers and electro-optical medical device Full time inhouse Consultant Candela Corporation
CEO American Medical Bio Care, Inc. / Medical Bio Care, Int Manufacturer in EU and the US of Medical device and Cosmeceuticals
CEO Kings Clinic (laser surgery) 
President Gothenburg Laser Clinic (laser bio-stimulation and medicine)
Paul Binun Co-Founder & CTO of Skarp Technologies 
With an MS degree in Applied Physics. He brings with him over twenty four years of experience in lasers and optics starting in the field while still in college to make some extra money to pay for college expenses. This has turned into a career which involved laser engineering ranging from the highly powerful lasers to the low power precision lasers for instrumentation. 
In addition to lasers Mr. Binun has experience in designing various optical systems which employ lasers and other optical sources, fiber optics and other optical waveguides, and free space propagation of light.
Much of the work involves the physics of light interaction with organic tissue. His passion is to push the edge of that envelope where science meets the practical application.

FAQ
Is it safe?
Yes, the laser is low power & eye safe. Unlike Laser hair removal, the light from the Skarp Razor never enters the skin so there is no risk of damage.
How long will the laser last?
the laser has a life of 50,000 hours.
How long will the battery last?
The Skarp Razor uses a small battery that will last about a month with normal use.
Can we see a demo?


There is a demo above, you can also view it here. Also take the time to read the text first. It explains in detail why the production model will be vastly superior & capable of a full a proper shave.

Will it cause complications like laser hair removal can?
The wavelength we're using doesn't emit UV. The power of the laser is too low to cause damage. But more importantly, the laser doesn't enter the skin, it only enters the hair. So there is absolutely no risk of developing any complications or damage.
Does it produce a smell?
No. Because we're not actually burning the hair, it doesn't produce a burnt hair smell.
Is it waterproof?
Yes. It can be used in the shower if required.
Is it patented?
Oh yes!
Will it take longer to shave with the Skarp Razor?
No. Shaving with the Skarp Razor will be very easy & shave a little quicker than you current method.
Why do you all have beards?
We look more manly that way.....right?
Can I shave at normal speed?
Yes you can. You don't have to shave at slow speeds! You'll even finish a little quicker as you won't have to lather up!

story:
Hi there!

For years, I’ve seen my “hoomans” suffer through the chore of handling my poop. Reports show the same pet owner struggles worldwide. 

We’ve witnessed…

  • The disgust on our owners’ faces when the smell hits their nose…
     
  • Their annoyance at having to bend over to grab our mess…
     
  • Wasted hours at a time — in dog time — for them to make their journey to the stinky dumpster…


Data shows that what my owner is experiencing is also happening to every dog parent around the world…

Us pooches know we’re the cause of this poop… so it’s my job to fix this! After countless late nights at the office, I’m here to say our “barktastic” team found the best way to pick up dog poop.

The world’s first 2-in-1 solution to dog poop!
 

 
 
 

No more bending over, trying to fit a monster doodie in a tiny bag, or nervously walking around trying not to get poop on your shoes! For the first time ever, picking up dog poop in the yard is just a flick of the wrist!

Sure, you could bend over like all the other hoomans. Or you could use PooPail’s practical 2-in-1 design, helping you scoop waste directly into the dog poop pail without getting in awkward positions.


 

PooPail’s huge storage capacity (4 Gallons) saves you from 28 long journeys to the dumpster by storing many smelly leftovers for up to a week in its waterproof and smell-proof pail!

“So now I have a bucket of poop?”
Nobody wants to stockpile dog poop, but now you have the choice of emptying it whenever it is most convenient. 

35 trips to the dumpster/trash cans a week can become 7, or you could go every 2 days, or 3... it’s up to you now!

 

A little treat for the Hoomans...



Each of our bag styles is certified by TÜV AUSTRIA, an authorized body certified by European Bioplastics. The certification stands for quality and reliability and guarantees our products are biodegradable and compostable. Many “planet friendly” claims from pet bags are actually not receiving these certifications because they are made of material that just breaks down into small pieces of plastic pollution, instead of being plant based like the PooPail bags! 

Let’s change how we handle dog poop forever!

-Tug the Pug

 



To make your life even easier and less poopy, we’ve also got large dog poop bags for you! Take them with you and conveniently attach them to your leash with the included bone dispenser (check out our add-ons for poop bags).

The “Pooper-Scooper’s” design allows sand, and pebbles to fall right through. The only thing getting in that bag is the mess you want to get rid of. 

While you could definitely bend over and grab poop over and over again…  With PooPail’s long handle, you’ll be saving yourself from future back pain, or just deciding to make your life a little easier!









10+ Year Lifespan — PooPail is made of durable materials to withstand years of messes.

Environmentally Friendly — PooPail’s bags are compostable and biodegradable, meaning they’ll decompose alongside your dog’s poop and not seal in the poop for centuries in landfills!

Sealed Lid — Keeps rain and sprinkler water out, and poop and the smell of our many dinners in.

 

Yes... and no.

PooPail is designed specifically to give you back the freedom to choose what you do with your time and your dog’s poop.

How so?

Whether it’s a rainy day, running late for a meeting, or just need a day off, you have 1 week to decide when it’s most convenient for you to deal with that poop.

PooPail puts time back into your court, by taking poop out of it. PooPail was made with you in mind...

Technically you can, but the main reason we created specifically designed certified Compostable/Biodegradable bags is to reduce the plastic we use that ends up in the ocean and landfills. Like we say, "Happy Dog, Happy Owner, Happy Planet!"

PooPail has a secure lid that prevents smells from getting out, and water from getting in. Although it does do an amazing job at containing the stench, recommend keeping it outside, and not under your kitchen sink.

 


 


Have a dog? What about a yard? Does your dog poop? I’m guessing yes… (All us pooches POOP!) :D Then PooPail is for you!

PooPail is the perfect poop solution for dog poop removal, whether you have a little Chihuahua, or 5 big Saint Bernards. The scoop works on all surfaces, from concrete to tall grass, and is ideal for dog shelters, trainers, and daycares too!




 

The idea of PooPail came to me a few years ago, when I had two dogs and a large backyard. Like any dog parent, I enjoyed spending time and playing fetch with my doggos. But aside from being cute and playful, my fur babies would always leave behind those nasty “surprises”. For me, that meant 28 piles of “jewels” to pick up each week, and 28 trips to the garbage cans, which were 10 houses away! To solve the problem, I tried a whole lot of contraptions and pooper scoopers, but none would work. So I decided to create something myself.

The result—PooPail,  the world’s first 2-in-1 system for scooping and storing dog poop!

Now I can pick up dog poop in seconds and store it for a whole week without having to take countless trips to the dumpster. And my backyard is always clean too!

To share this handy solution with you, dog parents like me, I’ve launched this campaign to make your life way easier and save you more time for playing with your fur friend.

story:
Vacos Video Doorbell is the most versatile and feature-rich smart doorbell. The smartest PIR & AI human detection ways remove false alarms. It’s a perfect art that combines the unique design & functions, proving true 2K Super HD & crystal IR night vision. Vacos Video Doorbell delivers professional-grade wireless security, and protects the data transmission with the safest protocols.





Vacos Video Doorbell, designed by Enlisted Design, a professional team with deep expertise in industrial design, wins the 2020 Red Dot Award with the unique rectangular architecture design and the down-firing light. It is not just a doorbell, but an eye-catching art.




With the stylish design & built-in lighting, the smart doorbell makes for a spectacular feature in any décor, and blends in every door, every position.




Vacos Video Doorbell adopts the most advanced image sensor & other image enhancement algorithms to produce the true 2K Super HD images, and up to 20 ft night vision distance. Take Super HD image clarity to the next level.

The A-1 true WDR balances every area of an image for stunning picture clarity, even in the strongest lighting contrast conditions. The 3D DNR removes the picture noise greatly to produce the sharpest videos in complete darkness.
 


The battery-powered smart doorbell captures a person from head to toe, a package on your front door, with the 180° super wide-angle lens. Record everything from the top to bottom within the detecting areas without blind spots.

The smart video doorbell detects the motion events with the PIR sensor and human detection. You’ll never miss the package delivery or never let your guests wait. Free you from false alarms caused by animals, trees, etc.
 




The cozy light built in the video doorbell turns on automatically when a human approaches your front porch. Allow you and your visitors to find the button easily even in complete darkness.




Get local storage without paying extra fees by inserting an up to 128 GB SD card, or store the videos to the 7-day free cloud storage for another secure data backup way.




Access the rechargeable battery-powered video doorbell via your voice by connecting the doorbell to an Alexa or Google Assistant device. Control your smart doorbell in a 100% hands-free way.

Enjoy easiest and unlimited control via Vacos Smart App, wherever, whenever. You’ll never miss anything important during your absence.




Pre-record up to 3 messages to interact with your visitors in real time when you can’t answer the door.




Vacos Video Doorbell is easy to install but hard to remove. The video transmission and download, secured by Vacos private protocols & encryptions, are extremely hackproof.






The built-in rechargeable battery provides up to 6 months with one single charge, freeing you from frequent battery charging hassle. Connect it to your current doorbell AC wiring for non-stop power supply.




The video doorbell is designed to endure the hot & cold. Install it on your front or back door without worrying about the weather, regardless rain or shine, snow or sleet.









Note: The chime only works with Vacos Video Doorbell.

















Where do we ship?
We ship the products worldwide with FREE shipping.

When do we start shipping?
We will start packing and shipping in March 2021 once we have manufactured the first batch of the Vacos Video Doorbell. We will try our best to ship the product(s) to you ASAP.

Is there any additional customs charge?
Normally, there would be no any additional customs charges shipping to you. However, we cannot 100% guarantee the 0 customs fee, and we are not responsible for any extra fee from customs shipping to your countries.

Why do you order now?
By backing our project now, you can get up to 50% off the original price. You will get the product(s) earlier than others, and you will be the first to enjoy the most cutting-edge video doorbell.

.

General Inquiry & Tech Support: support@vacos.com

Press Inquiry & Review Sample:pr@vacos.com

story:
Shop

Instagram

Facebook

Youtube Channel

Cooperate：

winmartdesign@gmail.com

 

Unboxing video of LeGrow Home Garden

 

If you need something to light up your life, there is nothing better than a desktop planter to beautify your room and refresh you. LeGrow 2021 is a planter system with a modern twist that makes growing plants easier than ever. The modular system is connected so that watering any plant, automatically shares the moisture equally with all the other plants. It’s fast, easy, and takes the hassle out of maintaining your garden.

 

4 years ago, we launched our first campaign on Kickstarter. It was a great success and now, after 4 years of development and feedback from the LeGrow community, we are back with the upgraded LeGrow 2021. Our new system is better than ever and ready to help your plants thrive while you experience the joy of indoor gardening. 
 

 

Modular Designed Blocks
 

LeGrow 2021 is a modular designed planter system. With every single LeGrow planter, a fun & functioning indoor garden can be built. Simply place different modules together for different uses. There are LED grow lamps, self-watering trays, specially made humidifiers, and other blocks in the LeGrow 2021 garden pack. Build your indoor garden as easy as playing with Lego, fun and creative.

 

Super Easy To Build 

LeGrow 2021 makes building an indoor garden easy. As you place each piece, they connect together and your indoor garden comes to life. The system includes watering components, humidifiers and lights. You won’t need to worry about frequent watering and adequate sunlight for your plants. LeGrow 2021 includes everything you need for a thriving indoor garden wherever you choose to put it.

  • Low Maintenance 

Taking care of multiple plants can be a real hassle for busy people. Plants require careful watering for proper growth and it’s a task that is easily overlooked. LeGrow 2021 has an automatic watering system so that you don’t need to water the plants every day. Even if you leave for a trip, LeGrow 2021 will keep your plants happy and healthy while you’re away.

 
  • How to water

Watering LeGrow 2021 garden is super easy. Simply pour water into the self-watering tray, it will distribute it to all the plants evenly. Therefore, you don’t need to water the plants one by one and you won’t water too much at once. You can save both time and water with a LeGrow 2021 indoor garden.

 

LeGrow 2021 developed a self-watering tray for its indoor garden system. The patented water pipe structure ensures that all the planters are connected and the plants can receive the water equally, while the roots are ventilated to encourage healthy grow. The water level is visible so that you’ll know when to water again.
 

Keeping plants alive and flourishing is difficult when growing indoors due to lack of sunlight. To overcome this, an LED grow light is essential for adequate light. The LeGrow 2021 LED grow light will turn on when you switch it on and turn off 12 hours later automatically. This sets the autonomous lighting system, which will then automatically repeat the process daily to ensure proper lighting for your garden. LeGrow 2021 takes care of it for you!
 

Some plants need higher humidity to thrive. The humidifier can help you build an environment that is conducive to proper humidity so you can grow your plants better.

If you have ever visited a tropical garden or climates where plants thrive, you probably noticed the high level of humidity in the atmosphere. While watering plants is important, it is also essential to maintain consistent humidity. LeGrow 2021 adds a 360° diffusing mist humidifier as a solution.
 

You can connect your phone with the LeGrow 2021 Bluetooth speaker and enjoy music at home, playing some peaceful natural sounds and watch your lovely garden grow. LeGrow 2021 creates a calm and relaxing home garden.

  • Grow indoor herbs year-round 

With LeGrow 2021 you can grow all the kitchen herbs you need and keep the harvest season going all winter long to flavor your favorite dishes and take your cooking to the next delicious level!
 

  • Release your stress and anxiety 

Research has shown that indoor plants can reduce tension in people by almost 40 percent because they remind us of the outdoors, nature, and a slower pace of life. Indoor gardening releases your stress and calms your emotions.

 
  • Why grow your own vegetable garden?

Having a vegetable garden for fresh organic food is more important than ever. Growing your own vegetable garden is an easy way to save money, stay active, and have fresh vegetables, herbs at your fingertips! No chemical pesticides, no food contamination. All you eat is clean and healthy.

 
  • Better for mental health

For people who spend a lot of time indoors, healthy air quality should be a top priority. Some plants can remove pollutants such as formaldehyde, benzene, trichloroethylene, and carbon monoxide. With all these plants, your indoor air gets purified and you can breathe clean fresh air.

White is the most classic color when decorating any room. The main tone of LeGrow is Ivory white. You can put LeGrow in any room as a complementary accent. It’s a look that never goes out of style - Ivory white blocks with green plants, clean and classic.

 

LeGrow Story
 

Hi there! My name is Haobin Lin and I am originally from Mainland China. When I was a young boy I was fortunate enough to grow up in the magnificent Chinese countryside. Beautiful plants and animals surrounded me. This experience left me with a deep connection to nature. I always felt calm amidst its tranquility.

Unfortunately though, as I grew older and took on new responsibilities I was forced to leave my village. First I went to university, and then to the big city to earn an income for my family. Over time the longing for the natural world grew inside me, but it wasn’t until about 5 years ago that I finally had to act.

When my daughter was born I decided that if it was impossible for us to leave the city, I must bring the beauty of nature to my daughter. So began a 3-year journey to create the best indoor garden I could design.

One day I noticed my daughter playing with her favorite toys – “building blocks.” In that moment I realized that indoor gardens could be so much more than just a bunch of pots. By allowing you to stack and expand your pots everyone can create a unique garden just like my daughter's unique building creations.

The Lego-like design has the added benefit of fitting into smaller spaces like our apartment. However, it also provides flexibility, so that my daughter can move and expand her garden as she grows. Once I began to design the pot I realized that this garden could do even more.

I noticed that indoor gardens could be quite messy! This is because of the multiple ventilation holes on the bottom of traditional pots that allow excess water and soil to get everywhere. So as I designed our planter pots I added an internal water reservoir that can capture the excess water and an elevated ventilation hole to reduce soil escape.

With the mess taken care of, I quickly realized that we needed to improve the lighting in our apartment if we wanted anything to grow to its fullest. My wife and daughter were particularly keen on succulents and would often leave them on the windowsill to get light, yet that still was not enough. So I set about to design a lighting fixture that could provide for multiple plants at once and have an automatic shut-off so they don’t get too much light.

At this point, things were going well and our plants were getting better, but some still continued to struggle. After some research, I realized that many plants require moisture in the air to thrive.

Instead of buying an off-the-shelf humidifier, I decided to create something beautiful, compact and that would match our building block concept. This provided an especially difficult challenge for me and it took 23 designs before I finally created a 360° diffusing mist humidifier.

Not only do our plants get the moisture they need, but it also provides additional health benefits. My eyes are less dry and I sneeze far less often when I work next to the humidifier. At this point, our garden system was shaping up to be a beautiful, easy-to-use masterpiece, but there was still one more thing I wanted to do.

Since I spend countless hours at the office I wanted to add some greenery to my desk. Our system works perfectly for workspaces, but one day I thought ‘wouldn’t it be cool if I could charge my phone with the plant on my desk?’ I immediately started working on our Power Pot.

This mini power hub has 4 USB ports so that it can power the LED lamp and humidifier, plus my phone and tablet.

It wasn’t until we completed the Power Pot prototype that I realized how incredibly convenient it truly was. Any desk, end table, or countertop can now have a beautiful plant and a quick-charge station!

This whole project over the past 3 years has been an amazing experience. Not only was the LeGrow Garden born, but also, I was able to spend quality time with my daughter planting, growing, and expanding our home garden. Now we hope to share this experience with you.

The money we raise here on Kickstarter will provide us with the capital necessary to start full production of the LeGrow Garden. We hope someday it can help millions of people reconnect with nature and grow something beautiful. Thank you!
 

LeGrow 2021 modular Self-watering Tray. The size is 17cmX17cm（5.1 inches). It can store 285 ml of water, 1 pot of water with 11 ml of water per day, and the tray can support 4 pots of water for 7 days. One set of trays contains 4 silicone stoppers and 2 silicone tubing.

LeGrow 2021 Bluetooth speaker supports Bluetooth 5.0 technology and 2 speakers can be combined for stereo sound. It's easy to connect your phone or computer, play your favorite music, or forest white noise

LeGrow 2021 Vertical Planter. The size is 8.5cmX8.5cm（2.6 inches). Suitable for hanging plants. For example String of Pearls, String of Nickels, Trailing Jade, Pitcher Plant, English Ivy...

LeGrow 2021 Moss Planter. The size is 8.5cmX8.5cm（2.6 inches). Suitable for moss plants and Carnivorous plants or shallow root plants.

LeGrow LED Lamp has 2 LED bulbs and upgraded to a full-spectrum LED chip, the light effect on the plants is increased by 300%, and the opening time is extended to 8 hours per day.

LeGrow Humidifier releases more than 30 ml of water per hour. The water storage capacity lasts for 6 hours. It will automatically shut off when it is out of the water and automatically resume again once the water is refilled. The electronic circuit solution has been upgraded to reduce power consumption and improve stability.

Base Pot: Increased water hole at the bottom of the pot. The size is 8.5cmX8.5cm（2.6 inches)

LeGrow Power Dock is a safe power charging solution. It provides 4 USB ports with DC 5V, 36W total output power. Input voltage is 100-240V AC.

Connector: It can be used to connect and fix the upper and lower growing pots.
 

Haobin Lin is the Founder and Designer of LeGrow and has more than 15 years of industrial design experience.

King Liang is the Co-founder of LeGrow and has over 17 years of experience in international marketing, logistics, finance, and gardening product development.

Ricky Lim is responsible for marketing and customer communication in Singapore.

Ann is responsible for marketing and customer communication in the United States.

Leon is responsible for marketing and customer communication in Korea.

Tran is responsible for marketing and customer communication in Vietnam.

winmartdesign@gmail.com
 

 
 
Unboxing video of LeGrow Home Garden
 
If you need something to light up your life, there is nothing better than a desktop planter to beautify your room and refresh you. LeGrow 2021 is a planter system with a modern twist that makes growing plants easier than ever. The modular system is connected so that watering any plant, automatically shares the moisture equally with all the other plants. It’s fast, easy, and takes the hassle out of maintaining your garden. 4 years ago, we launched our first campaign on Kickstarter. It was a great success and now, after 4 years of development and feedback from the LeGrow community, we are back with the upgraded LeGrow 2021. Our new system is better than ever and ready to help your plants thrive while you experience the joy of indoor gardening.  
 
 

 
  Modular Designed Blocks 
 
LeGrow 2021 is a modular designed planter system. With every single LeGrow planter, a fun & functioning indoor garden can be built. Simply place different modules together for different uses. There are LED grow lamps, self-watering trays, specially made humidifiers, and other blocks in the LeGrow 2021 garden pack. Build your indoor garden as easy as playing with Lego, fun and creative. Super Easy To Build 
 
LeGrow 2021 makes building an indoor garden easy. As you place each piece, they connect together and your indoor garden comes to life. The system includes watering components, humidifiers and lights. You won’t need to worry about frequent watering and adequate sunlight for your plants. LeGrow 2021 includes everything you need for a thriving indoor garden wherever you choose to put it.
 
 

Low Maintenance 
 LeGrow Side Table Garden
Taking care of multiple plants can be a real hassle for busy people. Plants require careful watering for proper growth and it’s a task that is easily overlooked. LeGrow 2021 has an automatic watering system so that you don’t need to water the plants every day. Even if you leave for a trip, LeGrow 2021 will keep your plants happy and healthy while you’re away. How to water
 
Watering LeGrow 2021 garden is super easy. Simply pour water into the self-watering tray, it will distribute it to all the plants evenly. Therefore, you don’t need to water the plants one by one and you won’t water too much at once. You can save both time and water with a LeGrow 2021 indoor garden.
 
   Patent Pending
LeGrow 2021 developed a self-watering tray for its indoor garden system. The patented water pipe structure ensures that all the planters are connected and the plants can receive the water equally, while the roots are ventilated to encourage healthy grow. The water level is visible so that you’ll know when to water again. 
 
Keeping plants alive and flourishing is difficult when growing indoors due to lack of sunlight. To overcome this, an LED grow light is essential for adequate light. The LeGrow 2021 LED grow light will turn on when you switch it on and turn off 12 hours later automatically. This sets the autonomous lighting system, which will then automatically repeat the process daily to ensure proper lighting for your garden. LeGrow 2021 takes care of it for you! 
 
Some plants need higher humidity to thrive. The humidifier can help you build an environment that is conducive to proper humidity so you can grow your plants better.
If you have ever visited a tropical garden or climates where plants thrive, you probably noticed the high level of humidity in the atmosphere. While watering plants is important, it is also essential to maintain consistent humidity. LeGrow 2021 adds a 360° diffusing mist humidifier as a solution. 
 
 
You can connect your phone with the LeGrow 2021 Bluetooth speaker and enjoy music at home, playing some peaceful natural sounds and watch your lovely garden grow. LeGrow 2021 creates a calm and relaxing home garden.
 
 
 
 
 

Grow indoor herbs year-round 
 LeGrow Herb Garden -L
With LeGrow 2021 you can grow all the kitchen herbs you need and keep the harvest season going all winter long to flavor your favorite dishes and take your cooking to the next delicious level! 

Release your stress and anxiety 
 
Research has shown that indoor plants can reduce tension in people by almost 40 percent because they remind us of the outdoors, nature, and a slower pace of life. Indoor gardening releases your stress and calms your emotions. Why grow your own vegetable garden?
 
Having a vegetable garden for fresh organic food is more important than ever. Growing your own vegetable garden is an easy way to save money, stay active, and have fresh vegetables, herbs at your fingertips! No chemical pesticides, no food contamination. All you eat is clean and healthy. Better for mental health
 The design is inspired by Garden by the bay Singapore
For people who spend a lot of time indoors, healthy air quality should be a top priority. Some plants can remove pollutants such as formaldehyde, benzene, trichloroethylene, and carbon monoxide. With all these plants, your indoor air gets purified and you can breathe clean fresh air.
 
 
 LeGrow Side Table Garden
 LeGrow Long Table Garden
 Rainforest
White is the most classic color when decorating any room. The main tone of LeGrow is Ivory white. You can put LeGrow in any room as a complementary accent. It’s a look that never goes out of style - Ivory white blocks with green plants, clean and classic.
 
 
 
LeGrow Story 
Hi there! My name is Haobin Lin and I am originally from Mainland China. When I was a young boy I was fortunate enough to grow up in the magnificent Chinese countryside. Beautiful plants and animals surrounded me. This experience left me with a deep connection to nature. I always felt calm amidst its tranquility.
Unfortunately though, as I grew older and took on new responsibilities I was forced to leave my village. First I went to university, and then to the big city to earn an income for my family. Over time the longing for the natural world grew inside me, but it wasn’t until about 5 years ago that I finally had to act.
When my daughter was born I decided that if it was impossible for us to leave the city, I must bring the beauty of nature to my daughter. So began a 3-year journey to create the best indoor garden I could design.
One day I noticed my daughter playing with her favorite toys – “building blocks.” In that moment I realized that indoor gardens could be so much more than just a bunch of pots. By allowing you to stack and expand your pots everyone can create a unique garden just like my daughter's unique building creations.
The Lego-like design has the added benefit of fitting into smaller spaces like our apartment. However, it also provides flexibility, so that my daughter can move and expand her garden as she grows. Once I began to design the pot I realized that this garden could do even more.
I noticed that indoor gardens could be quite messy! This is because of the multiple ventilation holes on the bottom of traditional pots that allow excess water and soil to get everywhere. So as I designed our planter pots I added an internal water reservoir that can capture the excess water and an elevated ventilation hole to reduce soil escape.
With the mess taken care of, I quickly realized that we needed to improve the lighting in our apartment if we wanted anything to grow to its fullest. My wife and daughter were particularly keen on succulents and would often leave them on the windowsill to get light, yet that still was not enough. So I set about to design a lighting fixture that could provide for multiple plants at once and have an automatic shut-off so they don’t get too much light.
At this point, things were going well and our plants were getting better, but some still continued to struggle. After some research, I realized that many plants require moisture in the air to thrive.
Instead of buying an off-the-shelf humidifier, I decided to create something beautiful, compact and that would match our building block concept. This provided an especially difficult challenge for me and it took 23 designs before I finally created a 360° diffusing mist humidifier.
Not only do our plants get the moisture they need, but it also provides additional health benefits. My eyes are less dry and I sneeze far less often when I work next to the humidifier. At this point, our garden system was shaping up to be a beautiful, easy-to-use masterpiece, but there was still one more thing I wanted to do.
Since I spend countless hours at the office I wanted to add some greenery to my desk. Our system works perfectly for workspaces, but one day I thought ‘wouldn’t it be cool if I could charge my phone with the plant on my desk?’ I immediately started working on our Power Pot.
This mini power hub has 4 USB ports so that it can power the LED lamp and humidifier, plus my phone and tablet.
It wasn’t until we completed the Power Pot prototype that I realized how incredibly convenient it truly was. Any desk, end table, or countertop can now have a beautiful plant and a quick-charge station!
This whole project over the past 3 years has been an amazing experience. Not only was the LeGrow Garden born, but also, I was able to spend quality time with my daughter planting, growing, and expanding our home garden. Now we hope to share this experience with you.
The money we raise here on Kickstarter will provide us with the capital necessary to start full production of the LeGrow Garden. We hope someday it can help millions of people reconnect with nature and grow something beautiful. Thank you! 
 
 
LeGrow 2021 modular Self-watering Tray. The size is 17cmX17cm（5.1 inches). It can store 285 ml of water, 1 pot of water with 11 ml of water per day, and the tray can support 4 pots of water for 7 days. One set of trays contains 4 silicone stoppers and 2 silicone tubing.
LeGrow 2021 Bluetooth speaker supports Bluetooth 5.0 technology and 2 speakers can be combined for stereo sound. It's easy to connect your phone or computer, play your favorite music, or forest white noise
LeGrow 2021 Vertical Planter. The size is 8.5cmX8.5cm（2.6 inches). Suitable for hanging plants. For example String of Pearls, String of Nickels, Trailing Jade, Pitcher Plant, English Ivy...
LeGrow 2021 Moss Planter. The size is 8.5cmX8.5cm（2.6 inches). Suitable for moss plants and Carnivorous plants or shallow root plants.
LeGrow LED Lamp has 2 LED bulbs and upgraded to a full-spectrum LED chip, the light effect on the plants is increased by 300%, and the opening time is extended to 8 hours per day.
LeGrow Humidifier releases more than 30 ml of water per hour. The water storage capacity lasts for 6 hours. It will automatically shut off when it is out of the water and automatically resume again once the water is refilled. The electronic circuit solution has been upgraded to reduce power consumption and improve stability.
Base Pot: Increased water hole at the bottom of the pot. The size is 8.5cmX8.5cm（2.6 inches)
LeGrow Power Dock is a safe power charging solution. It provides 4 USB ports with DC 5V, 36W total output power. Input voltage is 100-240V AC.
Connector: It can be used to connect and fix the upper and lower growing pots. 
 
 
Haobin Lin is the Founder and Designer of LeGrow and has more than 15 years of industrial design experience.
King Liang is the Co-founder of LeGrow and has over 17 years of experience in international marketing, logistics, finance, and gardening product development.
Ricky Lim is responsible for marketing and customer communication in Singapore.
Ann is responsible for marketing and customer communication in the United States.
Leon is responsible for marketing and customer communication in Korea.
Tran is responsible for marketing and customer communication in Vietnam.

story:
Now Shipping - Buy Flic Today on the Indiegogo Marketplace!

Introducing Flic


 

Flic is a simple and stylish wireless button that lets you create a shortcut to your favorite actions so that you don’t have to touch your phone.

 

 


Absolutely no need to touch your phone, Flic creates a shortcut to your favorite actions. With one Flic, you can create a shortcut to call a cab, text your loved ones of your location if you’re in distress, or just turn the lights on. Flic can do so much more too...

 

 

 

 

 

 

Flic in the Press

 

 

A Day Made of Flic

 

With Flic in your car you can keep your focus on the road, where it should be. With just a click Flic could launch navigation to your next appointment, text your spouse and say that you’re on your way home or detect the song you’re listening to on the radio.

 

Always looking for your phone when you’re on your way out? With Flic you can make your phone sound the alarm, making it easier to find.
 

 


Having a smart home set up should be, well, smart! Instead we have to dig through our phones to turn on a light? With Flic you can easily control all your smart home units the way it should be, with a smart, simple and easily accessible button located where you need it. As you can see in the picture above you can also create scenarios for when you’re going out or when you’re having a movie night to control multiple units at once.


But not everyone has a smartphone. For some it can actually be terrifying. Flic brings the amazing possibilities of the smartphone and makes it accessible to everyone.
 

 

Put your phone on the shelf and let everyone be in the picture. Let Flic be your photographer and take a picture for you without having to be near your phone. Flic integrates with your phone's camera shutter function so you can have everyone in your picture.

 

With just a click, Flic can start sharing your phones GPS location with your family and friends so they can follow you on your way home. In the event of a distressed situation, you can easily sound the alarm and send a distress message.
 

A Closer Look at Flic

 

Flic can do so much more...

 

Yeah, its just a wireless button, but it can change the way you live every day. The phone opens up a world of possibilities, but Flic brings them to life.
 

We are developing some of the amazing actions you can see above, some of which we have already developed. The amazing opportunities that Flic brings should not be restricted to our imagination.

 

Logitech Harmony Hub

Control your Phillips Hue lights, Nest thermostat, August Smartlock, and much more with a Flic. 
 

The Harmony Hub combines Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, and IR to control your home automation and entertainment devices such as lights, locks, thermostats, blinds, movies, TV, and more.

 

 

Spotify integration

The Flic app will allow Spotify Premium users to control Spotify with Flic. 

 

Some example integrations

Flic can control lots of different services on your phone but can also be used to contol your devices and web apps. These are a few examples.
 

 

 

 

 

 

Flic Developer Kit

Yep, there is a a already popular Flic Developer Kit for you to integrate Flic to your app! Head over to flic.io/partners to read more! 

 


 



 

How to start Flicing


Lets say I want Flic to skip to the next song when I Double Click:


 

  1. Press the Flic in the center screen and it will show you the three ways to use Flic: Click, Double Click and Hold. Next, we choose Double Click, and select Music. 
  2. The Music settings will be shown and we choose “Skip to next song”, that’s it! Now Flic will skip to the next song each time you Double Click. No need to have the phone around!

Designed for everyone

 

Technical Details

 

Flic uses Bluetooth Low Energy to communicate with your device and is compatible with iPhone 4s & later, iPad 3rd generation & later and select Android devices with 4.3 and later with Bluetooth 4.0.

We've worked really hard to make Flic as battery efficient as possible while still keeping it diverse for all sorts of applications. This is why we have prepared Flic to work in three different modes. In most use-cases Flic will mostly be turned off until it's pressed. In this mode the battery will last up to 60 000 clicks which is more than enough for anyone.

There is more to Flic than you might think. To give you a better feeling here is an exploded view of the different parts.



Flic will come with a double-sided adhesive that allows you to stick it to any surface. You can easily peel it off and restick it again. 

 

The Journey Behind Flic.

 

We've gone through an immense journey to get to the design that we are offering today. Below you can see the different prototype steps we have gone through to finally bring you Flic.

In March we flew off to join the Hardware Incubator Highway 1 in San Francisco. While we were there, we decided to do a respin on the product design before bringing it to the market. 

Together with the amazing guys at P E O P L E   P E O P L E, We went through another design cycle as you can see below.

After finding the right design, we flew off to China to have a look at some factories while finding suppliers to start prototyping.

We assembled the prototypes and started the DFM work to prepare the product for manufacturing.

A lot of changes were made to the initial prototype design such as the LED which had too low intensity as you can see below.



And now, we are ready to bring the Flic to you...The Journey is yet to be over.
 

 

Perks

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Why we need your help

 

We can all agree that smartphones are a huge part of the 21st century. Everything is getting integrated around the smartphone and most recently even our homes and cars. With Flic we want to make all this fantastic technology which our smartphones enable accessible to everyone. The next step after Flic is even more exciting but first we need your help to bring Flic to the market.

 
 

Timeline

 

 

 

 

Where the Funds Will go

 

The hardware is close to done with most of the DFM work already made. With a successful campaign we will start ordering the tools needed.

We have come this far and now we need your support to take the next step. We will be working closely with the manufacturers to make sure that everything runs as smoothly as possible and you getting your Flics in time.

 

 

 

 

 

Meet the Team

 

 

 


 

Risks

 

There's always risks that can delay the process before Flic gets into your hands. We thought it might be good to share some of them so you know what we are dealing with.

Component supply: Flic, or any product for that matter, contains a significant amount of components. These components come from different suppliers which have different lead times for their components. If ONE of these suppliers has a short supply or a long leadtime this will delay the entire production, if a substitute is not found for that component.

Enhancements in production: When in production there are a couple of parameters that can be improved during the process such as the color, click feeling, translucence, IP class etc. Making such enhancements during the process will be in order to improve your experience with Flic. We will do everything we can to ensure that Flic ships with superior quality.

Shipping and customs: When we start shipping there's always a risk of the product getting stuck in customs, either when we are receiving the products from the factory or shipping them to you. We have prepared as well as we can and hopefully there won't be any delays.


 

FAQ


Forgot to add shipping?

No worries, you will be able to add the shipping cost in a form that we will send you before we ship your Flics. 

How do I choose color and shipping adress?

When we're close to shipping we will ask you to fill out a form where you will be able to specify your color choice and fill in your shipping address. 

 

1. What is Flic?

Flic is a wireless shortcut button that sticks to any surface and can trigger any function on your smartphone, such as your music or ordering a Taxi.

2. How do I trigger my Flic?

Flic connects to a smartphone (both IOS and Android) or similar. When flic is pressed, it uses the device to activate a function predefined by the user. This function can either be something directly on the device - such as make a loud sound so the user can find it - or something else such as turning on a light or starting music on the stereo.

3. How many functions can I predefine my Flic with?

You can predefine three different functions per Flic – Click, Double Click and Hold. These functions are easily changed in the Flic app.

4. How does my Flic work?

Flic uses Bluetooth Low-energy (BLE) to communicate with your smartphone.

5. What is the range of my Flic?

Flic works up to 150 feet (50 meters) away from your device/smartphone.

6. How do I attach my Flic to a surface?

Flic comes with a double sided adhesive so you can stick it to any surface. If it gets dirty, just wash it with soap and it will be as new.

Flic’s battery hatch can also be exchanged to one with a clip-on (so you can wear Flic).

7. Can my Flic go outside?

Yes, Flic will be weather-proof. Not yet tested against exact IP class.

8. What is my Flic’s battery life?

We have optimized the battery life to last as long as possible. For most use-cases it will last up to five years or 60 000 clicks, see more details under question 12.

But just in case Flic still has a replaceable battery. Just twist the backside and replace it with a regular coin cell battery (CR2016).

9. How many Flic’s can I have to one device?

Short answer, there is no limit. Longer answer, for most use-cases Flic will be in Passive mode which doesn't have a limit to how many Flics you can have using one device.

10. How is my Flic different from a NFC-tag?

With NFC you always have to have the smartphone in your hand and scan your tags, considering that you scan it right and don't have to rescan it. A lot of people don't find NFC tags easy enough to use in their everyday life. 

With Flic on the other hand you can launch your actions with a simple press of a button, as long as the smartphone is somewhere nearby. The button interface is simple enough for (almost?) everyone.

11. What material is my Flic made of?

The outside has a custom silicon rubbery coating that gives Flic an exclusive feeling.

12. How can Flic have such a long battery life?

Flic works in three different modes. In the most common mode which most use-cases will use, Flic will practically be turned off all the time until it's pressed. 

13. I want Flic to work with my app, what do I do?

Contact us at support@shortcutlabs.com

 

14. How do I choose the colors of my Flics? 

We will ask you to fill out a form where you will be able to select colors. Keep a look out for our emails! 

15. How do I tell you where to send my Flics? 

We will ask you to fill out a form where you will be able to select your shipping address. Keep a look out for our emails! 

 

 

 

Contact

 


For press inquiries please contact press@shortcutlabs.com
Want to implement our API into your existing App? Contact us at support@shortcutlabs.com
