8. What is my Flic’s battery life?
We have optimized the battery life to last as long as possible. For most use-cases it will last up to five years or 60 000 clicks, see more details under question 12.
But just in case Flic still has a replaceable battery. Just twist the backside and replace it with a regular coin cell battery (CR2016).
9. How many Flic’s can I have to one device?
Short answer, there is no limit. Longer answer, for most use-cases Flic will be in Passive mode which doesn't have a limit to how many Flics you can have using one device.
10. How is my Flic different from a NFC-tag?
With NFC you always have to have the smartphone in your hand and scan your tags, considering that you scan it right and don't have to rescan it. A lot of people don't find NFC tags easy enough to use in their everyday life. 
With Flic on the other hand you can launch your actions with a simple press of a button, as long as the smartphone is somewhere nearby. The button interface is simple enough for (almost?) everyone.
11. What material is my Flic made of?
The outside has a custom silicon rubbery coating that gives Flic an exclusive feeling.
12. How can Flic have such a long battery life?
Flic works in three different modes. In the most common mode which most use-cases will use, Flic will practically be turned off all the time until it's pressed. 
13. I want Flic to work with my app, what do I do?
Contact us at support@shortcutlabs.com
 
14. How do I choose the colors of my Flics? 
We will ask you to fill out a form where you will be able to select colors. Keep a look out for our emails! 
15. How do I tell you where to send my Flics? 
We will ask you to fill out a form where you will be able to select your shipping address. Keep a look out for our emails!   


 Contact 
For press inquiries please contact press@shortcutlabs.com
Want to implement our API into your existing App? Contact us at support@shortcutlabs.com

story:
Exciting news! This year, we are delighted to celebrate TCL's 40th anniversary with the multi-category product launch event 2021. From smart home devices to electronics, it has always been our mission to make life intelligent with innovative technology. Check out the TCL breeva air purifier product launch and see the full video here.

Are you tired of conventional air purifiers that barely work? Your search ends here with TCL breeva that effortlessly improve your home's air quality, day and night, so you'll always breathe easy.

 

 

breeva can effectively break down pollutants on a molecular level and destroy harmful particles, microbes, and molds. It also captures up to 99.97% of allergens and pollutants with an effective purification technology.

The magic behind the breevaShield™ filtration system is powerfully smart technology. Our patented anti-bacterial system consists of three filter layers and two protective layers.

Equipped with a pre-filter, H13 HEPA filter, and an activated carbon filter, the 3 filtration layers can break down harmful particles as small as 0.3 microns for a stronger purification.

To protect your living space from toxins and dust, the breevaShield™ system also includes a shield within the protective layer that allows negative ions to accumulate and settle the tiny particles in the air.

In addition, the protective layer contains a UV-C purification layer that destroys the DNA / RNA of microbes and particles by short-wave ultraviolet radiation.

breeva has a medical-grade H13 HEPA filter, which removes all particles with an efficiency of 99.95%. H13 HEPA has a long service life of up to 2,160 hours and should be replaced every six months when breeva is on for 12 hours a day.

Check out the simple step-by-step instructions for changing filters below.

Moreover, breeva continues to provide you with better purification, and in addition to the standard replacement filter, we are also working on more filter options. There will be two enhanced versions of the filter element available on Amazon once the campaign ends. Stay tuned! 

According to the 3rd party testing report, breeva A3 indeed has a CADR of 293.4 m³/h .

*Please note the device was tested at the highest speed using Natural Decay measurement. The test was carried out in Airborne Particle Counter(SX-L301N), with temperature:25 ± 2℃ and relative humidity: 50 ± 10%RH.

breeva A3’s latest UV-C sterilization certification from SGS, a world's leading inspection, verification, testing and certification company that took our A3 for lab test runs and shows that A3 has a virus killing rate of even more than 99.99%. 

*Please note the test method refers to Technical Standard for Disinfection.

For Full Certifications Link: HERE

With a powerful 270 m³/h CADR, breeva tackles nearly every corner and can effectively cover a room with an area of up to 246 ft². It can also clean the air up to 5X more per hour than a conventional air purifier.

As shown in the video below, we are using smoke bomb as an experiment to demonstrate what the room will look like with and without breeva. 

 

See how breeva’s powerful purification system filters out the smoke in just 17 seconds. The conventional air purifier on the right struggles to filter out harmful particles in the ambient air. 

 

Typically, dust mites and formaldehyde cannot be detected with the naked eye, and your nose cannot smell the volatile organic compounds in the air. However, breeva is designed to screen your room so thoroughly that no particles are hidden.

By integrating the laser / infrared dust sensor* and a VOC sensor, breeva can automatically detect airborne particles, gases, and second-hand smoke. Besides, the laser sensor enables breeva to detect harmful particles more precisely in no time.

*The infrared dust sensor is only available for the A2 model; the laser dust sensor for the A3 model.

breeva makes sure every penny of yours is well spent. If the air quality is poor, the auto mode automatically adjusts the fan speed in real-time to the maximum cleaning level and ensures that no excess energy is wasted on clear days.

All you have to do is sit back and watch breeva do her job. Track your air quality via the TCL Home app and see how it changes throughout the day. Nobody else does it better than breeva, see for yourself.

breeva also has three light indicators on the panel that shows good, moderate, and poor air quality in your home or office in real-time.

 

Connect to voice assistants such as Google Assistant and Alexa to remotely control breeva as you go about your daily routine.

Whether you're at work, shopping, or taking a walk, you can easily control breeva via the TCL Home app. At the touch of a button, air quality can be adjusted in real-time and you can come home to fresh air every time.

With the TCL Home app, you can now control your breeva from anywhere. To personalize your favorite mode, you can choose your preferred runtime, switch on auto mode, turn on UV-C purification, and much more via the app. Then, with just one click, set the preset functions as your favorite mode to get the desired air quality each time.

While you’re deep asleep, breeva stays awake to refresh your bedtime air. Set breeva to sleep mode at night so you can enjoy a good night's sleep with a low noise level of 26dB.

The humidifying technology* helps alleviate allergy symptoms and eliminate irritating conditions such as congestion and sinusitis so you can feel refreshed the next morning.

*The humidifying function is only available for the A2 model. 

Inspired by the Nordic style, breeva is designed to go just about anywhere. breeva not only provides clean air with the idea of designing stylish furniture with an air purification function but also brings a touch of elegance in your home.

 

 

Check out what our Amazon buyers have said about the previous breeva model.

With every purchase of the breeva air purifier, it includes a filter, user manual, happy card and a power cable that’s compatible in US, CA, UK, and EU countries.

TCL delivers joy and simplicity through the thoughtful execution of technology. Our new breeva air purifier embodies that promise, with smart technology and innovative features that will effortlessly improve your home’s air quality, day and night. 

Being at the center of the booming smart home market, TCL listened carefully to customer feedback when developing the line of breeva air purifiers, ensuring the best user experience.

We identified the most sought-after features such as greater space coverage, better filtration system, voice assistance support, and affordability to improve over previous models. These improvements will provide users with a stronger purification, fresher air, and a touch of elegance in their homes.

story:
BodyPluv is a maximum performance drying tool that is easy to use, and it sticks right to your bathroom wall for immediate access once you step out of the shower. 

 

 

 

 

 

BODYPLUV warms your body as it dries, making you feel like you’re wrapped in a cozy, post-shower blanket. So instead of dreading shutting off the hot water, you’ll look forward to drying off in a luxurious cloud of warm air.

 

 

 

You’re wiping sh*t all over your clean body when you dry off with a towel. No, really.

 

 

On top of that, experts recommend that you replace towels (at least) every two years.

 

 

 

Learning how gross your towels are is unsettling, but there’s a solution.

 

 

BODYPLUV gives you a cleaner, more hygienic bathing routine by delivering a fresh, contactless drying experience that’s quick and feels amazing.

 

 

No need to call your electrician or remodel your shower. Anyone can install BODYPLUV in a minute! You simply apply it to your bathroom wall with included nano gel tape, plug it in and you’re ready to air dry after every shower.

 

Installation Steps:

  1.  Apply the nano gel tape to your bathroom wall by an outlet.
  2.  Mount your BodyPluv to four round pins on each corner of the wall mount.
  3.  Plug it in and dry off like never before!

 

 

 

 

 

BODYPLUV powers on the moment you pull the handgrip downward off the wall mount and stops once you put it back or when the timer runs out.

 

 

Every other setting is controlled by a simple finger tap.

 

 

 

 

With BODYPLUV, you can dry every part of your body in 4 minutes with the extendable air hose. It stretches up to 78 inches and allows you to target those hard-to-dry places, like your underarms and privates. 

 

 

Other body dryers are expensive and take long. They require you to stand on a fan platform and can’t target all your nooks and crannies (or the upper half of your body). No thanks!

 

 

 

 

BODYPLUV lets you manually target any area or enjoy a hands-free drying experience. You simply hang the air hose on the Hands-Free Holder and you can brush your teeth, shave and do your hair while drying off.

 

 

 

 

BODYPLUV has 4 temperature settings and 2 air speeds so you can find your perfect temperature during both humid summers and frigid winters. 

 

 

Level one starts at 95℉ (closest to human body temperature) and Level 4 goes all the way up to 149℉. All you do is tap a button to switch between the 4 options.

 

 

 

In addition to temperature control, you can also change wind speed between Natural Wind Mode and Turbo Mode. 

 

 

 

BODYPLUV helps you stay on schedule with a built-in Timer for 3, 6, 9 and 12 minutes. After 12 minutes, it automatically shuts off.

 

 

You can choose any of the time options but it defaults to 12 minutes, signaled by 4 lights over the Timer icon. Every 3 minutes one light goes out to show how much time is left before shut off.

 

 

It's easy to spend way too much time in a hot, steamy shower. Luckily for you, BODYPLUV has your back and won't allow you to waste time basking in a blanket of warm air. Showers could really use this feature...

 

 

 

Never wake partners, kids or roommates with BODYPLUV’s sleep-friendly sound levels.

 

 

 

Twenty-two percent of household water usage comes from doing laundry and about 5% of energy usage goes towards this as well. 

 

 

 

BODYPLUV’s IPX4 rating means it stands up to the wettest environments, like your steamy, moisture-filled bathroom.

 

 

On top of that, it has a built-in safety system that automatically shuts it off after 12 minutes to prevent overheating and wasting energy.

 

 

Man’s best friend deserves hygienic drying too, which is why we include a soft, silicone brush  designed specifically for pets.

 

 

It won’t hurt your pet’s skin and it gives them the spa-like experience they deserve with every bath.

 

 

 

BODYPLUV’s made from the highest-quality materials so that it looks good, performs perfectly and lasts under moist conditions.

 

 

 

 

Using a hair dryer on your parts is a serious no. It takes minimal Googling to discover that while hair dryers have hot air that could dry your body, it’s not safe or healthy. You could end up with a burnt tip (you know the one) or crispy privates.

 

 

With that being said, people looove drying off below the belt with air because it feels incredible and thoroughly dries those hard to reach flaps and crevices.

 


BODYPLUV gives you the same constant heat that feels amazing and dries every last drop of water, only it will never burn your skin. It’s safe on all of your body parts and makes your shower finale savor-worthy.

 

 

BODYPLUV makes drying off satisfying for everyone, regardless of age or ability. It’s warm and pleasant for kids after a bath, and you can use it to dry off your pet!

 

 

 

We all know how hard it is to get out of a really relaxing, hot shower or bath. Add winter to the mix and getting out of the shower becomes downright miserable. 

 

 

BODYPLUV warms your body while drying it, so you step from one soothing temperature to another.

 

 

BODYPLUV’s ultra quiet air won’t scare kids or animals, and it feels so good, they’ll want drying off to take as long as possible.

 

 

 BODYPLUV offers a more gentle drying alternative for sensitive skin with low temperatures and contactless drying. 

 

 

 

 

One of the quickest ways to make a difference is to change just one thing that you do every day, like how you dry off after a shower. 

 

 

Every time you dry off with BODYPLUV, there’s one less wet towel to wash and there’s less bacteria growing in your bathroom (and on your body). And the best part? It keeps you warm and feels incredible.

 

 

At BODYPLUV, our mission is to give you the most satisfying and hygienic way to dry your skin while helping the planet. Reducing water consumption and our dependence on towels is just the first step. 

 

 

New to Indiegogo? No problem. Follow these simple steps to get your own BODYPLUV.

 

 

At the end of the campaign, we’ll send you a survey to get your BODYPLUV color choice and shipping information, and deliver your BODYPLUV when manufacturing is complete!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We have worked extremely hard to make this product ready for full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment, but here are what we see as the risks and our plan to assess them:

MANUFACTURING: The manufacturer is lined up, and we have quality assurance people on site during production.

FULFILLMENT: Sometimes things get a bit crazy and stuff happens that can’t be planned for: a supplier misses a deadline or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay. We are using an experienced logistics team get our products to you. We’ll keep open and honest communication with you through our process so you know where your product is and when it’s going to get to you.

story:
Are you tired of having to go through multiple steps, like grinding your beans, brewing your coffee, adding your water etc.,

Do you wish if there was an easier way to make your coffee?

Now you can order your coffee by a simple touch of a button or wake up at the morning finding your coffee is ready.

Barista Bot is the first smart full automatic coffee machine that makes up to 16 drinks. Just one touch of a button combines delicious ground coffee, fresh milk, and purified warm water into the perfect cup of coffee.

Barista Bot is featured on: 

 

Machine dimensions (18.7 " * 9.6" *14.5"High)  

 

Barista Bot with cup warmer and milk fridge

How can you make your perfect cup of coffee? 

One size doesn’t fit all (Customized drinks):

You can configure your customized drink by adjusting the coffee intensity, the amount of milk and water, and the temperature of the coffee. 

 Various Drinks:

Barista Bot makes up to 16 different drinks.   

Factors that affect the taste of the coffee:

The temperature of the coffee

As the National Coffee Association of USA recommends, the coffee is served at a temperature between 180° to 185° F.

Measured Temperature 183.2 F

Water filter:

After research, we found out that the taste of coffee depends on water purity. That’s why we added a filter to the machine to purify water.

The coffee grinder:

The machine has a built-in stainless-steel adjustable coffee grinder up to 6 degrees. 

 Operation and Maintenance

Ø Self-cleaning

The machine cleans itself after serving.  

 

Ø Brush

Each part of the machine can be easily removed and cleaned with a special brush that we send with the machine. Special brush that is included with your Barista Bot.

Ø Environmentally Friendly

The machine uses fresh coffee beans as opposed to expensive capsules, which harm the environment. It is also made of durable high-quality ABS materials.

Easy to use (Mobile App)

The machine will be linked to a mobile app that works on both iOS and Android devices. It can also be linked to Google Home and Amazon Alexa.

Comparison 

Add-ons

1) Stainless Steel Cup Warmer

A stainless-steel cup warmer is attached to the machine to keep your coffee warm for a long time. Its temperature is high enough to keep your cup disinfected. 

 

 

2)Milk Fridge

The  fridge keeps your milk fresh and connected to the coffee Machine

Demo Video-1 Order Your cappuccino from the Machine 

 

Demo Video-2 Order Your Espresso from the Machine

That’s why we added a filter to the machine to purify water.The coffee grinder:The machine has a built-in stainless-steel adjustable coffee grinder up to 6 degrees.  Operation and MaintenanceØ Self-cleaningThe machine cleans itself after serving.   Ø BrushEach part of the machine can be easily removed and cleaned with a special brush that we send with the machine. Special brush that is included with your Barista Bot.Ø Environmentally FriendlyThe machine uses fresh coffee beans as opposed to expensive capsules, which harm the environment. It is also made of durable high-quality ABS materials.Easy to use (Mobile App)The machine will be linked to a mobile app that works on both iOS and Android devices. It can also be linked to Google Home and Amazon Alexa.Comparison Add-ons1) Stainless Steel Cup WarmerA stainless-steel cup warmer is attached to the machine to keep your coffee warm for a long time. Its temperature is high enough to keep your cup disinfected.   2)Milk FridgeThe  fridge keeps your milk fresh and connected to the coffee MachineDemo Video-1 Order Your cappuccino from the Machine  
Demo Video-2 Order Your Espresso from the Machine

story:
The Midea Cube dehumidifier has a unique lift-and-twist design that offers unparalleled flexibility: when operating in extended form, it has up to 3 times more water tank capacity than traditional dehumidifiers and can run much longer without the hassle of frequently emptying the tank; when in nested or drain form, the unit is half the size allowing compact storage or flexible draining.

It can fit into any room and maintain the desired humidity level in your home. The patented sensor and wi-fi enabled app allow you to monitor the humidity and water level, all at your fingertips. With multi-directional air intake and up to three different fan speeds, it is powerful enough to dehumidify your room, and quiet enough that you'll forget it's even there.

Not all dehumidifiers are the same! It's no secret that using conventional units can have its downsides. With a smaller water tank, it can fill up within a few hours, meaning you have to pour out the water more often, or they stop working once the tank is full. They can be noisy, too large to store, and use a lot of electricity.

The Midea Cube Dehumidifier fixes all these issues: with up to 3 times more water tank capacity (nearly 4.2 gallons/16L), multi-directional air intake for optimal dehumidification, and the ability to contract in half for flexible draining and compact storage. Furthermore, it enables streamlined and customizable humidity control through the mobile app: real-time water & humidity level monitoring, full-water alert and water level preset. This is much smarter than your old dehumidifier!

 
 

 

With Midea’s unique lift-and-twist extended design, the Cube dehumidifier has up to 3X more water tank capacity compared to a conventional unit. It sets a new standard for selecting the right dehumidifier: it's not just about the pint, but also the water tank that matches the needs of excess moisture and humidity removal.

 

Up to 3 times longer than a conventional dehumidifier. That's how long the Midea Cube can run before you need to empty its 4.2 gallons water tank. We designed the Midea Cube with a water tank size up to 3X larger than most traditional dehumidifiers, so that it continues to operate until it reaches the desired humidity level at your home. That means fewer trips to the sink emptying out the water tank and more time for yourself.

 

The Midea Cube's powerful multi-directional air intake system makes it ideal for whole-house dehumidification, effectively creating a safer and more comfortable environment anywhere – from your basement, bathroom, bedroom or living room when needed.

 

With no tank, the Midea Cube is about half the size. This provides more flexibility when using the drain hose option. Simply place the unit above the sink or over a floor drain, using the included hose.

Emptying buckets of water can be a hassle. That's why we gave the Midea Cube a drain hose option that saves you from constantly emptying the water tank. If you have a floor drain or sink available, you can empty the water directly without needing the bucket. This allows it to remove excess moisture around the clock without ever having to empty the water tank. With the smaller size, lower weight and easy to use the handle, you can place the cube anywhere.

 

Midea Cube's nested design means you can easily find a place to store it when not in use and extend it to its full capacity whenever you need it again.

 

Humidity control at your fingertips. The Midea Cube Air App allows you to monitor the real-time humidity level of your room and water level of your unit, adjust settings, and power the device on or off from your smartphone. You will receive a full-water alert and can check the status of your dehumidifier anywhere, so you can leave your home knowing it's in good hands.

 

You can even personalize the settings depending on your needs and preferences. For example, if a full 4.2 gallons (16L) bucket is too heavy for you to lift up, you can preset the water level accordingly so it switches off when reaching your desired fill point, keeping it simple and easy for anyone to operate. 

 

The Midea Cube uses a built-in sensor that allows you to monitor the water level in real-time, so you always know the exact status of your dehumidifier. Our algorithm can analyze the humidity level of your room and your unit settings and predict how long until the tank will be full.

 

Equipped with a high-efficiency compressor, the Midea Cube offers a powerful yet efficient dehumidifier. The Midea Cube can effectively remove moisture in your home while conserving energy, helping create the perfect atmosphere for you and your loved ones to relax in.

 

The Midea Cube is quiet. It gives off a mere 42-decibels (*test results under laboratory standard) while operating, meaning it’s quieter than your fridge! 

 

Humidity in closets creates an environment where it leaves stored items smelling musty. The Midea Cube's Max mode is specially designed to dry clothes quickly. Just place it in your laundry room or closet, and let it do the work.

 

The Midea Cube's sleek design fits in any room perfectly, not just the basement: its compact size makes it ideal for your home office; its silent operation will not disrupt your sleep when used in the bedroom. Moreover, the different humidity level settings make it suitable for any room from your bathroom to your home's hard-to-reach crawlspaces.

 

Washable Dust Filter: Our filter can effectively reduce dust and other impurities in the air, plus it's easy to clean. Just rinse the dust filter in the sink every ten days. And no need to buy expensive replacement filters. 
Robust Handles: The handle is designed to comfortably lift the unit and carry a bucket of water, so you can whisk the excess water away without a worry. 
Tank Lock: The lock in the water tank helps ensure the unit orientation is always correct. It requires you to manually press the lock when storing the Midea Cube in the tank.

 

 

 

 

Are you still suffering from wet and rainy days? The quilts and sheets are too damp to fall asleep? Get allergic reactions more easily? Feel helpless with the mold in your house?  Actually, in a humid environment, bacterial growth increases quickly. It's very harmful to you and your family's health, especially for children and the elderly. 

All the problems mentioned above can be improved with the perfect antidote for a moist indoor environment. The solution is a dehumidifier! The primary function of a dehumidifier is to reduce the amount of humidity in the air, but it comes with plenty of additional benefits.

 

Every home is different. Whether you’re in a studio apartment or have a two-story house, the Midea Cube will satisfy your current home needs. Take a look below to choose the best model for your home.

  • For US: 4.2 gallons water tank, 35 pints (DOE 2019) water removal per day, covering up to 3000 sq.ft.
  • For US: 4.2 gallons water tank, 50 pints (DOE 2019) water removal per day, covering up to 4500 sq.ft.
  • For UK/AU/DE: 12 liter water tank, 20 liter water removal per day, covering up to 40m². 

 

 
 

We stand behind our products & services with confidence. Midea offers a 1-year limited warranty for the Midea Cube Dehumidifier. Please note that the warranty period complies with the applicable consumer laws in the consumer's country of purchase required. Please email us if you would like to know more about the warranty details. Email address: official@midea.com

As the world's largest producer of major appliances and the world’s No.1 brand of air-treatment products, Midea aims to bring more to our users with constant innovation. The Midea Cube extended dehumidifier is not our first campaign on Indiegogo. Earlier this year, we launched the Midea U-Shaped AC campaign which successfully reached over $1.5 million!

Unlike traditional units, the Midea U-Shaped AC is a radically new type of window air conditioner. Its revolutionary U-shaped design blocks the noise out and makes it faster and easier to set up. The unique Inverter Quattro technology keeps your home cool through the worst of the summer while using 35% less energy to run. And you don’t even have to give up a window- you can still open and close your window any time, just as you normally would.

Midea is one of the Global Fortune 500 brands, and also the No.1 Air Treatment Brand in the world. We guarantee 100% high quality and on-time shipping for crowdfunding customers.
 
We have chosen to launch our new dehumidifier on Indiegogo because we believe the crowdfunding platform is a great channel to communicate with our customers. We listen to our customer's voices to optimize our products and services accordingly. The value we place on your feedback is why we are providing significant discounts in return for your early support, as we bring this product to market.”

story:
Origin Story

One day our founder decided to read the back of their "high-end" moisturizer and was astonished by the length of unnecessary and potentially harmful ingredients. Parabens, Silicones, PEGs, and Synthetic Fragrances are all unnecessary ingredients that can cause more damage than their perceived benefits are worth. The industry's increased knowledge on these ingredients has led to a flood of All-Natural and Organic skincare lines to seemingly address the concern. However the majority of quality brands are financially inaccessible to most people, with face oils and serums ranging from $90 - $300+. Or they use subpar ingredients to lower the prices. Our Renewal Face Oil brings the highest quality ingredients at a much more affordable price. We are an LGBTQ owned business focused on making sustainable and environmentally friendly decisions in every aspect of the production chain.  

Ingredients:

Prickly Pear Seed Oil*, Pumpkin Seed Oil, Avocado Oil, Sea Buckthorn Oil, Hemp Seed Oil, Olive Squalane, Marula Oil, Raspberry Seed Oil, Watermelon Seed Oil, Evening Primrose Oil, Argan Oil, Papaya Seed Oil, Kiwi Seed Oil, Guava Seed Oil, Rosehip Seed Oil, Passion Fruit Seed Oil, Tocopherols (Vitamin E), Geranium Oil, Patchouli Oil

 

  

 

*Prickly Pear Seed Oil

Prickly Pear Seed Oil is derived from the seeds of the Barbary Fig Cactus.  It takes over 1 million seeds and over 36 hours of manual labor to produce a single liter of oil. Thus, we're unfortunately not talking about the most inexpensive oil on the market.  This stuff can get a little pricey.

Essential Fatty Acids

Prickly Pear Seed Oil has the highest concentration of unsaturated fatty acids of any plant oil at 88%

Linoleic Acid

PPSO contains upward of 60.5% Linoleic Acid (Omega 6).  This fatty acid imparts anti-inflammatory moisture to the skin while promoting wound healing, including healing acne.  It imparts this healing moisture without being heavy, resulting in a velvety light finish on the skin.

This is why PPSO is fantastic for all skin types, including oil and acne prone skin!

Oleic Acid

PPSO contains 20% Oleic Acid, otherwise known as Omega 9.  Oleic Acid adds moisture and richness to oils as well as anti-inflammatory benefits.

Stearic Acid

PPSO contains 3.2% of Stearic Acid, a cleansing surfactant.  Surfactants are substances that tend to reduce the surface tension of a liquid in which it is dissolved.

This contributes to PPSO's cleansing properties.

Palmitic Acid

PPSO contains 13.9% Palmitic Acid, otherwise known as Omega 7.  Palmitic Acid is a soothing emollient that our skin stops producing as we age.  In aging skin, palmitic acid levels can decrease by as much as 56%.

This contributes to PPSO's anti-aging and moisturizing properties.

Vitamins & Minerals

In addition to essential fatty acids, PPSO is loaded with with vitamins and minerals!

Vitamin E

Prickly Pear Seed Oil has the highest concentration of Vitamin E, also known as Tocopherol, of any plant oil, 150% more Vitamin E than Argan Oil, which was previously revered for its Tocopherol content.  Vitamin E is known for the following skin benefits:

  • A potent antioxidant that helps fight free radicals that would prematurely age the skin
  • Promotes cellular regeneration
  • Reduces hyper-pigmentation
  • Heals scar tissue and assists in cellular regeneration
  • Improves skin texture, moisture and softness

Vitamin K

In addition to Vitamin E, PPSO has high concentrations of Vitamin K.  Vitamin K is amazing at healing the skin due in part to its abilities to strengthen capillaries and aid in blood clotting.  In addition to:

  • Stimulating cell growth
  • Brightening the completion by reducing redness and hyperpigmentation
  • Preserves skin elasticity through protein activation
  • Combats acne
  • Reduces under-eye darkness

story:
That's why our team created DuraPik, a reusable, zero-waste dental pick made from recycled, surgical-grade stainless steel that’s built to last. DuraPik even comes with a Lifetime warranty. This beautiful, timeless, ergonomic design fits right in the palm of your hand – and, when necessary, between your teeth.

We’ve combined this beautiful, durable dental pick with our organic vegan floss. Infused with peppermint essential oils and coated in organic candelilla wax, this floss is totally house-compostable and vegan-friendly.

It’s the perfect combo for anyone that wants to rid themselves of single-use plastic and take care of their oral health. What’s better than a clear conscience and a great smile?

 

DuraPik is an eco-conscious start-up. We’re based in Australia/Canada but have team members around the world. We are a small team of elite(…ish) eco-warriors lead by founder and head honcho Keirin Shaw.

The company’s ultimate goal is to eliminate single-use plastics. Today, we’re implementing that goal with our eponymous product, the DuraPik dental pick, and its accompanying DuraFloss dental floss. We want to give you the power to help change the world a little every time you floss.

We’re giving you the power to help change the world each time you floss. By redesigning the everyday single-use dental pick, we’ve created something much more sustainable, reusable and, dare we say, sexier… Yes, we dare. It’s something a little sexier for your night-time routine. Because saving the planet is always hot.

 

 

We donate 5% of our profits to Project Aware to help clean our oceans and another 5% to reforestation*. Being Australian, we know all too well the ramifications of clear-cut logging for our land and wildlife. We’re aiming to create a new normal where single-use plastic is a thing of the past. That’s why DuraPik’s products are 100% plastic-free and environmentally-friendly. With DuraPik, you can rest easy knowing your dental health isn’t harming the environment or our planet’s marine life. So what are you waiting for.. 

*Only future profits will be donated. 

 Want more Info? 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

It was important for us to consider all the functionalities of the everyday dental pick. In going from "single use" to a more durable and sustainable design, we wanted to make DuraPik eco-friendly and give it a more modern look. After intensive research and surveys, Durapik is the final result of all the work done by our team of eco-conscious engineers and designers, and our community!

Your support will be funding:

  •  Injection moulding tools: The biggest investment required for DuraPik to go from a dream to a funky fresh reality is the making of the injection moulding tools.
     
  •  First production runs: After setting up the manufacturing process, we’ll need to start the first production run. To do that, we will need to purchase various recycled raw materials as well as cover the costs of our manufacturing operations to produce the first-ever batch of DuraPiks.
     
  •  Subscription service & online shop: To make your lifestyle easier and breezier, DuraPik will be offering a subscription-based service. To make that happen, we must set up an online shop and partner with the right logistics company to ensure our Durapik products get delivered on time and in good shape.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We're happy to answer any queries you might have about the Durapik or if you need more details, please contacts us!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 Back us!

*give it time, it will play* Sorry about the beard??...?*All measurements are in MillimetersIt was important for us to consider all the functionalities of the everyday dental pick. In going from "single use" to a more durable and sustainable design, we wanted to make DuraPik eco-friendly and give it a more modern look. After intensive research and surveys, Durapik is the final result of all the work done by our team of eco-conscious engineers and designers, and our community!Your support will be funding:
 Injection moulding tools: The biggest investment required for DuraPik to go from a dream to a funky fresh reality is the making of the injection moulding tools. 
 First production runs: After setting up the manufacturing process, we’ll need to start the first production run. To do that, we will need to purchase various recycled raw materials as well as cover the costs of our manufacturing operations to produce the first-ever batch of DuraPiks. 
 Subscription service & online shop: To make your lifestyle easier and breezier, DuraPik will be offering a subscription-based service. To make that happen, we must set up an online shop and partner with the right logistics company to ensure our Durapik products get delivered on time and in good shape.
            We're happy to answer any queries you might have about the Durapik or if you need more details, please contacts us!                  Back us!

story:
RICHYN is the smart and stylish tool that holds towels tight and keeps them from falling to the floor.

 

 

 

 

Forget about towels falling from ordinary hooks and rings with RICHYN. This smart towel holder provides a secure grip to your towels to prevent them from dropping on floors. 

 

 

 

The RICHYN’s Push and Grip mechanism prevents your towels from being dirty and keeps them out of your pet’s reach. The smart design lets you use the towel without removing it from the holder. Simply click and fasten your towel in seconds!

 

 

 

 

RICHYN is several times smaller than conventional tower racks, so you can place it anywhere you want. You can mount it on any surface using a quick adhesive tape or screws. Attach it on walls, on the fridge, on kitchen cabinets, on bathroom tiles, and more.

 

 

 

Our team advocates the preservation of our environment. We actively support the use of reusable materials, as well as those subject to subsequent recycling. In line with this, we use durable, sustainable materials for the production of our product. 

In addition, using RICHYN will reduce your usage of paper towels. This small step goes a long way in saving our resources. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The one seemingly simple problem from a long time ago simply never left us: the towels that fell from towel hooks and rings.  Every day, this problem is encountered by every person, but for some reason so far no one has been able to offer a solution that just works. 

Using engineering knowledge and smart materials, we were able to create the perfect holder for your things. We were inspired by the works of science fiction writers and classical forms in art when we thought about our product design. Finally, we found a truly perfect shape for our product. 

 

 


We are a new startup dedicated to new technologies and innovative solutions for homes. Our teams are based in the USA, Israel, Ukraine, and China. We are made up of experts in the field of materials technology, industrial design, and engineering.

Our goal is to make you forget about the problem of falling towels or any other things that you use daily and want to keep handy. We spent a lot of time on research and development to create RICHYN so that we can be proud to share it with the whole world!

 

SHIPPING RATES

story:
Overview

Create mouthwatering BBQ meals anywhere with the ASMOKE Applewood Pellet Grill.​

  • Pure Applewood Flavor
  • Color LED PID Temperature Control
  • 8-in-1 Versatility
  • Auto Pellet Reloading
  • Heats Up 15% Faster
  • Uses 20% Less Pellets
  • Portable Design

Prepare your palate for a unique and flavorful experience. ASMOKE is the first portable (and versatile!) applewood grill that uses 100% all-natural applewood pellets.

Other brands add harmful blends and unnatural fillers to their pellets. We don’t. We source our pellets from real fruit orchards. The apple trees are harvested, brought to our plant, and produced all in a few days to keep their freshness. By using only pure fruitwood, you’ll enjoy delectable, smoky-sweet flavors without the artificial taste.

 

 

 

                                     

                                     

                                     

 

 

 

 

Flavors from the Orchard

ASMOKE fuels pure applewood pellets sourced from real orchards—infusing your meals with sweet and smoky undertones without the artificial taste. Our pellets do not contain any fillers, binding agents, chemicals, oils, or additives. Ever.

 

More Ways to Cook

Whether you’re in the mood for prime rib roast or BBQ chicken pizza, ASMOKE’S versatility lets you grill, smoke, BBQ, bake, roast, braise, sear, and char-grill.

 

Enjoy Longer Cookouts

Other pellets burn quicker to maintain the same temperature. Our premium pellets, however, burn at about 8,500 BTU per pound. That means our pellets will reach 500°F 15% faster, stay hotter, and burn longer, so you don't have to go through bags of pellets constantly.

ASMOKE also uses fewer pellets than other grills — saving up to 20%. That means less ash and fewer grill cleanups. Plus, you'll spend less money on pellets and spend more time perfecting your grilled recipes.

 

Auto Pellet Reloading

With the ASMOKE grill, you can still walk away when you need to, as it will maintain the desired temperature for you by automatically reloading pellets to regulate heat. No need to babysit!

 

Perfect Precision

Go low and slow, or fast and hot with a temperature dial ranging from 180° to 500°F. Color LED digital temperature display makes it easy to set the temperature you want so that you can cook with confidence. 

And with a programmable meat probe port, you'll get quick and accurate temperature readings to know when the meat is fall-off-the-bone ready.

 

Great Pairs​

Applewood pairs well with anything. Create a light, fruity-smoked flavor that enhances beef, lamb, chicken, pork, seafood, vegetables, and wild game. You’ll never need any other flavorings again.

 

 

 

Bring the Flavor Anywhere​

Share your love of flavors anywhere that has a power outlet. From camping to tailgating, to your backyard, ASMOKE has you covered with its super portable design. It's also compact enough to be stored in any space—whether you have a backyard, patio, or deck. ASMOKE grills are great for camping and tailgating. However, it will require an inverter to convert the electricity from 12V to 120VC AC. Please refer to more information in our FAQ.

 

Easy to Clean

ASMOKE comes equipped with a side bucket to collect extra oil and grease for easy disposing. For detailed cleaning instructions, please visit our FAQ section.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Italian Rib Eye
 
 
BBQ Pork Shoulder
 
 
Grilled Spiced Chicken Skewers with Cucumber Salad
 
 
BBQ Pork Chops with Bourbon Glaze
 

 

Applewood Smoked Chicken Wings
 

 

Grilled Corn On The Cob

 

 

 

 

We just hit our first Stretch Goal ($100K!). That means for every grill you purchased you'll get an accessory set that includes:  1 pair of grilling gloves, 1 pair of stainless steel tongs, and 2 grilling claws

 

Earn 10% cash back for helping us spread the word!

Be rewarded with 10% commission of every dollar you help raise for our campaign! All you have to do is:

1. Click HERE and register as a Booster.

2. Share your unique Booster link on your Facebook, Twitter, Blog, Website, or wherever you'd like!

3. Refer to your Kickbooster dashboard and watch your commissions roll in!

Our Misson

Our mission is to create a healthier barbecue culture with 100% natural and original flavors that will delight all taste buds.

Our Story

It all began at a friend’s BBQ party when one of us ate some ribs that tasted like lighter fluid and charcoal. That moment sparked a discussion about ways we can create a healthier, tastier alternative.

Several years later we launched ASMOKE as a way to bring people together, using fruit-smoked flavors that taste natural and original.

We believe that grilling connects us, and deepens our bonds through our shared love of food and creativity. Combining ingredients and enjoying the end result is an enriching experience.

 

 

That’s why we put flavors first. Our passion for taste enables us to handpick the best quality fruitwoods that everyone can enjoy. While other pellets contain fillers and binding agents, we use only 100% pure applewood — straight from the delicious orchards of Aksu, Xinjiang.

We want to inspire grillers everywhere with real flavors and simple, outdoor cooking. Because at the end of the day, it’s all about sharing delicious food with great company. 

ASMOKE's SGS certificate of approval ensures that our applewood pellets have been inspected for quality.

We’ve spent countless hours testing our products to ensure safety and quality.

Our shipping carriers are FedEx in the U.S., UPS in Canada, and Eparcel and Express in Australia. Shipping is expected by mid July and delivery is expected by August.

A clean grill means smoky-sweet goodness year round.

  1. Place the grill rack and chimney dome in hot, soapy water. 
  2. Discard any solids from the detachable grease bucket. 
  3. Scrub all the parts as needed and air-dry thoroughly. 

 

Check our FAQ section for full cleaning instructions and how to maintain your grill after each use.

This crowdfunding project is marketed by Red Cube. Since 2015, Red Cube has helped companies of all sizes bring their ideas into fruition, raising over $100MM through crowdfunding.

 

Safety Steps

We're fully committed to delivering your products on time, and we're taking the necessary steps to protect our incredible fulfillment team's health and safety.  Our safety measures include social distancing and increased surface cleaning, and we are also performing temperature checks for our team. 

 

Additional safety steps include:

- Local warehouses taking extensive precautions to ensure the safety of its workers. 

- Providing team members with high-quality face masks and gloves to wear at work. 

- Encouraging healthy hygiene habits as guided by the CDC.

 

We’re On Track for Safe Delivery

With proper planning and safety measures, COVID-19 has had zero effect on our production. Since we’re deep into our production stage, all products will be shipped to local warehouses ahead of time. Rest assured the first batch will ship early July and delivery is expected around mid-July. We currently don’t foresee any delays due to the Coronavirus. To help ensure the health and safety of our supporters, our team, and the broader community we’ll be doing contactless delivery as our default delivery option. Contactless delivery means: We’ll deliver your item(s) to the front door of your house or apartment. We’ll knock/buzz, and will greet you at your door while maintaining a six-foot social distance. Your signature won’t be required — our team will simply photograph your order at your doorstep as proof of delivery.

 

Please contact us if you have any questions or concerns at support@asmokegrill.com.

story:
A magical way to begin a journey, right from your room.

Day in, day out, we can’t do everything, and we can’t be everywhere. The world is so big, there are so many places just waiting. How about being in Bolivia’s Salar de Uyuni in the morning, in Rome for lunch, then gazing at the view from the Space Station in a futuristic dining experience at night?

 

So what is Atmoph Window 2?

Atmoph Window 2 is a smart display in the shape of a window, from which you can see scenes from around the world. By simply putting it on your desk or hanging it on the wall, Atmoph Window 2 will open up a whole new world before you. With over a thousand videos of beautiful scenery from around the world, complete with audio, you’ll feel as if you’re actually there.

 

But not just a smart window. It's a smarter smart window.

"How about if you could really have a window to the whole world from your room?" Atmoph Window began from this one idea. Our first product was introduced in 2015, people around the world took to it, and we brought the world to them.

“How can we evolve into a ‘Window of the Future’? How can we change people’s experiences of their everyday?” We thought hard, and now Atmoph Window has been reborn, into a smarter smart window, Atmoph Window 2. 

 

Featuring over 1,000 original 4K videos

From incredible scenery and stunning oceans and night scenes, to quaint street corners. You can enjoy these scenes from around the world in 4K ultra-high resolution. Together with true-to-life sound, you will feel like you are really there. Each looped video lasts around 15 minutes, and only costs about 5 dollars (ten fixed views are installed initially). Every month our dedicated videographers shoot new scenes, so the choice only gets bigger. 

 

Upload your own video

Of course, you can also upload your own videos. Not only can you relive that unforgettable time, but you can share it with your friends and family. A nostalgic place, or that once-in-a-lifetime journey. It’s nice to be able to bring it to life again in your own home. 

 

Join three windows together in a Panorama

Join three Atmoph Windows together to make a synced Panorama. A fish can swim along from left to right, a boat can take off from the port from one side, and head out to see on the other. An even more impressive scenery for your room. Maybe even try out different scenes on each window. 

 

Live Streaming

See what’s going on in the world in real time. We plan on increasing the number of camera spots, so you can enjoy the ‘now’ from locations across the world.

 

Change your Frame to suit your interior

You can choose from high quality resin frames in five different colors, or a supreme quality timber frame that has been made to bring out the inherent warmth of genuine wood. This wooden frame has been custom made by Japan’s premier long-standing traditional wood furniture maker, Karimoku.

 

An even more real window, while maximizing the potential of everything a window could be 

Atmoph Window 2 has all the best qualities of a real window, with all the excitement of a smart window. What does a window do for you? Bring in light, space, breeze, show you what’s going on outside? By including various additional modules such as the Camera Module, Atmoph Window 2 can even do things that normal windows can’t. Now THAT is a window of the future!

 

Camera Module

 

Face-View Follow: Changes the angle of the view to fit the position of your face

With the Camera Module option, Atmoph Window 2 can track the position of your face using the camera, so it knows what angle you are looking at your window from. The scenery changes accordingly, making your view look even more real, more three dimensional. 

 

It also becomes an indoor camera

Not only that, but with the Camera Module, you can check the inside of your home even when you aren’t there. Want to see how your pet’s doing? Your smart phone can turn into a small window that allows you to glimpse inside your home when you never could, up until now. 


 

LED Light Module

One of the best things about a window, is it brings in light. With Atmoph Window 2, attach the LED Light Module and it's just like having that light stream in. Not as bright as the sun, but just enough to help your pot plants grow. How about relieving that stress with an indoor garden?

 

Linked to your smart speaker

You can also operate your Atmoph Window 2 through your smart speaker, change the view or adjust the volume. Don’t want to get off the couch? Got your hands fully tied? Just tell your Google Home ‘Hey, Google, change the view to Hawaii’, and the view will transform into a tropical paradise. Brighten your mood in just one moment. 


 

The entire frame vibrates as a speaker. Sound that goes to the next level.

The sound quality of Atmoph Window 2 has evolved to the next level, by replacing mono speakers with stereo speakers. An increase in the number of interior speakers from one to two also means you can enjoy more surround sound. Moreover, Atmoph Window 2 is equipped with a vibration speaker, turning the entire screen into a sound experience. From high pitched birds to the thunder of the Niagara Falls, everything sounds truly real.

 

Listen to your favorite music, maybe?

Seeing as we have worked to give you true sound quality, maybe you’d like to listen to your favorite music? With Bluetooth or Spotify, you can choose your playlist together with whatever view you like. Enjoy your “me time” to the fullest. 

 

Know your day at a glance

It’s your busy morning, and you want to check the time, the weather, the news. Atmoph Window will tell you what you need to know. There is no need to have multiple devices any more. You can check everything, at a glance. With Google Calendar synchronizing, you can confirm your work and your family’s schedule, and it’s so big and easy to see. Now that’s convenience! 

 

Come across a new view, begin a new journey

You might think ‘I want to go there!’ and with your Atmoph Window, you can book a trip to the other side of the window, any time! 

 

Choose your operating method, we’ve made it simple

From the smartphone app, to the remote control and sensor, and even automatic scheduling, there are multiple ways to operate your Atmoph Window 2. 

 

Decoration: Try them out, see what suits your lifestyle. 

You can even change the inside frame of your window. Adjust it to suit the view, or there are different Decorations to suit the season. Feel like you are at a Halloween party, inside a plane, how about on  the ISS! 

 

Beautiful fabric cable

We tried to make Atmoph Window 2 as simple as possible. We even tried to eliminate the power cord so that it feels more like a real window, but with current technology standards, this proved to be infeasible. So we installed a high-quality fabric cable that won’t interfere with the decor. Its soft ivory color can fit with any wall. Also, the cable can come out from backside too in case you want to hide it inside the wall.

 

Technical specs

  • 27-inch high-contrast display (1920x1080, anti-glare)
  • CPU: 1.9 GHz quad-core ARM Cortex-A53
  • GPU: Mali-G31
  • H.265 hardware decoder
  • 2GB memory
  • 32GB storage
  • Wi-Fi: 802.11 ac/b/g/n (5GHz/2.4GHz)
  • Bluetooth: 4.0
  • 3W full-range speaker x 2 and 10W vibration speaker
  • Size: 25.4” x 15.2” x 2.4” (645 x 385 x 60mm)
  • Weight: 12.1lbs (5.5kg)
  • Power: 60W
  • AC adapter: 100-240V (50/60Hz)

Be noted that design details and technical specs can still vary along the way to production. We'll try to update you as much as we can.

 

About the team and the Atmoph Window story

“If we could change the view from our window…” This was the beginning of everything, and lead to the birth of the window of the future. Not only have we brought views from around the world, we have updated the window into a device that can make your lifestyle smarter. Our new members, like us, are into traveling, gadgets, discovering new things, are adventurous, and ready to embark on the Atmoph journey. 

 

Atmoph Window 2, new and improved from our years of experience and thanks to your feedback. 

It's not a TV, it's not just a display. It is designed as a window. And we worked to make it smarter, more natural, and for it to become even more than what any normal window ever could.

 

Yokozeki Ryota - Product Design

For product design we have employed the knowhow of Ryota Yokozeki, who worked at SONY as an industrial designer from 2008-2017. His Aizome chair was selected to be part of the collection of Vitra Design Museum in 2016. He established "RYOTA YOKOZEKI STUDIO" in Tokyo in 2017.

 

Wooden Frame by Karimoku, the best

Our wooden Atmoph Window frame is produced by Karimoku Furniture, Japan’s premier timber furniture maker with true knowledge of and love for the warm natural qualities of wood. Karimoku was founded over eighty years ago from a love and deep knowledge of timber. This beautiful smooth frame is made to bring out the inherent warmth of genuine wood, and brings a natural lightness to any interior. 

 

Timeline

 

Thank you for your support! Let's make the everyday an adventure!

Atmoph team

 

Ask us anything!
contact@atmoph.com

Each looped video lasts around 15 minutes, and only costs about 5 dollars (ten fixed views are installed initially). Every month our dedicated videographers shoot new scenes, so the choice only gets bigger.  Upload your own videoOf course, you can also upload your own videos. Not only can you relive that unforgettable time, but you can share it with your friends and family. A nostalgic place, or that once-in-a-lifetime journey. It’s nice to be able to bring it to life again in your own home.  Join three windows together in a PanoramaJoin three Atmoph Windows together to make a synced Panorama. A fish can swim along from left to right, a boat can take off from the port from one side, and head out to see on the other. An even more impressive scenery for your room. Maybe even try out different scenes on each window.  Live StreamingSee what’s going on in the world in real time. We plan on increasing the number of camera spots, so you can enjoy the ‘now’ from locations across the world. Change your Frame to suit your interiorYou can choose from high quality resin frames in five different colors, or a supreme quality timber frame that has been made to bring out the inherent warmth of genuine wood. This wooden frame has been custom made by Japan’s premier long-standing traditional wood furniture maker, Karimoku. An even more real window, while maximizing the potential of everything a window could be Atmoph Window 2 has all the best qualities of a real window, with all the excitement of a smart window. What does a window do for you? Bring in light, space, breeze, show you what’s going on outside? By including various additional modules such as the Camera Module, Atmoph Window 2 can even do things that normal windows can’t. Now THAT is a window of the future! Camera Module Face-View Follow: Changes the angle of the view to fit the position of your faceWith the Camera Module option, Atmoph Window 2 can track the position of your face using the camera, so it knows what angle you are looking at your window from. The scenery changes accordingly, making your view look even more real, more three dimensional.  It also becomes an indoor cameraNot only that, but with the Camera Module, you can check the inside of your home even when you aren’t there. Want to see how your pet’s doing? Your smart phone can turn into a small window that allows you to glimpse inside your home when you never could, up until now.  LED Light ModuleOne of the best things about a window, is it brings in light. With Atmoph Window 2, attach the LED Light Module and it's just like having that light stream in. Not as bright as the sun, but just enough to help your pot plants grow. How about relieving that stress with an indoor garden? Linked to your smart speakerYou can also operate your Atmoph Window 2 through your smart speaker, change the view or adjust the volume. Don’t want to get off the couch? Got your hands fully tied? Just tell your Google Home ‘Hey, Google, change the view to Hawaii’, and the view will transform into a tropical paradise. Brighten your mood in just one moment.  The entire frame vibrates as a speaker. Sound that goes to the next level.The sound quality of Atmoph Window 2 has evolved to the next level, by replacing mono speakers with stereo speakers. An increase in the number of interior speakers from one to two also means you can enjoy more surround sound. Moreover, Atmoph Window 2 is equipped with a vibration speaker, turning the entire screen into a sound experience. From high pitched birds to the thunder of the Niagara Falls, everything sounds truly real. Listen to your favorite music, maybe?Seeing as we have worked to give you true sound quality, maybe you’d like to listen to your favorite music? With Bluetooth or Spotify, you can choose your playlist together with whatever view you like. Enjoy your “me time” to the fullest.  Know your day at a glanceIt’s your busy morning, and you want to check the time, the weather, the news. Atmoph Window will tell you what you need to know. There is no need to have multiple devices any more. You can check everything, at a glance. With Google Calendar synchronizing, you can confirm your work and your family’s schedule, and it’s so big and easy to see. Now that’s convenience!  Come across a new view, begin a new journeyYou might think ‘I want to go there!’ and with your Atmoph Window, you can book a trip to the other side of the window, any time!  Choose your operating method, we’ve made it simpleFrom the smartphone app, to the remote control and sensor, and even automatic scheduling, there are multiple ways to operate your Atmoph Window 2.  Decoration: Try them out, see what suits your lifestyle. You can even change the inside frame of your window. Adjust it to suit the view, or there are different Decorations to suit the season. Feel like you are at a Halloween party, inside a plane, how about on  the ISS!  Beautiful fabric cableWe tried to make Atmoph Window 2 as simple as possible. We even tried to eliminate the power cord so that it feels more like a real window, but with current technology standards, this proved to be infeasible. So we installed a high-quality fabric cable that won’t interfere with the decor. Its soft ivory color can fit with any wall. Also, the cable can come out from backside too in case you want to hide it inside the wall. Technical specs
27-inch high-contrast display (1920x1080, anti-glare)
CPU: 1.9 GHz quad-core ARM Cortex-A53
GPU: Mali-G31
H.265 hardware decoder
2GB memory
32GB storage
Wi-Fi: 802.11 ac/b/g/n (5GHz/2.4GHz)
Bluetooth: 4.0
3W full-range speaker x 2 and 10W vibration speaker
Size: 25.4” x 15.2” x 2.4” (645 x 385 x 60mm)
Weight: 12.1lbs (5.5kg)
Power: 60W
AC adapter: 100-240V (50/60Hz)
Be noted that design details and technical specs can still vary along the way to production. We'll try to update you as much as we can. About the team and the Atmoph Window story“If we could change the view from our window…” This was the beginning of everything, and lead to the birth of the window of the future. Not only have we brought views from around the world, we have updated the window into a device that can make your lifestyle smarter. Our new members, like us, are into traveling, gadgets, discovering new things, are adventurous, and ready to embark on the Atmoph journey.  Atmoph Window 2, new and improved from our years of experience and thanks to your feedback. It's not a TV, it's not just a display. It is designed as a window. And we worked to make it smarter, more natural, and for it to become even more than what any normal window ever could. Yokozeki Ryota - Product DesignFor product design we have employed the knowhow of Ryota Yokozeki, who worked at SONY as an industrial designer from 2008-2017. His Aizome chair was selected to be part of the collection of Vitra Design Museum in 2016. He established "RYOTA YOKOZEKI STUDIO" in Tokyo in 2017. Wooden Frame by Karimoku, the bestOur wooden Atmoph Window frame is produced by Karimoku Furniture, Japan’s premier timber furniture maker with true knowledge of and love for the warm natural qualities of wood. Karimoku was founded over eighty years ago from a love and deep knowledge of timber. This beautiful smooth frame is made to bring out the inherent warmth of genuine wood, and brings a natural lightness to any interior.  Timeline Thank you for your support! Let's make the everyday an adventure!Atmoph team Ask us anything!contact@atmoph.com

story:
Meet the CarbonIce Pillow! The all new and only 7 in 1 pillow that features Activ-Air Technology that enhances breathability, keeps you cool with increased comfort and is dirt, bacteria and dust mite resistant. Our pillow also utilizes the Dual Memo-Density system that allows you to choose your firmness. 

Our Proprietary Dual Memo Density Memory Foam allows you to choose the firmness you desire.  The Black side is firmer for those that want extra support and the blue side is softer to cradle your head, neck and shoulders.

Our advanced Memory Foam gives you balanced support of your head, neck and shoulders.  Dual Memo Density Foam reacts to your body offering superior, comfortable support. It can help relieve muscle fatigue, pain, soreness all while you sleep. It also helps promote proper spine alignment so you always wake refreshed and relaxed.

Blue Side (Soft) - Soft memory foam for users who like soft cloud like pillows. Ideal for stomach and side sleepers.

Black Side (Firm) - Firmer memory foam for users who like firm pillows. Firm side is ideal for users who sleep on their back. It helps to position spine in a more natural position. This side can also be used as a support pillow.

Our Proprietary Activ-Air Technology utilizes 3 different air flow cells in the pillow.  This allows you maximum comfort as well as continued air flow that keeps you cool while you sleep.  The breathable memory foam is enhanced by this increased Ventilated Air Flow while still giving you optimal comfort and support.

Small Air Cells - Keeps pillows structure for years to come.

Medium Air Cells - Positioned around head to reduce sweating during the night. These holes keep you cool and comfortable all night.

Large Air Cells - Positioned under head to help with breathing.       

 Protects Against Bacteria, Dust Mites, Germs & Allergens!

CARBON BAMBOO CHARCOAL  -Bamboo charcoal’s activated carbon can absorb toxins, helps prevent mold growth and purifies air by absorbing bad odors and moisture to prevent bacterial growth. Carbon Bamboo charcoal helps eliminates odors, absorbs excess moisture, and regulates temperature. It is also great for people with allergies, asthma, or sensitive skin. 

AHH...Thats nice and cold!

Cooling gel foam aims to extend that "cold pillow" feeling throughout the night. The top layer of gel foam contours to your shape and resists body heat to regulate your temperature all through the night.   

Antimicrobial & Antibacterial

COPPER - In Ancient Egyptian times, Copper’s antimicrobial properties were used for healing and maintaining optimal health.  The microscopic copper particles are known to be beneficial for your skin while you sleep.

For skin that means two things: Helping to treat acne and prevent breakouts and aiding the production of collagen, which can help improve elasticity, smooth and reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

Copper technology has been tested by NASA for its skin-healing and microbial properties.

Copper has been infused in hospital linens, scrubs, and other medical fabrics to prevent the growth and spread of bacteria. 

The Pillowcase is made with our Advanced Cooling Gel technology that keeps your body cool as it wicks away moisture so you sleep better.

Recent studies show that Graphene is an antimicrobial agent in addition to  its extraordinary mechanical strength, optical transmittance, electrical conductivity and high specific area properties. It is the world’s strongest known material.

Graphene materials are rapidly emerging as a new class of broad‐spectrum antimicrobial agents.

The Graphene Materials are known for antimicrobial colloids, contact‐killing surfaces, release‐killing surfaces, light‐activated disinfectants (i.e., photothermal/photodynamic inactivation). 

All of these properties of the graphene restrict the growth of harmful bacteria, allergens, mold or dust mites that thrive in ordinary pillows.

Researchers have used graphene specifically to attacks bacterial cells.

Antibacterial Properties of Graphene-Based Nanomaterials - https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC65...
 

Cold all night long

Sleep better and wake up feeling more refreshed with your CarbonIce™ Pillow. The incredible cooling properties (Activ-Air) disperse the heat through the large, medium and small air flow channels, releasing it from the pillow helping to lower your body temperature and keeping you cool all night long.  

Our unique Proprietary Memo Density Memory Foam has cradling support and rebounds slowly with microencapsulated fibers that also keep you at the optimum temperature. 

We spend one third of our lives in bed and getting a good night’s sleep is a key component to your health.  The Carbon Ice Pillow provides healthy sleep with incredibly comfortable support.  When your head rests on it, it feels amazing for your best night’s sleep ever… 

Pillow Specs

We are all ready to start manufacturing and together we can help to improve sleep for millions. Make CarbonIce™ pillow the last pillow you buy.

 

Backer is Responsible for ALL VAT & Customs charges that may occur.

story:
Click here for press material

 

 

 

 

Levia is a unique design product! It’s a desk lamp that uses the magnetic levitation system, a method by which one object is suspended on another, thanks to a magnetic field which can combat the gravitational pull effect.

It allows the levitation of an LED filament lamp with a very high energy efficiency.

Levia’s advanced technology, combined with its amazing design, will blow you away!

 

 

The Levia desk lamp is the result of painstaking Italian craftsmanship. The base is made of Genuine Carrara or Black Marquina, which is cut by cnc and hand-finished for a polished and beautiful look..

 

 

 

Everything at an affordable price to everyone!

 

 

 

Simple Shapes, Amazing Design!

 

Levia ’has been painstakingly crafted to the finest detail.

The stem’s length allows the LED filament bulb to levitate at a height of about 20 cm from the ground above marble base: the effect is a perfect balance between the shapes and the levitation distance.

 

 

The centre of gravity is completely unbalanced, because of the metal stem’s extension outwards with the levitation system and the floating bulb at the end. However, it’s perfectly counterbalanced by the marble base.

 

 

The marble base has also an anti-slip and anti-scratch rubberized support, to avoid scratches and protect the support surfaces.

 

 

The touch sensitive button allows you to switch off the LED filaments with a single touch, by keeping the light bulb in levitation at the same time.


 

The fabric wire makes what has always been considered a disturbing element, an integral part of the design.

The meticulous attention to detail, the stem's colors and the different types of marble give Levia a high-level design, suitable to any kind of environment and furniture.


 

With the Highest Quality Materials.

 

The metal stem gives structure strength and support.

 

The base is made of genuine Carrara marble or black Marquina marble.

  • Carrara marble is a high quality type of white or blue-grey marble,  quarried in the city of Carrara located in Tuscany, Italy.

 

  • Black Marquinia marble  is a high quality, black stone marble extracted from the region of Markina, Basque Country in the North of Spain. 

 

 

Every single piece is cut by cnc and then hand-finished, according to the age-old tradition of Italian craftsmanship, a process that makes the product unique and inimitable.

 

 

 

 

With an integrated anti-fall system and very high energy efficiency.

 

Levia is managed by 3 electronic boards: one placed in the marble base, one in the levitation system and one in the light bulb. The levitation of the light bulb is very effective and extremely stable, thanks to a bi-directional and automatic management of the device. It makes its use simple, preventing any destabilization at the same time.

 

 

We asked passers-by to try to levitate the light bulb to prove the ease of its use. This is the result!

 

  

 

 Levia also has an anti-fall system that forces the light bulb to attach itself to the upper part in the event of a blackout, accidental shocks or interruption of the current flow.

 

 

​

The bulb has no internal batteries and it turns on via electromagnetic induction. The bulb uses warm light. Unlike cold light, this warm light is often associated with positive feelings and the human mind perceives it as soft and enveloping. Furthermore, it reduces eye strain and it greatly improves the sleep quality.

 

 

 

Levia uses about 3 watts, which equates  to about 2 cents a day, and the LED light has a lifecycle of about 50000 working hours . So, if you used it for 8 hours a day for 365 days, the life span would be around 17 years.

 

 

 

 

 

Levia’s use is very simple!

You just have to bring the bulb near the upper part-from the bottom up- until you feel a magnetic force and the led filaments turn on simultaneously. And now you can let the light bulb float.

 

As mentioned above, the light bulb has no batteries and it turns on via electromagnetic induction!

 

 

If you just want to switch the led filaments off , you just have to touch the touch sensitive button on the marble base: that way, the bulb will continue to float.

 

 

The bulb is pulled up into the socket instead of falling and breaking if the current is shut off, thanks to the anti-fall system.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Levia is available in 5 different versions. 

 

 

 

  • Basic Version - Black or White metal stem and Carrara or Black Marquinia marble base.
  • Special Versione - Brass-lacquered metal stem and Carrara or Black Marquinia marble base.
  • Deluxe Version - Gold-plated copper stem and Portoro marble base.

 

The Levia Deluxe Portoro version has a real gold-plated copper stem and a Portoro marble base.

 

  • The gold-plated copper stem emphasizes the golden veins of the marble. The golden touch sensitive button fits perfectly to the base. The advanced technology, combined with the highest quality materials, makes Levia Deluxe Portoro something totally new and never seen before: it isa high-class design object, with a very high investment value.  

 

  • Portoro is a very precious variety of dark brilliant black marble with golden veins. Portoro marble can be found only in the province of La Spezia in Liguria, Italy.

 

 

We would like to give you the opportunity to pledge the Deluxe Portoro version, at an exclusive price, when we reach € 250,000 goal. 

Please, help us to unlock the Deluxe and Special editions by sharing our project with your friends.

 

 

In accordance with the production times, we expect to ship your products between the month of July - August 2019 at least.  

All the products will be shipped by DHL - Express Tracked Courier.

Please, remember that Customs Clearance costs, if any, shall be borne by the addressee.

Each State, according to its own taxation, applies its fees to the imported goods. We are not able to eliminate or control Customs and Customs Clearance costs of your countries, and we cannot  declare a lower value than that of your donation.

In the event that, at your choice, you decide not to pay Customs Clearance for the product once it arrived in your state, the package will be abandoned at Customs point and we will not issue any refund.

Thanks to our experience gained with our first "Geizeer" product, our Team, with the support of DHL Express Courier, will help you to solve any problems about shipment, delivery and / or Customs Clearance as quickly as possible.

We would like to point out that we were able to deliver all the units with only a few weeks delay during our first Geizeer-campaign, despite the unexpected difficulties in our first large scale production.

 

Our Team is made up of young professionals who constantly want to grow up and improve.

 

 

 

Our company was born in 2016, when our project, Geizeer - eco-friendly ice cooling, was launched on the international market where it got an immediate success.

From now on, our goal has been to work in order to improve our professional training and skills.  Our headquarters is in Italy, homeland of the craft, where expert craftsmen work every day, with love and dedication, to realize our products. Made in Italy is a guarantee of elegant and high manufacturing that we offer to every design lover.

 

 

We ask your help to allow us to carry out our project.

 

Please, follow us on our social channels @idea3Di to be updated about Levia developments and share our posts with your friends by using the #levialight hashtag.

 

 

Click here for press material

 

 

 

 

 

Thank you so much for having a look at our project!!!

 

 

______________________________________________________________________

 

Risks and challenges

 

The careful study of the product before, and the prototyping phase then, allowed us to reach , an already finished product, even before the launch of the campaign.

We already got samples from companies that will be our future suppliers and producers.

Almost all the components of Levia are ready for production; we just have to make some small improvements so that the product will be perfect in every details.

These are the reasons why we firmly believe we can meet the expected delivery times in the campaign.

However, we will keep you constantly updated on product developments and production status. We thank you so much for the support, we are sure that all of you will love Levia!
