Please, follow us on our social channels @idea3Di to be updated about Levia developments and share our posts with your friends by using the #levialight hashtag.
 

 
Click here for press material
 

 
 

 
 
Thank you so much for having a look at our project!!!
 
 
______________________________________________________________________
 
Risks and challenges
 
The careful study of the product before, and the prototyping phase then, allowed us to reach , an already finished product, even before the launch of the campaign.
We already got samples from companies that will be our future suppliers and producers.
Almost all the components of Levia are ready for production; we just have to make some small improvements so that the product will be perfect in every details.
These are the reasons why we firmly believe we can meet the expected delivery times in the campaign.
However, we will keep you constantly updated on product developments and production status. We thank you so much for the support, we are sure that all of you will love Levia!

story:
Our household air purifier may have done a great job so far, but it will be ridiculous to carry the bulky appliance to your office, to the library, to your favorite coffee shop, or even leave it in your car. You need an ultimate purifier to keep you protected at all times! Purus Air V, portable and powerful, will always be there to make you breathe better.

 

 

 

When Bio-Aerosol particles enter the 12-channel cyclone system of Purus Air V, they are swirled around at an immense speed and are then sunken to the bottom of the dust container with gravitational forces.

In order to turn the linear motion of the air into a vortex motion, the shape and angle of the air inlets should be carefully calculated to prevent turbulence. Purus Air V will guide the air into the purifier along the tangential direction, forming the cyclone, and achieve high efficiency of dust collection.

The funnel-shaped tubes will keep the collected dust trapped in the container below. Unlike traditional air purifiers trap dust and particles on their filters, leaving concerns for potential secondary pollutants, Purus Air V guarantees only filtered air can flow through the tubes for further sterilization.

As experts in aerodynamics, we miniaturized and replicated the technology behind traditional dust collectors commonly used in flour mills, gravel fields, and other high dust industries, to effortlessly transform the air quality around you.

 

 

 

Purus Air V is the world’s first portable air purifier with both UVA+UVC sterilization. Through the specially designed light diffraction structures, the UV light spreads out evenly, effectively sterilizing the filtered air rising through the 12-channel cyclone cleaning system.

 

 

Our ultraviolet light has a 254nm wavelength, falling within the range in which MicroDNA has peak sensitivity to UV light, allowing Purus Air V to further safeguard and sterilize the air more efficiently.

 

 

 

 

The Molecular sieve filtration is another feature that founds the outstanding performance of Purus Air V. Unlike air fresheners or perfumes that mask odors, The Molecular sieve traps noxious odors in its crystalline structure and effectively absorbs and removes unpleasant smells.

 

.

 

 

UVA and UVC light not only activates the nano-molecular sieve module to catalyze and decompose organic pollutants, but the radiation also helps the molecular sieve module achieve automatic regeneration. Whenever Purus Air V is powered, the molecular sieve filtration will continue to maintain its adsorption capacity. There’s no need to replace filters, nano-molecular sieve modules, or any type of consumables. Super easy, convenient, and sustainable!

 

 

Purus Air V is powered by carefully calculated and complicated technology, but it’s extremely intuitive and simple to operate! With the detachable dust container and water washable components, Purus Air V spares you from all the tedious cleaning. It’s easy to clean, easy to charge & easy to carry!

 

Cleaning Purus Air V is a breeze, remove the magnet sealed dust container, pour out the collected Bio-Aerosol particles, and it’s done! Cleaning has never been easier!

When needed for a deeper cleanse, Purus Air V is water washable, and safe with household detergents. Just rinse it under water thoroughly and let it air dry, reassemble Purus Air V and it’s back on duty!

 

Purus Air V weighs only 320g. You can easily power it with a power bank or a car charger when you are outdoors. Bring Purus Air V with you, and you will be protected by a clean air shield anytime and anywhere!

 

 

Ideal For In-car Usage

 

With so much time spent in your vehicle, clean air is certainly a necessity. Pollutants tend to accumulate in enclosed spaces, and the longer you drive, the worse your air quality becomes. Purus Air V can fit in the cup holder, freshening up your car easily.

 

 

With the similar size of a water bottle, Purus Air V is easy to travel with. Leave it in your cup holder, and it will diffuse purified and clean air into your vehicle. Made of military-grade thermoplastic polymer, it is also shock-resistant and can withstand road bumps.

 

 

Operating Purus Air V is super easy, there’s a simple touch-button controlling  3 manual wind speeds. The wind expelled is gentle and the machine operates quietly without disturbing your daily life and affecting your sleep.

 

Our specially designed type C cable is specifically for Purus Air V. The durable 90-degree bend head cable will not get stuck or twisted due to prolonged squeezing or pulling. Purus Air V also consumes minimal wattage. Tested results show that with a 12,000mAh power bank, it can provide up to 30 hours of fresh air, keeping you protected all day long. Please be noted that the PURUS Air V does not include a built-in battery and is not chargeable for portable use, Air V must be connected to a power source.

[Product does not include power bank or any sort of battery device]

We've conducted several removal tests on some common pollutants that we might encounter in our daily lives, showing you real results on our purifying performances.

 

 Bio-Aerosol​ Dust (0.01-1000µm Bio-Aerosol​ Particles)

 

 Cigarette Smoke (For Highly Polluted Environments)

 
 

 Formaldehyde (Petrol fumes, Carbon oxides, Xylenes, etc.)

 

 

 

 

In 2020, we launched our first air purifier project - Purus Air i Plus on Kickstarter, and we have achieved overwhelming success. This year, we came up with an alternative to take care of the polluted air around you!

Both Purus Air V and Purus Air i Plus can effectively purify your air, remove unpleasant odors, and eliminate PM2.5, and both designs are filter-free, portable, and super easy to clean! However, these two purifiers utilize different patented technology and specializing in different functions.

 

 

 

 

 

Press Kit
View on YouTube

However, these two purifiers utilize different patented technology and specializing in different functions.     
Press KitView on YouTube

story:
Urbie Air 2.0 Purifier & Ionizer kills & destroys 99.99% of all allergens, mold, bacteria & viruses. It also purifies the air from many indoor air pollutants like PM 2.5 & PM 10 along with many types of Volatile Organic Compounds like cigarette smoke, wall paintings, furniture fumes, and cooking fumes.

 

Eco-friendly Air Filter Activated Bamboo Charcoal, Hemp & Nano Silver lining technology

Over 100 million disposable plastic air filters end up in landfills yearly. We wanted to change that, so we created an air filter that's fully compostable and made simply from Activated Charocal and Hemp. We've also added a silver nano-technology lining to ensure bacteria and viruses have a ZERO chance of survival

 

Never worry about under-watering or over-watering your plant!

Urbie Air 2.0 is smart and calibrated to 10 types of plants with air purification properties. The self-watering system uses accurate soil sensor readings and machine learning to ensure just the right amount of water is used to automatically water your plant when it's thirsty.

 

 

2-Litre Detachable Water Tank

We've made it easy for you to detach the water tank. Simply drag it out, re-fill it and let Urbie Air automatically water your plant when it's thirsty.

 

 

 

 

USB Port Grow Light Lamp

If your plant doesn't get enough sunlight, we've got you covered. Simply plug in the grow light lamp to the built-in USB port and never worry about your plant not getting enough sunlight!

 

 

 

 

 

 

Monitor your home air quality in real-time from absolutely anywhere when you sync with the Urbie Air app. Control Urbie Air remotely and watch how your air is being purified. The app even displays water tank levels, plant watering frequency, humidity levels, and VOCs. We've also added Bluetooth to make the initial setup go smooth and easy!  

 

 

 

Urbie Air uses powerful fans that are designed to yield the maximum airflow to your plant. This technique empowers your plant to produce the most amount of oxygen while eliminating high concentrates of CO2 and other harmful gases.

 

 

 

Reports of experiments held by NASA Office of Commercial Programs- Johnson Space Station, and the Associated Landscape Contractors of America (ALCA) with different potted plants mixed with activated charcoal filter.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Switch ON Urbie Air using your phone app and set your local time so that by default it will water your plant during day time.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We’ve chosen some of the best color combinations. The vibrant rose creates a sense of energy and playfulness. The Pearl provides a dose of neatness that will blend in well with any decor. And our Classic Shadow color is our favorite (one shown in our video), it's timeless with a modern edge, creating a setting that feels distinctly personal.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Early-stage prototypes

 

Urbie Air is the culmination of two years of research and development, the result of many trials, prototypes, and lots of 3D printed models.

 

 

 

Meet the team!

 

 

 

 

 

How it all began

 

When my father got diagnosed with blood cancer a few years ago, I made a promise to myself to quit everything and focus on developing products that promote health and well-being hence Urbie was born. We live in highly polluted cities, air filled with toxic fumes that have become so normal to breathe, we drink dead water that’s been contaminated with traces of pharmaceutical drugs and other chemicals along with chlorine. And don’t get me started on the bottled water full of microplastic and the damage they cause to our environment.

 

Manufacturing, quality control, and time delivery

 

After spending two years in R&D, testing and developing prototypes, and finding the right balance between design and practicality, we're now ready to take Urbie to the production stage. We've sourced factories, studied the logistics of fulfillment centers, and have our assembly line and engineers ready, 

 

Thank You

 

This crowdfunding campaign will help us continue on our mission to design and develop urban devices that promote health and well-being. We owe our existence to our backers who believe in our core values and who want to be part of a Positive Social Impact company that aims to bridge the gap between urban and rural worlds. 

 

Risks and challenges

 

We have a highly qualified team of engineers and have partnered up with leading manufacturing and fulfillment companies around the world. With your support, we will be able to bring Urbie to life. We're completely prepared to bring Urbie to every household, and we have the right team on standby, are ready to start pouring their hearts into this project.

If anything comes along the way, you'll be the first to know. We will constantly update you and keep you informed of any issues or complications that we might face, some of which might be out of our control.

story:
ALBERO is an ultra-quiet 3-in-1 smart air purifier for any home or office. It uses innovative nano-purification technology to detect and destroy allergens, bacteria, odors and toxic chemicals — turning them into water, carbon dioxide and harmless base compounds in the process.

ALBERO’s 18dB ultra-silent cleaning mode is quieter than a whisper — allowing you breathe clean air without disturbance, so you can get a perfect night's sleep. Finally, wake up every morning feeling fully recharged, rested and refreshed.

With the average American expected to spend over 90% of their lives indoors, we need effective air purifiers now more than ever before.

Traditional HEPA and activated carbon filters collects contaminants rather than destroy them.  Bacteria and mold can easily accumulate, multiply, mutate and spread from the filter cartridges. Overtime, the filters can easily become a source of contamination themselves.


ALBERO’s advanced PCO filtration offers a much better alternative to traditional HEPA filters. ALBERO vaporizes contagions even as they attempt to multiply

Bacteria trapped in HEPA filters can grow and be released back into the air you breathe. ALBERO was tested and showed a 83% abatement of bacteria within the first three hours.

Results: 83% reduction of bacteria within the first two hours of use has been reported during the experiment. The microbiological test has been conducted according to norm UNI EN ISO 14698 – 1: 2004 and UNI EN ISO 14698 – 2: 2004​.

Results: 84% reduction of NOx has been registered during the test in just 2 minutes. This test was evaluated with a certified test according to norm UNI 11247:2010.

Many harmful pollutants are under the 0.3-micron and are too small for HEPA filters to capture. ALBERO showed a 78% abatement of PM 0.3 (size under 0.3 micron) within the first two hours.

Results: 78% reduction of PM 0.3 (size under 0.3 micron) within the first two hours of use. The PM abatement test has been conducted according to norm UNI EN ISO 14644-1.

Photocatalytic oxidation (PCO) is a NASA-tested innovative nano-scale process that has been under research, testing and extensive development for the last 25 years. 

Now, the ALBERO team has finally reached a place of effectiveness and safety to proudly present it to the public. Destroy allergens, VOCs, formaldehyde, dust, dander, bacteria, mold and combustion gases, quickly and efficiently.

Best of all, you never need to replace the nano-filter! Because ALBERO’s nano-filter vaporizes contaminants instead of collecting them, it doesn’t need replacements.

Simply rinse it off every 6 months and you’re good to go for at least 5 years.

The protective exterior nano-coating keeps ALBERO clean and protects it from corrosion, bacteria, dust, scratches and aging.

Avoid the hidden costs of filter replacements that you would normally face in HEPA filters. You could be saving $100-$400 a year just by this feature alone! Plus, ALBERO comes with 3 years worth of nano-silver pre-filters, so you don’t have to worry about changing those out either!

ALBERO’s patented air quality sensors, smart AI and mobile app lets you know what you’re breathing anytime, anywhere. ALBERO follows your habits while detecting and cleaning your air.

If it detects anything harmful, ALBERO automatically sends you a notification and turns on to immediately start cleaning your air and reach the desired air quality. It then turns off or switches to silent mode depending on your air quality, energy consumption and overall preferences.

ALBERO is always ready at your fingertips. With WiFi connectivity and an intuitive mobile app for iOS and Android, ALBERO gives you full control and smart capabilities from anywhere, even when you’re not at home.

4 control modes let you control how fast and how often you want ALBERO to run.

Connect it with Google Assistant or Amazon Alexa to control ALBERO with voice or hook it up to your smart home network. ALBERO is fully compatible and ready to automate with your existing setup.

Don’t want to use the app? You can still easily control ALBERO manually through the touch button on the top of the device.

Our proprietary titanium-coated ceramic nano-filters maximizes the effect of the photocatalytic reaction unlike any other filter tested. The patented alveolar design creates maximum surface area and ion exposure to ensure your air is fully purified quickly, efficiently and effectively.

Unlike other PCO filters, ALBERO uses a highly calibrated, selected range of UV-A light near the visible spectrum that does not generate harmful ozone.

Our non-woven pre-filter blocks large particles like pollen, dander and dust, and the antibacterial nano-silver treatment naturally kills bacteria and mold.

ALBERO’s patented micro electrical mechanical system (MEMS) is the most advanced and precise sensor on the market. When ALBERO detects a decrease in air quality or presence of a dangerous compound, it automatically starts purifying your air and can continue to cycle your air to hit 100% purity.

ALBERO’s ceramic nano-filters don’t need to be replaced. They can be rinsed and washed in tap water when needed. This means no hidden costs or wasteful expenses.

ALBERO is the quietest filter on the market! Boasting an incredible 18dB noise output on silent mode, ALBERO is quieter than a whisper

ALBERO is 8x more efficient than traditional purifiers. It only uses 20W - 56W of energy for up to 540 sq ft of coverage!

A LED light illuminates ALBERO and acts as a soft ambient lamp for your room. Easily control and change the intensity and temperature of the lighting via the included app.

ALBERO holds an exclusive patent on its nanotechnology, air quality sensor and design — making it the only air purifier with all these benefits!

ALBERO’s patented photocatalytic oxidation process uses a proprietary doped titanium dioxide (TiO2) ceramic filter as the base catalyst material. The filter’s specialized design maximizes the surface area of effect.

A precisely calibrated, powerful UV light blasts the filter and also prevents the production of ozone. The light activates the catalyst and sends out charged ions to then attack and destroy any contaminants passing through the filter. 

This is the most optimal, effective and energy efficient method of air purification and eliminates more pollutants than any other available method.

ALBERO is 8x more efficient than traditional air purifiers and uses significantly less energy. In fact, it only uses 20-56W of energy. That’s less than a single incandescent light bulb! Save hundreds of dollars per year on your energy bill alone.

The low energy consumption doesn’t inhibit ALBERO’s efficacy. ALBERO has a maximum range of up to 540 sq ft and can filter up to 236 sq ft of space 90% cleaner in 2 hours!

Plus, since you don’t need to change filters and get a 3 year supply of pre-filters, you don’t have to worry about hidden costs in filter replacements!

Save money and energy while quickly and effectively purifying your home air.

80% of ALBERO’s materials (bamboo wood, aluminium) are premium, eco-compatible and recyclable with less than 12% made from plastic.

ALBERO was designed and engineered in Italy. We gave it a clean aesthetic and modern, minimalist design to reflect the purity of your air. Every detail was accounted for with painstaking Italian craftsmanship and thought.

The compact, modern shape blends ALBERO with your home decor and enhances your space as ALBERO cleans it.

ALBERO is not just a powerful home appliance, it’s a piece of art — worthy of your carefully curated space and designed to fit perfectly in your home.

When you use ALBERO, you’re not just cleaning your own air — you’re stepping into a global community dedicated to improving our world’s air quality.

ALBERO’s app lets you see how many pollutants you’ve removed from our planet and how your part adds up with all other ALBERO users to contribute to a much larger picture around the world. 

Stay connected and join the initiative to creating a healthier, cleaner world together.

The air you breathe affects you in every facet of life. From work to home life, we spend too much of our lives inside.

With ALBERO, you can enjoy the invigoration of fresh air even through your busy days.

Clean air is a necessity of life. It’s time we can breath clean and breath free, every time, anywhere.

 

  1. Lisa Stevens, John A. Lanning, Larry G. Anderson, William A. Jacoby & Nicholas Chornet. Investigation of the Photocatalytic Oxidation of Low-Level Carbonyl Compounds, Journal of the Air & Waste Management Association. https://doi.org/10.1080/10473289.1998.10463748 
  2. Mark R. Nimlos, Edward J. Wolfrum, David A Gratson, Andrew S. Watt, and Craig Turch. Review of Research Results for the Photocatalytic Oxidation of Hazardous Wastes in Air. National Renewable Energy Laboratory.
  3. Hodgson AT1, Destaillats H, Sullivan DP, Fisk WJ. Performance of ultraviolet photocatalytic oxidation for indoor air cleaning applications. Indoor Environment Department, Environmental Energy Technologies Division, Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory, Berkeley, CA 94720, USA. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/17661927
  4. Barbara Kolarik, Pawel Wargocki, Anna Skorek-Osikowska, Armin Wisthaler. The effect of a photocatalytic air purifier on indoor air quality quantified using different measuring methods. Building and Environment. Technical University of Denmark, International Centre for Indoor Environment and Energy, Faculty of Civil Engineering, Lyngby, Denmark. Silesian University of Technology, 44-100 Gliwice, Poland. Danish Building Research Institute (SBi), Department of Construction and Health, Dr Neergaards Vej 15, 2970 Hørsholm, Denmark. Institute of Ion Physics and Applied Physics, University of Innsbruck, 6020 Innsbruck, Austria. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.buildenv.2009.12.006 
  5. Titanium Dioxide Photocatalysis in Atmospheric Chemistry;Haihan Chen, Charith E. Nanayakkara, and Vicki H. Grassian, Chem. Rev. 2012, 112, 5919−5948; American Chemical Society
  6. Design of an efficient photocatalytic reactor for the decomposition of gaseous organic contaminants in air Minzae Lee et Al.;Chemical Engineering Journal 187 (2012) 203– 209
  7. Photocatalytic Degradation of Gaseous Formaldehyde Using TiO2 Film; Noguchi, Fujishima, Sawunyama, Hashimoto; VOL. 32, NO. 23, 1998 / ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY

We are Dirac — a start-up in nanotechnology — founded by the mechanical and nanotechnology engineer, Federico, and the young entrepreneur Davide. Dirac began working with the development and commercialization of incredible surface treatment, called nanocoatings. It then sought solutions to bring nanotechnology into the lives of all people through the development of revolutionary products. The story behind Albero is unique. Federico comes from a small mountain-town where the air was pure. When he moved to Rome to study at university, he started to feel physical ailments because of pollution and realized that the problem was really big. Hence the great dream of inventing an air purifier that would allow all people to live healthy by breathing clean air, a product for everyone who would rewrite new rules in the field of air purification. a product that can be integrated into any space experienced by men.

During our path toward achieving our goals, we brought together the most qualified team, which aims to establish itself as a pioneer of this revolutionary technology — thanks to the development of innovative applications. We have created a product that eliminates the problems of old purification technologies and equipped it with triple functionality: air purifier, air quality monitor and a beautiful lamp. We believe in a more intelligent world where technological innovation simplifies and accompanies the evolution of humanity, helping it to find the lost balance with itself and with nature.
story_txt:
ALBERO is an ultra-quiet 3-in-1 smart air purifier for any home or office. It uses innovative nano-purification technology to detect and destroy allergens, bacteria, odors and toxic chemicals — turning them into water, carbon dioxide and harmless base compounds in the process.ALBERO’s 18dB ultra-silent cleaning mode is quieter than a whisper — allowing you breathe clean air without disturbance, so you can get a perfect night's sleep. Finally, wake up every morning feeling fully recharged, rested and refreshed.With the average American expected to spend over 90% of their lives indoors, we need effective air purifiers now more than ever before.Traditional HEPA and activated carbon filters collects contaminants rather than destroy them.  Bacteria and mold can easily accumulate, multiply, mutate and spread from the filter cartridges. Overtime, the filters can easily become a source of contamination themselves.ALBERO’s advanced PCO filtration offers a much better alternative to traditional HEPA filters. ALBERO vaporizes contagions even as they attempt to multiplyBacteria trapped in HEPA filters can grow and be released back into the air you breathe. ALBERO was tested and showed a 83% abatement of bacteria within the first three hours.Results: 83% reduction of bacteria within the first two hours of use has been reported during the experiment. The microbiological test has been conducted according to norm UNI EN ISO 14698 – 1: 2004 and UNI EN ISO 14698 – 2: 2004​.Results: 84% reduction of NOx has been registered during the test in just 2 minutes. This test was evaluated with a certified test according to norm UNI 11247:2010.Many harmful pollutants are under the 0.3-micron and are too small for HEPA filters to capture. ALBERO showed a 78% abatement of PM 0.3 (size under 0.3 micron) within the first two hours.Results: 78% reduction of PM 0.3 (size under 0.3 micron) within the first two hours of use. The PM abatement test has been conducted according to norm UNI EN ISO 14644-1.Photocatalytic oxidation (PCO) is a NASA-tested innovative nano-scale process that has been under research, testing and extensive development for the last 25 years. Now, the ALBERO team has finally reached a place of effectiveness and safety to proudly present it to the public. Destroy allergens, VOCs, formaldehyde, dust, dander, bacteria, mold and combustion gases, quickly and efficiently.Best of all, you never need to replace the nano-filter! Because ALBERO’s nano-filter vaporizes contaminants instead of collecting them, it doesn’t need replacements.Simply rinse it off every 6 months and you’re good to go for at least 5 years.The protective exterior nano-coating keeps ALBERO clean and protects it from corrosion, bacteria, dust, scratches and aging.Avoid the hidden costs of filter replacements that you would normally face in HEPA filters. You could be saving $100-$400 a year just by this feature alone! Plus, ALBERO comes with 3 years worth of nano-silver pre-filters, so you don’t have to worry about changing those out either!ALBERO’s patented air quality sensors, smart AI and mobile app lets you know what you’re breathing anytime, anywhere. ALBERO follows your habits while detecting and cleaning your air.If it detects anything harmful, ALBERO automatically sends you a notification and turns on to immediately start cleaning your air and reach the desired air quality. It then turns off or switches to silent mode depending on your air quality, energy consumption and overall preferences.ALBERO is always ready at your fingertips. With WiFi connectivity and an intuitive mobile app for iOS and Android, ALBERO gives you full control and smart capabilities from anywhere, even when you’re not at home.4 control modes let you control how fast and how often you want ALBERO to run.Connect it with Google Assistant or Amazon Alexa to control ALBERO with voice or hook it up to your smart home network. ALBERO is fully compatible and ready to automate with your existing setup.Don’t want to use the app? You can still easily control ALBERO manually through the touch button on the top of the device.Our proprietary titanium-coated ceramic nano-filters maximizes the effect of the photocatalytic reaction unlike any other filter tested. The patented alveolar design creates maximum surface area and ion exposure to ensure your air is fully purified quickly, efficiently and effectively.Unlike other PCO filters, ALBERO uses a highly calibrated, selected range of UV-A light near the visible spectrum that does not generate harmful ozone.Our non-woven pre-filter blocks large particles like pollen, dander and dust, and the antibacterial nano-silver treatment naturally kills bacteria and mold.ALBERO’s patented micro electrical mechanical system (MEMS) is the most advanced and precise sensor on the market. When ALBERO detects a decrease in air quality or presence of a dangerous compound, it automatically starts purifying your air and can continue to cycle your air to hit 100% purity.ALBERO’s ceramic nano-filters don’t need to be replaced. They can be rinsed and washed in tap water when needed. This means no hidden costs or wasteful expenses.ALBERO is the quietest filter on the market! Boasting an incredible 18dB noise output on silent mode, ALBERO is quieter than a whisperALBERO is 8x more efficient than traditional purifiers. It only uses 20W - 56W of energy for up to 540 sq ft of coverage!A LED light illuminates ALBERO and acts as a soft ambient lamp for your room. Easily control and change the intensity and temperature of the lighting via the included app.ALBERO holds an exclusive patent on its nanotechnology, air quality sensor and design — making it the only air purifier with all these benefits!ALBERO’s patented photocatalytic oxidation process uses a proprietary doped titanium dioxide (TiO2) ceramic filter as the base catalyst material. The filter’s specialized design maximizes the surface area of effect.A precisely calibrated, powerful UV light blasts the filter and also prevents the production of ozone. The light activates the catalyst and sends out charged ions to then attack and destroy any contaminants passing through the filter. This is the most optimal, effective and energy efficient method of air purification and eliminates more pollutants than any other available method.ALBERO is 8x more efficient than traditional air purifiers and uses significantly less energy. In fact, it only uses 20-56W of energy. That’s less than a single incandescent light bulb! Save hundreds of dollars per year on your energy bill alone.The low energy consumption doesn’t inhibit ALBERO’s efficacy. ALBERO has a maximum range of up to 540 sq ft and can filter up to 236 sq ft of space 90% cleaner in 2 hours!Plus, since you don’t need to change filters and get a 3 year supply of pre-filters, you don’t have to worry about hidden costs in filter replacements!Save money and energy while quickly and effectively purifying your home air.80% of ALBERO’s materials (bamboo wood, aluminium) are premium, eco-compatible and recyclable with less than 12% made from plastic.ALBERO was designed and engineered in Italy. We gave it a clean aesthetic and modern, minimalist design to reflect the purity of your air. Every detail was accounted for with painstaking Italian craftsmanship and thought.The compact, modern shape blends ALBERO with your home decor and enhances your space as ALBERO cleans it.ALBERO is not just a powerful home appliance, it’s a piece of art — worthy of your carefully curated space and designed to fit perfectly in your home.When you use ALBERO, you’re not just cleaning your own air — you’re stepping into a global community dedicated to improving our world’s air quality.ALBERO’s app lets you see how many pollutants you’ve removed from our planet and how your part adds up with all other ALBERO users to contribute to a much larger picture around the world. Stay connected and join the initiative to creating a healthier, cleaner world together.The air you breathe affects you in every facet of life. From work to home life, we spend too much of our lives inside.With ALBERO, you can enjoy the invigoration of fresh air even through your busy days.Clean air is a necessity of life. It’s time we can breath clean and breath free, every time, anywhere. 
Lisa Stevens, John A. Lanning, Larry G. Anderson, William A. Jacoby & Nicholas Chornet. Investigation of the Photocatalytic Oxidation of Low-Level Carbonyl Compounds, Journal of the Air & Waste Management Association. https://doi.org/10.1080/10473289.1998.10463748 
Mark R. Nimlos, Edward J. Wolfrum, David A Gratson, Andrew S. Watt, and Craig Turch. Review of Research Results for the Photocatalytic Oxidation of Hazardous Wastes in Air. National Renewable Energy Laboratory.
Hodgson AT1, Destaillats H, Sullivan DP, Fisk WJ. Performance of ultraviolet photocatalytic oxidation for indoor air cleaning applications. Indoor Environment Department, Environmental Energy Technologies Division, Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory, Berkeley, CA 94720, USA. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/17661927

Barbara Kolarik, Pawel Wargocki, Anna Skorek-Osikowska, Armin Wisthaler. The effect of a photocatalytic air purifier on indoor air quality quantified using different measuring methods. Building and Environment. Technical University of Denmark, International Centre for Indoor Environment and Energy, Faculty of Civil Engineering, Lyngby, Denmark. Silesian University of Technology, 44-100 Gliwice, Poland. Danish Building Research Institute (SBi), Department of Construction and Health, Dr Neergaards Vej 15, 2970 Hørsholm, Denmark. Institute of Ion Physics and Applied Physics, University of Innsbruck, 6020 Innsbruck, Austria. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.buildenv.2009.12.006 
Titanium Dioxide Photocatalysis in Atmospheric Chemistry;Haihan Chen, Charith E. Nanayakkara, and Vicki H. Grassian, Chem. Rev. 2012, 112, 5919−5948; American Chemical Society
Design of an efficient photocatalytic reactor for the decomposition of gaseous organic contaminants in air Minzae Lee et Al.;Chemical Engineering Journal 187 (2012) 203– 209
Photocatalytic Degradation of Gaseous Formaldehyde Using TiO2 Film; Noguchi, Fujishima, Sawunyama, Hashimoto; VOL. 32, NO. 23, 1998 / ENVIRONMENTAL SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY
We are Dirac — a start-up in nanotechnology — founded by the mechanical and nanotechnology engineer, Federico, and the young entrepreneur Davide. Dirac began working with the development and commercialization of incredible surface treatment, called nanocoatings. It then sought solutions to bring nanotechnology into the lives of all people through the development of revolutionary products. The story behind Albero is unique. Federico comes from a small mountain-town where the air was pure. When he moved to Rome to study at university, he started to feel physical ailments because of pollution and realized that the problem was really big. Hence the great dream of inventing an air purifier that would allow all people to live healthy by breathing clean air, a product for everyone who would rewrite new rules in the field of air purification. a product that can be integrated into any space experienced by men.During our path toward achieving our goals, we brought together the most qualified team, which aims to establish itself as a pioneer of this revolutionary technology — thanks to the development of innovative applications. We have created a product that eliminates the problems of old purification technologies and equipped it with triple functionality: air purifier, air quality monitor and a beautiful lamp. We believe in a more intelligent world where technological innovation simplifies and accompanies the evolution of humanity, helping it to find the lost balance with itself and with nature.

story:
Official Website Link: 

https://www.yeeuu.com/collections/hote-product-4/products/r2-fido-smart-fingerprint-lock

(NOTE: Prices converted to Hong Kong Dollars (HKD) at checkout)

FIDO (R2) is the winner of the Red Dot Design Award, an award given by the Design Zentrum Nordhein Westfalen in Essen, Germany. A staple in product design standards since 1955.

Judged by more than 40 internationally known jurors, FIDO ticked all required boxes to be a winner.

 

 

 

Whether you’re running an Airbnb or want to give temporary access to your friends and family, the FIDO App has a straightforward and easy to use interface to manage your smart lock features. Manage users, grant remote entries and record unlocking logs all from your own smartphone, wherever you are.

 

"Unlock Status" Function: 
After the fingerprint of the administrator is recognized successfully, press the fingerprint until the white light starts to flash, the "stay unlock" function is turned on.
Under the "Unlock Status", after the fingerprint of the user is recognized successfully, press the fingerprint until the green light starts to flash, the  "stay unlock" function is turned off.

 

 

Use FIDO APP to manage unlock authorizations, set unlocking times and record logs.

 

When it comes to parenting, ensuring the safety of your child is the most important role of a parent. With FIDO you will identify who came home and at what time. You can also monitor the entry and exit activities of a nanny or any maintenance staff who come into your house.

If you have a vacation home, FIDO smart lock offers all the security and monitoring you need. You can give e-keys to the tenants and temporary visitors with predetermined limited access. Meanwhile, you retain the authority over all e-keys via the FIDO app so you can change or remove the control access for security at any time. 

If you forget or lose keys frequently, why not a smart lock?  FIDO will respond to the APP and you can always keep and manage the keys.

 

 

A Billion Billion Years to Crack

FIDO employs an encryption method used by most governments and security agencies around the world. With total of 3.4*10^38 possible combinations, FIDO Smart Lock is impossible to break and hack by mere brute force and checking all possible key combinations.

 

Automatic Lock

A smart locking feature will automatically be engaged after you enter or exit, keeping unwanted visitors outside.

 

Advanced Alarm System

If the door is forced to open, the alarm will be triggered instantaneously notifying you through the FIDO App.

 

 

10 Seconds to Switch Batteries

With super low power consumption, R1 can work for one year with just 2 Triple-A batteries and it's easy to replace.

 

Low Battery Warning

It alerts you when the battery is lower than the warning line.

 

 

 

 

 

Check This Ultimately Minimalist Beauty

​

 

Black and White Color Options

 

 

 

Meet Our Team 

UJIA is the global top tier smart lock solution provider, introducing the next generation of smart home safety and home access control.

Design in Stockholm

Our designs have been tested and proven. Our engineering team and designers come from three continents and each person brings with them rich and unique experience from pioneering smart home companies. By working together through countless iterations and long hours, our design has achieved recognition from the Red Dot Design Award committee. We have been working day and night to perfect our technology to get it ready for your home.

 

We've successfully finished pilot production! The product has been perfectly optimized, the tools are prepared, and we are excited to get the mass production lines running. As soon as we hit our goal, we'll "press go" and the products will begin their journey to you! Thank you for your support!

 

Spread the Word!

Let more people know how cool the project you are backing now!

We really appreciate your love and support. 

For press inquiries about FIDO, please download our media kit including photos, GIFs, videos, or send message to below email.


Check Out Helpful FAQ Here

 

1. My door thickness is over 56mm, does FIDO fit?

- Yes, FIDO has extra thicker door kit for door thickness over 56mm, you will see add-on options when you check out each perk.

2. Batteries are in the outside handle.

3. Each perk has add-on options for extra kit: Bridge, Extra Badges, Extra Thicker Door Kit. You can see them when you check out.

4. FIDO Handles are Metal.

5. One Bridge can connect to 7 FIDOs.

6. You can absolutely use FIDO without a Bridge. Bridge is for the extra smart home features like voice command unlocking via Alexa and Google, remote access sharing to friends/housekeeper, door activities monitoring.  In General, Bridge makes FIDO connect to internet!

7. You can see extra inducted badges add-on options when you check out!

8. Both side handles are waterproof.

9. FIDO can not fit multi-points lock system door, if you are not sure about your lock system, please sent images to us for confirmation.

Questions?  Feel free to reach out to us anytime at support@yeeuu.com.

story:
We were craving a perfectly frozen coffee from our favorite cafe, but had zero desire to step out in the humid summer heat to go get it. After a few [failed] attempts with a blender, instant coffee and a bunch of ice, we had the idea for ICEY.

Making an icy drink with your blender at home is never quite the same as the refreshing frozen drinks you get at a restaurant. We wanted to recreate the smooth texture and the satisfying feeling of that first sip. And now that we have, we’re excited to share ICEY with you all.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Tross is a data driven Crowdfunding company

story:
FAQS

What is LightCam?

LightCam is a controllable smart light bulb paired with a fully adjustable HD (1080p) security camera that lets you see anywhere you have a standard light socket and WiFi.

 

How do I set up LightCam?

1.     Pick an exterior or interior location with a light socket where you want to place LightCam

2.     Simply twist LightCam into the socket

3.     Turn your light switch on

4.     Download the LightCam app from the App Store or Play Store and follow the instructionsto complete the setup

 

What if someone steals my LightCam?

Your LightCam comes with a unique QR code that when scanned will associate the device with your LightCam account. That means whenever LightCam tries to connect to WiFi you’ll get a notification through the app, asking if it’s you. Bottom line:  no one can use your registered LightCam without your permission (but don’t worry, you can transfer ownership to another account if you need to).

 

How conspicuous is the camera on LightCam?

While LightCam doesn’t claim to be a part time ninja, with a camera lens less than one inch in diameter it definitely keeps a low profile! And with the led lights at full power it’s very difficult to tell that LightCam is anything other than a regular lightbulb.

 

Many smart cameras come with little to no onboard storage; how does LightCam compare?

LightCam arrives with secure, encrypted onboard storage (non-removable). It'll cover you for about one-week of video recording out of the box! No fees or additional set up required.

 

Most smart cameras can only be backed up online by paying monthly storage fees; what backup options does LightCam provide?

We are all about giving you options to control your data. You can easily set up auto back-ups to your phone, computer, internet enabled hard drive, dropbox, or our low-cost storage provider if needed.

 

Can I download video clips from LightCam?

For sure! Within the app you can download right to your phone, or connect your phone to your computer and download the video clips to your hard drive.

 

So now that I have a LightCam, do I need to use my light switch?

Not if you don’t want to! Every LightCam comes with a convenient clear plastic switch lock to guarantee the light switch stays on.

 

If my switch is on all the time will this cost me a ton in power?

No—even if you keep your light on a lot the high efficiency COB LEDs ensure you won’t use significant amounts of power.

 

I don’t want my light on all the time—how do I handle that?

The LightCam App lets you program your light just like any smart light, meaning you can tell it to turn on based on motion, time, or a certain event. For example, you could easily set it to turn on each night at sunset and off at, say, 11 p.m.

 

I want my LightCam to record motion at night, but not turn on the light…

From the LightCam App you can determine when LightCam’s light turns on and when it runs on the Infrared LEDs.

 

Can LightCam see in the dark?

Like an owl! The infrared LEDs provide grayscale night vision up to about 30 feet.

 

If I see something or someone from my App can I talk to them? Hear them?

For sure! The built-in speaker and microphone let you both hear and interact with anything going on around your LightCam.

 

My friend has a security system and they can only have so many cameras connected. Are there limitations to how many LightCams I can have hooked up?

With our secure, built-in storage LightCam doesn’t choke out your WiFi like many smart cameras out there, eliminating the problems of cameras offline and camera number restrictions.

 

I have several lights on my switch, but I only need one LightCam; what do I do about the other lights?

Based on demand we are open to offering a smartbulb that looks and functions identically to LightCam, minus the camera components. It would be less expensive and allow you to have perfectly matched lights on your home!

 

What type camera is LightCam?

LightCam features an HD 1080p camera and wide-angle lens.

 

Can I use LightCam in a lantern or sconce?

LightCam has a one-of-a-kind, fully adjustable lens skirt that’s designed to connect with the inside glass surface of any light enclosure, preventing the normal glare that would otherwise blind any camera. Our patent-pending solution extends out from the body, and telescopes up or down to ensure a good fit with any light enclosure.

 

Can I use LightCam in a standard can light?

Absolutely! LightCam’s body extends down to adjust to almost any light fixture depth. The lens also tilts up or down, so you can film straight down or another convenient angle to get the best aerial view possible!

 

Will the motion sensor pick up trees and other movement?

LightCam’s intelligent motion detection strives to pick up people and large objects like cars—not leaves and bushes moving.

 

I have specific tastes in my lights—can I adjust the lighting?

Once we hit a specific funding goal we will add the ability to adjust the intensity, temperature, and tone of the white-light, as well as change the colors.

 

I have other smart devices in my house—can I use LightCam with them?

LightCam is compatible with WiFi, Z-Wave, and ZigBee protocols.

 

Risks & Challenges

We have a working prototype and need funding to help us get LightCam to you as quickly as possible by completing the following :

Ramp up production in China with at least the minimum order quantities

Complete the LightCam app development

Members of the LightCam team have been successful in raising over $1.5 million on previous crowd funding technology campaigns. We intend to leverage that expertise to help us avoid the pitfalls common to many projects. As with any hardware project, LightCam may run into unexpected delays due to order volume, manufacturing issues, or other unforeseen issues. We will do everything in our power to plan effectively, make good decisions, and most importantly keep you in the loop

Thanks for backing!

LightCam’s body extends down to adjust to almost any light fixture depth. The lens also tilts up or down, so you can film straight down or another convenient angle to get the best aerial view possible! Will the motion sensor pick up trees and other movement?LightCam’s intelligent motion detection strives to pick up people and large objects like cars—not leaves and bushes moving. I have specific tastes in my lights—can I adjust the lighting?Once we hit a specific funding goal we will add the ability to adjust the intensity, temperature, and tone of the white-light, as well as change the colors. I have other smart devices in my house—can I use LightCam with them?LightCam is compatible with WiFi, Z-Wave, and ZigBee protocols. Risks & ChallengesWe have a working prototype and need funding to help us get LightCam to you as quickly as possible by completing the following :Ramp up production in China with at least the minimum order quantitiesComplete the LightCam app developmentMembers of the LightCam team have been successful in raising over $1.5 million on previous crowd funding technology campaigns. We intend to leverage that expertise to help us avoid the pitfalls common to many projects. As with any hardware project, LightCam may run into unexpected delays due to order volume, manufacturing issues, or other unforeseen issues. We will do everything in our power to plan effectively, make good decisions, and most importantly keep you in the loopThanks for backing!

story:
Traditional pitchers collect unwanted pollutants in filters where they can quickly multiply and reverse contaminate your water. 

The LARQ Pitcher goes beyond filtration with a unique 2-step filtration and purification process for pure-tasting water sip after sip.

 

 

 

 

Traditional filters simply trap and collect unwanted pollutants where they can quickly accumulate and multiply. By removing chlorine, the filters become the perfect breeding ground for bacteria, mold, and other pollutants in just 2 weeks—making the filter itself a source of contamination.

Read about it in our white paper

 

 

 

 

 

 

Go beyond filtration with two-step filtration and purification.

Step 1: Better filtration

Our carbon-derived, plant-based filter gets rid of unwanted contaminants like lead, mercury, chlorine, VOCs, and more, leaving you with pure, crisp-tasting water. No compromises here.

 

 

 

Step 2: PureVis™ purification technology

What traditional water pitchers are missing is a vital second step—PureVis™ UV-C purification, which eradicates bio-contaminants at the molecular level. Keeping your water as pure as nature intended.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Name a water pitcher with better features, we'll wait.

No other pitcher gives you the seamless experience and uncompromising innovation that the LARQ Pitcher offers.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Something you used to hide away just became the main attraction.

Available in 2 rich colors that stand the test of time.

 

 

 

 

Step 1: Fill up your LARQ Pitcher

 

Step 2: Tap the button to start purifying as it filters

 

Step 3: Sip and enjoy. Ah, that’s what we call pure water beyond filtration. 


 

 

We've done the science to help you drink brilliantly.

LARQ's proprietary and patented PureVis™ UV-C LED technology is the most advanced in the world.

 

 

 

 

By flattening the filter geometry we were able to maximize surface area for the perfect balance between efficacy, filter speed, and lifetime. Our filters last 50% longer than leading brands.

 

 

 

 

Two types of filters to choose from based on your water quality needs.

LARQ Filters will be tested to NSF standards (42 and 53) to achieve >90% reduction across a range of contaminants.

All perks or add-ons with Advanced Filter will ship in Q3 2021.

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

We’re taking the next two months to finalize our certifications. Here’s a look at our preliminary third-party testing across a range of contaminants.

 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

 

Your personal control center (coming Q2 2021)

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Who said practical had to be boring?

Household essential turned table centerpiece. We can dig it. Our unique 2-step filtration and purification process leave you with perfectly crisp drinking water—which means better coffee, better tea, better cooking, and better hydration. 

 

 

 

 

This isn’t our first rodeo. 

With thousands of reviews, ratings, press features, and even awards for the LARQ Bottle and LARQ Bottle Movement, delivering quality products that work is what we do.

 

 

 

 

 

The LARQ Pitcher is the first of a whole new class of pitchers with advanced technology that delivers the purest water, but you can see that for yourself.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  •  Volume: 8-cup (1.9 liter) Capacity
  •  Battery Capacity: 650 mAh / 2~3 month capacity (charge when you replace filters)
  •  L x W x H: 238 x 126 x 258 mm / 9.4 x 5 x 10 inches
  •  Weight: 36oz / 1.05 kg
  •  Material: BPA / BPS free polymer
  •  Connected: Bluetooth, Over-The-Air Updates, iOS App, Android App.


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are LARQ.

LARQ began with a simple vision where innovative technology can be combined with inspirational design to help people access pristine drinking water easily and sustainably.

Our products look as good as they make you feel. We are confident that these are the most beautiful hydration products in the world that make it easier for you to make the healthier and sustainable choice, anytime and anywhere.

You are what you drink. So #DrinkBrilliantly.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Many Indiegogo campaigns have disappointed backers by not thinking about shipping, taxes, and duties ahead of time. Truthfully, we also learned the hard way the first time around. We want to assure our backers that we’ve partnered with world-class logistic solution providers to ensure the delivery of all of our perks across the world.

 

 

Please be aware that all shipping, sales and VAT taxes will be collected after the campaign is over. 

 

Shortly before the LARQ Pitcher ships, we will email you a link so you can:

  • Input your shipping address and latest delivery information
  • Choose a color for the LARQ Pitcher
  • Pay shipping and sales/VAT/GST tax
  • Order additional filters, the LARQ Pitcher or other accessories

 

Below is a shipping estimate table based on the latest data. We will strive diligently to achieve the right balance of shipping speed and cost efficiency for our backers. We will remain 100% transparent regarding shipping costs and will pass on any potential savings to our backers as well.

 

 

Taxes will vary based on where your rewards are shipped. For the following countries, we're collecting taxes before shipping, so you won’t have to worry about paying them at the time of delivery, extra fees, or being held up in customs.

  •  United States: State sales taxes apply in most states.
  •  European Union, United Kingdom, China, and Canada: VAT/GST taxes apply.
  •  Other Countries: We will not charge any taxes in the pledge manager. However, you may be responsible for sales tax, VAT/GST taxes, duties, import fees, or other taxes/fees when your reward is delivered.

story:
Are you all about smart home automation? Looking to get motorized blinds but don't want to pay the high price tag or deal with the complex installation and having to replace the perfect window shades you already own?

It hasn't been possible until…

  • Automate any blind or shade with App, Scheduling, Group Control, and more
  • Works with any shade or blind that has a beaded chain or cord loop - regardless of size or weight
  • Installs in 10 minutes - just in time to enjoy that beautiful sunset
  • Voice control with Alexa, Google Home, and Siri + HomeKit via our SmartBridge
  • Go wire-free with our long-lasting BatteryPack
  • Perfect for heavy or hard to reach blinds and shades 
     

RYSE SmartShades is the most affordable motorized blind solution - simply upgrade the window shades you already own: 

 

 

Make your life easy: schedule your shades to fit your daily routine

 

Set schedules/timers to perfectly suit your preferences from the time you wake up to the time you go to bed.

With RYSE SmartShades you can:

  • Automate all of your heavy or hard-to-reach shades

  • Wake up to refreshing sunshine

  • Go to bed in complete darkness and privacy

  • Keep your home office cool and comfortable while you work from home

 

Transform your living room into the ultimate home theater 

Close your blinds, dim the lights, and snuggle up for that new show you've been meaning to watch. All with a simple voice command or a tap on your phone.

Transform your living room into a home theater or simply control the temperature and ambiance without relying on expensive A/C or artificial lighting. Either way, you can kiss the annoying TV glare goodbye once and for all.

 

Wake up naturally to energizing sunshine 

Fall asleep faster and for longer at night and wake up naturally to energizing sunshine in the morning. Maintain a healthy sleep-wake rhythm that is in sync with your body's natural alarm clock. 

RYSE SmartShades uses scheduling and timers to automatically close your blinds at night and open them in the morning.

 

Control your shades with just your voice 

Nothing is as simple and easy as controlling your shades with your voice. By just saying, “Alexa, open my shades" - SmartShades does the rest.

Warm sunlight or relaxing shade is only a Hey Google, Alexa, or Siri away.

 

 

Bring complete home automation to your Smart Home 

You can finally complete your smart home with smart blinds. Complete control is in your hands.

Get fine-tuned control of your home with:

  • Your own custom schedules/timers

  • Smart integrations with your favorite home automation systems and devices

  • Simple voice control and intuitive on-device controls

 

Wire-Free (if you want it to be)

Don’t like messing around with wires and cables?

RYSE SmartShades can be completely wire-free with the optional quick-release battery pack. This battery pack lasts 3 - 6 months depending on usage and is easily recharged via the included USB cable. Keep the look of your home clean and pristine.

 

Why get the RYSE SmartBridge?

The RYSE SmartBridge brings some amazing features to your window blind by allowing your SmartShades to connect to your WiFi. This allows for voice control, smart integrations, scheduling, and more. 

We highly recommend that you purchase the SmartBridge to fully experience the benefits of SmartShades in your home. 

 

Half the price, twice the possibilities

Motorized blinds usually cost around $1,000 USD and force you to throw out the great blinds you already have installed.

Save your money and the environment by upgrading the blinds you already own and love. Plus, you get:

  • On-device controls

  • Unlimited schedules, timers, and groups

  • Smartphone control with new updates and features being added regularly

 

The best products are the ones that pay for themselves. 

In the summer most of the unwanted heat enters your home through the windows. With RYSE SmartShades, you can set your blinds to automatically close during the day when you leave for work which will lower your room temperature by as much as 11 degrees. This means your A/C doesn’t have to work as hard and you cut down on your energy bill!

 

Scheduling and app control

Lower your blinds to shut out the glare, or open them up to enjoy some sunlight. Complete control is just a tap away with the RYSE app. Set schedules/timers to perfectly suit your preferences from the time you wake up to the time you go to bed. Group your blinds together in the app to create rooms, making things even easier and more convenient.

  • Individual shade control (0% to 100%)

  • Group shade control (0% to 100%)

  • Unlimited schedules/timers

  • Add multiple users

 

Will it work for you?

RYSE SmartShades is an upgrade for the blinds and shades you already own and love. Simply attach it to your blind’s chain or cord loop to transform them into smart blinds. Installation couldn’t be simpler and it only takes a few minutes.

RYSE SmartShades works with any window covering that uses a looped beaded chain or continuous cord loop. From roller shades to vertical blinds, regardless of brand or size.

 

What it works with:

RYSE SmartShades works with any window shade that has a beaded chain or cord loop such as:

Some window blinds and shades that SmartShades work with are:

 

Installation

RYSE SmartShades is so easy to install that you can do it yourself. See how simple it is to install:

1. Attach the mounting bracket with screws (for wood frames) or double-sided tape (for metal frames).


2. Loop your chain or cord into the cogwheel. 

 

3. Snap it on to the mounting bracket.

 

How loud is it?

We've designed the SmartShades motor and specifically selected materials to minimize noise. RYSE SmartShades is rated to operate at ~40db. But what the heck does that mean? Check out this handy chart for reference:

 

After selecting a perk right here on Indiegogo, you can simply add-on as many extra SmartShades, BatteryPacks and SmartBridges that you would like.

You can also simply visit us at helloryse.com between 11 AM and 6 PM EST to chat with our friendly team. They can help you find exactly what you need and can answer any questions you may have directly!

 

Tech Specs

 

We’ve done this before

The team behind RYSE is the same team that brought AXIS Gear to market in 2016. Now in 2020, we’ve taken everything we’ve learned from the last 4 years and put that into RYSE SmartShades. 4 years of engineering, design, and manufacturing experience that we bring to the table. 4 years of listening, learning, and evolving. That’s a lot of growth and change in 4 years. But one thing that hasn’t changed over the last 4 years is this team’s need to create products that make things smarter, simpler, and more convenient for you. RYSE represents the next generation of smart shading, and we can’t wait to share it with you.

 

Why we need your help

After 4 years of research and development, we have now reached the point where we feel confident about bringing RYSE SmartShades to your window blind. However, we can’t do this without your support. The next step is to simply raise enough funds to start the manufacturing process.

 

Shipping and Duties

Please be aware that shipping and duties are not included in the pledge levels. Shortly before RYSE SmartShades ships, we will email you a link to our “pledge manager.” In the pledge manager, you can:

  • Enter your latest address
  • Pay Shipping and Duties
  • Adjust your order

Shipping charges vary based on your country and the number of units you purchase. This would typically be anywhere from $15 - $30.

Media Inquiries

Please send media inquires to media@helloryse.com

story:
What is E-Prism?  

Based on color mixing technology, E-Prism can produce more colors and color effects allowing users to interact with and enjoy colors in more ways.

 

Featured in

 

        

Customer Testimonials

"I gotta say I really like the lighting. I have a lot of Philips hue lights right now and it’s slowly becoming my image and style to work with different cool lights and lamps! I’d love to get one of your products."

"I think your E-Prism is super cool! Would love to use it in photo shoots and videos!"

"I need this for my room."

"Please get me this for Mother's day!" 

Key Features & Highlights

1. Multi-Color Output: create and display up to seven colors simultaneously at a 120° angle from RGB LED color mixing. You have up to 1 million color settings to choose from.
2. App Controlled: colors can be selected manually on RGB color bars or automatically or continuous from mode buttons. In random mode, colors are selected randomly while preset colors are selected in favorite mode. In fade and transition delay features are available for the two modes.
3. Smart Colors: E-Prism’s color projection system, when encountering objects with negative space, can create new colors on them and around them.
4. Color Interaction: users can interact with smart colors to create color shadows or color projection.

5. Adjustable Brightness: easily adjustable brightness, dimness, and transition.
6. Pivotable: you can pivot the light to any angle to project wonderful color effects.
7. Portable: Its small and robust design makes it convenient for almost any setting.
8. Manual Switches: when you don’t have your phone, you can still adjust colors by using manual switches.

 

App Features 

Activating your desired ambience is effortless! Control the E-Prism quickly and conveniently with the mobile app.

1. Manual mode: color settings are adjusted by sliding the intensity level on color bars.
2. Preset mode: up to 16 color settings can be saved and displayed as buttons. Users can access any setting by pressing its button.
3. Automatic random mode: color settings are selected randomly and continuously.
4. Automatic favorite mode: color settings are selected by cycling through saved settings.
5. Setting delay: time delay before the next color setting in automatic modes. It can be adjusted by sliding the delay bar. 
 6. Fade transition: time it takes to transit from previous color setting to new color setting. If the fade is zero, then color between two settings is instantaneous. If it is 1 second, then it will take 1 second to change between two settings.
 7. Relax mode: fade transition is turned on in either random mode or favorite mode. The transition is smooth and slow.
8. Fast mode: fade transition is turned off in either random mode or favorite mode. The transition is abrupt and fast.

 

 Applications

Make everyday moments more colorful!

Home Decor

 E-Prism provides you with endless options to light your home!

E-Prism’s multi-purpose, portable, and pivotable design makes it perfect to place it on a side table, work desk, nightstand or wherever you need to create an amazing atmosphere.

Entertaining 

E-Prism any color you wish, anywhere you want!

E-Prism was designed to go from your bedroom to your living room to your kitchen and literally anywhere where a pop of color is needed to create beautiful ambient lighting for everyday moments. 

Gaming

Create the ideal mood for gaming.

Work out

LED lights creating beautiful displays of color shadows and shapes.

Relaxation

Perfect ambient light for everyday moments & relaxation!

E-Prism displays beautiful colors that are therapeutic to look at and can be adjusted to your preferred brightness for entertaining, working, reading, working out, etc.

 Special Occasions 

The perfect lamp for any situation!

E-Prism provides a continuous glow which can be adjusted to your preferred color and brightness for special holidays like Halloween, Christmas, Thanksgiving celebration and much more!

 Get the perfect ambient light for special occasions like parties.

 

Kids'  Playtime! 

The perfect light for hours of playtime! 

It's fun to play with the light to create interactive art!

Product Specifications 

The perfect combination of modern design and technology!

We have designed E-Prism in a way that users can easily take it anywhere in their home where a pop of color is needed and create the right atmosphere in any room for everyday moments. E-Prism's small design makes it perfect to place it on a table, work desk, nightstand, or wherever you need to create an amazing atmosphere. 

Comes with a pivotable & removable stand

Its pivotable design & removable stand  makes it perfect to manipulate and directly illuminate objects to create beautiful color shadows.

 

3D Design View  

E-Prism Lamp Dimensions

 

Timeline

 

About Us

 

E-Prism smart lamp is made by a Boston-based tech startup company called E-Green LLC founded in 2012. We design high tech, interactive, and innovative smart lighting technology. We’re a team of entrepreneurs who have a passion for technology but limited resources. Our purpose: facilitate the way people interact with light.

About our CEO, Chia Ming Chen:
Chia Ming Chen was a principal system engineer at Raytheon and United Technologies before becoming an entrepreneur. He worked on missiles and multispectral sensors for airborne reconnaissance. He graduated from Columbia University with BS and MS in applied physics 1990.   

Our Story

Our founder, Chia Ming Chen, grew up in a small village in rural China. There was no electricity and when going from place to place at night, he had to carry a kerosene lamp. Since he was just a child, sometimes he would trip over an unseen object and create a small fire. Due to his childhood experience with kerosene lamps, he wanted to create a lighting system that was safe, convenient, and cool. 
After 20 years working in aerospace industries, he decided to start a lighting company in 2012 called E-Green. He wanted to use the latest sensor technologies to make lighting more interactive, flexible, comfortable, and beautiful. To get there, he needed some luck and also some color... During a failed light mixing uniformity test in late 2017, a dazzling color mixing pattern not seen anywhere had been discovered. The E-Prism smart lamp was born!
Our company filed a patent for this new technology in early 2018 and then built our first prototype. We learned from testing and analysis of the prototype that the colorful display had 7 colors, 16 color regions, twice that of the traditional color mixing method! We also learned the illumination angle was 120° degrees. We also found out its colors changed colors and created multiple color shadows when encountered an object. Finally, it could project multiple color images from the user-designed pattern. Based on these properties, we optimized our new prototype and phone app for various applications. We tested it in homes, hotels, restaurants, churches, wedding parties, and other venues. We were amazed when we watched how the E-Prism created a new world of light and shadow in these spaces, and we want to share this world with you.

 

How will funding be used?

We want to bring this beautiful lamp to our customers. Currently we don’t have the resources to do so. These funds are needed to pay for the manufacturing of the product.

Return Policy and Warranty

We will not offer refunds or return for items that are not defective. Our E-Prism comes with a 12-month warranty. In any case that you think you receive a faulty device, please contact us at egreen.lights@gmail.com. We will do our best to get your problem solved accordingly.

Shipping

We offer free shipping of our product. However, please note that we are not responsible for additional customs or taxes that may apply to your country.

 

Learn more about us
story_txt:
What is E-Prism?  
Based on color mixing technology, E-Prism can produce more colors and color effects allowing users to interact with and enjoy colors in more ways.

 
Featured in

 
        


Customer Testimonials
"I gotta say I really like the lighting. I have a lot of Philips hue lights right now and it’s slowly becoming my image and style to work with different cool lights and lamps! I’d love to get one of your products."
"I think your E-Prism is super cool! Would love to use it in photo shoots and videos!"
"I need this for my room."
"Please get me this for Mother's day!" 
Key Features & Highlights

1. Multi-Color Output: create and display up to seven colors simultaneously at a 120° angle from RGB LED color mixing. You have up to 1 million color settings to choose from.2. App Controlled: colors can be selected manually on RGB color bars or automatically or continuous from mode buttons. In random mode, colors are selected randomly while preset colors are selected in favorite mode. In fade and transition delay features are available for the two modes.3. Smart Colors: E-Prism’s color projection system, when encountering objects with negative space, can create new colors on them and around them.4. Color Interaction: users can interact with smart colors to create color shadows or color projection.
5. Adjustable Brightness: easily adjustable brightness, dimness, and transition.6. Pivotable: you can pivot the light to any angle to project wonderful color effects.7. Portable: Its small and robust design makes it convenient for almost any setting.8. Manual Switches: when you don’t have your phone, you can still adjust colors by using manual switches.
 
App Features 
Activating your desired ambience is effortless! Control the E-Prism quickly and conveniently with the mobile app.
1. Manual mode: color settings are adjusted by sliding the intensity level on color bars.2. Preset mode: up to 16 color settings can be saved and displayed as buttons. Users can access any setting by pressing its button.3. Automatic random mode: color settings are selected randomly and continuously.4. Automatic favorite mode: color settings are selected by cycling through saved settings.5. Setting delay: time delay before the next color setting in automatic modes. It can be adjusted by sliding the delay bar.  6. Fade transition: time it takes to transit from previous color setting to new color setting. If the fade is zero, then color between two settings is instantaneous. If it is 1 second, then it will take 1 second to change between two settings. 7. Relax mode: fade transition is turned on in either random mode or favorite mode. The transition is smooth and slow.8. Fast mode: fade transition is turned off in either random mode or favorite mode. The transition is abrupt and fast. 
 
 Applications
Make everyday moments more colorful!

Home Decor
 E-Prism provides you with endless options to light your home!
E-Prism’s multi-purpose, portable, and pivotable design makes it perfect to place it on a side table, work desk, nightstand or wherever you need to create an amazing atmosphere.

Entertaining 
E-Prism any color you wish, anywhere you want!
E-Prism was designed to go from your bedroom to your living room to your kitchen and literally anywhere where a pop of color is needed to create beautiful ambient lighting for everyday moments. 

Gaming
Create the ideal mood for gaming.

Work out
LED lights creating beautiful displays of color shadows and shapes.

Relaxation
Perfect ambient light for everyday moments & relaxation!
E-Prism displays beautiful colors that are therapeutic to look at and can be adjusted to your preferred brightness for entertaining, working, reading, working out, etc.

 Special Occasions 
The perfect lamp for any situation!
E-Prism provides a continuous glow which can be adjusted to your preferred color and brightness for special holidays like Halloween, Christmas, Thanksgiving celebration and much more!
 Get the perfect ambient light for special occasions like parties.
 
Kids'  Playtime! 

The perfect light for hours of playtime! 

It's fun to play with the light to create interactive art!

Product Specifications 
The perfect combination of modern design and technology!
We have designed E-Prism in a way that users can easily take it anywhere in their home where a pop of color is needed and create the right atmosphere in any room for everyday moments. E-Prism's small design makes it perfect to place it on a table, work desk, nightstand, or wherever you need to create an amazing atmosphere. 


Comes with a pivotable & removable stand
Its pivotable design & removable stand  makes it perfect to manipulate and directly illuminate objects to create beautiful color shadows.
 

3D Design View  

E-Prism Lamp Dimensions

 
Timeline

 
About Us

We’re a team of entrepreneurs who have a passion for technology but limited resources. Our purpose: facilitate the way people interact with light.
