story:
This is Beam

The World’s Most Advanced Router

 

Beam is a router that provides more than just WiFi, it encrypts all of your information so your internet provider can’t see what your doing and services can’t track you. It protects all the devices in your home from threats online and keeps your physical location hidden so you can access any part of the internet, from anywhere in the world. It’s the world’s most advanced router and that’s just the beginning.

 

 

 

 

Unlike other routers, Beam encrypts all your data so your web activity is kept private and and your internet provider can’t see or log your web activity. Because the encryption is at the router level, you are also able to use peer-to-peer applications and access geo-restricted content without any software running on your computer.

Beam also provides advanced firewall protection, network scanning, and remote access. The Forcefield software, which is included with Beam, can be used to keep all your devices protected even when you’re away from home.

 

 

Beam is equipped with latest gen wireless technology, gigabit networking, and an incredibly powerful processor and co-processor. This enables Beam to provide every device in your home with breathtaking encrypted speeds.

Four, high-powered antennas

Four, dual-band antennas with high-powered amplifiers provide seamless WiFi coverage making lag, dropped connections, and dead zones a thing of the past.

Serious processing power

Beam sports a 2GHz dual core processor and co processor to maximize the WAN/LAN throughput, encrypt network traffic and provide advanced features that most routers aren’t capable of.

Beamforming, AC Wave 2 WiFi with MU-Mimo

With 6 separate wireless antennas, Beamforming allows direct signals to be sent to your device so the WiFi is stronger and faster reaching speeds of up to 2500mbps and 250mbps through the VPN.

 

 

Beam is an improvement over Flter in every way. Beam’s VPN speeds are 10x faster and also comes with Firewall protection and advanced network control features to keep your devices safe.

Beam has gigabit Ethernet and 2500mbps WiFi speeds. Traffic through the VPN is encrypted and can reach 250mbps, faster than any other router on the market. 

 

 
 

 

A Virtual Private Network (VPN) encrypts all of your incoming and outgoing web traffic so that no one, not even your internet provider, can see your online activity. Our servers act as middlemen that hide your IP address from the websites you visit and the services you use.

 
 
 

 

Every Beam router comes with a subscription to Forcefield VPN. Forcefield is our standalone, no-log VPN service. Beam utilizes Forcefield VPN technology to encrypt all data entering and leaving your home, keeping your online activity, identity, and physical location hidden. This prevents data theft from hackers, snooping internet providers, and tracking services. We’ve taken what we’ve learned from the development of our first product to help make Beam and Forcefield work even more seamlessly together. Beam’s VPN capabilities offer extremely low latency and breathtaking speeds, you’ll never notice that you’re connected. 

We offer full peer to peer support and unlimited bandwidth. We have servers in over 35 countries and we’re expanding every month. We have apps for Forcefield on every major operating system so you can have access to VPN protection while you’re away from Beam. 

We want to emphasize the fact that we don’t keep any logs on user web activity and all of the traffic through our network is encrypted. You can read our very simple privacy policy here.

 

"We don’t collect your information so we won’t be able to sell or share it"

 

Our Privacy Guarantee

At Passel, we have built our company on the core belief you should have the freedom to do anything without being tracked or watched.

We’ve purposefully designed our servers to not log any traffic through our network and to prove that we’re going to have annual code audits from a third party to prove that we are doing what we say we are doing. You can read our very simple privacy policy here.

 

Yearly Security Audits

What you do online is your business, and it’s our business to make sure that make sure it stays that way. We don’t want to know what you’re up to, which is why we’ve taken technical measures to ensure we can’t.

Our business is built around keeping your information private. This is why we don’t log and why we’re committed, through doing yearly security audits, to proving that what we say is what we mean. When it comes to staying safe, accountability matters, so our audits will be published in an annual public report.

 

 

 

Network VPN Encryption

Beam encrypts all data entering and leaving your home keeping all the devices in your network protected. Traffic through the VPN is encrypted and can reach 250mbps, faster than any other router on the market. 

 

"watch content from all around the world"

 

No Geographic Restrictions

Beam is able to circumvent geographic restrictions on any device. This enables you to enjoy all the content video streaming services have to offer, no matter where you are. With servers in over 35 countries you can

 

 

 

 

IoT Protection

IoT protection is a feature that protects the more vulnerable devices in your home, such as smart devices from things like malware and hackers. These devices can easily be manipulated by getting past your router, which is why Beam stops all unauthorized access preventing these devices from being compromised. 

Firewall Security and More

Beam blocks unauthorized access using advanced firewall protection and two-factor authentication. Beam scans your network for vulnerabilities and alerts you on how to fix them. If the system detects a threat, it can automatically disconnect the affected devices to keep the malware from leeching data.

Automatic Updates

For ease of use all block lists and security features are kept up to date automatically, so you don’t have to worry about security vulnerabilities. Last year we pushed an update to Flter in a day while it took others manufacturers months to patch the KRACK attack vulnerabilities. 

 

 

VPN Filtering (split tunneling)

You can exclude individual websites and devices of your choice from being tunneled through the VPN, so you don't have to keep turning Forcefield on and off. You get to stay connected all the time, in the places that matter most.

Parental controls

Set up profiles for your kids so that you can pause the internet when it's time for bed.

Remote access

Access your home network from anywhere in the world. You can view files saved on network storage or use your home IP address to get around geographic restrictions while traveling.

Advanced Networking

Beam supports virtual LANs, access point isolation and mac address spoofing to keep your network safer and more private.

Prioritize bandwidth

You have the option to prioritize a device in your home so that it receives better bandwidth which ensures that your most important tasks are never slowed down.

 

"We were fed up with all the data being collected about our lives and how companies were using it"

 

Our Story

Founded in 2015, our NYC-based company consists of five talented and passionate team members. We have backgrounds in financial and information security, hardware and software development, and design. We recognized that no one is looking out for consumers, and most companies are trying to turn personal data into profit in order to make the most money, our entire team is very passionate about changing that.

Last year we released our first project, Flter, it started as a small crowdfunding campaign based on the needs we saw so many of our friends and family expressing; that they were looking to stay more private and secure online, but they didn’t know where to begin. We raised half of a million dollars and with no other outside capital, we created hardware and software for Flter, built a standalone VPN service (now Forcefield) with applications on every major operating system, created security solutions for businesses, and delivered over three thousand devices worldwide. As our company grows and evolves our vision will always be the same: to make great technology with privacy and security built in.

This campaign will be no exception, the funds and feedback we receive for Beam will be put toward more innovation and growth and we will continue to work towards our goal of a safer and more private internet and with your help, we know we can achieve it. 

 

 

Why We Need Your Help:

We’ve spent the past few months moving past the design phase, testing our hardware and software, building a prototype and have found the manufacturers we will be using for this project. We believe Beam could change how you experience privacy and security, but we need you to make that happen. Our goal is to raise $30,000 in order to meet manufacturing requirements and volume in order to mass produce Beam and make it affordable for everyone. 

With your help we can make Beam a reality. So let’s do this!

 

 

Our BONUS gift to you

Although we were excited at the possibility of hiring a marketing team to help us successfully launch this campaign, after speaking to multiple agencies, we realized that it would never be a good fit.  

We’ve said it before, but your data is important to us. We feel strongly that your information, even when it’s not personally identifiable, such as demographics, is not ours to share.

So when we approached agencies about marketing the Beam campaign and they wanted information that we weren’t comfortable gathering, we knew we had to rethink our strategy. This invasive push from companies to gather user data goes against our core beliefs, and we feel that this type of parasitic relationship between companies and consumers is not necessary for success.

As a matter of fact, we believe that the incredible success of our last campaign is proof that there is a way for companies to thrive without cannibalizing their users’ data. So in keeping our beliefs aligned with our business model, we have decided to forego a marketing agency and offer a FREE GIFT to the backers that share our campaign on social media. We’re sticking with what we know works for us, and for you too. 

Just comment to let us know if you've shared and we'll include the USB key with your order. 

 

"share the campaign and get a free key-shaped water & shock proof USB thumb drive with your pledge"

 

 

 

How do I connect Beam?

Beam’s setup is strikingly simple, although it works best as a standalone router, it can work with any network configuration and internet service provider. The app will help guide you through setup process and Beam has built-in diagnostics.

All of Beam’s security features will be on by default and be configured within the app. It really is that easy.

We have 24/7 live support, we’re always here to help.

 

FAQ

Do you allow peer-to-peer torrenting? 

Yes, you can download torrents on every single server!

Do you log VPN traffic?

For our VPN service, Forcefield, we have purposefully designed our server software to not log any traffic through our network. If we were subpoenaed we would not have any information to give. You can read more about our privacy policy here: https://forcefield.passel.io/privacy

Will your lifetime Forcefield VPN subscription be available later?

Due to popular demand the lifetime subscription is available to purchase on Indiegogo again. This is the last time you will be able to purchase a lifetime subscription and it will not be available after this campaign ends. 

What are Beam's specs? 

We have a full list of specs that can be viewed: https://passel.io/specs

Will Beam work with my internet service provider?

Yes, Beam will work with any network configuration and internet service provider.

Can I use a third party VPN service with Beam?

Beam will work with other VPN services just like our first device did, however, more advanced features like remote access and VPN filtering will not work since we aren't able to edit a third party VPN configuration.

story:
First time to Indiegogo?

It's super easy!

1. Decide how many towels you would like then click the pink button that says "GET THIS PERK".

2. Fill out your shipping information and continue with your payment.

3. Receive and fill out the survey for color choices via email.

4. We receive your color choices and get your shipment out.

5. You receive your order and enjoy your new towels!

 

Bath towels may be the hardest working members of your household. After all, we expect our towels and washcloths to keep us clean, dry us off and add to the look of our bathroom.  

However, despite their versatility, towels are often underappreciated, with many people putting little thought into which type of towel they buy and bring home. Sento towels look, last and perform better.

The right towel  

If you think about it, you use a towel everyday. Whether after your bath, shower, washing your hands or at the beach. However, your choices at the store are confusing.  

Cheap towels won't stay soft after a only few washes and fray apart easier. Even if you're willing to spend more, unfamiliar features and a wide spectrum of prices can make the options overwhelming. Finding the right towel can be a frustrating experience, but we don’t think that needs to be the case.

Traditional towels are bulky, heavy, trap dirt, and take forever to dry. These inconveniences are something that we’ve all dealt with, and this led us to create the ultimate towel.  

Say Hello to Sento....  

That's where Sento comes in, introducing the towels as soft as a cloud.  

After experimenting with dozens of towels, fabrics & types of cotton we’ve created an incredible towel that feels right in your bathroom. Combining the best elements of western and Japan towel making, and putting them into one great towel.

The most absorbent, luxuriously delicate, odor resistant & 100% Japanese cotton towel. Welcome into your life fine craftsmanship in the pursuit of excellence in towel making. We know you'll love it!  

JAPANESE CRAFTSMANSHIP

The Japanese have been perfecting the art of towel making for hundreds of years. Used by the high class of society in the 17th Century including the Samurai. They still carry on this tradition focusing on superior craftsmanship and simplicity.

In modern Japan bath houses are a large part of the culture and we have taken inspiration from both the fine experience and the name 'Sento' which is Japanese for bathhouse.

Composed of two textured sides stitched together in the traditional Japanese style. A cotton front with a gentle texture and a looped terry pile in the back. Using a premium woven stich rather than low grade sewing knit that regular towels use.  

"Created with painstaking attention to detail"

Sento features:  

  • Larger size than your regular towel 
  • Dries 3x quicker 
  • Absorbs 3x its weight 
  • Soft & Durable 
  • 100% Japanese Cotton 
  • Style and Decor 
  • Minimalist Design 
  • Anti-bacterial to eliminate odors  

Inspired by our passion for the finer things in life, Japanese craftsmanship and attention to detail.

 

Many towels are made of cotton, but the look and feel of towels largely depends on what type of cotton is used. Towels designed and priced for everyday use are made of sub-standard cotton.

Sento is made with 100% Japanese cotton which use longer, more-fibrous threads, meaning that each towel will have more moisture-wicking loops per inch. 

Sento fabric is ultra-soft, super-fluffy and designed for high-end spas and hotels with it's luxurious look and feel. 

“A better experience with every touch”

Unlike mircofibre, which is a man made fabric, we use organic cotton which has a looser, velvety-soft texture. Unlike towels made from engineered fibers these natural fibers are better for your skin and extra absorbent. Best used for wringing water from wet hair without being too heavy.

Sento towels are woven to create lots of little loops with high quality yarn allowing for a better spun affect. Giving the soft, silky and fluffy feel. Making Sento one of the softest towels ever.

"Towels as soft as the sense of well-being"

 

 

1 SENTO TOWEL SET INCLUDES:

- 1 X BATH TOWEL

- 1 X HAND TOWEL

- 1 X FACE TOWEL

1 DELUXE SENTO SET INCLUDES:

- 1 X BATH SHEET

- 1 X BATH TOWEL

- 1 X HAND TOWEL

- 1 X FACE TOWEL

 

Sento comes in 7 different colors - Dark Navy, Grey, White, Royal Blue, Lavender, Red and Green.

 

SHARING THIS CAMPAIGN

By backing this project you are helping make this new project become a reality and as an added bonus any backer who shares this project will receive a pair of free Japanese chop sicks! So please share this project via social media, email and word of mouth to tell your friends and family about our campaign. Thank you in advance! Click the share button at the top of the page! (then message us to let us know you have shared).

 

Machine wash with cold water and mild detergent. No bleach or fabric softeners. Hang or tumble dry low. Strong threads means this won't wear down easily or come apart.  

To dry, hang in a dry place. Their absorbency makes Japanese towels especially quick to dry. You can also tumble dry them on gentle or low cycle.  

The great thing is the more you use them, the softer, fluffier, and gentler they become.

story:
Clicbot is your family’s newest friend. He listens, he thinks, and he even reacts. His personality is contagious, and his playful design makes him even more lovable. More than that, he’s an engaging teacher that knows how to make learning fun.

Clicbot’s character and personality were designed by Carlos Baena, an award winning designer.

Clicbot’s personality adjusts depending on how you build and code him- each setup (and there are more than 1000 setups) has its own unique combination of use cases, ensuring that Clicbot is forever-engaging and always fun.

 

 

Clicbot is an entire universe. He’s got more than 1000 different setups, so you can build yours to climb, dance, crawl, drive, or even serve you your morning coffee.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Clicbot has more than 200 reactions like nuzzling up to you when you pet him, trying to find you when you cover his eye, and getting excited when you put him in the charging station. There are two setups with predefined personalities according to their specific set ups- you don’t even need to code them.

 

 

 

Clicbot starts super basic. Build your new robot and get a grasp on robotics by clicking pieces together. You can then assign movement directions by moving your Clicbot and selecting the direction in which its moving. Or you can record a sequence by simply hitting record and moving the bot. It’s that easy. Now you can play that sequence over and over- no code required.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Upload your videos to the Clicbot community and browse videos from other users. Learn from others and let them learn from you- the perfect combination of creativity and education. 

 

 

 

 

 


 

 

 

Founded in 2014, KEYi Tech Ltd. is an innovative robotics company with strong competence in designing and developing STEAM Education robots in China. Our first-generation product, CellRobot was featured on Forbes, Digital trends, BBC, etc. In 2016, CellRobot was chosen as the "Best of CES" by BBC and won the championship in the 2017 Creative Business Cup in Copenhagen.

Our team consists of top engineers and designers with working experiences from Pixar, Samsung, Intel and academic backgrounds from Tsinghua, BUAA and more. KEYi Tech owns more than 40 independent IPR ranging from robotic designs to AI algorithms, and our company has strong connections with China's top universities and enterprises.

Clicbot is our second-generation product and we've been developing it for the last year-and-a-half with the goal of making breakthrough, modular education robots. Our industrial-level algorithms enable smoother and more natural robot movements, and the 200+ reactions really give Clicbot a personality.

We hope to use this simple yet powerful product to deliver ultimate education values and bring smart robots to every family.  

 

 

 

 
 

 

 

Tross is a data driven Crowdfunding company

story:
Thank you so much for your support! 

We've been talking to our manufacturing partners all this week and will get rolling on production next week. 

We thought we'd say hello to a few of our friends we haven't seen since the beginning of the pandemic and show you around a few great British manufacturers!

 

The Hesed Chair is a radical breakthrough!

Comfort, Health and Style whilst you sit.

 
  • The Hesed Chair is a radical breakthrough in ergonomic seating. 
  • The reason other Ergonomic chairs don't work is that they miss the fundamental fact that for 9 out of 10 people  their pelvises are at different heights on each side.
  • Hesed Chairs naturally adjust and accommodate the differences between and within us and so more closely support and match your natural standing posture when you sit in them.

 

 "Man I love my Hesed!  There’s something about this chair that really does quite effortlessly help you to maintain a nice healthy posture but in a very relaxed comfortable way. "

Milo McKinnon - Musician/Composer/Jazzer

 

"I’m recommending my Hesed Chair to my friends regularly. I call it my espresso chair! I feel more energised, more alert. Who would have thought it - if your body doesn’t think it’s sitting, your mind stays sharper too? 

Matt G, Strategy Partner, Grey London

 

"My whole back feels so much more stable! I instantly felt relief in my lower back when I first sat on my Hesed while I was working, and I really love how comfy and unrestrictive the seat as I move around between my client and ink station. I know that other tattooists will feel the same."

Deni M -Tattooist

 

"Heseds are the first true innovation I've seen in ergonomic seats in 35 years."

Zeev Aram, Aram Furniture -Chair World Legend

 

 

Now you can stay fit whilst you sit!

 

  • Flexercise is a unique active technology which allow the muscles in your back and thighs engage in continuous micro exercise.
  • Your body gets a mini workout whilst you sit.  You tone and condition your postural muscles and maintain your body's normal, healthy function.

  • Humans are organic, natural not manufactured beings.  Nine out of ten people have a slight leg length difference.
  • This means that they also have a pelvic height difference and their spine will have its own natural side-to-side curves. 
  • Whist other chairs actually force you out of your natural position Heseds are the only chairs in the world to match your natural structure!

 

 

"While, yes, still technically a chair, The Hesed Chair is in a league of its own.  Honestly, a game changer." - GQ Magazine

 

"The seated position makes me feel like I’ve just sat down with perfect Alexander Technique...you get a level of micro-exercise which helps counteract the unhealthy effect of sitting." - Forbes

 

“A fortnight into my trial, I wasn’t getting my usual pain any more – and could stand straight up from it and walk about” - HOW TO SPEND IT - The Financial Times

 

We've made an Exclusive 24 carat Gold Edition just for our Indiegogo Supporters!

 

We're very happy with the adjustment lugs for Hesed's back-rest in Sterling Silver, but we thought we'd give you an unmissable opportunity to be the proud owner of a exclusive, limited-edition Indiegogo version.  And what better way to say thanks to our supporters than saying it with 24 carat gold!  

 

 

 

You won't have long to wait as we have already made and shipped the first batch!

 

A limited first batch of 120 Hesed Chairs and Stools has already been made using finished factory made parts.  We assembled and packed all of the first batch by hand in our small workshop, but we need to set up a factory assembly line for the Hesed Chair & Stool project to be sustainable.

This first batch is sold out and shipped and we continue to receive fantastic feedback from our customers, professional product testers and reviewers.

 
 

"My whole back feels so much more stable! I instantly felt relief in my lower back when I first sat on my Hesed while I was working, and I really love how comfy and unrestrictive the seat as I move around between my client and ink station. I know that other tattooists will feel the same."

Deni M -Tattooist

 

The only chair in the world made for Humans!

You've been told it's unhealthy to sit, but it's not sitting that's bad for you it's what you've been sitting on!  Very little has changed since the introduction of the Aeron chair in 1994.  We believe that as radical as it was, it and all other conventional office chairs have got it fundamentally wrong!

Whereas other chairs actually force your body out of its natural position, Hesed seats are the first to adjust to you, adapt to you and your natural position, and keep you comfortable and healthy.

“I have spent the last 25 years sat in a chair. The Hesed Chair is the first chair I have used that instantly feels right.  We will be kitting out our office with the Hesed Chair so that all of our staff can benefit. Personally, I don’t want to sit on any other chair. Oh, and it looks amazing, too.”

— Ludo Fealy, Founding Partner, nineteentwenty

 

 We need your help to make it healthy for you and the world to sit.

 

If you can help to boost the number of chairs & stools in our Batch 02, we can set up a full factory assembly line.  That way we can keep our price low, help more people have true ergonomic support and compete with the environment-damaging, industry giants.

 

 

 "Man I love my Hesed!  There’s something about this chair that really does quite effortlessly help you to maintain a nice healthy posture but in a very relaxed comfortable way. "

Milo McKinnon - Musician/Composer/Jazzer

 

“After three weeks with the Hesed Chair my back pain has gone, my posture is better and the chair is a welcome design feature to my apartment.”

Rob C, Director Global Entertainment, Fremantle

 

 

 

 

Save the Planet!

If we all bought a Hesed instead of a conventional task chair we could save more than a million tons of CO2 gas going into the atmosphere every year!

The Hesed Chair weighs less than a third of the average task chair and as each component is meticulously designed and chosen for its environmental credentials it has a far smaller carbon footprint.  

 

We can't do it without you

Breathing life into a disruptive technology is notoriously difficult. We've done most of the hard work already.  The tools for industrial manufacture are made and were used to produce the first full production run.  That paid for the tooling and first run, but to push the button on the second, hopefully larger one, we need our Indiegogo community to support us and pre-order a health-saving, planet-saving Hesed.  Once we have the production funds we will have all our components in 12 weeks after ordering, start assembling and packing immediately and ship shortly afterwards.

 

Help us change the way the world sits

Imagine a world were sitting becomes the healthy option.  One where of equal importance in design and manufacture is to have as minimal an impact on the environment as is possible.  That's the difference your support will make!

 

Risks and Challenges

All the tools for factory manufacture have been made and tested in our first small production run. Have a look at some of the pictures of our tools below.

We shipped Heseds to 100 + users who have 'loved' their Heseds for several months and no manufacturing issues have arisen.

That's given us the confidence to approach the Indiegogo community.  

Once we have the funds in place we'll place the order with our various UK-based manufacturers.

The longest lead time we are looking at is for our very specialised wooden components.  That's 12 weeks and all other manufacturing times fall comfortably within that.

The pandemic has lengthened lead times and increased cost.  It's also made sourcing materials harder than before.  However, this has all been taken into account.  There are always 'unforeseen disasters' that can occur, but we hope we've planned for just about everything!

story:
Rotofarm by Bace is an advanced, space and time-efficient indoor garden packed in a beautiful, modern award-winning design. Grow your favorite vegetables, herbs and microgreens using less space, water and energy. 

Rotofarm combines the power of NASA-inspired zero-gravity technology, energy-efficient sunlight spectrum lighting and smart app automation for the easiest, most efficient and most effective growing experience. 



Grow fresh food year-round with no soil, 95% less watering, automatic lighting and full control from your phone. Rotofarm is fully automated, so you don’t have to worry.

No more underwatering or overwatering. Just set it and forget it — spend less than 5 minutes of maintenance per week for perfect results.

Rotofarm flawlessly fits 5.2 ft of growing surface into a compact cylinder that takes up 3x less space. Easily place it on top of a kitchen counter, table or island.

With the award-winning design, Rotofarm also makes an excellent centerpiece or highlighted piece of decor anywhere you want.


Get healthy, nutrient-filled foods without pesticides or harmful chemicals. Rotofarm is made of BPA-free materials and contains no toxic metals in its construction.

By producing your vegetables and herbs directly at home, you know that your food is coming from a 100% safe, sustainable, and protected environment.​

With Rotofarm, you bring nature to any corner of your home or office. The sleek, modern and futuristic design enhances any space, while the lush garden inside breathes life wherever your Rotofarm lives. 

Rotofarm makes gardening easy and efficient. No more wasted plants, wasted space, wasted water, or wasted energy. From the zero-gravity system to the full automation, Rotofarm is designed and engineered to ensure maximum efficiency and ease.

Zero Gravity. NASA-Technology. Faster Growth.

Rotofarm uses a NASA-inspired zero gravity technology that rotates your garden a full 360° every hour and reduces the growth-suppressing effects of gravity. This optimizes the watering and aeration of roots, encourages nutrient absorption, and maximizes both light exposure and space-utilization — resulting in faster growth with less water.

Research on the International Space Station has shown that plants actually grow better in zero gravity environments. No gravity means there’s nothing resisting the plant’s efforts to pull water and nutrients up. As a result, their stems can grow much taller and their leaves much wider with less energy needed.

A low voltage motor and internal power supply in the base keeps Rotofarm rotating 24/7. The continual rotation creates a net zero gravitational pressure environment. The time spent upside down counteracts the time spent right-side up. Water and nutrients are picked on the bottom of the rotation, then drips down and pools in the plant leaves when on top — accelerating growth. 

This innovative technology allows Rotofarm to achieve space-level growth and benefits in your own home. Get larger, healthier plants faster with simple science.

Maximum Light. Minimal Cost. Healthier Living.

The boosted-spectrum, energy-efficient Sun+ LED light is optimized for strong plant growth. The light generates the full color emission of sunlight and boosts the purple, red, and invisible infrared wavelengths for enhanced plant health and increased growth speed across all stages. 

The centralized position provides steady lighting to all your plants simultaneously. This maximizes the light supply for all your plants and encourages even growth throughout your entire garden without wasting energy or space. 

Set an automatic timer with the mobile app to sync the light to sunset and sunrise times. The light will automatically fade off at sunset and fade on at sunrise — saving you even more energy and hassle. The automation mimics a natural day cycle and promotes a healthier circadian rhythm both in you and your plants.

When these three design, tech and engineering innovations combine, they produce a maximum yield of growth-inducing light while saving you tons of money in energy bill savings. The result: a happier, healthier, wealthier you.


Worry-Free Watering. Sustainable Gardening.

Precise peristaltic pumps and level sensors prevent flooding and ensure there is always liquid resting at the base of the farmbed, regardless of rotation. If the sensors ever detect low water levels, Rotofarm will alert you via the app so you can refill the base.

Because Rotofarm is a fully enclosed system, there is minimal water loss from evaporation or drainage. Your plants get just the right amount of water they need — any excess returns to the reservoir and is recycled for the next rotation. As a result, Rotofarm uses 95% less water than traditional farming techniques. Nothing is wasted. ​

The rotating farmbed maintains the perfect balance of water, nutrients and oxygen for your plants. No more root rot or dried out leaves. Rotofarm has your watering regiment completely covered. Never worry about watering your vegetables ever again.​


No Soil. No Mess. No Waste. 

The soilless Seed Podsare made from 100% biodegradable, plastic-free, soil-free coconut fibre. The coconut fibre retains moisture and humidity extremely well and doesn’t lose its integrity when wet or dry. These features help your plants stay hydrated and secure, even when they’re upside down. 

No soil also means no mess, no waste and no runoff! Grow your plants in the most efficient way possible without any hassle.


Easy To Access. Easy To Harvest.

Rotofarm features a 180° swivel head that allows you to access it without strain. Simply move the garden opening towards you to harvest your herbs. The large opening and flexible head makes it easy to pick out your plants and prepare your meal for the day.


 

Premium Luxury Materials. Designed To Last.

Rotofarm is made with the highest-end quality materials for durability, longevity and aesthetics. 

Polished anodized aluminum and BPA-free silicones and plastics make up a majority of the base, internals and stand — creating a clean and strong build that holds the full density of your garden with stability and safety.

A durable, beautiful white silicone shell protects the farmbed and keeps a modern, minimalistic aesthetic. 

Eclipse Cover — Maximize Light w/o Eye Strain

The optional Eclipse Cover is an innovative acrylic and aluminum cover that reflects light back into the farmbed, retains internal humidity, optimizes plant health and decreases eye strain as you enjoy your Rotofarm. 

The Eclipse Cover easily snaps on to Rotofarm through hidden neodymium magnets. The magnets auto-align the cover and securely attach it in an instant — no locks or latches needed. 

The cover keeps air moisture and humidity from escaping the enclosed environment. This helps conserve water, maximizes leaf respiration and maintains an optimal growing state.  

The reflective interior mirror bounces and reflects light back to smaller, covered crops. This ensures all your herbs and vegetables, including those that may be blocked by larger plants, get the adequate lighting they need to thrive.

The exterior smoked tint on the cover cuts out 60% of glare coming from the extra bright Sun+ light — reducing eye strain from the growth-optimized lighting. 

With the Eclipse Cover, you can conserve even more water, keep leaves healthier, and view your plants with ease.


Rotofarm Pass — Continue The Harvest

Each Rotofarm comes with a starter package of Seed Pods and Nutrient Concentrate. This is enough to get your first batch of produce growing and ready to eat. But what happens after?


Don’t worry, we've got you covered! Before you checkout, be sure to add the Rotofarm Pass to your order. The Rotofarm Pass is a monthly subscription for Seed Pods and Nutrient Concentrate optimized for Rotofarm. Get your next batch started immediately after you harvest!

Always be ready for the next cycle and keep the growth going!
 

Traditional farming is terribly inefficient and wasteful. As a global community, we want to find ways to conserve our Earth’s precious resources while helping humanity thrive. With Rotofarm, we believe we can get one step closer to a more sustainable, more efficient, healthier future. 



Bace is an Australian-born biotechnology company comprising of horticultural and engineering experts that bring novel tech hardware and software to fruition whilst helping save the planet.

story:
Crownes is a modern approach to a timeless game. Each piece is precisely designed to fit one over the other in sequential order, creating a uniformly compact stack. 

A full size set awaits within an efficiently sized solution. Set up, stow away and bring along without compromise. 

It provides a simplified way of organizing your pieces. Remove and place or stack and go. It is perfectly nested together for your convenience.

16 pieces, an entire team, is nested together and magnetically drawn to the centralized base, creating a handheld barrel for each opponent.  

The two teams can be stored in a cylindrical, compact carrying case for you to bring pieces anywhere with style, while minimizing mass.

Play the classic game wherever you please with this space-saving and portable design. Crownes impresses the world with a refreshingly simple, but functional design. 

Reveal & Play: Unroll the board to reveal both teams. Remove each team from their storage cases to sequentially unstack the nested pieces in perfect order.

Nest, roll and go: Go on your way by rolling up the carrying case of both teams into the board, becoming an easy-to-carry ensemble.

The centralized bases split open providing a stable platform for each piece to rest on.

 

The tubular, space-saving design makes storing convenient and effortless. Place in a bag, luggage, cabinet shelf or in the open. The minimized footprint is easy to carry along or tuck away.

 

An additional set of queens, to promote your pawns, are available for Premium & Original sets as “Add-On Perks.”

Each set of extra queens comes in a compact designed storage case with rubberized end caps,  designed to store inside the main carry case with the rest of Crownes Chess Set’s pieces.

Premium Sets: Stainless Steel (bronze & black) for $15 exclusive IndieGoGo InDemand perk pricing. 

Original Sets: Zinc Alloy (silver & black) for $10 exclusive IndieGoGo InDemand perk pricing.

Countless rounds of sketching, paper studies, rapids prototyping and metal 3D printing took Crownes from napkin sketch to feasible solution. Failing was not an option, but it took numerous attempts to succeed! Exploring different materials and testing different manufacturing techniques helped validate the idea and plan.

Crownes impresses the world with a refreshingly simple, but functional design. Reveal & Play: Unroll the board to reveal both teams.   The tubular, space-saving design makes storing convenient and effortless. Place in a bag, luggage, cabinet shelf or in the open. The minimized footprint is easy to carry along or tuck away.

 
Lifestyle pictures and videos of Crownes on the campaign page are created with prototypes. Please refer to the "Set Details" and “Specifications” tables for all color, material and size information.


  

   An additional set of queens, to promote your pawns, are available for Premium & Original sets as “Add-On Perks.”Each set of extra queens comes in a compact designed storage case with rubberized end caps,  designed to store inside the main carry case with the rest of Crownes Chess Set’s pieces.Premium Sets: Stainless Steel (bronze & black) for $15 exclusive IndieGoGo InDemand perk pricing. Original Sets: Zinc Alloy (silver & black) for $10 exclusive IndieGoGo InDemand perk pricing.
Crownes Chess Premium Queen Set in Stainless Steel
 

Crownes Chess Original Queen Set in Zinc Alloy
 Countless rounds of sketching, paper studies, rapids prototyping and metal 3D printing took Crownes from napkin sketch to feasible solution. Failing was not an option, but it took numerous attempts to succeed! Exploring different materials and testing different manufacturing techniques helped validate the idea and plan. 
*Plastic&Metal parts are not representative of final texture and color *These parts are for tooling and part quality tests.
These are images of the Leather Carry Case & Wooden Storage Case prototypes. We are testing size, manufacturability, material composition & construction methods. The Crownes Logo is a gold stamp embossed into the leather & the leather carry case magnetically closes along the metal edge trim.
 
These are images regarding polished stainless steel version chess piece, plastic version chess pieces, and silicone chess board.

story:
SEALVAC is a food vacuum sealer that utilizes powerful features and a convenient design to properly preserve food so that the cooking process is made easier and more enjoyable for you. You can even use this with foods that come in pre-packaged bags!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Let’s be honest.. how many times have we let the bulk of our groceries go bad in the fridge? That’s a waste of good food and precious money. Proper food storage with the help of our SEALVAC will allow you to buy in bulk and keep it fresh for much longer!

 

 

 

 

 

Our vacuum bags have been designed to completely seal your food from being exposed to oxygen and moisture in the air. This helps prevent oxidation which is one of the primary contributors to food spoilage. This means that your foods will stay fresh for 5 or even 10 times longer with SEALVAC.

 

 

 

* Duration of freshness may vary depending on the environment you are in when you use the SEALVAC.

 

 

 

 

 

How many times have we used unnecessarily clunky storage containers that make it super annoying to reach the food in the back? By vacuum sealing your foods with SEALVAC, you’ll save up to 3 times the amount of fridge space and make it easier to navigate around each shelf.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We launched the 1st generation of SEALVAC on a South Korean crowdfunding platform and raised $120,000. After our Korean backers received their SEALVAC’s and had a chance to test them out, they came back and gave us a 5 star rating! With their feedback, we’ve created the 2nd generation SEALVAC to share with the world through Kickstarter!

 

 

 

 

 

We get it. With the rise of other kitchen appliances like the air fryer, you’ve probably noticed that there’s less countertop space for you to cook or prepare your foods on.

Not only is SEALVAC compact in size, it’s completely wireless which means that you can take it out, use it, and store it without having to compromise on long-term countertop space.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

SEALVAC uses two Samsung SDI 18650 battery cells typically used in electric vehicles to power the vacuum mechanism. Experience the power of wired performance and wireless convenience in SEALVAC!

 

 

 

 

 

SEALVAC uses a low-noise motor that maxes out at 75db which is the same noise level as an average person to person conversation. After all that blender use, it’ll be nice to let your ears a break.

 

 

 

 

 

The SEALVAC features three different UV-C lights that will activate to sterilize while it’s vacuum sealing your food.

 

 

 

Have you ever noticed that plastic food storage bags and containers usually look like a mess near the opening because it makes contact with the food you’re putting in?

 

SEALVAC goes one step further with the sealing process by using it’s three UV-C LED lights to sterilize the bag so that you can get that extra peace of mind when storing your food.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We used industry-leading 3D mechanical design techniques and mold technology to secure all of the main parts of the SEALVAC so that it stays intact even if it falls off your kitchen counter.

 

 

 

In the average vacuum sealing device, the temperature of the heating wire can rise to 300℉. We’ve discovered that when those devices are used in consecutive sessions, the plastic bags end up melting and causing the device to malfunction.

 

That’s why with the SEALVAC, we chose to include a silicon plate with very low thermal conductivity under the heating wire in order to block any residual heat so that you can use the SEALVAC multiple times in a row without any risk to the device, the bag, or the food.

 

 

 

 

 

 

SEALVAC can also be used to elevate your cooking to a whole new level. By sealing your choice of food and marinade, you’ll lock in and intensify the flavors.

You can also use a wine stopper to vacuum seal your wine as well.

For your convenience, our device is compatible with third party food containers and sealing bags.

Once you incorporate SEALVAC into your routine, you’ll experience a new paradigm of food storage and cooking.

 

 

 

SEALVAC sealing bags will be available both online and offline. You can also use other commercially available sealing bags as well.

 

 

 

With third party sealing bag rolls, you can create a sealing bag with your preferred length and seal it with the SEALVAC’s Sealing Mode.

 

 

 

 

 

 

The SEALVAC contains four intuitive buttons (MANUAL/AUTO/STOP/SEAL) that allow you to control the device with extreme ease.

 

For normal foods, press the AUTO button and within seconds your food will be completely vacuum sealed and Sterilize.

 

For finer control over the vacuum sealing process press and hold the MANUAL button until your desired amount of air has been extracted. Then, press the SEALING button to seal the bag.

 

You can even store soups and other liquids by simply placing them in the bag and pressing the SEALING button.

 

The UV LED lights will activate automatically during the sealing process. If you wish to activate the UV LED lights again after the sealing has completed, press and hold the STOP button for 3 seconds.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

You can use any USB-C Type charging cable to charge the SEALVAC.

 

 

 

 

It takes a lot of energy to create an artificial vacuum. Because of this, it’s extremely difficult to create a vacuum packaging device that’s wireless. However, we made this possible by using two Samsung SDI 18650 battery cells which are used in Jaguar EVs to provide a power and stable output. With each full charge you’ll be able to seal 80 bags. Why go wired when you can go wireless now?

 

 

 

 

Since the SEALVAC isn’t necessarily a tall device, the ideal way to store it is to have device upright. This allows the device to be stored easily without taking too much kitchen space. Place it in any cabinet, or if you want to show it off SEALVAC’s beautiful design for your next dinner party, consider keeping it on your countertops.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Last year, we launched a crowdfunding campaign for the 1st generation SEALVAC (KUV-1) on a Korean crowdfunding platform and raised $120,000 in funding from 971 backers.

After our supporters had a chance to properly test out the SEALVAC they came back and gave us an overall score of 5 out 5 stars for product performance. We’ve perfected the quality assurance of the SEALVAC and we’re confident that you’ll be satisfied with the 2nd generation SEALVAC!

 

 

 

 

After our first crowdfunding campaign for the 1st generation SEALVAC, we also used the opportunity to get feedback on how we could improve the product. We took the feedback and immediately spent the next several months to make drastic improvements.

 

Click here to see a list of upgrades made from the 1st generation SEALVAC to the 2nd generation SEALVAC 

 

Click here to see the Supplier's Declaration of Conformity for the 1st generation SEALVAC

 

Click here to see the Supplier's Declaration of Conformity for the 2nd generation SEALVAC 

 

Click here to see the test comparison results between the 1st generation and 2nd generation SEALVAC

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

In order to develop a product that meets the highest of standards, we applied for and received an FCC certification for our electrical components and a UL certification for battery stability.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Through the collaboration of our CEO and product designers who collectively have over 20 years of product design experience and 30 years of hardware/software engineering, we were able to create a prototype of SEALVAC.

 

During the modification phase, the SEALVAC went through 3 major instrument design modifications, countless quality tests, and hundreds of drop tests. Our team members worked tirelessly day and night to create a final version of the 2nd generation SEALVAC that would not disappoint our supporters.

 

Now, with your help we will have the honor of sharing SEALVAC with the rest of the world.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Altos is a product launch consulting agency that specializes in helping b2c tech startups launch their products in the global market! Contact Us: support@altosbusiness.com

 

Trend Adopter promotes the best new crowdfunding products from all around the world! Contact Us at hello@trendadopter.com or visit our website at www.trendadopter.com

You can also use other commercially available sealing bags as well.   With third party sealing bag rolls, you can create a sealing bag with your preferred length and seal it with the SEALVAC’s Sealing Mode.      The SEALVAC contains four intuitive buttons (MANUAL/AUTO/STOP/SEAL) that allow you to control the device with extreme ease. For normal foods, press the AUTO button and within seconds your food will be completely vacuum sealed and Sterilize. For finer control over the vacuum sealing process press and hold the MANUAL button until your desired amount of air has been extracted. Then, press the SEALING button to seal the bag. You can even store soups and other liquids by simply placing them in the bag and pressing the SEALING button. The UV LED lights will activate automatically during the sealing process. If you wish to activate the UV LED lights again after the sealing has completed, press and hold the STOP button for 3 seconds.   

 


 
         You can use any USB-C Type charging cable to charge the SEALVAC.    It takes a lot of energy to create an artificial vacuum. Because of this, it’s extremely difficult to create a vacuum packaging device that’s wireless. However, we made this possible by using two Samsung SDI 18650 battery cells which are used in Jaguar EVs to provide a power and stable output. With each full charge you’ll be able to seal 80 bags. Why go wired when you can go wireless now?    Since the SEALVAC isn’t necessarily a tall device, the ideal way to store it is to have device upright. This allows the device to be stored easily without taking too much kitchen space. Place it in any cabinet, or if you want to show it off SEALVAC’s beautiful design for your next dinner party, consider keeping it on your countertops.            Last year, we launched a crowdfunding campaign for the 1st generation SEALVAC (KUV-1) on a Korean crowdfunding platform and raised $120,000 in funding from 971 backers.After our supporters had a chance to properly test out the SEALVAC they came back and gave us an overall score of 5 out 5 stars for product performance. We’ve perfected the quality assurance of the SEALVAC and we’re confident that you’ll be satisfied with the 2nd generation SEALVAC!    After our first crowdfunding campaign for the 1st generation SEALVAC, we also used the opportunity to get feedback on how we could improve the product. We took the feedback and immediately spent the next several months to make drastic improvements. Click here to see a list of upgrades made from the 1st generation SEALVAC to the 2nd generation SEALVAC  Click here to see the Supplier's Declaration of Conformity for the 1st generation SEALVAC Click here to see the Supplier's Declaration of Conformity for the 2nd generation SEALVAC  Click here to see the test comparison results between the 1st generation and 2nd generation SEALVAC         In order to develop a product that meets the highest of standards, we applied for and received an FCC certification for our electrical components and a UL certification for battery stability.                       Through the collaboration of our CEO and product designers who collectively have over 20 years of product design experience and 30 years of hardware/software engineering, we were able to create a prototype of SEALVAC. During the modification phase, the SEALVAC went through 3 major instrument design modifications, countless quality tests, and hundreds of drop tests. Our team members worked tirelessly day and night to create a final version of the 2nd generation SEALVAC that would not disappoint our supporters. Now, with your help we will have the honor of sharing SEALVAC with the rest of the world.      Altos is a product launch consulting agency that specializes in helping b2c tech startups launch their products in the global market! Contact Us: support@altosbusiness.com Trend Adopter promotes the best new crowdfunding products from all around the world! Contact Us at hello@trendadopter.com or visit our website at www.trendadopter.com

story:
NEW: Buy the set and get a free wooden base!

"Once again Rudy has designed a simply elegant piece of artwork that also feeds the spirit, mind, and body."  -- Anna K.

"What a beautiful addition to my Forge Solid Cubes. Can't wait to see the next thing you come up with." -- Susan P.

It's time to claim elemental superiority with the KILO sphere: ONE KILOGRAM solid spheres of aerospace-grade Tungsten, Copper, Titanium, Aluminum and Magnesium.

UPDATE: Copper (5.98cm) and Titanium (7.51cm) are already in production and available now in limited quantities!

This is what one KILOgram of solid metal looks like in metals with wildly different densities:

    Why do I need the KILO Spheres?

    • You are a metal junkie and need a centerpiece for your collection - a full kilogram of solid metal in progressive densities.
    • You are an educator and you want to shock your students with the different densities of solid metal.
    • You want to have the coolest thing in the office - the ultimate conversation starter.
    • You want the ultimate "structure" item to focus on for creative unleashing or meditation

    Tungsten

    • 70% denser than lead
    • Denser than Uranium
    • Nearly impossible to melt
    • 4x harder than Titanium
    • 19x denser than water
    • Sample density: 18.3g/cc (95% W)

    Copper

    • It’s Oligodynamic, which means it naturally kills germs on contact. 
    • We each have about 2mg of copper in our body, without which we could not survive.
    • It’s dense - between lead and steel in density 
    • Along with gold, the only non-greyish pure metal 
    • Takes on its own unique hue over time and can be “reset” to brilliancy with baking soda and water (or salt and vinegar).
    • Sample density: 8.96 g/cc

    Titanium

    • The strongest metallic element
    • Shockingly rigid and lightweight
    • Non-magnetic
    • Resistant to many acids
    • Extremely high melting point (3034 degrees F)
    • Sample density: 4.51 g/cc

    Aluminum

    • 1/3 the density of steel
    • vital to the aerospace industry
    • Superconductive at low temperatures
    • Excellent Corrosion resistance
    • Sample density: 2.70 g/cc

    Magnesium

    • 1/10 the density of our Tungsten sample
    • The lightest metal used for engineering
    • only 2/3 the density of Aluminum
    • Highly flammable when powdered or cut into thin strips
    • Extremely important to our health, especially our bones
    • Sample density: 1.80 g/cc

    How are they made?

    We're now using a precision machining process to get a perfect finish.  A large cylinder of these metals is put onto a metal lathe and carefully worked using a CNC, then hand polished in an hours-long process.  This results in the most perfect finish you can imagine.  Here is a video of the process:

     

    Specs

    • Each sphere is 1000 grams (2.2 pounds)
    • W: 1.86 inches (4.73 cm) diameter 
    • Cu: 2.35 inches (5.98 cm) diameter 
    • Ti: 2.96 inches (7.51 cm) diameter 
    • Al: 3.50 inches (8.91 cm) diameter 
    • Mg: 4.02 inches (10.2 cm) diameter 
    • Comes with base (as pictured)
    • Buy the full set and get the wooden base!

    This is our 4th major metals campaign here at Trance Metals. We strive to make the best possible aerospace quality solid metal products on the planet. We have a 100% success and fulfillment rate with our previous crowdfunded campaigns and have raised over $1.1 million.

    Here are what some people are saying about our previous projects:

    "Once again Rudy has designed a simply elegant piece of artwork that also feeds the spirit, mind, and body."  -- Anna K.

    "What a beautiful addition to my Forge Solid Cubes. Can't wait to see the next thing you come up with." -- Susan P.

    "Now I'll have a cool sphere next to my Esington glass!" -- Jason A.

    "Hi there, just wanted to let you know I was a huge fan and backer of the tungsten project, and found this awesome as well. So backing this was a no brainer." -- Mohamad S.

    "I just backed your latest KS campaign. I love your stuff and have two cubes and one hourglass already in my home. Can't wait to see this 1kilo sphere... I'm sure your campaign will be another huge success." -- Dan D.

    "Hello! I was one of your esington backers, I just backed this project too...My father is a huge fan of copper so I figured This would be a wonderful gift to him. Thank you!" -- Jennifer L.

    "Hey Rudy! I backed Esington (actually a Day 1 backer on that, too, I'm proud to say!!) and I just backed Trance...I love your products! Keep up the good work!" -- Tania D. 

    "I backed the tungsten KS project and love it. My wife is copper crazy and will think this is perfect. I hope you are able to get a good polish. Great job on the super speedy funding!!!!!"  -- Mike E.

    "Congrats on getting funded so quickly. It's very impressive but not surprising! A true statement to the quality of your previous products and how much people liked them. I already got my own pledge and 3 more friends are onboard. Congrats again." -- Kosta Z.

    "Hi Rudy, I'm a backer of the Forge Kilo (which I loved by the way) and pledged for the Trance Copper Sphere as an early-bird backer." -- Brian H.

    "Looks so cool. All Backed!  Thanks and look forward to holding this thing..." -- Darrel R.

    "Stunning! I did back Esington and am looking forward to adding the Copper sphere to my collection. Best wishes" -- Lee A.

    "I think this project just might be more interesting than the Forge Solid! I backed that project for two cubes and this sphere will be a nice addition to my collection." Robert S.

    "Hi Rudy, Count me in of the Trance Copper Sphere -- looks very cool and will be a nice addition next to my Esington glass! Onward!" -- Steve P.

    "Hello! I was a backer of the [tungsten] cube project! I actually regret not getting a larger size of the cube, but now i can make up for it in copper! The cube was definitely helpful and calming just to have on my desk, so I cant wait to see the sphere!" Florence W.

    "Excited for your new project! Everyone who sees the cubes from the Forge Solid project loves it. Woohoo!" -- Butch W.

    "Hi, I am an [Esington] backer and just backed your Copper Spere at the 2x 1kg level. Looking forward to this - love my timers!" -- Monika R.

    "Hi - I just backed the Trance Copper Sphere...and was a backer of the Forge Solid as well. Thank you for another cool project!" -- John B.

    "Hi! As a backer for your Esington glass project, I got your email today about this project and immediately had to back it. The images of this copper ball look amazing and I can't wait to see this project fulfilled!" -- Nicole T.

    "G'day. I love my Tungsten cube and would love to get a copper sphere to put next to it. These are such awesome ideas. Thank you for doing them" -- Matthew I.

    "Hi Rudy,...I just pledged the 1 lb. copper sphere in matte. I love my Esington glass, every one who comes over to my home, if they come in my living room they are drawn to it to turn it up side down" -- Nate K.

    "I backed the cubes and use them at work regularly. I teach at the military EOD (bomb squad) school in the nuclear division. The density of the kilo helps me show the how small 2 lbs of fissile material can be when talking about criticality incidents. I have backed this at the kilo size as well and it looks awesome." -- James H.

    Please pledge today to make the KILO Trance Spheres a reality!

story:
• The Design - Patent-pending, slender design helps you get the most out of your cabinets while taking up no/minimal valuable shelf space!
  • The Versatility - Use Slim Caddies anywhere, in any arrangement, for whatever it may be for your organizing needs.
  • The Ease of Attachment - No tools required! Quality double-sided adhesive provides easy, secure attachment.

 

 

While there are numerous organizers meant for your cabinet door, we took the time to fully analyze the space provided by a cabinet along with potential items desired to be stored on your cabinet door. This helped us design an organizer optimized for your cabinet door with these considerations in mind. After doing this, we looked at problems with every other organizer on the market. The result was Slim Caddies, a door organizer made above the rest.

  • No bulkiness like other organizers that take up too much shelf space and take away valuable storage room (counterintuitive?) — leaving you unable to close your cabinet doors as well. 
  • No permanent holes or damage to your cabinets/desired attachment surface unlike other organizers on market. Slim Caddies make for a great solution when attaching to thinner surfaces such as a thin, cabinet door.
  • No unsightly hangers exposed when your cabinets are closed! 
  • No adhesive visible versus clear plastic organizers on the market as well.

 

 

 

 

 

Slim Caddies are great for easy storage and accessibility to drink lids (Tervis, Tumbler, coffee lids, and many more) — all while taking up minimal/no valuable shelf space!

 

Great for food storage containers as well! If we hit our stretch goal, we will come up with a larger Slim Caddy for those super large lids!

 

Slim Caddies are great for organizing  spices boxes and smaller spice containers, without taking up valuable shelf space!

 

Great for easy access to your favorite snack bars to keep you going through the day, all those koozies from over the years for parties, and many more pantry items!

 

 

 

Great for your bathroom cabinets too! Slim Caddies are great for your smaller accessories that can get lost in those jumbled storage bins!

 

Great for storing note pads, pens, stationary, and other offices accessories in a cabinet where space can be a premium! Medicine cabinets as well for convenient access to those smaller medications and other accessories that otherwise get lost in a jumbled storage bin (especially when needed in an emergency).

 

 

 

Great for convenient access to all your smaller laundry stain accessories, your workbench, and many other areas as well!

 

Organize Your Home, and Optimize Your Life!

 

Quality Materials: Quality is #1. Slim Caddies are made with durable, cold-rolled steel (same steel used in automobiles) wire mesh with a quality powder-coating — providing you long-lasting strength, reliable performance, and an organizer that won't rust. What good is a quality organizer without a quality attachment system? Slim Caddies come preset with quality adhesive to provide guaranteed long-lasting, reliable attachment!

 

 

Easy Accessibility and Visibility of Every Stored Article: Convenient access to every lid, spice, snack, or whatever accessories you plan to store!  The wire mesh design provides easy visibility of all your stored items as well. Mesh design also prevents residue buildup (such as residual water in those lids from the washing machine)!

 

 

Aesthetically-Pleasing: The Slim Caddy looks great in your cabinets or wherever storage is needed in a tight spot.

 

Damage-free Removal: By utilizing quality, double-sided foam adhesive you can remove these whenever you need to (such as in an apartment or dorm).

 

 

Environmentally-Friendly: While many organizers are made of plastic, contributing and encouraging more plastic in the home and plastic production in the organization industry, the Slim Caddy is a step in the right direction to help reduce your plastic footprint and help the planet!

 

 

Thoughtful Dimensions; Why are the dimensions critical? 

We chose a length that was able to accommodate for almost all cabinets including upper cabinets that you may want to utilize for storage. We found a lot of more intricate upper cabinets had a smaller surface area on the door and we wanted the organizer to take advantage of that space as well.  

We chose a balance in height that was able to store a variety of items, particularly lids  (tall, wide, short, and small). An organizer that was not too high as to make it difficult to access smaller items while being tall enough to prevent taller items from falling out when the door moves.  

We chose a critical depth/width that provides the right balance being able to efficiently use the slender "empty gap" in the cabinet created by the cabinet face frame — providing enough room for a variety of items to be stored while taking up minimal/no valuable shelf space. In cabinets without a face frame, it just means an organizer above the rest with a slender design not taking up too much cabinet room.  Being a tradesoff to not taking up shelf space/cabinet room, this depth does not provide enough room to store bulkier lids, spices, and other items. If we reach our stretch goal, I can immediately start designing a slightly wider and larger version to accommodate for larger items in places where you are willing to give up a little more room for more door storage!

Right Price: As for the price, we noticed that many direct-attachment metal organizers (such as those made by 3M) had a higher price range around twenty dollars (for one organizer) and many plastic organizers varied from 8 dollars to 16 dollars. 

Along with the main benefits, the Slim Caddy looks better than a plastic organizer for your cabinets or wherever you plan to use them (without the adhesive being visible as well). If you want that "feeling" of an organized space that looks clean and professional at the same time, the Slim Caddy is your solution (while taking up minimal cabinet space as well). 

We feel the the Slim Caddy's steel design, durable powder coating, and quality adhesive attachment will provide long-lasting, reliable strength — while looking great at the same time. An organizer providing the quality and reliability that we pledge to stand behind and well worth the price for you. 

 

 

 

  • Why I Made Slim Caddies: With anything in life, being organized is the first step to being efficient. The first step in the right direction to living an efficient way of life is to get organized in the place you are daily — your home, your domain...  This is where it all starts... An organized home is the start to an optimized life... I created Slim Caddies out of necessity to be able to get rid of cabinet clutter (especially lids) but not take up valuable shelf space. I found bulky organizers to be counterintuitive to storage space. I then discovered door storage and shelf space don't have to be mutually exclusive (discovery of the slender, "empty gap" created by the face frame). That's when I decided to make an organizer that optimized your cabinet space but still provided enough room to accommodate a variety of potential items to be stored, looked great while being reliable at the same time, and could easily be attached without the worry of tools.  I then found out what was possible when you make an organizer as versatile as this. 
  • The Struggles and Going for It: Truth be told, I have actually been working on this project for several years, licensed it to large companies twice to only have the deals fall apart (maybe didn't see the full potential; who knows)...but still keeping the dream alive for a product I still believe brings a ton of value to a lot of people. This is the final test to see if others feel the same way about it. 
  • A Deeper Purpose: Sometimes it's all about taking a chance, putting yourself out there and going for it, seeing what happens and see if something great comes out the other side. This is me doing that. Big picture, I want to develop innovative, awesome products that benefit people (like you) in everyday life, have a favorable outlook in the marketplace, and are sustainable from the benefits they provide.

 

Can't I just get this at Bed Bath and Beyond?

You can get a cheaply-made, plastic organizer that takes up shelf space if you want. What makes Slim Caddies stand out (beyond the quality design your cabinets deserve): the consideration and accounting for the limited, “empty gap” created by the face frame of a cabinet, while also taking into consideration (and personally measuring) variable items that may be desired to be stored on the cabinet door but not take up shelf space — a balance in design to optimize your cabinet space versus taking away from it... along with all other benefits to make it the ultimate organizer for your cabinet door or anywhere you may want to organize in a tight spot.

In cabinets without a face frame, you still get an organizer above the rest. 

 

If we can raise 30,000 dollars I can immediately start designing a larger version of Slim Caddy that is based on your feedback:

Whether it is slightly wider and larger version to accommodate for larger items in places where you are willing to give up a little more room...specifically larger areas like pantry doors and bottom cabinets that provide more space for a larger organizer to store larger, bulkier items (cleaning supplies and bulkier drink lids). We will come up with a different name for this organizer as well!

Or simply a larger version of the Slim Caddy keeping the same width but larger length and height. This would be optimum for larger, slender items (larger food storage lids for example). I will let everyone who backed this project vote on the next version (to further enhance your home organization). Let's MAKE IT HAPPEN!!!

 

Spread the word about Slim Caddy™ organizers and MAKE MONEY! If you know someone who you would like some Slim Caddies, share this project with them! YOU CAN EARN COMMISSION by simply clicking the Kickbooster button below, creating an account, and watch your commissions roll in!

I made it super easy to post as well: use the press kit below for great post images and text optimized for Instagram and Facebook, or you can simply send them the web address www.theslimcaddy.com to send right to this page. The success of this campaign will help others with their organizing needs. Every post, share, and pledge counts!
