Slim Caddies are great for your smaller accessories that can get lost in those jumbled storage bins! Great for storing note pads, pens, stationary, and other offices accessories in a cabinet where space can be a premium! Medicine cabinets as well for convenient access to those smaller medications and other accessories that otherwise get lost in a jumbled storage bin (especially when needed in an emergency).   Great for convenient access to all your smaller laundry stain accessories, your workbench, and many other areas as well! Organize Your Home, and Optimize Your Life! Quality Materials: Quality is #1. Slim Caddies are made with durable, cold-rolled steel (same steel used in automobiles) wire mesh with a quality powder-coating — providing you long-lasting strength, reliable performance, and an organizer that won't rust. What good is a quality organizer without a quality attachment system? Slim Caddies come preset with quality adhesive to provide guaranteed long-lasting, reliable attachment!   Easy Accessibility and Visibility of Every Stored Article: Convenient access to every lid, spice, snack, or whatever accessories you plan to store!  The wire mesh design provides easy visibility of all your stored items as well. Mesh design also prevents residue buildup (such as residual water in those lids from the washing machine)!   Aesthetically-Pleasing: The Slim Caddy looks great in your cabinets or wherever storage is needed in a tight spot. Damage-free Removal: By utilizing quality, double-sided foam adhesive you can remove these whenever you need to (such as in an apartment or dorm).   Environmentally-Friendly: While many organizers are made of plastic, contributing and encouraging more plastic in the home and plastic production in the organization industry, the Slim Caddy is a step in the right direction to help reduce your plastic footprint and help the planet!  Thoughtful Dimensions; Why are the dimensions critical? We chose a length that was able to accommodate for almost all cabinets including upper cabinets that you may want to utilize for storage. We found a lot of more intricate upper cabinets had a smaller surface area on the door and we wanted the organizer to take advantage of that space as well.  We chose a balance in height that was able to store a variety of items, particularly lids  (tall, wide, short, and small). An organizer that was not too high as to make it difficult to access smaller items while being tall enough to prevent taller items from falling out when the door moves.  We chose a critical depth/width that provides the right balance being able to efficiently use the slender "empty gap" in the cabinet created by the cabinet face frame — providing enough room for a variety of items to be stored while taking up minimal/no valuable shelf space. In cabinets without a face frame, it just means an organizer above the rest with a slender design not taking up too much cabinet room.  Being a tradesoff to not taking up shelf space/cabinet room, this depth does not provide enough room to store bulkier lids, spices, and other items. If we reach our stretch goal, I can immediately start designing a slightly wider and larger version to accommodate for larger items in places where you are willing to give up a little more room for more door storage!Right Price: As for the price, we noticed that many direct-attachment metal organizers (such as those made by 3M) had a higher price range around twenty dollars (for one organizer) and many plastic organizers varied from 8 dollars to 16 dollars. Along with the main benefits, the Slim Caddy looks better than a plastic organizer for your cabinets or wherever you plan to use them (without the adhesive being visible as well). If you want that "feeling" of an organized space that looks clean and professional at the same time, the Slim Caddy is your solution (while taking up minimal cabinet space as well). We feel the the Slim Caddy's steel design, durable powder coating, and quality adhesive attachment will provide long-lasting, reliable strength — while looking great at the same time. An organizer providing the quality and reliability that we pledge to stand behind and well worth the price for you.    

Why I Made Slim Caddies: With anything in life, being organized is the first step to being efficient. The first step in the right direction to living an efficient way of life is to get organized in the place you are daily — your home, your domain...  This is where it all starts... An organized home is the start to an optimized life... I created Slim Caddies out of necessity to be able to get rid of cabinet clutter (especially lids) but not take up valuable shelf space. I found bulky organizers to be counterintuitive to storage space. I then discovered door storage and shelf space don't have to be mutually exclusive (discovery of the slender, "empty gap" created by the face frame). That's when I decided to make an organizer that optimized your cabinet space but still provided enough room to accommodate a variety of potential items to be stored, looked great while being reliable at the same time, and could easily be attached without the worry of tools.  I then found out what was possible when you make an organizer as versatile as this. 

The Struggles and Going for It: Truth be told, I have actually been working on this project for several years, licensed it to large companies twice to only have the deals fall apart (maybe didn't see the full potential; who knows)...but still keeping the dream alive for a product I still believe brings a ton of value to a lot of people. This is the final test to see if others feel the same way about it. 

A Deeper Purpose: Sometimes it's all about taking a chance, putting yourself out there and going for it, seeing what happens and see if something great comes out the other side. This is me doing that. Big picture, I want to develop innovative, awesome products that benefit people (like you) in everyday life, have a favorable outlook in the marketplace, and are sustainable from the benefits they provide.
 Can't I just get this at Bed Bath and Beyond?You can get a cheaply-made, plastic organizer that takes up shelf space if you want. What makes Slim Caddies stand out (beyond the quality design your cabinets deserve): the consideration and accounting for the limited, “empty gap” created by the face frame of a cabinet, while also taking into consideration (and personally measuring) variable items that may be desired to be stored on the cabinet door but not take up shelf space — a balance in design to optimize your cabinet space versus taking away from it... along with all other benefits to make it the ultimate organizer for your cabinet door or anywhere you may want to organize in a tight spot.In cabinets without a face frame, you still get an organizer above the rest.  If we can raise 30,000 dollars I can immediately start designing a larger version of Slim Caddy that is based on your feedback:Whether it is slightly wider and larger version to accommodate for larger items in places where you are willing to give up a little more room...specifically larger areas like pantry doors and bottom cabinets that provide more space for a larger organizer to store larger, bulkier items (cleaning supplies and bulkier drink lids). We will come up with a different name for this organizer as well!Or simply a larger version of the Slim Caddy keeping the same width but larger length and height. This would be optimum for larger, slender items (larger food storage lids for example). I will let everyone who backed this project vote on the next version (to further enhance your home organization). Let's MAKE IT HAPPEN!!! Spread the word about Slim Caddy™ organizers and MAKE MONEY! If you know someone who you would like some Slim Caddies, share this project with them! YOU CAN EARN COMMISSION by simply clicking the Kickbooster button below, creating an account, and watch your commissions roll in!I made it super easy to post as well: use the press kit below for great post images and text optimized for Instagram and Facebook, or you can simply send them the web address www.theslimcaddy.com to send right to this page. The success of this campaign will help others with their organizing needs. Every post, share, and pledge counts!

story:
My Favorite Way To Drink

Licking water from KittySpring’s shallow and wide dish is a pleasure. My adorable whiskers never brush against it and never hurt because of whisker stress!

 

 

Enough Water Every Day

KittySpring ensures I satisfy my daily need for a cup of freshwater (0.8 oz/lb) for 2 looong days. Now Mom and Dad don’t need to fill up my bowls and refresh the water in them several times a day. It’s a lifesaver for both of us!

I simply can’t stop admiring the sleek design of my new fountain! It can be placed in almost any corner of the house and still look great. 

Hard to knock over

I’ve already paw-tested KittySpring. After hitting the light yet stable fountain a few times, it never flipped over! The fountain stands strong against any of my paw attacks. No more puddles of water, I promise.

Purremium, safe materials

KittySpring is made of FDA and RoHS certified materials, which means all of its components are  100% non-toxic, safe, and me-friendly. 

Non-electric, just gravity 

I never knew what gravity was until I got my KittySpring. Meow I know — it’s a kind of thing that fills up my dish automatically once I lick a few drops … and it never adds to Dad’s bills. Meowgic!

Silent like a sweet nap

KittySpring has no motor, which means no scary noises for a fluffy like me and a quiet night’s sleep for Mom & Dad. 

 

 

Hard  to destroy

The durable materials make KittySpring my long-term water fountain: time and even naughtiest of tricks will never put it out of order. 

 

 

No need to replace the filter

The built-in stainless steel filter lasts for years. This actually means 2 things: no troubles for me and no extra expenses for Mom and Dad.

Easy to install

Simply unbox it, fill the bottle with water and place it in any corner of your house. No plugs, no cables needed!

Track the water level easily 

With the transparent water bottle, Mom and Dad always knows when it’s time to refill the bottle of my favorite water. 

Easy to clean 

Cleaning KittySpring is super easy and super important. Make the dish and the bottle bacteria-free in seconds by simply taking them apart and washing in tap water using a brush or sponge and soap. Everything is also completely dishwasher-safe.

 
 

 

Single size. RRRight size

KittySpring is purrfectly suited for both large cats like me and small kittens. Depending on the size of my fellow cats, KittySpring offers enough to drink for 1-2 days. And it will always stay fresh!

Good for many cats  

With its ultra-large dish, KittySpring can serve water not only to one but even two cats. The second cat is often my friend, Max. We just love drinking together from this fountain!

 

Designed with comfort-loving cats in mind

Each component of KittySpring is designed to combine useful with pleasant and comfortable. Thanks to its ergonomic design, drinking water from this fountain is almost like drinking from a natural spring.

 

Two pawesome color options for your cat

 

  • Crystal White
  • Emerald Green  

 

 

 

Absolutely cat approved

KittySpring is approved by all representatives of my cat family. This means British shorthairs like me, Bengal and Persian cats, Sphynx, Scottish folds and all the rest just love KittySpring.

 

Dimensions and Weight

 

 

 

 

Our Pawesome Story

Last year my cat, Oscar, suddenly fell ill. The vet diagnosed the fluffy with dehydration and resulting kidney problems. The poor thing had to go through lots of pain and long treatment to regain his kitty self. We all worried about him pretty much as he was our team’s absolute favorite. 

And fortunately one bright day he started meowing happily again. We all sighed with relief and decided to join our efforts and design a water fountain that would help cuties all over the world avoid such problems and always stay hydrated. 

In designing KittySpring, we considered each detail of feline physiology to turn our fur friends’ drinking experience into the most enjoyable and comfortable one. We also tried to balance cats’ preferences for running and still water, creating an amazing gravity fountain perfect for any cat. 

With KittySpring, we hope to improve the life of our fluffies, keep them healthy and help loving cat parents like you take better care of them. 

 

 

 

 

By backing now, you’ll get KittySpring at a discount that is only available during the crowdfunding campaign. What’s more, you’ll join our community of cat parents and receive useful tips on keeping your furry friend hydrated and healthy.

We ship worldwide! Please check out the shipping costs for your reward as it may vary depending on your country. Also note that costs like VAT, GST, duties, taxes, etc. are not included in the reward price and are covered by backers on delivery, in the amount determined by your shipping country.

 

Here is our estimated shipping timeline:

We are planning to start the shipping from January 2021 of your KittySpring from China, which means that it first has to reach our European, American, or Australian warehouses and only then be delivered to you.

If according to the aforementioned timeline the shipping of your KittySpring starts on January 1, it will reach our warehouses on February 2 and be delivered to you within 3-7 working days. To make the process more transparent and predictable for you, we will keep you updated on all the developments in detail.

Lockdown has affected almost any business, including our company. Nevertheless, we continue working hard and already have estimated dates for production and delivery based on all the known variables. We promise to keep you posted in case anything out of our control forces us to change our plans.

story:
SORTEDFood - They’re whipping up a 4-course meal using just the Omni Cook! How good will it be?

 

 
'MasterChef' Christine Ha's first TOKIT unboxing video - 
 
 

Following lovely Kerry Whelpdale to cook the classic CURRY LAKSA NOODLE with the Omni Cook - 

 
 

 
Start your day with great taste! Whether you’re a seasoned chef or a beginner in the kitchen, the TOKIT Omni Cook helps you prepare meals at home more efficiently, time-saving, and exciting than ever before.  
 
 
TOKIT Presents - Bourbon Chicken
 
 

TOKIT Presents - Laksa Noodle  

 

Omni Cook's cutting-edge technology makes it easy to cook for any occasion or daily life. It features simple, step-by-step digital recipes with an automated cooking process that brings every perfect and delicious meal to the table.  

 
 
 
 
 
 
Thanks to the built-in 11+ culinary modes and innovative compact design, Omni Cook replaces up to 21 cooking gadgets in your kitchen, which fulfill a wide range of tasks, from chopping and grinding to steaming and much more. 
 
 
Modes Demo : Weighing & Kneading
 
 
 
Never have to worry about measuring cups again! Equipped with an internal high-precision food scale, Omni Cook accurately measures the ingredients as you place them in the bowl.
 
 
It also has a clever suction-based design that keeps Omni Cook stable and secure throughout the preparation and cooking process, preventing any kitchen mishaps! 
 
 
Omni Cook provides a quick and easy interactive design via an integrated 7-inch touchscreen display. Tweak and customize your favorite dishes with a press of your fingers. 
 

 

Designed to be easy to read, the screen is at a comfortable and easy to reading angle. The brightness of the display is also easy to adjust so you can read it in any setting.

 

 

With a small footprint of about 1 square feet, you can place the Omni Cook anywhere and save up to 90% of the space in your kitchen while replacing other kitchen appliances at the same time. 

 

 

 

 

What if we told you that you could bring all your favorite dishes to the table at the touch of a button? Well, with the Automated Cooking Guidance System, you can. The Automated Cooking Guidance System gives you preset timers, temperatures, and cooking steps so you can perfectly prepare a delicious home-cooked meal every single time. 

All you have to do is put the fresh ingredients into the 2.2-liter large-capacity pot, press the button and then wait for your favorite dishes to be served!

Making the Signature Singaporean Gourmet at home : Chili Crab

 

 

 

Integrated with a powerful 500W high-speed motor and strong, quad-blade cutting head, Omni Cook can spin at a rapid speed of 12,000 rpm.

 

 

Supported by the forward and reverse spin direction, it is designed to grind, whip, and emulsify effortlessly. 

 

 

 

With a precise temperature control between 95 and 356 degrees Fahrenheit (35 to 180 degrees Celsius), Omni Cook ensures the taste and quality of food while saving time for cooking. 

 

 

 

 

 

Simply connect to WIFI and get unlimited access to a cloud recipe database with a single tap on the screen. Then select your recipe, and Omni Cook will guide you step by step to help you finish your dish! 

 

 

Omni Cook includes a simple step-by-step guide so you can make delicious dishes like a chef from scratch. Let's cook! 

 

 

 

More than a hundred recipes for you to choose from. Find exactly what you want with a press of a button.

 

 

An online community to share your cooking results. With hundreds of recipes to choose from if you don’t see a recipe you like, you can leave us a comment in the community.

 

TOKIT presents: Italian Risotto

 

 

TOKIT Presents - Indian Butter Chicken 

 

 
 

 

 

With just the press of a button, your smart kitchen assistant activates the auto-cleaning mode and helps you clean up every time you cook. Sit back, relax, and say goodbye to extra dishes. 

 

 

More ways to do the Cleaning : 

 

 
 
 

 

Thanks to the versatility of the Omni Cook’s compact and portable design, it can fit perfectly almost anywhere. With the Omni Cook, you can comfortably cook smoke-free and odor-free so you can take it with you to your dormitory, office, or camper van and enjoy delicious food wherever you may be.

 

 

 

 

 

The wide inner pot is designed to evenly heat ingredients via a hot plate. As an additional safety feature, a built-in lid detection system protects the food and you during the cooking process until everything is locked and securely in place.

 

 

 

Made of temperature-resistant and food-grade materials, Omni Cook is 100% safe and environmentally friendly, which ensures a worry-free cooking experience.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The idea of making this smart home chef was raised 3 years ago. We devoted ourselves to try to combine what we have achieved in other successful products - design, art, technology, ease-of-use, and so on - into this almighty unit. We finally did it and deliver it to global users now in 2021.  

 

 

 

 

 

We would like to, at this time, briefly introduce ourselves. 

 

We are a group of people, each equipped with some techniques and skills, dreaming to change the way people cook. We started the business 8 years ago, devoting ourselves to designing and creating smart cooking devices, utilizing technology to search and discover wisdom hidden in cuisines all around the world.

 

Awards we have collected -  48 awards since 2013. IF, Red dot, G-mark, IDEA, and so on.

 

 

 

 Manufacturing Facilities we collaborate -  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

business@tokitglobal.com

 

 

crowdfunding@tokit.com

We devoted ourselves to try to combine what we have achieved in other successful products - design, art, technology, ease-of-use, and so on - into this almighty unit. We finally did it and deliver it to global users now in 2021.

story:
The prices will go up as this campaign moves from crowdfunding to e-commerce - last few days!

 




The new hand-held power scrubber effortlessly cleans even the most stuck up grime on any surfaces in your home. Hyper Lychee’s engineering and technology has been razor-focused on developing the most powerful compact scrubber that delivers impeccable cleaning results. 

The lightweight ergonomic design lets you catch a comfortable hold, while the three rotating power scrubbers make scrubbing fast and fun!




Press the "on" button on the bottom and attack that nasty grime. Achieve hyper-clean surfaces with zero effort!

Skadu comes with three different attachments, to cover a wide range of surfaces and levels of ingrained dirt and help you adjust to the most diverse requirements.


The Triple Head: 

Our PDT system (Planetary Distribution Technology) distributes the motor's power evenly to the three scrubbers while allowing them to rotate in opposite directions. And that powerful opposite rotation is exactly what helps you scrub stubborn grime so much faster with zero effort. 

(This is an animated GIF - give it a second to load)

 

Scratch Free - Triple Head: 

A set of scratch-free pads ensures a thorough and safe cleaning of your delicate appliances.

Say goodbye to the grime at the bottom of your bottles - baby bottles, protein shakes, coffee travel mugs, soda stream (one of our beta testers loves it because he can clean the base of the soda stream bottle that never gets clean enough in the dishwasher), and about any container that you can think of. The bottle brush attachment is the extra power you need to give a thorough cleaning right to the bottom rim and scrub off that greasy grime build up. 

The bottle brush has a total length of 20cm and can reach the base of bottles, glasses, and containers of all types up to 35cm!
 

The copper scrubber attachment is here to effortlessly remove burnt food from your BBQ and oven grill plates. When you need that extra level of toughness, this is the attachment. Why copper? Because it is incredibly tough and durable while being gentle to all surfaces and 100% recyclable.

This is our secret breakfast recipe - Eggs, Marshmallows, BBQ Sauce & Tomatoes! Yum, we burnt it nice and long on our brand-new Stainless Steel Pan just to take up the challenge of cleaning it up without soaking the pan. Let's see Skadu clean this burnt grime up in under 60 seconds:

Since we couldn't find the perfectly up-to-the-task motor, we engineered our own. The Hyper Lychee motor technology can drive immense power (8kg.cm), just what you need to take the effort out of scrubbing tough jobs.

Skadu uses Hyper Lychee’s advanced Planetary Distribution Technology (PDT), which delivers the power of three scrubbers in one device. By enabling the scrubber disks to rotate in opposite directions, a multiplier effect is created to remove even the toughest grime with great speed. It channels 5x the scrubbing efficiency compared to its competitors. 

We have engineered this special motor for Skadu to have enhanced performance driving an on-load torque of 8 kg.cm. This motor combined with our PDT system, and even the nastiest grime vanishes fast without you having to lean in and apply pressure.

 

This April, We sent prototypes to beta testers to get real feedback and work out initial kinks. The results were amazing! We heard how it was super easy to clean up garden pots. We heard about how Skadu scrubbed clean a dirty bike. We heard about how it made cleaning therapeutic instead of a dreaded chore. More than anything, we heard time and again how simple Skadu was to use. We can't wait to spread the cleanliness and hygiene and see Skadu in many more households across the world.



 

Unleash the full potential of Skadu using Skadu's App. The App features a community section where you can ask questions and share cleaning tips, tricks and experiences with all fellow Skaduers! The Skadu Store makes it convenient to purchase extra attachments, consumables, and get in touch with us for any query or request!
 







Shipping, Taxes (and VAT) will be calculated and paid for towards the end of the campaign before we ship out to you. During these uncertain times, shipping costs have gone up significantly, however, we do believe that the prices will go down as the situation gets better globally.

We have an internal, dedicated logistics team to ensure you get your Skadu without any errors and at the best price.

Hence, we do not charge shipping right now, upon pledging is at the interest of our supporters as the prices today might be more expensive than that in a few weeks time.

Here are our estimates of what shipping would be:

If your country or region is not listed above click here:  Worldwide Shipping Estimates 

* Prices do not include taxes and VAT. That will be subject to the laws and regulations of each individual country.

** We use customs friendly shipping and we ship worldwide.

*** Please note that these are estimates and the actual costs of shipping may vary slightly depending on the circumstances.

 


 

 

 


 

At Hyper Lychee we are a family - literally! The two co-founders Hannan and Juzer are cousins and they've roped in their most talented friends and close family to build this company.


One day Hannan walked into the kitchen of his great uncle and aunt who are both 60 years old in New Jersey and saw them scrubbing/cleaning by hand and they were struggling, he realized that this is a painful task not just for him but even worse for seniors - a task that we've just given into. After trying out various products that didn't work because they were either too slow or weak, he decided to build Skadu.

He first ran the idea by Juzer and he said: "Bro, let's do this - let's change the way everyone scrubs clean, this can really improve people's quality of life!".

And so Hyper Lychee was born!

A 100 prototypes later the team is finally ready to bring the ultimate power scrubber to your homes.

For business & press enquiries contact: juzer@hyperlychee.com



 

ENVIRONMENTAL COMMITMENTS

Long-lasting design

We have designed Skadu with the highest quality engineering processes - the top and bottom body of Skadu is ultra-sonic welded and shows no screws. This makes it absolutely impossible for water to seep through the body line making it secure from water damage. We use an official license of Solidworks 2020 Premium (Entrepreneurship Grant) to run various simulation tests on the durability of the product. We check for stress on gear assemblies, motor performances, and also for unexpected falls to the ground. We have also chosen the highest quality electronics in the market. We have tested a large range of electronics and ensured that the components chosen to build Skadu have survived and surpassed levels of usage that is way above that of the final product.

Reusability and recyclability

All packaging for Skadu is made using environmentally friendly fiber paper and we only use vegetable ink for printing. All Skadu users will have the option of sending us back the copper scrubbers are exhaustion as they are 100% recyclable. All Skadu units can be sent back to us once their life-term ends so we can appropriately recycle and dispose what is not recyclable in a responsible way.

Sustainable materials

All cosmetic plastic parts in Skadu are made using recycled plastic. For instance, the main body & all the attachment exteriors. The scrubbing pads (tough & scratch-free) are made from recycled plastics The bottle brush is made from recycled plastics The copper scrubber is 100% recyclable All packaging Is eco-friendly fibre and vegetable ink.

Environmentally friendly factories

We have made sure that the factory that we are working with are all abiding by the rules and regulations of the government to ensure that all waste is either recycled or disposed off correctly.

Sustainable Distribution

Our distribution partner is one of the largest crowdfunding fulfilment companies that take into account various factors towards sustainable shipping practices, one of them being optimizing the best routes to the last mile delivery.

Questions about this project? Check out the FAQ section.

The prices will go up as this campaign moves from crowdfunding to e-commerce - last few days!
 

The new hand-held power scrubber effortlessly cleans even the most stuck up grime on any surfaces in your home. Hyper Lychee’s engineering and technology has been razor-focused on developing the most powerful compact scrubber that delivers impeccable cleaning results. 
The lightweight ergonomic design lets you catch a comfortable hold, while the three rotating power scrubbers make scrubbing fast and fun!

Press the "on" button on the bottom and attack that nasty grime. Achieve hyper-clean surfaces with zero effort!

(This is an animated GIF - give it a second to load)






Skadu comes with three different attachments, to cover a wide range of surfaces and levels of ingrained dirt and help you adjust to the most diverse requirements.


The Triple Head: 

Our PDT system (Planetary Distribution Technology) distributes the motor's power evenly to the three scrubbers while allowing them to rotate in opposite directions. And that powerful opposite rotation is exactly what helps you scrub stubborn grime so much faster with zero effort. 

(This is an animated GIF - give it a second to load)
 
Scratch Free - Triple Head: 
A set of scratch-free pads ensures a thorough and safe cleaning of your delicate appliances.

(This is an animated GIF - give it a second to load)

(This is an animated GIF - give it a second to load)

This motor combined with our PDT system, and even the nastiest grime vanishes fast without you having to lean in and apply pressure.
 

 

Visitors and industry experts at CES 2020 got their hands on Skadu and gave in their thoughts. It was the validation that Skadu and the team needed to move towards market launch.

 
Hyper Lychee's Skadu has been turning heads with its innovative approach. Silicon Valley-based accelerator Motwani Jadeja Foundation selected Hyper Lychee as one of the Top-5 most Innovative Technology Startups to exhibit at CES 2020. 
We were covered by various media publications and outlets for our work and participation

story:
If you think about it, calendars are actually disposable products. Once a year has passed, they have served their purpose and end up in the trash.  

But the Growable Calendars from primoza are different: They help you take a whiff of real garden air and grow vegetables, flowers and herbs. The calendars contain 12 detachable calendar strips with certified-organic and open-pollinated seeds that you can plant together with the paper. At the end of the year, you'll be left with a beautiful book of hand-drawn illustrations and gardening tips that will be there for you again next season. This makes the Growable Calendars an all-round sustainable product! 

 

 

Did you know there's a plant called “strawberry spinach”? Or have you ever tried a carrot called "ox heart"? If not, it's high time! In our Growable Calendars you’ll encounter such rare varieties, but also classic vegetables and herbs such as cress are in there too. 

Our Growable Calendars each contain 12 calendar strips of seeds for you to plant. The selected varieties take you on new culinary adventures, but they will also give you a garden or balcony full of radiant blooms.  

Our organic guarantee means you can be sure that only the best vegetables end up in your cooking pot. The "open-pollinated” characteristic is also close to our hearts. Overbred hybrid varieties are often offered in the trade, which can no longer be easily propagated. So you can only grow them once and you'll have to buy a new bag of seeds the next year. It’s different with our calendars: The seeds they contain still have all the characteristics they need for successful propagation. If your plant has produced seeds, you can just collect them and use them next year. 

 

Organically certified and open-pollinated—that's pretty good. But we figured: There's more to it than that. Couldn't we also produce in an environmentally friendly, resource-saving and pollutant-free way?  

Yes, we can! Because producing sustainably isn’t magic. All you need is creativity and the will to do things differently. Better. And to constantly optimize one’s own products through critical feedback.   

What we've already achieved:  

 

With our calendars, you'll learn new gardening skills month after month: The 12 calendar strips contain different organic seeds for you to plant. Our planting tips ensure that flowers, herbs and vegetables will soon be sprouting on your balcony, windowsill or in your garden. Further help is available in the form of a digital plant magazine, where you will find articles on the respective plants. 

No matter whether you're already a pro or don’t have any gardening experience yet: Our products give you the opportunity to bring a piece of nature into your home. We encourage and support you to try new things and make your green thumb grow. 

 

Planting info in the calendar 

Each calendar contains 12 fantastic varieties for you to plant. Basic tips on what to look out for with vegetables, herbs or flowers can be found on the corresponding calendar sheet. Here we’ve put together the following info for you:  

  • Germination period, germination temperature, germination depth 
  • Plant spacing 
  • Preplanting indoors or direct sowing outdoors 
  • Harvest time 
  • Good and bad bedfellows 

 

“Plant Press” – your digital magazine  

You don't have to do your own Internet research on what else there is to look out for with your particular vegetables and flowers. Our digital plant magazine “Plant Press” features specific articles for each calendar. Here you'll learn how to correctly sow your monthly plant, how to care for and repot seedlings, what diseases they might get, and how to tell when it's time to harvest. What’s more, we'll give you tips on storage and use in the kitchen—after all, you don't just want to admire your strawberry spinach, you want to enjoy it too, right?  

As a lucky calendar owner, you have access to this exclusive content in our FriendsWithPlants community and you can share your plant experiences with others!

 

Plant growing kit  

Our plant growing kit contains everything a gardener's heart desires: Clay pots and saucers, peat-free organic soil, vegan organic fertilizer, wooden plant labels, a watering ball and a brochure with gardening tips and tricks. Perfect to start with your (new) hobby – or as a gift for friends or acquaintances.  

By the way: All components of the set are plastic-free and – wherever possible – in organic quality. We take care to use local raw materials and to have as much produced locally as possible.   

 

 

Please remember: The prices do not include shipping costs. They will be charged to you extra. But if you order at least three calendars or the digital gardening course, shipping charges are dropped.  

 

 

People today know: You only protect what you know. That is why we at primoza are united in our desire: to bring more people closer to nature again, so they can help contribute to its preservation. We believe anyone can become a gardener – with a little patience and support. 

From a student idea of designing sustainable and plantable calendars, a company with a 20+ strong team has since evolved. In our office in Nuremberg, creative people – who are both the biggest fans and the harshest critics of their own ideas – work on innovative, sustainable products. 

Every member of the team tries out the primoza products for themselves, because that's the only way we find out whether our promises really work. So our office and balconies are inhabited by many plants. And if a sapling dies on the windowsill, there are plenty of encouraging words from colleagues – or perhaps the odd sarcastic remark ... Ultimately, however, we all pull together and remain highly motivated in putting our joint mission of creating a greener world into practice. 

 

Our aim is to produce sustainably at all levels. For us, "producing properly" starts with product development and goes all the way through to customer service. Pursuing fairness and ecology is important for us from start to finish, as is inclusion of all participants. Our ideas and products should be meaningful, clever and innovative, bring great pleasure to people, and they should be good for the environment. 

For example, we select companies for production that work as sustainably as possible and adhere to high social and ecological standards. The eco-friendly print shop "Druckwerk" in Nuremberg is such a gem for us – we have been working with them since our foundation. We source our seeds from various suppliers, almost all of which are based in Germany. And only organic-certified and open-pollinated seeds are used in our calendars, so we contribute to biodiversity. Plastic – no way José – not with us.   

Besides sustainability, social fairness is also an integral part of our mode of production. That’s why we work together with the “Lebenshilfe Nuremberg”, a charitable association committed to the inclusion of people with disabilities in school and in the workplace. The collaborators support us in the production of our children’s book "Emi Brillenbiene" and our Plant Growing Kit.  

 

Nothing more left to say than: Pot it like it's hot

story:
OneClock is not an alarm clock

Let’s save the alarms for fires, burglaries and submarines. We researched the best tones, tempos and frequencies to wake you up. Then we asked Jon Natchez from The War on Drugs to create a collection of musical compositions to lift you out of sleep in a peaceful, more natural way. 

OneClock is as much a piece of art as it is a functional household object.  

 

Preorder to save 14% and get priority shipping 

 

As seen in

 

Sleep is great, but waking up is better

We believe the only thing better than sleep is waking up. Because that’s where all the love starts. We believe in waking up better, so you can live better and breathe better and think better.

 

Take back the bedroom

Make your bedroom your sanctuary, without all the gadgets and devices that seem to sneak stress and distractions in between the sheets with you. OneClock is designed to disconnect, so all you have is you, your thoughts, and perhaps a significant other in bed with you - human, canine, or feline.

 

Sonic science to start your day

There’s a growing body of sonic research outlining the importance of waking up correctly and its effect on our mood and behavior. OneClock’s sounds are designed to wake you gently and reliably.

 

Music composed by Grammy-winning artists

You deserve better, so we created a new way to wake up with Jon Natchez, renowned composer and multi-instrumentalist of The War on Drugs. OneClock’s compositions are original recordings, not available elsewhere, and feature 20+ instruments that create a warm, organic and non-digital soundtrack to start your day. 

Jon won a 2018 Grammy as a member of The War on Drugs, was formerly a member of the acclaimed group Beirut, and has performed and recorded with David Byrne, St. Vincent, Taylor Mac, Father John Misty, and Liza Minnelli, among many others. He has composed scores for numerous films and has contributed to over 100 albums, composing and arranging as well as playing more than 30 instruments.

 

 

Listen to the music samples

Video includes 7 samples, starting at the top of each minute

 

AI music generator

Humans can suffer from alarm fatigue and become desensitized to sounds they hear over and over. When OneClock’s alarm is activated, our AI music generator will randomly choose one of the songs stored on the clock’s solid state memory and remix it by adjusting the levels of each instrument or vocal for infinite combinations. It’s subtle, but noticeable and you will never hear OneClock’s songs the same way twice. Ever.

 

Timeless analog design + slow-tech philosophy

Warm, organic, minimalism meets an analog and tactile experience that’s built to last a lifetime with high quality, sustainably sourced components. In our current culture of Amazon/Walmart convenience, the approach we took was unorthodox. We prioritized design and quality over price to create a product that is enjoyable to experience amongst other cherished heirloom objects in your home.  

Extruded, precision machined, solid aluminum enclosure. Available in black, red, and white powder coat. Solid rift sawn white oak, natural hand-oiled finish.

 

Multi-function waking knob 

Seamlessly toggle between the current time and waking time. Set, activate and turn off the alarm. Located on the front of the clock (where you need it).

 

Swiss designed clock movement   

Stepper motor technology used in automotive gauges, offers precise and silent operation.

 

Speaker  

Waking music plays through a high dynamic range BMR from Tectonic Labs (4 Ω / 10 Watts / 100Hz – 20kHz full range).

 

Clock face 

The glass face is scratch resistant, low glare, and easy to read.

 

Screen-free   

We left out the touchscreens and buttons in favor of knurled, solid aluminum knobs that provide a tactile, analog feel and precise control reminiscent of high-end audio components.

 

Night light   

Touch sensitive enclosure activates a low-light, warm glow, that turns off after five seconds. 

 

Alarm indicator   

Low-light integrated LED assures you that your OneClock is set to wake you up. It's just bright enough to see at night, but not any more than you need. 

 

Reliable power 

Power is supplied by a fixed USB cable with a two-prong standard wall outlet AC adaptor. In the event of a power outage, OneClock has an internal backup system that stores your time and alarm settings for up to two weeks.

 

 

Product videos

 

 

What people are saying    

 

Specifications & Production 

Package design - actual size and color of product shown on box

The ability to oversee the design process in our backyard allows us to deliver a high quality product that we can touch and see throughout the development process. We’ve been fortunate to collaborate with LINK PD and HWI to ensure that our engineering and production game is on point. With over 50+ years of experience across countless products, they allow us to move forward thoughtfully and confidently to bring our vision to life.

 

 

Warranty

Lifetime warranties typically come with a lot of fine print that often amounts to nothing more than a marketing ploy. We’re matching our high end materials and hand built quality with a robust and straightforward policy. Our 20 year warranty ensures OneClock will be free from defects in materials and workmanship and operate as advertised.

 

Our team

We’re veteran musicians, strategists, creatives and artists that understand the value of waking up beautifully. Between us we have won Lions, Grammys, Emmys, Effies, Pencils, Coup de Couers, and other hard-to-win awards with weird names. And we have woken up each day for the past 25+ years to shape culture through products, campaigns, environmental initiatives, soundtracks, live performances, and the creation of vibrant, sustainable businesses.

 

 

 

Production is Complete as of 8.4.21

We're super excited to let you know that our Production & Final Testing Phase is complete. We're loading up the master cartons, stacking pallets and our ocean freight is scheduled for Thursday, August 12th.

Here's a look at the timeline moving forward:

  • August 12th - clocks ship from China to US (Expedited Ocean service)
  • September 2nd-6th - clocks arrive at our US fulfillment facility
  • September 8th-17th - Clocks ship to backers (est. 500 units/day)
  • 3-day shipping to US backers
  • 1-3 weeks for International shipments 

 

 

Why Indiegogo?

Crowdfunding gives us the freedom to run our business exactly how we want. The revenue we generate here makes it possible for us to continue developing products without seeking outside funding. This allows us to focus on doing what we love: designing and bringing our visions to life, supported by an incredible community of like minded individuals that appreciate our philosophy.

We also deeply value the ability to have the Kickstarter community influence our products (who’s our next musician?!?) through feedback and direct participation in our design process.

 

Shipping and sales tax

We will ship complete units from our fulfillment facility in Denver, CO to anywhere in the US. All units will be shipped in a custom container engineered from high density cardboard and recycled protective foam.  Packages will be sent via UPS Ground, tracking included, for 1-5 day delivery at a cost of $14/clock. 

If state sales tax is applicable on your purchase, we'll follow up with you post-campaign with the cost and a method of payment.

 

International orders

OneClock will be available for delivery to select countries around the world. As shipping, handling, local charges and custom fees vary from country to country, please select your reward to see specific details about your location.

Customer is responsible for all applicable taxes or duties that may occur in your location. OneClock is shipped delivery duties unpaid (DDU).

You can find a complete list of the shipping costs per pledge as well as full shipping and handling details in our FAQs section. If you’d like to back the project but your country isn’t listed in the dropdown menu upon checkout, or if you have any further questions about shipping, please feel free to contact us. 

 

Support

 

Further reading 

Here are a few of our guiding lights that helped inform the design of OneClock:

Why Sleep Matters

Why Snoozers Are Losers

Blue light has a dark side

71% of Americans who own smartphones sleep with them

One in three kids under 18 wake up to check their mobile device at least once a night

More on alarm fatigue

Devices create a mental state of “threat vigilance” in the bedroom

Waking sounds and sleep inertia

 

Risks and challenges

Our team has invaluable industry experience bringing hardware products to market from concept through manufacturing. Over our 20+ years in the industry, we’ve learned first hand about the challenges, and rewards, at each step in the process.

From Day 1, we stated our desire to ONLY launch a crowdfunding campaign if we were 100% confident in our ability to deliver the product we had envisioned. We are proud to say that our prototype has been through several iterations of testing and is now in the final stages of refinement. We have also engaged all the necessary partners to bring OneClock to life - musicians, parts suppliers, assembly, fulfillment and everything in between. 

As with any hardware product - particularly when mass manufacturing - there is always a risk of delays, with possible issues arising in any point of the design, manufacturing and certification processes. However, we have identified risk areas, mitigated against these, and accounted for adequate testing time at every stage of our upcoming process. And, no matter how much we try and control all the variables, things can still go awry. If they do, we promise to give you full transparency into the issues and solve them in a way that leaves our backers happy and proud to support our company.

 

Environmental commitments

Lifetime warranties typically come with a lot of fine print that often amounts to nothing more than a marketing ploy. We’re matching our high end materials and hand built quality with a robust and straightforward policy. Our 20-year warranty ensures OneClock will be free from defects in materials and workmanship and operate as advertised.
story_txt:
OneClock is not an alarm clockLet’s save the alarms for fires, burglaries and submarines. We researched the best tones, tempos and frequencies to wake you up. Then we asked Jon Natchez from The War on Drugs to create a collection of musical compositions to lift you out of sleep in a peaceful, more natural way. OneClock is as much a piece of art as it is a functional household object.   Preorder to save 14% and get priority shipping  As seen in Sleep is great, but waking up is betterWe believe the only thing better than sleep is waking up. Because that’s where all the love starts. We believe in waking up better, so you can live better and breathe better and think better. Take back the bedroomMake your bedroom your sanctuary, without all the gadgets and devices that seem to sneak stress and distractions in between the sheets with you. OneClock is designed to disconnect, so all you have is you, your thoughts, and perhaps a significant other in bed with you - human, canine, or feline. Sonic science to start your dayThere’s a growing body of sonic research outlining the importance of waking up correctly and its effect on our mood and behavior. OneClock’s sounds are designed to wake you gently and reliably. Music composed by Grammy-winning artistsYou deserve better, so we created a new way to wake up with Jon Natchez, renowned composer and multi-instrumentalist of The War on Drugs. OneClock’s compositions are original recordings, not available elsewhere, and feature 20+ instruments that create a warm, organic and non-digital soundtrack to start your day. Jon won a 2018 Grammy as a member of The War on Drugs, was formerly a member of the acclaimed group Beirut, and has performed and recorded with David Byrne, St. Vincent, Taylor Mac, Father John Misty, and Liza Minnelli, among many others. He has composed scores for numerous films and has contributed to over 100 albums, composing and arranging as well as playing more than 30 instruments. 

 
Listen to the music samples

Video includes 7 samples, starting at the top of each minute

 
AI music generator

Humans can suffer from alarm fatigue and become desensitized to sounds they hear over and over. When OneClock’s alarm is activated, our AI music generator will randomly choose one of the songs stored on the clock’s solid state memory and remix it by adjusting the levels of each instrument or vocal for infinite combinations. It’s subtle, but noticeable and you will never hear OneClock’s songs the same way twice. Ever.

 
Timeless analog design + slow-tech philosophy
Warm, organic, minimalism meets an analog and tactile experience that’s built to last a lifetime with high quality, sustainably sourced components. In our current culture of Amazon/Walmart convenience, the approach we took was unorthodox. We prioritized design and quality over price to create a product that is enjoyable to experience amongst other cherished heirloom objects in your home.  

Extruded, precision machined, solid aluminum enclosure. Available in black, red, and white powder coat. Solid rift sawn white oak, natural hand-oiled finish.
 
Multi-function waking knob 

Seamlessly toggle between the current time and waking time. Set, activate and turn off the alarm. Located on the front of the clock (where you need it).
 
Swiss designed clock movement   

Stepper motor technology used in automotive gauges, offers precise and silent operation.
 
Speaker  

Waking music plays through a high dynamic range BMR from Tectonic Labs (4 Ω / 10 Watts / 100Hz – 20kHz full range).
 
Clock face 

The glass face is scratch resistant, low glare, and easy to read.
 
Screen-free   

We left out the touchscreens and buttons in favor of knurled, solid aluminum knobs that provide a tactile, analog feel and precise control reminiscent of high-end audio components.
 
Night light   

Touch sensitive enclosure activates a low-light, warm glow, that turns off after five seconds. 
 
Alarm indicator   

Low-light integrated LED assures you that your OneClock is set to wake you up. It's just bright enough to see at night, but not any more than you need. 
 
Reliable power 

Power is supplied by a fixed USB cable with a two-prong standard wall outlet AC adaptor. In the event of a power outage, OneClock has an internal backup system that stores your time and alarm settings for up to two weeks.
 

 
Product videos

 


 

What people are saying

story:
Feels is the most affordable and easiest to install smart video doorbell, allows you to monitor who comes to your front door, screen and communicate with visitors in real-time. You can answer the door even when you're not home. 

The unique pull ring design adds an elegant touch to the doorbell. An advanced 4K high-definition smart camera with intelligent dynamic capture and IR night vision is equipped. It also comes with an indigenously developed TWS speaker, which can be used as a Bluetooth speaker individually and for two-way conversations with the doorbell. Feels provides 24/7 professional, reliable and convenient wireless security for your home or office. 

Feels supports two types of storage methods — 64G SD card recording and cloud storage. Besides, one year of free cloud storage will be given to every backer during the crowdfunding period.

 

 

The Feels Video Doorbell allows you to see, hear and speak to visitors from anywhere using your smartphone. No matter in the daytime or at night, you can see what happen around your door clearly. With Feels smart doorbell, you'll be connected and closer to home than ever before.

 

 

With the motion detection to ensure your home safety, Feels Smart Doorbell will send instant push notifications directly to your smartphone as long as it detects moving objects or motion at your door. And you can change the doorbell setting in the APP, to set the frequency of notifications, decide when to get notifications about the activity the camera spots and what kinds of activity it should look for. Give you some peace and quiet  without disturbing your life.

 

Instant motion detection, you will never miss any doorway motion. Getting APP push notification, you can remotely talk to whoever comes to your doorstep.

 

Apart from talking to someone instantly via the APP, you can even record video anytime to improve home security and share on your social media with people around the world. 

 

Feels Smart Doorbell is specifically set to ultra low-power consumption which makes the battery lasts longer and can be used for a year with just one single charge. It can work 24/7 to monitor your home, identifying dangerous automatically. Never breakdown. No vacation. No need to pay salary. It is even better than a security guard.

 

Just like other similar products on the market, the data can be stored locally using SD card storage. The difference is that Feels Smart Doorbell also offers a powerful and secure cloud storage service. You no longer have to worry about running out of storage.

 

 

 

Equipped with a TWS speaker, you can answer your doorbell via the speaker and it also works as a bluetooth stereo sound system. Allows you to play your tune and set your alarm clock. The LED breathing light on the speaker will even flash according to the music rhythm. 

 

 

With a high resolution camera and up to 4K HD picture quality, Feels Smart Doorbell can easily detect the doorway situation. HDR photography ensures that shadows aren't blacked out and provides user with a clear picture at low-light situations.

 

The 160° ultra-wide view makes it possible to easily capture every corner. The 3-Meter motion sensing distance means you won’t be disturbed by irrelevant information and also means you won’t miss out any motion on your doorstep.

 

Complete process monitoring through integrated infrared night vision imaging system. 6 infrared cameras can see clearly at night and any thief has nowhere to hide.

 

With IP65 waterproof rating, Feels Smart Doorbell can stand for any extreme weather and operate in any condition from -20°C ~ 60°C. Whether heavy rain or snow, it will not damage the doorbell. Feels - your personal security guard throughout the year.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Add On：

story:
Now Available to Order on Our Website, 

www.u-tec.com!

 

 

Ultraloq UL1 Smart Lock

Open your door through fingerprint identity, key fob or smartphone Bluetooth proximity sensor.

 

Versatile, affordable & user-friendly smart home security allows multiple ways to access and the flexibility to grant access remotely to completely control who comes and goes in your home.

 

 

With the Ultraloq UL1 Smart Home Lock, we've used our experience from our previous generations of key-less entry systems and kept everything from installation to daily use simple, convenient and user friendly. 

 

As Seen In:  

 

Ultraloq Features at a Glance

UL1 is sleeker and smarter than our previous keyless entry system and packed with more technology.

 

 

Ultraloq UL1 is engineered with the patent pending technology for the newest and highest grade security:

 

 

An Upgrade From Our First Generation

We've taken our first generation UL3 BT smart lock (pictured below) and packed more technology into a smaller design.

 

 

We've used our experience from retailing the UL3 model in Walmart and Home Depot to design our second generation key-less smart lock entry system with a few notable upgrades:

  • ​SIZE - Smaller, more compact and discretely disguised as a traditional lock.
  • PRICE - Cost half the UL3 and packs much more tech into a smaller body.
  • SETUP - Install with 5 screws on nearly any door in your home or apartment.

 

$50K Stretch Goal Unlocked: AutoBolt 

Ultraloq AutoBolt provides you with heavy duty dual security through deadbolt and latch which is different than any other lock. AutoBolt (requires your existing deadbolt) is a smart deadbolt interior part that connects wirelessly to your UL1 and grants access with one touch for convenience. When you gain entry through fingerprint, key fob, or Bluetooth, your AutoBolt will automatically unlock. Check the lock status at any time with the smartphone app, so you'll never worry about leaving the door unlocked again. 

 

AutoBolt is designed to fit both the UL1 colors beautifully with black color and satin nickel highlights.

 

 

 

  

 

Use Your Unique Fingerprint

 Your fingerprint is completely unique to you. It cannot be stolen, forgotten, or impersonated, making for the utmost security. Ultraloq uses the most sophisticated biometric fingerprint technology available today for identification in half a second!

 

 

The fingerprint sensor will wake automatically once you place your finger on it and is conveniently positioned to accompany your natural hand position. One seamless action allows you to wake the sensor, read your fingerprint, and unlock your door.

 

 

 

Bluetooth Proximity Detection

The Bluetooth compatibility allows you to ditch your keys for your smartphone! Because you already carry your phone with you everywhere, we've made it even more useful. You'll never have to worry about losing your keys, forgetting combinations or unauthorized duplicating of your key.

 

  

 

 

Quick Tap Entry

 For those who don't use a smartphone, UL1 can be unlocked with a contactless key fob. Once you present the key fob in the vicinity of handle, the door will instantly unlock. This key fob utilizes 13.56MHz frequency smart technology for fast and accurate identification. If you ever lose your key fob, you can easily delete in the app so it will no longer have access.

 

  

 

 

Monitor Access Remotely

The Ultraloq app is designed for iOS and Android devices and gives you easy door access and tracking abilities. You can view the access logs in the app for detailed information about who has opened your door, at what times, and how they gained access.

 

 

Add or delete users any time with the ability of adding up to ​100 users.

  

 

5 Screws & Done!

Ultraloq UL1 is a painless installation process with no wiring and no drilling. The simple installation takes minutes and only five screws. The handle is reversible for compatibility with both left handed and right handed doors.

 

 

UL1 fits any standard American door of regular thickness, regardless of material.

 

 

  

 

When Safety is Paramount

We don't take security lightly, on our homes or in our data storage. That's why Ultraloq uses a dual encryption process. The Ultraloq uses Bluetooth 4.0 to communicate between your smartphone and the UL1 lock. These communications are encrypted using bank level 128-bit AES via an embedded hardware coprocessor.

 

 

The second layer of protection is the Dynamic Key. This key code is randomized for every single data transfer. Even if somebody were able to capture the AES encrypted data, the Dynamic Key protection would make it impossible to for them to unlock your door.

  

 

 

Bridge Your Home to Your Life

With the optional Ultraloq Bridge upgrade, you can control entry to your UL1 or previous generation, UL3. Simply plug the Bridge into an outlet in your home, and you can grant access to guests and visitors via an eKey for specific dates or periods of time with no monthly fees!

 

Bridge is ideal for granting temporary access in any situation. You never have to leave work to rush home again. With the Bridge accessory, you can even receive smartphone notifications when someone opens your door for ultimate safety and peace of mind.

  

 

 

Specify Your Level of Security

UL1 features three different locking statuses for your convenience. You can set your lock to one of the following settings:

Auto Relock: UL1 will automatically relock after every time the door is used. Approved guests can unlock using fingerprint ID, key fob, or smartphone. You'll never have to wonder if you forgot to lock the door again.

Privacy Lockout: In this setting, UL1 can only be unlocked by an administrator. This setting is ideal for when you leave on vacation or business trip.

Free Passage: When you're entertaining or know that there will be people in and out of the house frequently, you can set your UL1 to this setting for free passage.

 

  

  

 

Resilient Enough for Outside Doors

The UL1 is designed to be weather resistant so that you can use it on in and outside facing doors. The fingerprint sensor is completely waterproof, scratch proof, and dust-proof, protected by a layer of quartz with high hardness. The solid zinc alloy lock body can endure harsh winters and rainy monsoons. The fingerprint sensor and the outside lock body is completely sealed to keep water and dust from penetrating any electronics.

 

  

 

 

Match Your Home Aesthetic

Ultraloq UL1 is thoughtfully crafted with style and functionality in mind. This handle looks clean and compact on any door with smooth surfaces, curved edges, and narrow size. While the main function of UL1 is safety, we wanted to create a lock that brings usability, simplicity and elegance together.

 

  

 

UL1 Fits Any Door, in Size & Style!

 

  

 

 

One Year Battery Life

To ensure that you're never locked out because of a dead battery, UL1 operates on a dual battery system as well as sends your phone warnings if the battery is low. Thank to Bluetooth 4.0's ultra low power consumption technology, Ultraloq can be powered by four AA batteries with more than one year of battery life through regular use. 

 

 

Two AA batteries are in the indoor door handle & two AA batteries are in the outdoor handle.

 

  

 

Real Time Light Response

The tricolor LED indicator shows authorized or denied access, Bluetooth connectivity, and locking status.

 

  

 

Use Cases

  • Hands Full: Never worry about fumbling around for your keys again. Ultraloq is completely keyless, so you don't have to worry about carrying anything with you. 
  • Forgot to Lock Your Door: No worries! Ultraloq UL1 can auto lock your door for you so your home is always safe.
  • Any Room: Ultraloq UL1 is ready for indoor or outdoor use but also can be used on any room inside your house that you want to keep private, like offices, wine cellar, or storage room.
  • Guests: With UL1 and Bridge, you never have to leave work to let in the maintenance worker or your dog walker. Bridge lets you grant access to to guests, the babysitter, or a service provider from anywhere for any amount of time.
  • Airbnb Home Owners: UL1 and Ultraloq Bridge are the perfect accessories for Airbnb hosts, giving you the ability to grant access to your guests for the period of their stay without physically being there. You can save time and money, while keeping your guests happy and your home safe. With UL1 you never have to worry about guests returning or copying their keys and have the added luxury of keeping private rooms or closets locked away from guests.
  • Smartphone Notifications: UL1 can send notifications directly to your phone if someone opens your door. See who it is and how they opened the lock for ultimate safety and peace of mind. Now you know whenever your children arrive home.

  

  

 

 

  Ultraloq UL1 Bluetooth Lock ASSA ABLOY Fingerprint Lock Kwikset Keypad Lock
