story:
No more mess and clutter around TV.

Dabby is a radically new home entertainment device that brings a revolutionary way of consuming entertainment with a beautiful voice-controlled device paired with a dongle, thereby obsoleting all your streaming devices, remotes, and smart speakers.

 

It plays ANY CONTENT on your TV - just ask: “Dabby, play….”

Have you always struggled to remember the exact episode of a show you want to watch or the specific scene of a movie? With Dabby's unique deep search technology you can now easily find the exact episode or scene based on a description of what you remember.

 

 

It will instantly play it on your TV. 

 

 

Dabby can play anything — contents from thousands of free sources like YouTube, VUDU, TubiTV etc, paid sources like Netflix, HBO etc, social media sources like Instagram, Twitch etc and even your cable subscriptions like XFinity, Sling etc.

 

The best part - you don’t need to know where to play from, no need to download any apps - just ask Dabby to play something and it will find the right source and play them on your TV instantly (no more app switching and downloading).

 

 

 

Dabby can play from 1000s of free online sources, but you can also connect your existing subscription services easily if you want to aggregate those on top of the free sources.

 

 

Featured In 

 

 

It will even play your social video streams like Twitch and Instagram - no other device/platform does that.

 

 

Watch Twitch on TV and see comments on the Dabby Touch screen.

 

 

Watch Instagram videos and see the comments on Dabby.

 

 

And yes, you can WATCH TOGETHER even when you are apart.

 

 

 

You can now watch shows together with your friends & family who live in a different city, state or even country, while on a video call via Dabby. Experience the shows as if you are in the same room. You can control the content on both TVs simultaneously with touch or voice commands.

You can also listen to music together and share your holiday pictures with your friends & family.

 

And what if you don’t know what you feel like watching?

 

 

We understand that you don't always know what you want to watch. 

In this case, you can say for example "Dabby, play a horror movie". The deep search engine will find the relevant sources for the horror movies and the ranking algorithm will use the user's taste profile, viewing habits and history and the user subscriptions to rank the sources accordingly. 

Dabby will show recommend content from a variety of apps and online sources on the Dabby Touch screen and you will be able to create watchlists and add content to your favorites.

 

As long as it's online, Dabby can play it. Simply connect it to WiFi and enjoy all content available online at your fingertips (pun intended).

 

Scrubbing on Dabby touch will control the content on your TV

 

Flicking content from Dabby to TV

You can simply flick the content you want to watch and it'll instantly play them on TV.

 

 

Dabby is portable & can transition from one room to the other. 

 

 

It is equipped with proximity sensors to detect that you are moving away from your TV and it will switch content to the Dabby Touch Screen until you approach another TV that has a Dabby dongle plugged in.

 

 *Make sure to play with sound to really experience the demo.

Watch Dabby in action against the FireTV - turn your sound on to experience the demo.

  *This is a previous Dabby prototype that has a different camera than the new version. 

 

It goes far beyond what the other devices on the market currently do and support.

  •  *Content limited to apps built for streaming device 
  • **Example: “Play the clip from Avengers where Thanos snaps his fingers”

Dabby searches across a wide variety of content on the web using its proprietary content AI engine that has been trained to identify sources related to entertainment. Users can watch any content from:

  •  paid sources like Netflix, Hulu etc (simply connect your credentials), 
  •  free sources like Youtube, Vudu, Vimeo, TubiTV etc, and 
  •  social media sources like Instagram, Twitch, TikTok etc. 
  • it can even find Indie content sources like patriots.com, therams.com and 1000s of other video websites. 

It will always find the best available options for what you want to watch.

 

 

 

We first started with building the software, this is when we created Dabkick 4 years ago. This set us off for the natural progression into hardware, which is where Dabby comes in. 

 

Dabby is a portable wireless touchscreen home entertainment device. It has a 7" HD screen, 32GB storage and has a battery life of 12 hours from being fully charged. 

Dabby has the following proprietary technologies

  • Content AI engine
  • Deep Search Engine
  • Personalized media ranking engine
  • Deep Media Extractor
  • Media Indexer
  • Hybrid Payments Platform
  • Custom Video Playback
  • Dabby Touch and Dabby Dongle have a custom operating system and a custom browser

 

Please review the rewards and pledges below. We will be announcing our stretch goals once we hit our goal. 

Choose between white or all black.

 

 

We consider ourselves very lucky to have been joined by some amazing people from the industry all equipped with invaluable experience that together makes Dabby so exciting. 

 

 

More info about our executive team:

 

Serial entrepreneur with a successful exit before founding DabKick. Prior to founding startups, he was a senior research engineer working with companies like Oracle, HP and Sun Microsystems.

Experience before DabKick:

  • - Founder, Snapstick (acquired by Rovi for $35M in 2 years)
  • - Senior Research Engineer, Oracle
  • - Senior Research Engineer, HP
  • - Research Engineer, Sun Microsystems

 

Highly accomplished technology executive. At Amazon, he led the team that brought products like FireTV, Echo Show, Echo Look and at Apple, he led the team that brought graphics to Macintosh. He worked closely with influential leaders like Steve Jobs, John Rubinstein, Tony Fadell.

Experience before DabKick:

  • - VP of Computer Vision Products, Amazon/Lab126 for 7 years
  • - VP of Graphics, Audio and Video for Mac, Apple for 14 years

 

Seasoned executive specialized in sales and business development for around 30 years in the industry. Prior to DabKick, he worked with top companies that built semiconductors, WiFi chips, VR and AR products, Computer Vision products. 

Experience before DabKick

  • - VP of North American Sales, Aquantia
  • - VP of Business Development, Qualcomm
  • - VP of American Sales, PrimeSense (acquired by Apple)
  • - VP of Sales, Marvell Semiconductors

 

Stanford trained Product Designer with diverse design and manufacturing experience including Medical Device Design, Toy Design, Consumer Electronics. As a Design Engineer Rakmun was responsible for the budgeting, sculpting, safety, function and prototypes for 30% of the Burger King Kid's Meal toys, shipping over 8,000,000 units per year. He went on to broadened to attain a Master's Degree in Industrial Design while continuing to build his professional portfolio with internships and freelance work for several organizations including NASA and Hallmark. Following his master's work, Rakmun developed Industrial Design, UI/UX, branding and pitch videos for wearable products at Read/Write Labs. 

  • Designer in Residence, ReadWrite Labs
  • Design Engineer, Equity Marketing
  • R&D Engineer, Applied Medical

 

Gopal is an engineer and an entrepreneur with a passion for innovation. In his previous job, he has led a team in creating award-winning consumer products. Gopal brings extensive Engineering R&D and leadership experience, including over 15 years at Xerox and Xerox/PARC.

Experience before DabKick:

  • Co-Founder and CEO, ThinkOptics, Inc.
  • Engineering and R&D leadership roles (Xerox and Xerox/PARC)
  • Business Development roles (Rackable Systems, Inc., Compaq - now HP - Systems Research Center)

We have also had some great external support along the journey: 

 

Check out our Founder, Balaji and our Senior Product Designer, Rakmun, showing you all the  features we have spoken about in our campaign page.   

 

Look how far we have come... 

The first sketches

 

Our first ideas about the shape of Dabby

 

One of the first "boxy" demo units in action

 

Next iteration

 

And another one - this one had a retractable camera! But we realized it won't be do-able in time, but maybe in version two...

 

Our VP of Product, Max, holding the most recent Dabby demo unit that you see across the campaign page

 

Parts of a newer demo unit

 

More details on how it works?

  • When a user issues a command, say, ‘Dabby, play the final moments of NBA finals last game’, the Dabby touch will hand off the transcribed text to the content AI engine (in the cloud) that will break it down to understand what category of entertainment the user is looking for. Once the category is identified, the AI engine will further analyse the intent and the classification by working tightly with the Media Indexer. As a result, the content AI engine will create 20 to 25 parameters on an average for any given query and hands this off to the Deep Search Engine.                                                                                                                                                                                                             
    • The deep search engine will then use those parameters to find the relevant content sources. Once the content sources are identified, the search engine will then hand it off to the ‘media ranking engine’. The ranking algorithm will use the taste profile that was created for each user, viewing habits, and the user subscriptions and sort the sources accordingly to make it more personalized.
    • Once the sources are ranked, the content AI engine sends them back to Dabby touch. Dabby touch will then inform Dabby dongle to play them directly from their websites. Dabby dongle will use the custom video playback engine to fetch the source and play the videos in full screen seamlessly.

 

Join Our Community

For example, you could be watching a movie in your living room and when you are ready to move to your bedroom, you can simply ask Dabby to pause in your living room and ask Dabby to resume playing in your bedroom. Or even better simply take Dabby with you and the content will move from TV to Dabby to TV again using our proximity sensors. It can even control different content on TVs in different rooms! With one Dabby and multiple dongles, you can have Dabby play different content on each TV in the house. You can play kids' channels in the living room while you watch a movie in the bedroom just by telling Dabby what to play and in which room.  And then there is more. SECOND SCREEN.
 

 
Scroll through game highlights when watching the game or even better watch the highlights video on Dabby screen while the game plays on the big TV screen.
 

 
Music player with deep search
 

 

Dabby can also deep search for music, as well as podcasts. Dabby Touch will then display the video content or you can stream it to your TV. This can also be done while doing video chat.
 
Portable standalone device
 

 
Dabby can be used as a standalone device to watch content. Simply, ask Dabby to play the content on the Dabby screen so you can watch anywhere in the house and outside.
 

 
1. HD video calls - you can chat on the device or on your TV.
2. Video assistant - you can say, “Dabby, tell me more about San Francisco”, and Dabby will show you places to check out in San Francisco and will play a tourist video on TV. You can browse tourist activities on the touch display and buy tickets.
3. Your new sous-chef - you can ask “Dabby, show me how to make chicken pot pie", and Dabby will play the cooking video on TV while showing the step by step recipes and instructions on the touch display. You can also choose to buy those ingredients through Dabby. 
4. Digital photo frame - upload your photos to Dabby and display your favorite memories on Dabby.
 
SEE A COLLECTION OF SHORT DEMO VIDEOS TO SEE THE FEATURES ON OUR PROTOTYPE UNIT:

Once the category is identified, the AI engine will further analyse the intent and the classification by working tightly with the Media Indexer. As a result, the content AI engine will create 20 to 25 parameters on an average for any given query and hands this off to the Deep Search Engine.                                                                                                                                                                                                             
The deep search engine will then use those parameters to find the relevant content sources. Once the content sources are identified, the search engine will then hand it off to the ‘media ranking engine’. The ranking algorithm will use the taste profile that was created for each user, viewing habits, and the user subscriptions and sort the sources accordingly to make it more personalized.
Once the sources are ranked, the content AI engine sends them back to Dabby touch. Dabby touch will then inform Dabby dongle to play them directly from their websites. Dabby dongle will use the custom video playback engine to fetch the source and play the videos in full screen seamlessly.

 Join Our Community

story:
Sure, the old spirit level works fine. It's been around for almost 500 years after all. But let's face it, the aging population doesn't have the eyesight that it used to and that little bubble is getting harder to see. And honestly, now that you have a choice, which level would you choose? Yeah, we thought so. ;)

 

 

The LumiLevel’s 25 lights represent a viewing area that’s 10 times wider than a typical bubble vial. No more closing one eye when looking at this beauty. And better still, there’s no more interpretation required from the user. The lights show you when you’re perfectly level.

story:
Translations of this campaign, provided by our Partner Youkauf Media:
German (Deutsch)

Forged in supernovas and collapsing stars titanium is truly a metal of the gods, combining characteristics like lightness, strength, flexibility, resistance and much more. These characteristics make this material irreplaceable in the aerospace industry, but it reached out much further than that. Sternsteiger has combined this unique material with a core of stainless steel, crafted in the city of blades, therefore creating a unique kind of knives that totally change the game. 

The new Titanium Series is Sternsteiger's 2nd generation of titanium knives. The original series launched in 2015 and received a lot of positive customer recommendations, but the design had a lot of room for improvements.

We are proud to launch this 2nd generation here on Kickstarter and share these unique knives with our backers.

All these Prototype Titanium knives feature a full tang design. Meaning that the steel core reaches from the knives Point to the knives Butt. The steel core is made of a high wear resistant Carbon Stainless Steel (Type 5Cr15MoV) and the blade is coated with a 0.1 micrometer layer of titanium.

This thin layer of titanium bonds with the steel core increasing the blades overall strength. The hardness of the blade without the titanium coating is 58 Rockwell, with the added titanium layer and bonding the blade reaches 61±2 Rockwell.

Compared to the old series blade, which had only a hardness of 55 Rockwell at best, the blades of the new Titanium Series are not only thinner but also feature a reduced height. Both leading to a weight reduction of up to 12% in the case of the chef's knife version.

After the coating process, the blade is mirror polished by hand using a new nano-particle buffing technique. This buffing technique improves the blades resilience against sticky clippings, leading to a lotus effect on the blades surface. Therefore giving the knives their unique look while enhancing their cutting and slicing ability with greatly reduced friction.

In contrast to the old series, which were mechanically sharpened, the new blade is hand-sharpened with the unique Solinger Dünnschliff, which is a traditional diamond sanding technique unique to the German city of Solingen.
 

The Titanium knives come with a new special ergonomic handle designed for every hand shape or size. It's slightly angled inwards to your palm, providing a strong grip for any cuttings and improved grip in case the handle gets soaked.

The scales are now made of an anti-bacterial composite called Micarta, instead of fine wood, which features a nice wooden finish. The scales are joined with the tang using newly oriented 3 rivets.

 

As featured by

 

Here you can see the Titanium series in action and hear some testimony.
 


The above video is in German, but it shows very well how good the Titanium Series knives are. Here are some slow motion scenes from that clip:

The following video shows how sharp the Titanium Series knives are ... 

Prototype in curve paper cutting test:   "Sharp like a razor"

This Chef's Knife is an all-purpose kitchen knife that can be used for mincing, dicing and chopping. Due to its very light weight and eye-catching design this knife is also perfect for heavy duty work like cutting thicker vegetables and meat. 

Technical details: 

  • Blade characteristic: Chef's knife
  • The blade is 8 inches / 20 cm long
  • At its base the blade is 0.8 inches / ~2 mm
  • 5Cr15MoV stainless steel core
  • The blade is coated with a 0.1 micrometer layer of titanium
  • The blade is mirror polished
  • Sharpened using Solinger Dünnschliff
  • The knife weighs ~0.35 lbs / 158 g

Santoku blade geometry incorporates the sheep's foot tip. A sheep's foot design essentially draws the spine ("backstrap") down to the front, with very little clearance above the horizontal cutting plane when the blade is resting naturally from heel to forward cutting edge. Providing a more linear cutting edge, the Santoku has limited "rocking" travel (in comparison to a German/Western-style chef's knife). The Santoku may be used in a rocking motion; however, very little cutting edge makes contact with the surface due to the extreme radius of the tip and very little "tip travel" occurs due to the short cantilever span from contact landing to tip. An example of this limitation can be demonstrated in dicing an onion—a Western knife generally slices downward and then rocks the tip forward to complete a cut; the Santoku relies more on a single downward cut and even landing from heel to tip, thus using less of a rocking motion than Western-style cutlery.  

Technical details: 

  • Blade characteristic: Santoku
  • The blade is 7 inches / 18 cm long
  • At its base the blade is 0.8 inches / ~2 mm
  • 5Cr15MoV stainless steel core
  • The blade is coated with a 0.1 micrometer layer of titanium
  • The blade is mirror polished
  • Sharpened using Solinger Dünnschliff
  • The knife weighs ~0.34 lbs / 156 g

This knife features the same design as the Titanium Santoku Knife but adds another unique feature: a hollow edge. The unique characteristic of a hollow edge is several small cavities that get hammered into the blade in close proximity to each other. The purpose of these cavities is to prevent the adherence of particularly thin, greasy or otherwise sticky clippings, such as ham or cheese, on the knife and thus also to cut very thin slices without damage. 

This property is due to the reduction of the blade surface which comes into contact with the cut material. In the case of pure cheese knives, there are even holes in the blade instead of the cavities, which achieve the same effect. However, since the soft or very thin material can be entangled in the holes, holes are not universally applicable. Cavities, on the other hand, are a good compromise between reducing the surface of the blade and stabilizing the cut material. 

Based on the 1st generation our engineers improved the design of the hollow edges angle, which increases the cavities effect. The new cavities and edge angle dramatically improved the blades resilience against sticky clippings.In our 2nd generation, blades cutting curves has been decreased, which results in more sliding effect through the cuts.

 (Please see markings, inch sketch RIGHT )

Technical details: 

  • Blade characteristic: Santoku with hollow Edge
  • The blade inches/ 18 cm long
  • At its base, the blade is 0.8 inches / ~2 mm
  • 5Cr15MoV stainless steel core
  • The blade is coated with a 0.1-micrometer layer of titanium
  • The blade is mirror polished
  • Sharpened using Solinger Dünnschliff
  • The knife weighs ~0.34 lbs / 156 g

A paring knife is a small knife with a plain edge blade that is ideal for peeling and other small or intricate work (such as de-veining a shrimp, removing the seeds from a jalapeño, 'skinning' or cutting small garnishes). It is designed to be an all-purpose knife, similar to a chef's knife, except smaller.

Technical details: 

  • Blade characteristic: similar to Chef's knife
  • The blade is 3.5 inches / 10 cm long
  • At its base the blade is 0.8 inches / ~2 mm
  • 5Cr15MoV stainless steel core
  • The blade is coated with a 0.1 micrometer layer of titanium
  • The blade is mirror polished
  • Sharpened using Solinger Dünnschliff
  • The knife weighs ~0.2 lbs / 90 g

Sternsteiger is still a very young brand - ambitious and fast growing. We came to Kickstarter, because we want to spread the word and enable more people to experience our high quality knives that are manufactured in the famous city of Solingen in Germany, the "city of blades". 

Our mission is to revive the German steel-ware industry that has been decimated by the competition form the far east. With new ideas and strategies Sternsteiger is already now a known brand in the region.

The Titanium Series is a new product that gets its wide spread release through this campaign. All funds raised will be targeted to production and enhancing our production capabilities. 

The goal of 8.000 Euro (about 8.400 US$) is set low for a reason, The Funds generated will enable us to bring all above Titanium Prototypes to  Reality. we want to make sure we make it, and get these unique knives into your hands and kitchens. 

We hope you like our products and our mission, we'll be happy for every contribution to our efforts! to bring these from Prototypes into a Reality. Below you get an overview on the perks that we are offering!

The Knife 

You get 1 full size knife and you can choose from: 

  • Titanium Chef's Knife
  • Titanium Santoku Knife
  • Titanium Santoku Knife with hollow Edge
  • UNLOCKED: Titanium Nakiri Knife

In addition you receive  ...

  • 1 x Free Cleaning Cloth - Unlocked at the 9.000 Euro stretch goal!
  • 1 x Free Sharpening Stone - Unlocked at the 15.000 Euro stretch goal!

The Pair

You get 2 full size knives and can choose one of these variations:

  • 2 x Titanium Chef's Knife
  • 1 x Titanium Chef's Knife + 1 x Titanium Santoku Knife
  • 1 x Titanium Chef's Knife + 1 x Titanium Santoku Knife with hollow Edge
  • 2 x Titanium Santoku Knife
  • 1 x Titanium Santoku Knife + 1 x Titanium Santoku Knife with hollow Edge
  • 2 x Titanium Santoku Knife with hollow Edge
  • UNLOCKED: Combinations with the Titanium Nakiri Knife

In addition you receive ...

  • 1 x Free Cleaning Cloth - Unlocked at the 9.000 Euro stretch goal!
  • 1 x Free Sharpening Stone - Unlocked at the 15.000 Euro stretch goal!

The Hat Trick

You get 3 full size knives and you can choose one of these variations:

  • 3 x Titanium Chef's Knife
  • 2 x Titanium Chef's Knife + 1 x Titanium Santoku Knife
  • 2 x Titanium Chef's Knife + 1 x Titanium Santoku Knife with hollow Edge
  • 1 x Titanium Chef's Knife + 2 x Titanium Santoku Knife
  • 1 x Titanium Chef's Knife + 2 x Titanium Santoku Knife with hollow Edge
  • 3 x Titanium Santoku Knife
  • 2 x Titanium Santoku Knife + 1 x Titanium Santoku Knife with hollow Edge
  • 3 x Titanium Santoku Knife with hollow Edge
  • 2 x Titanium Santoku Knife with hollow Edge + 1 x Titanium Santoku Knife
  • 1 x Titanium Chef's Knife + 1 x Titanium Santoku Knife + 1 x Titanium Santoku Knife with hollow Edge
  • UNLOCKED: Combinations with the Titanium Nakiri Knife

Each order of "The Hat Trick" receives an additional ...

  • Titanium Paring Knife

and in addition you receive ...

  • 1 x Free Cleaning Cloth - Unlocked at the 9.000 Euro stretch goal!
  • 1 x Free Sharpening Stone - Unlocked at the 15.000 Euro stretch goal!

The Short

You receive 1 ... 

  • Titanium Paring Knife

and in addition you receive ...

  • 1 x Free Cleaning Cloth - Unlocked at the 9.000 Euro stretch goal!
  • 1 x Free Sharpening Stone - Unlocked at the 15.000 Euro stretch goal!

The Outfit

You get 1 full size knife and you can choose from: 

  • Titanium Chef's Knife
  • Titanium Santoku Knife
  • Titanium Santoku Knife with hollow Edge
  • UNLOCKED: Titanium Nakiri Knife

and you get 1 ...

  • Titanium Paring Knife

In addition you receive ...

  • 1 x Free Cleaning Cloth - Unlocked at the 9.000 Euro stretch goal!
  • 1 x Free Sharpening Stone - Unlocked at the 15.000 Euro stretch goal!

The Quartet (unlocked at 25.000 Euro stretch Goal)

You get 4 full size knives and you can choose one of these variations:

  • 4 x Titanium Chef's Knife
  • 3 x Titanium Chef's Knife + 1 x Titanium Santoku Knife
  • 3 x Titanium Chef's Knife + 1 x Titanium Santoku Knife with hollow Edge
  • 3 x Titanium Chef's Knife + 1 x Titanium Nakiri Knife
  • 2 x Titanium Chef's Knife + 2 x Titanium Santoku Knife
  • 2 x Titanium Chef's Knife + 2 x Titanium Santoku Knife with hollow Edge
  • 2 x Titanium Chef's Knife + 2 x Titanium Nakiri Knife
  • 1 x Titanium Chef's Knife + 3 x Titanium Santoku Knife
  • 1 x Titanium Chef's Knife + 3 x Titanium Santoku Knife with hollow Edge
  • 1 x Titanium Chef's Knife + 3 x Titanium Nakiri Knife
  • 4 x Titanium Santoku Knife
  • 3 x Titanium Santoku Knife + 1 x Titanium Santoku Knife with hollow Edge
  • 3 x Titanium Santoku Knife + 1 x Titanium Nakiri Knife
  • 4 x Titanium Santoku Knife with hollow Edge
  • 3 x Titanium Santoku Knife with hollow Edge + 1 x Titanium Santoku Knife
  • 3 x Titanium Santoku Knife with hollow Edge + 1 x Titanium Nakiri Knife
  • 2 x Titanium Santoku Knife with hollow Edge + 2 x Titanium Santoku Knife
  • 2 x Titanium Santoku Knife with hollow Edge + 2 x Titanium Nakiri Knife
  • 4 x Titanium Nakiri Knife
  • 3 x Titanium Nakiri Knife + 1 x Titanium Santoku Knife
  • 3 x Titanium Nakiri Knife + 1 x Titanium Santoku Knife with hollow Edge
  • 1 x Titanium Chef's Knife + 1 x Titanium Santoku Knife + 1 x Titanium Santoku Knife with hollow Edge + 1 x Titanium Nakiri Knife
  • etc.

Each order of "The Quartet" receives an additional ...

  • Titanium Paring Knife

and in addition you receive ...

  • 1 x Free Cleaning Cloth - Unlocked at the 9.000 Euro stretch goal!
  • 1 x Free Sharpening Stone - Unlocked at the 15.000 Euro stretch goal!

The Series (SPECIAL OFFER)

"The Series" contains the following:

  • 1 x Titanium Chef’s Knife
  • 1 x Titanium Santoku Knife
  • 1 x Titanium Santoku Knife with hollow Edge
  • 1 x Titanium Nakiri Knife
  • 1 x Titanium Paring Knife

and of course ...

  • 1 x Free Cleaning Cloth - Unlocked at the 9.000 Euro stretch goal!
  • 1 x Free Sharpening Stone - Unlocked at the 15.000 Euro stretch goal!

We compiled some nice stretch goals for you, our backers, that include some free extras for each backer and if we cross 25.000 Euro / 26.500 US$ we'll be adding another type of knives to the Titanium Series. 

 Details 

Nakiri Knife 

Nakiri Knives are Japanese-style vegetable knives and they have a straight blade edge suitable for cutting all the way to the cutting board without the need for a horizontal pull or push. These also have a very thin blade. This does not help with cutting small bones in fish or meat, but is useful for cutting vegetables. 

If we reach 25.000 € (about 26.500 US$) we'll be adding a Nakiri version of our Titanium Series to the options for the perks that include full-size knives. In case you like this knife better than those we have to offer from the start, you should still consider backing early to make sure we reach that mark. You'll make the final knife choices only after the campaign concludes and until it concludes you are able to withdraw your pledge. Of course, we hope you won't withdraw.

  

We hope with your SUPPORT we will be able to bring these 2nd generation Titanium Knives into reality .

We compiled some nice stretch goals for you, our backers, that include some free extras for each backer and if we cross 25.000 Euro / 26.500 US$ we'll be adding another type of knives to the Titanium Series.  Details 
 Nakiri Knife Nakiri Knives are Japanese-style vegetable knives and they have a straight blade edge suitable for cutting all the way to the cutting board without the need for a horizontal pull or push. These also have a very thin blade. This does not help with cutting small bones in fish or meat, but is useful for cutting vegetables. If we reach 25.000 € (about 26.500 US$) we'll be adding a Nakiri version of our Titanium Series to the options for the perks that include full-size knives. In case you like this knife better than those we have to offer from the start, you should still consider backing early to make sure we reach that mark. You'll make the final knife choices only after the campaign concludes and until it concludes you are able to withdraw your pledge. Of course, we hope you won't withdraw.  We hope with your SUPPORT we will be able to bring these 2nd generation Titanium Knives into reality .

story:
Featured in

 

Place The Light Where You Need It

An award winning design pendant lamp that allows you to move the light in any direction using simple paint gestures on your phone!

Instead of dimming the light in your room, you can adjust the direction of your light to place it where you need it. This allows to create any light setting with just one pendant lamp!

 

 

Indirect Light To Create The Perfect Mood

Direct light can sometimes be too bright or create unpleasant glare. Indirect lighting via the ceiling can create a very pleasant light ambience. However, currently available solutions can be very expensive and difficult to install. Our lamp is the first where you can easily upgrade any room to get indirect light with just one lamp! You can even choose multiple colors for the indirect light, to create the perfect mood for any situation and you don’t need additional colored mood lights anymore.

"Paint Your Light" For Intuitive Adjustment

The adjustment of the light is very easy with the free companion app. Just pick a color and paint the light in the desired direction. The more you paint, the brighter it gets, while the other parts of your room will stay dimmed. To give you a real-time feedback, the lamp will light-up immediately while you paint.

We use so-called “light scenes” to store your favorite light settings. You can store any setting as a light scene and come back to it with just one swipe in the app. The app also allows you to control several of our lamps and switch between them easily.

 

 

We believe that smart lighting products must be visually appealing and built with high quality materials. This is why we put a lot of effort into the design. The heat sink is made from anodized Aluminium and the powerful LEDs are covered behind a durable anti-glare diffuser. The lamp is designed and manufactured in Europe. The design already won the Silver Award at the 2015 London Design Award.

 

 

The lamp uses LED technology and has up to 4200 lumen output when fully illuminated. This is about as much light as a 300W incandescent bulb provides.

We use high-quality white LEDs that provide adjustable warm to cool light with one of the highest color-rendering index (CRI) on the market. In addition, it’s uplight has red, green, and blue LEDs to provide a full color mood light to the ceiling. The LEDs have a lifetime of up to 60.000 hours at full power, so that it will easily last over 10 years.

Installing the lamp is easy. It comes with a specially designed ceiling mount to fit it to any kind of flat ceiling surface. It has an universal power supply, so that it can be directly connected to any outlet on the ceiling.

 

Smart Home Functionality

Smart Learning

The lamp learns from your behavior by analyzing which light scenes you use during the course of a day. This helps it to predict the most likely light scene whenever it is turned on (automatically or using the light switch). For example, when you are going to the bathroom during the night, it will turn on the appropriate “dimmed” light scene to illuminate your way without blinding, or, when you watch TV most days at 8pm, it turns on your favorite TV light scene when you enter the room. If you are not satisfied with the lamp's suggested light scene, you simply swipe to the desired scene, which will improve the next prediction. You can, of course, turn this feature off, if you would like to use it in places where it is not desired.

Presence Detection

The lamp uses presence detection sensors to turn itself on when you enter the room in the dark. Whenever you leave the room, it turns itself off to save energy and protect the environment.

Click Detection

When you don’t have your phone with you but want to change to another light scene, you can do so by simply turning the light switch off and on again. The lamp recognizes this “click” and switches to the next light scene.

System Integration

The lamp is truly smart by itself and does not require additional devices such as hubs or switches. Nevertheless, we want it to be able to communicate with other smart home products and are therefore working on integrating it into 3rd party smart home systems. Our initial set of systems that the lamp will be able to communicate with “out of the box” is: Homey, Guh.IO and openHAB. Several others are already planned and will be announced in the upcoming months.

Whats's Next

This is all just the beginning! We have carefully engineered the lamp to include all relevant sensors and a future-proof bluetooth wireless module, so that we can add new features through our regular software updates. We have many great ideas on our roadmap and are eager to bring them in your hands as soon as possible!

 

What Makes The Lamp Unique?

Our lamp is much more than just another smart lamp. We have put thousands of hours of engineering into the development to make it the ultimate smart lamp. Specially designed electronics control over 300 white and colored LEDs individually and several sensors interact with the environment. Our patent-pending optics realize the directional lighting effect without any moving parts in the lamp. The carefully crafted heat sink is integral part of the overall product design, keeping the LEDs cool and ensuring a long lifetime.

Some Of Our Prototypes

We have spent the past year designing, prototyping, coding, testing and iterating to develop our lamp. With each iteration we were able to improve the design as well as the technology.

Incandescent ? Smart Bulb ? Smart Lamp

Due to the ban on incandescents, most light bulb manufacturers started developing smart LED bulbs. At Luke Roberts, we think that these bulbs are only a transitional technology that will vanish soon and that LED lamps, such as ours, are the future of smart lighting.

Smart Bulbs:

 

  • Smart bulbs require additional fixtures for each bulb
  • Light output of a single smart bulb is rather low
  • One smart bulb can only produce one color and brightness at a time
  • Smartness and advanced features require a hub and Internet connection

Smart Lamp:

 

  • Full LED fixture - not just a bulb
  • About as bright as 4 smart bulbs to illuminate even larger rooms
  • Independently controllable up- and downlight gives you unprecedented flexibility
  • Allows you to place the light in different directions
  • Heat sink is big enough to keep LEDs cool and ensure long lifetime
  • Smartness is in the lamp, it does not require a hub nor internet connection

 

The Team

Our team combines 20+ years of experience in electronics and software development, product design, as well as 25+ years of experience in the lighting industry.

The two co-founders, Lukas and Robert, are both engineers, experienced in software and hardware development and worked several years in industry and management consulting before. Lukas, for example, developed parts for a particle accelerator at the international research facility CERN in Switzerland before and Robert developed software to enhance critical business processes.

Our advisory board combines deep industry know-how as well as strategic and sales expertise.

Timeline

 

 

 

FAQ

What is the cable length?
We offer the lamp with cable lengths between 1 and 4 meters (3.3 to 13.2 ft). The preferred cable length will be collected after the end of the campaign in the fulfillment survey. Furthermore, the ceiling mount will allow to wind-up and hide up to 1m (3.3 ft) of cable. So if you select, e.g. a 2 m cable, you can adjust the height between 1 and 2 meter from the ceiling. The minimal recommended distance from the ceiling is 20 cm (0.7 ft).
 
 

Thank you for supporting us!

 

Disclaimer: Final product specifications are subject to changes during production optimization. iPhone, Apple, and Apple logo are registered trademarks of Apple Inc. Android is a trademark of Google Inc. Arduino is a trademark of Arduino LLC. Raspberry Pi is a trademark of the Raspberry Pi Foundation. All other product names, logos, and brands are property of their respective owners.

story:
Working in bed or on the couch has become more normal than going into the office during the quarantine time. However, if you've ever tried to use a laptop while sitting on a couch, bed, or chair, you know how uncomfortable it could be. 

Fold Back to a Board In Seconds.

Devised to be a lap desk and a laptop stand, iSwift Pi is a game changer, which makes you feel cozy while having a good posture when you are navigating a new WFH situation.

 

Video

 

 

 

 

iSwift Pi has two triangle legs that can be folded flat or extended to give you a raised surface to work from, making sure you have a nice and comfortable time using your laptop at bed, sofa or anywhere.

 

The solid legs work great whether you place it on the bed while you work, or on a table to get a suitable angle to work from while standing. 

 

The angle raised by the stand varies depending on the thickness of the devices.

Dedicated stopper prevents laptops from sliding off.

There are four angles that you can adjust to find the perfect position while working. It means reducing the risk of repetitive stress injury such as neck and back strain, which happens when you do something mundane like typing on a keyboard over and over again.

As iSwift Pi is 0.2-inch in thickness and 40 ounces in weight, you can stow it anywhere you want. Just slide it in your desk organizer or right below your pillow, saying goodbye to those heavy and bulky lap desk and stand.

 

Ideal working companion for digital nomads.

In addition, you can carry it just like your file folder when mobile working, adding nothing extra on the go.

 

The premium PU material is extremely durable, water-resistant and can be easily wiped clean by towels.

Premium PU material.

Made to last and ready to take on whatever the day brings, helping you do your best work.

 

As we all know, triangles are the most stable structure. iSwift Pi is sturdy enough to sustain a weight of 44 lbs owing to the bottom support of its two triangle legs.  

Magnets built in the frame help reinforce the stability of the structure, avoiding the unnecessary wobble while you are typing in bed or on the desk.

iSwift Pi is compatible with laptops  (up to 17.3 inches) and tablets at any size in your hands.

*NOTE*

The iSwift Pi in forest green is made of premium PU leather which is different from regular.

 

Spending our workday in bed or on the couch has become more normal than going into the office at this time. The problem is that working from bed isn't quite as comfortable as it appears to be.

Our team, therefore, created iSwift Pi to elevate our working experience no matter where you are. 

With the achievement of combining comfort and flexibility for the iSwift Pi, we couldn’t wait to bring it to life, for all the people who are finding a best working situation at home.

 

Attention: 

iSwift Pi is only available on Kickstarter currently. If you find any other identical product that are sold on different platforms, please send us the link and don't place the order since they are definitely a scam. 

 Our website for your reference: https://iswift.us/

story:
We started Clean-tech on a mission to protect the people and spaces we love, so we can all get back to life. We partnered with global pioneers in science, research, engineering, and manufacturing to bring this technology to life.

 

Re-open businesses, provide employee safety, and prevent putting people at risk.

Provide customers with the comfort and confidence to enter shared environments.

Keep your home safe, even when it's become a classroom or boardroom.



Clean-tech is designed to sanitize the air around you, while you're there. Unlike UV-C solutions found in hospitals, or other UV-C devices that can damage your eyes and skin - everything happens inside the device. There's absolutely zero light leak, so it's safe for your loved ones to co-workers.

Revolutionary design for maximum air exposure to UV-C light. The longer the air is exposed to UV-C light, the more cleaning power. That’s why our engineers created a vertical chamber to slow down the air and increase dosage time. The result? An industry leading 75% product height to UV-C light ratio while in the chamber.

 



Clean-tech uses an ultra powerful and high efficiency 254 nm UVC wavelength bulb that provides the right intensity, dose and duration that's needed to inactivate and destroy the outer proteins of microorganisms. (see FDA article here).

 

Filters that collect or trap particles and dust rather than destroying them. Airborne particles are much smaller than droplets and can linger in the air for longer. Air currents can also carry them longer distances.  

Invisible to the eye, there are harmful particles suspended in the air. These airborne particles cannot be removed with hand sanitizers and masks.  

 

Access the 9/16/2020 Lab Result 1

Access the 9/16/2020 Lab Result 2



 HEPA and UVC light technology has been a trusted technology for air purification from hospitals to airports for decades. Recent UVC break-throughs in manufacturing have made it possible for high quality UVC bulbs to enter the consumer market. Clean-tech's 2-Stage air purification rethinks the fundamentals by focusing on maximum UVC exposure time rather than just collecting pollution and maximizing air volume. 

 

Stage 1

Full room air purification begins with a HEPA 10 air filter removing larger particles and allergens to optimize the UVC effectiveness. Large particles will block the UVC light rays from deactivating microorganisms. This first stage is critical to cycling and purifying air at scale.

Stage 2

Air flows into the purifying chamber coated with ReflectTech mirror coating the optimal 360 degree equidistance from the bulb for a amplified UVC dosage at extremely high intensity. The mirror coating both reduces particles from adhering to the side of the chamber, but bounces and focuses the UVC 254μm wave length into the chamber. All air flowing through the device is sterilized.


 

UV LIGHT IS A PROVEN TECHNOLOGY USED IN HOSPITALS FOR YEARS

It’s used on Airplanes, Bus Terminals, and other Public Spaces. It cleans better than chemicals without damaging fabrics. The FDA (link to article) confirms that UV-C light at 254 nm is a trusted technology that is effective at inactivating microorganisms.

 




Our unique ReflectTech mirror coating when applied to stainless steel increases the reflectiveness by 30%. This means that the UV-C light is magnified inside of the sterilizing chamber.  The widened chamber slows down the air flow while exposing particles to maximum UV dosage. The coating also prevents particles from attaching to the sides of the chamber.

UVC light has been a proven cleaning technology trusted by hospitals, airports, bus terminals, and other public spaces. In fact, it cleans better than chemicals that damage fabrics. Safely sanitize the air around you with medical grade ultraviolet light that destroys microorganisms at the molecular level.

The ultraviolet rays destroy the molecular structure of DNA or RNA in the cells of microorganisms. 

Within the ultraviolet light, wavelengths known as UV-C, from 200 to 280 nanometers (nm) have been shown to be the most effective for disinfection. Reference: ies.org

 

"Why Spend $10's of Thousands to Retrofit your Office when you can Buy Clean-tech’s UVC Air Purifier unit?"

- Dr. Lee (Southern California based Dentist)


 

"That's why we offer UV hospital grade filtration, it's something safe so you can feel comfortable"

- Super 73 Showroom Team

Feel safe when waiting at the dentist or doctors office. Clean-tech is one of the first devices to provide medical grade UVC air purification when people are in the same room safely. 

Lobbies & Waiting Rooms

Retail Stores

Coffee Shops 

Gyms & Fitness Centers​

 

Working sample unboxing

Clean-tech is ready to be manufactured and shipped immediately.   

Specifications:

24W 254nm UVC Bulb

Mode 1 - Full Power: 58 decibel rating

Mode 2 - Low Power: 45 decibel rating

Replaceable HEPA filters will be available to be purchased directly through clean-tech.co

HEPA filters will last between 6-12 months depending on usage

story:
Petit Qoobo is a new sibling of Qoobo, Yukai Engineering's popular robotic pillow that wags its tail in response to one's touch. Petit Qoobo, which is one size smaller than Qoobo, reacts not only to the user's stroking but also to the surrounding natural soundscape – be it the sound of clapping or one’s voice. In addition, when you are cuddling Petit Qoobo, you'll be able to hear its "heartbeat."  We hope that this little one, reminiscent of skittish, young animals, will provide you with comfort and enrich your life. 

 

Qoobo was inspired by a Yukai designer’s wish for a healing presence at home that could comfort her at the end of a long day. When she proposed to create a pet-like robot during the company's internal makeathon camp in March 2017, we immediately decided to make it a reality by focusing on the animal's tail. This is how the Qoobo project began.

We paid particular attention to Qoobo's weight, size and texture, so it would feel comfortable and natural when you put it on your lap and cuddle it in your arms. We researched actual tails and developed a mechanism that reproduces lifelike movements. A year after the product's general market release in November 2018, Qoobo had already exceeded cumulative sales of 15,000 units, including the presale, in Japan and internationally. 

Then in July 2019, we launched the Petit Qoobo project in response to a fan's feedback that they wished to have a smaller, portable version of Qoobo that they could carry around wherever they go.

 

  • Wags its tail in response to one's touch

When caressed, it waves gently. When rubbed, it swings playfully. It occasionally wags just to say hello. Users can interpret Qoobo's varying responses however they like, and enjoy "heart-to-heart" communication with their robot.

We researched real tails and built a program which reproduces lifelike movements
For Petit Qoobo, we redesigned the mechanism to create tail movements that mimic those of small animals.

 

  • A portable size

We made Petit Qoobo small enough for you to keep it with you wherever you go. It fits perfectly in your bag or basket. You can even take it to the office!

 

  • Tail that reacts to sounds or voices

Petit Qoobo can get startled by loud sounds, or may wiggle its tail when it hears your voice.

Petit Qoobo's internal circuitry and programming are designed to produce varying tail movements based on the volume of sounds or voices.

 

  • A subtle heartbeat

You can feel Petit Qoobo’s subtle heartbeat. Cuddle it, put it on your lap, or by your bedside. You can feel the presence – or subtle vibrations – of Petit Qoobo, even if you are not looking directly at it.

Fine controlled actuator to replicate a heartbeat

 

A design that leaves a “blank space” for the imagination​

In designing Qoobo, we removed all of an animal's physical elements but the tail to leave room for users to freely imagine their Qoobo's appearances and personalities.

In the user's mind, Qoobo could be a “dog,” a “cat,” or even a “rabbit.”

When creating Petit Qoobo, we focused on designing the short tail reminiscent of those of young, skittish animals. There are four color variations: Gris (gray), Marron (brown), Noir (black), and Blanc (white).

 

“You can be together with Petit Qoobo all the time.
　We want it to be a presence that feels closer both mentally and physically.”

We created Qoobo as a robot that you want to actively play and have fun with. But, we realize you don't always have to consciously try to interact with your pets – or robots, for that matter.

You don't need to be looking at your pets directly to feel their presence. You may feel their heartbeat when holding them. Or, you may feel a connection with your pet when it reacts to a sound or voice that you also hear. We want Petit Qoobo to be that unassuming and comforting presence – a robot that's always with you, both physically and emotionally. This is why we decided to give Petit Qoobo its heartbeat and the ability to respond to sounds and voices.

It's our hope that Petit Qoobo will be the robot you develop a bond with and want to keep by your side, whether at home or on the road.

Petit Qoobo Project Team

 

July 2019 : Project launch

August 2019 : Prototype design

January 2020 : Presented at CES 2020

March 2020 : CAMPFIRE Japan crowdfunding campaign

July 30 – September 28 2020: Indiegogo International crowdfunding campaign

June – September 2020 : Mass production of Petit Qoobo

December 2020 : Shipping!

 

 

【 Perk Contents 】
・Petit Qoobo × 1　

As a thank you to our super early supporters, we are offering you the added perk of $20 off the Standard perk price.

Please choose from the four color options: Gris (gray), Marron (brown), Noir (black), and Blanc (white).

 

【 Perk Contents】
・Petit Qoobo × 1　

As a thank you to our early supporters, we are offering you the added perk of $10 off the Standard perk price.

Please choose from the four color options: Gris (gray), Marron (brown), Noir (black), and Blanc (white).

 

【 Perk Contents 】
・Petit Qoobo × 1　

We will send you one Petit Qoobo.

Please choose from the four color options: Gris (gray), Marron (brown), Noir (black), and Blanc (white).

 

【 Perk Contents 】
・Petit Qoobo × 1
・Petit Qoobo Logo Bag × 1　

We will send you one Petit Qoobo and one bag with Petit Qoobo's logo on it, in which Petit Qoobo fits perfectly. Please choose from the four color options: Gris (gray), Marron (brown), Noir (black), and Blanc (white).
※The bag may differ from the one shown in the video.

Image

 

【 Perk Contents 】
・Qoobo × 1　

We will send you one Qoobo.

Please choose from the three color options: Husky Gray, French Brown, and Silky Black.

 

　Size：Width 210 × Length 280 × Height 100 (mm)
　Weight：Approximately 500g
　Power Source：Rechargeable battery
　Battery Life：Approximately 8 hours
　Accessories：AC adapter, charging cord

 

We first jotted down many different ideas on sticky notes, describing various tail movements. 

They included the spinning of the tail – as if Petit Qoobo felt dizzy – in reaction to the user spinning Petit Qoobo around. 

We carefully whittled down these multiple ideas before deciding on a select few.

 

Mechanical prototypes of Petit Qoobo.
We went through trial and error to create a lifelike tail mechanism that moves expressively.

 

We experimented with different actuator designs for the "heartbeat."

We tagged each actuator with a number before checking them for movement inconsistencies and noise levels.

 

In the early stages of development, the tail was a little longer than it is now.

 

We sewed fur covers in various colors and compared the shades.

 

There was a time when we sewed a cover and realized the fur was flowing in the wrong direction...

 

We also considered putting together the body and tail in different colors.

 

Sometimes, we enjoyed sweets together.

 

Petit Qoobo made its debut at CES2020, the world's largest consumer electronics show held in January 2020 in Las Vegas. It has been featured in a variety of Japanese and global media.

 

Yukai Engineering is a robotics venture that develops and sells a variety of products with the motto, “Robotics for Fun Living.” The company's award-winning flagship products include “BOCCO,” the communication robot that keeps families connected, “Qoobo,” the therapeutic robot cushion with a tail, “necomimi,” the fake cat ears that move in synch with the user's brain waves, “konashi3.0,” the physical computing tool kit, “codama,” the voice communication development kit, and the “create-a-critter robot kit” that enables elementary school students to easily build robots. The company is currently developing “BOCCO emo,” the "ultimate emo-tical robot," with the aim to release the robot and related services in late 2020.

 

Q. Can I sit on Petit Qoobo?

You cannot sit on Petit Qoobo.
Put it on your lap, cuddle it, take it out with you, and treat it as if it were a pet.

Q. What is the inside material made of?

The inside is made of cotton.

Q. What is the outside made of?

The outside is faux fur.

Q. Can I wash it?

A soiled outer cover can be hand-washed.
Take off the fur cover. Dilute neutral detergent in lukewarm water and gently press the cover in the water. Please note that the texture of the fur may change after washing.

Additional information is available at this link (Japanese).

Q. Does it understand the meaning of words?

Petit Qoobo doesn't understand words. However, it hears sounds and voices just as you do. When a loud sound startles Petit Qoobo, pet it gently to calm it down.

Q. Can it be wirelessly charged?

We considered a wireless charging option. We concluded, however, it was not doable due to limited transmission distance. For charging, please use a conventional plug.

 

  • This crowdfunding campaign will run from July 30th to September 28th, 2020, for a duration of 60 days.
  • The Petit Qoobo project is a Flexible Funding campaign, meaning we will be able to proceed with the project and deliver the product to you by using the raised funds, regardless of whether we reached our target amount.
  • Due to material availability and cost fluctuation, the texture of the fur may change.
  • The functions of the final product may differ from those of the prototype.
  • We will do our best to deliver the product on time. However, shipping could be pushed back if there is a delay in the procurement of material or the manufacturing of the product. In the unlikely event of a delay, we will contact all of our supporters immediately.
  • The included AC Adapter is a Japan Type A Plug. Please use a plug converter as needed.
  • Recipients are responsible for the payment of all fees, taxes, and duties related to shipment(s) to destinations outside of Japan.
  • The recipient is responsible for all customs fees.

  • Yukai Engineering Inc. will not issue a refund for a shipment that has been lost, abandoned or refused by the recipient for any reason, including the local taxes, duties or customs not being paid.
story_txt:
Petit Qoobo is a new sibling of Qoobo, Yukai Engineering's popular robotic pillow that wags its tail in response to one's touch. Petit Qoobo, which is one size smaller than Qoobo, reacts not only to the user's stroking but also to the surrounding natural soundscape – be it the sound of clapping or one’s voice. In addition, when you are cuddling Petit Qoobo, you'll be able to hear its "heartbeat."  We hope that this little one, reminiscent of skittish, young animals, will provide you with comfort and enrich your life. 
  
Qoobo was inspired by a Yukai designer’s wish for a healing presence at home that could comfort her at the end of a long day. When she proposed to create a pet-like robot during the company's internal makeathon camp in March 2017, we immediately decided to make it a reality by focusing on the animal's tail. This is how the Qoobo project began.
We paid particular attention to Qoobo's weight, size and texture, so it would feel comfortable and natural when you put it on your lap and cuddle it in your arms. We researched actual tails and developed a mechanism that reproduces lifelike movements. A year after the product's general market release in November 2018, Qoobo had already exceeded cumulative sales of 15,000 units, including the presale, in Japan and internationally. 

Then in July 2019, we launched the Petit Qoobo project in response to a fan's feedback that they wished to have a smaller, portable version of Qoobo that they could carry around wherever they go.

 

Wags its tail in response to one's touch
When caressed, it waves gently. When rubbed, it swings playfully. It occasionally wags just to say hello. Users can interpret Qoobo's varying responses however they like, and enjoy "heart-to-heart" communication with their robot.

We want Petit Qoobo to be that unassuming and comforting presence – a robot that's always with you, both physically and emotionally. It's our hope that Petit Qoobo will be the robot you develop a bond with and want to keep by your side, whether at home or on the road.

story:
Don't Trust Your Bathroom,

It's Dirtier Than You Think

 

 

49,000 brush movement/mins and Well-controlled Vibration Range - Which is a Dentists Recommend to Avoid damaging your gums and remove plaques and stains effectively; PP Food-grade toothbrushes bar which could be trusted to put into your mouth.

Our ultra-powered 49,000 vibrations-per-second motor literally brushes your teeth for you! It has tested, and fine-tuned to be gentle, and tender to your gums and enamel safe, but will be more powerful against plaque with ease. 

 

The charcoal absorbs plaque rather than rubbing it across the teeth and mouth.

Non-Copper Planting Bristles; 2X Higher Density Soft Bristles than Normal Toothbrush Heads - More efficient for removing plaque; Dentists Recommend Shaping - Fitting Teeth Gently and Effectively.

Not that many people know that charcoal toothbrushes are much like your regular toothbrush. The difference is in the bristles; the bristles have charcoal built into them. When you do brush your teeth with charcoal bristles, the germs from your teeth gets locked into the bristles, instead of moving the germs around in the mouth. 

Charcoal activates properties built into the bristles, so no need for any special dental powder.

 

 

 

 

Would you like to protect yourself from plaque and gingivitis?

Most of the time when we use a new toothbrush, either manual or electric, it is recommended that you leave the toothbrush to dry for at least 3 minutes.  Little do people realize that there are unhealthy elements floating around your bathroom, which can make your toothbrush unhealthy as well.


The DentaSonique Charcoal Toothbrush comes with our Internal Auto Cleaning System and Plaque Defense Protection, making your brush heads cleaner and a lot safer to use. Now when you are finished brushing your teeth, you can feel confident knowing that not only are your teeth getting clean, but your toothbrush is getting clean too!

 

3 Smart Modes for a healthier Smile.

One Power Button has 3 Functions:

  1. Cleaning Mode: For a powerful, thorough cleaning

  2. Sensitive Mode: Senses when you brush too hard

  3. Whitening Mode: Bright White Polished Teeth

 

 

 

 

 

The toothbrush is equipped with built-in timers

The "Quadpacer" lets you know when you've spent just the right amount of time brushing and cleaning your mouth, while the "Smart-Timer" informs you when you have brushed your teeth for the recommended two minutes. 

 

 

Maintaining oral hygiene can be very challenging while on-the-go, SO we created a battery that lasts for 60 days on ONE CHARGE.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The DentaSonique™ toothpaste foam system, comes in a liquid form in a 60ml bottle. Inside the bottle is foam-like toothpaste, that contains mint extracts to provide fresh, cool and clean breath feeling for your mouth and teeth. The alcohol-free toothpaste can also help destroy all the bad breath cells that is caused by bacteria that causes halitosis.

Essential for dental hygiene, the DentaSonique™ White Toothpaste works to deliver vibrant and bright whitening.  Whiten your teeth without making a trip to the dentist or going to a professional. It has been clinically shown to whiten teeth in 14 days and amazing results of a whiter smile. 

The foam features powerful technology which boosts stain removal from several causes (coffee, wine, acidic foods, etc.), and develops an ultra-fine foam that is designed to whiten all of your teeth, not just the front, by carrying the active whitening ingredient to all of the nooks and crannies of the teeth. 

 

Whitening powder can naturally whiten your teeth and get rid of impurities, yes it's true. But did you know that toothpaste can do the same thing? The toothpaste is very safe for your mouth and very safe for dental hygiene. Just use the toothpaste like you would your regular-standard toothpaste -- only note, this toothpaste is foam and not an actual PASTE.

DON'T FRET. FOAM TOOTHPASTE IS GOOD FOR YOUR MOUTH. 

 

 

 

 

WHATS INCLUDED

  • 1X rechargeable toothbrush handle,
  • 1X Multifunctional traveling cup,
  • 1X Carbon Charcoal Bristle electric toothbrush head,
  • 1X Micro-USB charging cable,
  • 1X User Manual

 

Stretch Goal: $250,000

If we reach this goal, we will release a white version of the Denta Sonique 8 in 1 Sonic Charcoal Toothbrush. Check it out, it looks AMAZING!!

 

 

 

You may also like our other available DentaSonique cleaning tools

 

Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for what we are doing by sharing a link to this campaign on any social media platforms you use. Go ahead and post the campaign link on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for your time.

 

 

Disclaimer

These statements have not been evaluated by the food and drug administration. This product is not intended to treat, cure, or prevent any disease

The information, including but not limited to texts, graphics, images and other material contained on this website is for educational purposes only. The content is not intended in any way as a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified healthcare provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition or treatment and before undertaking a new health care regime, and never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because something you have read on this website.

DentaSonique does not guarantee specific results for individuals who use the Hydroice due to many factors that can influence health and or weight loss.

Please consult doctor before use for:

Using pacemaker or other medical devices which are susceptible to electrical interference;

Being pregnant or at puerperium;

Individual results may vary..

*Model, design, shape and color may vary

**To achieve best results, you must use the full DentaSonique system

No individual results should be considered typical or guaranteed.

Backer is Responsible for ALL VAT & Customs charges that may occur.

story:
The Easy Jar Opener

We introduce the smartest and easiest jar opener in the world! Why? Simply because so many people, young, old, male, female, fit, or not,  find it difficult to open jars.

With the Easy Jar Opener it is super easy to open any shape or size of jar. No need to hold the jar or the lid. No need to apply a lot of force. No need to make a hole in the lid, run hot water over the lid, put a knife under the edge of the lid, or use any other trick you have tried before. Just place the Easy Jar Opener on a jar and push the handles. 

The Easy Jar Opener is tested and proven, was nominated for the German Design Award 2019 and won a Silver Medal at the Geneva Invention Exhibition 2019.

 

 

The Easy Jar Opener is the best Jar Opener in the world, because it combines all the necessary features to easily open jars in one simple design. The essential features are:

 

 

The Quopener Easy Jar Opener will be available in two color configurations, with one standard color for the handles and two color options for the rubber caps.

 

 

Rewards

We offer various rewards. Pricing starts at €14 and gets as cheap as €9 per opener for a pack of ten! It makes a great gift. 

 

www.quopener.com

 

 

Timeline

  • July: production pre-run and quality checks
  • August: start production
  • September: production ready and shipping
  • October: delivery of Easy Jar Openers

 

About us

We, father and son, have joined forces to create what we believe is the best jar opener in the world. Both of us have an engineering background (mechanical, industrial design & biomedical engineering) and we love to create and do all kinds of DIY projects.

After years of work we believe that the Easy Jar Opener is ready to bring to the market. In a successful first crowdfunding campaign we secured enough funding to realize production, and via Indiegogo In Demand we want to make the Easy Jar Opener available to even more people.
story_txt:
The Easy Jar OpenerWe introduce the smartest and easiest jar opener in the world! Why? Simply because so many people, young, old, male, female, fit, or not,  find it difficult to open jars.With the Easy Jar Opener it is super easy to open any shape or size of jar. No need to hold the jar or the lid. No need to apply a lot of force. No need to make a hole in the lid, run hot water over the lid, put a knife under the edge of the lid, or use any other trick you have tried before. Just place the Easy Jar Opener on a jar and push the handles. The Easy Jar Opener is tested and proven, was nominated for the German Design Award 2019 and won a Silver Medal at the Geneva Invention Exhibition 2019.  The Easy Jar Opener is the best Jar Opener in the world, because it combines all the necessary features to easily open jars in one simple design. The essential features are:  The Quopener Easy Jar Opener will be available in two color configurations, with one standard color for the handles and two color options for the rubber caps.  RewardsWe offer various rewards. Pricing starts at €14 and gets as cheap as €9 per opener for a pack of ten! It makes a great gift.  www.quopener.com

  Timeline
July: production pre-run and quality checks
August: start production
September: production ready and shipping
October: delivery of Easy Jar Openers
 About usWe, father and son, have joined forces to create what we believe is the best jar opener in the world. Both of us have an engineering background (mechanical, industrial design & biomedical engineering) and we love to create and do all kinds of DIY projects.After years of work we believe that the Easy Jar Opener is ready to bring to the market. In a successful first crowdfunding campaign we secured enough funding to realize production, and via Indiegogo In Demand we want to make the Easy Jar Opener available to even more people.

story:
We built Boombox to work seamlessly with our HomeBase wireless charger. Boombox powers up in 2 additional ways USB-C and solar. We recommend charging via HomeBase wireless or via cable and using solar to keep you topped up on the go. 

 

We owe all of our success to our Indiegogo community and we will  forever be thankful for you. You've got first dibs to get discounted  products - and the first units to ship. First time backing a  Indiegogo? Check over this quick demo to learn how it works. 

 

Save on retail pricing by cutting out all the inflated costs when you pledge on Indiegogo. Traditional retail product costs associated with distributors, middle men, and retailers don’t apply to the Indiegogo community as your product is shipped directly from the factory to your doorstep. That’s why we’re able to get you sweet products at sweet deals.

 

 

We believe that being a global citizen is about being a good steward  to the earth while enjoying everything that it has to offer. Our goal is  to undo the damage humans have caused to the planet, beginning with  ocean plastics. That’s why everything we make is created with a belief  in building sustainability for tomorrow. We strive to give more back to  the planet than we take.

We’re obsessed with solving problems for our fellow global citizens.  We create smart and sustainable everyday items at the intersection of  fashion and technology. We make awesome products that are available to  you at a price that’s reasonable, because we believe you should spend  your money on experiences, not things.

Adrian Solgaard: Founder & CEO | Chris Cavill: Creative Director |  Seth Verbeek: Head of Operations | Ana Reis: Sales Manager |  Brittany Partridge: Controller of Chaos | Emma Garner: Head of PR |  Marcus Svensson: Digital Marketing | Stephanie Mejia: Customer Service | Austin Morales: Content Creator

story:
We are happy to send out so many towels to the world (32 countries to be exact ...and counting) and change the way people shower! For many who never tried K-25 before, the problem stays yet the same:

  • Perpetually wet towels that take forever to dry, and develop moldy stinky smells, even after wash. 
  • Towels that become so wet and heavy you feel uncomfortable to wrap around your body. 
  • Poor quality scratchy towels that irritate your skin...

Who can relate? What can you do about it? 

You may do laundry every day - using tons of energy & water. On top of losing time & money, that's not eco-friendly, right?... AND You will end up buying new towels every month in. 

Disappointing conventional towels on the market inspired us to invent a unique towel technology - K-25.

K-25 towels solve the biggest consumer pain. We applied scientific approach to tackle the problem. It was a long creative process with three variables in hand: fabric weight, pattern and weaving technique. After developing many prototype samples we achieved a perfect balance - our Patent pending SECRET SAUCE.

+ do some math how much you save on laundry and new towels...

 

The combination of ALL-in-1 features creates a towel perfect to follow you on any activity such as gym, spa, trails, travel, pool, beach.

 

 

 

 

Believe it or not, but textile is one of the World leaders in ocean pollution. When you support K-25 Smart Bath Towels we will donate to our charity partner focused on saving whales and dolphins.

story:
Press Coverage

 

"Arbor Video Doorbell offers more than Ring, for less." 

 

"Arbor Video Doorbell Gives a full-HD View of your front porch." 
 

"Arbor Video Doorbell Installs on Any Door in Mere Minutes" 

Meet the Arbor Video Doorbell



Other Doorbells have issues with... 

  • They are hard to install & often leave permanent damage. 
  • Hidden hardware costs or expensive monthly fees. 
  • Unreliable WiFi. 
  • Have large "lag times" of what's actually happening at your door. 
  • Don't come with an alarm.  If something bad happens they can only record the activity. 

 


  • Installs in 3-minutes.
  • Skip the costly professional installation.
  • Don’t destroy your doorframe. Arbor only needs 2 screws or you can attach it with double-sided adhesive. Great for renters.
  • Plug & Play WiFi Hub ( Range Booster, Digital Chime, & Alarm all-in-one)

 

Arbor is an All-in-One Home Security System 

  • Arbor comes with everything you need standard. 
  • Unlike other home security systems, we give you the alarm & chime for free.  
  • No monthly service fees - We let you access your recordings for free.


  • 2-Megapixel camera at 1080p HD resolution.  Most other doorbells are only 1-Megapixel.
  • 5x Digital zoom - Control from your phone!
  • Night Vision
  • Customizable motion detection - be notified when someone arrives at your door. 
     

​​


Easy Setup:  Once you've mounted Arbor to your door, simply plug in the WiFi hub and then download the app.  You can access this from anywhere in the world to keep an eye on your home. 

 

  • Personalize the motion detection settings to reduce false alarms. 
  • Get motion alerts to your phone when someone approaches your door
  • See who's at your door in real-time.
  • Scare off people by swiping left to sound off the WiFi Hub alarm. 
  • Easily save screenshots of door activity 
  • Easily speak to who's at your door with 2-way audio. 
     


PRE-ORDER NOW FOR DISCOUNTS

 

 

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION

 

Stretch Goals

70K Funding = Alexa Integration 
100K Funding = Expand Shipping to Europe 
150K Funding = Google Assistant Integration 


2 Years in the Making 

We've been working on the Arbor Video Doorbell & WiFi Hub for over 2 years. We've gone through various prototypes to develop both the industrial design & optimize the connectivity of Arbor.  

 

The Team

Arbor was designed with a team of experts from Cisco, Netgear, Ericsson, Microsoft, Nike, & Apple. We run an agile team of 15 senior people at Arbor, working on everything from hardware engineering to the app design.  Many of us have 15-20 years of experience in our field. We're applying our expertise in WiFi connectivity & industrial design to Arbor to make sure it's the most reliable & beautiful video doorbell on the market.  

For too long, people have had very limited options in what they could buy in the home security space.  We wanted to challenge the big players in this space to design something that worked better & didn't have last minute add on's that cost the consumer more.  We are passionate about giving people peace of mind for their home. 

 

EXTRAS
​



Full Product Review 

 

Full Arbor Demo

 

Update: Anti-Theft of Unit:

Several people asked us "if Arbor is so easy to install, what's to keep people from stealing it off your doorframe?"  We have two features that solve this issue. 

  1. We have a "security screw" shown below that secures Arbor to your home. This is hidden under the battery compartment. 
  2. Additionally, if someone removes the battery or removes the entire unit by force, it will trigger the alarm on your phone & in your home via the digital chime.  It's also worth noting that you should have a video of the suspect as well to share with the police. 

 

Picture Quality: Side by Side Comparison: 


SOCIAL SHARES 

Tell your friends about arbor on FB using the link above or the social buttons at the top.

 

F.A.Q.

Video Doorbell

  1. What if people steal it off my door?
    There is a security screw that will keep it attached to your doorframe.  We also offer a purchase warranty in case of theft.
  2. Why is Arbor better than the other doorbells on the market?
    Arbor comes with everything, while other companies have hidden service charges & extra charges for the chime hardware. Please also see the feature comparison chart we have at the top of this page.  
  3. Does it come in other colors?
    Arbor comes in black & a silver option.
  4. If I get two, do they work together?
    They can both connect to one account, or you can split them up completely. It’s up to you. You can also share each doorbell independently with different people on your account & adjust the notification settings of that doorbell.
  5. How often do I have to charge it?
    The standard use case should last for a year. 
  6. How do I charge it?
    We give you a micro-USB cable. 
  7. Can I access from anywhere in the world if I am not home?
    Yes
  8. What is the camera field of view and quality?
    160 degrees and 1080p
  9. Can I download the video clips?
    Yes, from web portal now and later on in App.
  10. What can I do if I am not home & someone is at my door?
    Use the alarm and talk to them.
  11. When does video start recording?
    If there is motion or if someone pushes the bell.

 

WiFi Booster & Hub

  1. Can I customize the chime sound?
    Arbor gives you 3 chime sounds to pick from.  
  2. Do I have to upgrade my wifi to use this?
    No.
  3. Can I buy a 2nd WiFi hub separately?
    Not yet, but likely when we officially launch in late August.
  4. Is there a volume knob on the Hub?
    Yes. You can set the Hub to low, high, & off.

 

App  (Note: Watch the video of our app in the Updates section )

  1. Does it work on both Android & iOs?
    Yes
  2. Does it have a web portal?
    Yes
  3. What if I want to access my clips forever?
    We offer all clips free for 48 hours.  
  4. Does it show up at a call or a notification on my phone?
    Notification.
