story:
Did You Know?

  • An average user picks up his phone more than 1,500 times each week.
  • Average owners use their phone for 3 hours and 16 minutes a day.
  • Many of us have become so reliant on our smartphones, we use them to carry out a staggering 221 tasks every day.

Glance saves you from procrastinating on your phone. It syncs with your iOS device and reminds you of important events, displays calls, and updates from fitness trackers and more. Glance helps you to keep your hands and mind off the phone and do the important stuff!

  • Stop Procrastinating
  • Start Doing
  • Stay Informed



 


Wondering how you can get Glance to bring you the right notifications just when you need them? It’s as easy as 1, 2, 3…

1. Download the iOS app from App store

2. Connect your Glance to your phone or tablet

3. Choose Apps that you want to see on Glance 

It’s that simple!

 

See Your Day in Color

Connect your calendar to Glance and see your day’s schedule colorfully represented on the clock face. Get prompt reminders about meetings, traffic conditions, events from your mailbox, and important dates (e.g. your mom’s birthday).

Works with:

 

Never Miss A Call, Text Or UBER

During your busy day, Glance will gently alert you of incoming calls, texts, or UBER rides. This sleek device will even show you who is calling, and let you color-code your contacts so you can recognize who’s on the line—at a glance.

Works with:

 

Never Get Caught In The Rain

How many times have you left the house and later noticed those rain clouds rolling in? With Glance, you’ll never get caught in bad weather. Stay up to date on chances of rain and the temperature as your Glance displays weather updates throughout the day. 

 

Sync Glance With Smart Home And Amazon Alexa via IFTTT

If you have a smart home device, why not enhance its power? Glance is the perfect interface for visualizing the notifications and functions of your smart home device. For example, with Glance, you can give Amazon’s Alexa a face to match the voice. Ask Alexa a question and see the answer flash on your Glance.

 

Stay Connected To What Matters

Notifications can get tedious and annoying, to say the least. At the same time, however, staying connected is hugely important to modern life. Glance supports smart notifications from your favorite apps, reminders, ToDos and family events, so you control what notifications you get—staying connected to the things that matter most.

Works via IFTTT with:

 

Catch That Sunset, Wherever You Are

With Glance, you’ll never miss that gorgeous sunrise! No matter your schedule, Glance will wake you up just in time. You can set alarms to help you coordinate with people in different time zones, to see the sunset, or stay in tune with prayer times.

 

Create Your Own Features Via IFTTT, Stringify And Open APIs

Glance contains an amazing visual interface that can show you just about anything. However, if you can't find the feature you’re looking for, then you can create your own using open APIs. Add more value to Glance through IFTTT recipes and Stringify flows.

 

 

Glance is a beautiful piece of tech. But don’t be fooled, our team went through a number of iterations before we landed on this final design. And we must say, we are quite proud of the final product. It’s really amazing how Glance looks effortless on any wall, and feels totally sleek in your hands.


To make Glance, we combined natural materials, giving the clock a cozy quality. We wanted to make sure that Glance is soft to the touch, so we gave it a smooth back that flows into a cold aluminum frame, finally meeting with the fabric clock face.

When the lights go on they look like a small diamonds that make the clock magically amazing.
 

To add a little spark, we placed bright full-color LEDs behind the clock face. Even though they are hidden when the clock is switched off, as soon as a notification pops up, the clock faces shows beautiful and crisp graphics.

When a notification is ready, you can see it clearly in beautiful and bright colors. Doesn’t it look magical?
 

 

We were selected to participate in  TechCrunch's Hardware Battlefield.
Las Vegas, NV, USA. January '16
 

HWTreck invited Glance to be a part of 2016's manufacturing tour.
Shenzhen & Beijing, China. April'16
 

Glance showcased at CESAsia
Shanghai, China. May '16
 

Our team participated in the PITCH competition at RISE Conference
Hong Kong, China. June '16
 

We even baked some yummy Glance cookies for our community

 

 

 


Here you can see the evolution of Glance very core. These PCBs might look the same, but the difference lies in the small details. We went through a number of significant changes and alterations before we got to our final version.


Final prototype assembly: in just a matter of minutes, these scattered parts come together as a beautiful piece of technology.

We worked hard to make the Glance display as bright and sharp as possible. Each prototype turned out much better than the previous one. 

 

 

General

HOW DOES GLANCE WORK?
Glance gets data from the cloud, where we do integrations with popular applications and smart devices. Using our App, you pick your favorite services and add information that you want to see displayed on your Glance. Day by day, Glance will analyze data and set up your personal profile. Based on this profile, Glance will determine what information should be displayed and when. You can also set up your own preferences for the information that you want to see on your Glance.

DOES IT HAVE A BATTERY?
Yes, Glance has a rechargeable battery and cable. The battery lasts for up to 3 months of operational time, it depends on how many notifications you set up. To avoid any charging issues, you can keep the clock plugged in, as it has a long and versatile charging cable.

DOES THE CLOCK TICK?
No, absolutely not! Glance is completely silent, thanks to the precise clock movement implemented in its construction.

HOW MANY GLANCE CLOCKS SHOULD I GET FOR MY HOME?
Glance can make your life at home or in the workplace much more efficient. You can get a clock for every room, or just a few to spread out here and there!

HOW EASY IS IT TO SET-UP GLANCE?
To set up Glance, you just need to download the app and choose your favorite apps to sync with the device.It’s so simple that even elderly people or kids can easily do it.

HOW CAN I CONTROL THE CLOCK?
The primary way of controlling Glance is with the companion app. The other option is to use voice control by connecting your Glance to Amazon Alexa via IFTTT service.

HOW CAN I SELECT THE COLOR?
There are 2 color options: modern Silver and elegant Graphite. You will have a chance to select the color of your choice during the ordering process. If we reach our stretch goal, then we might add a premium color, Copper.

DO YOU OFFER DIFFERENT LANGUAGES ON THE CLOCK?
You can set up different languages, as long as they have the same alphabet as English. The display does not support Chinese or Japanese characters at this time.

 

Integration

HOW MUCH DOES THE APP COST?
The app will be free, of course.

WHAT PHONES DOES  THE APP SUPPORT?
Glance supports Apple devices with iOS 8+ with Bluetooth 4.0 and later.

HOW MANY PHONES CAN I CONNECT TO THE CLOCK?
The Glance works effectively with up to 5 phones.

 

Notifications

HOW LONG DOES A NOTIFICATION REMAIN ON THE CLOCK FACE?
It’s up to you! Just set up your preferences in the Glance app.

HOW DOES IT WORK WHEN SEVERAL PEOPLE CONNECT TO ONE GLANCE?
The cloud provides data insights and determines the exact moments when information should be shown. Glance shows insights at the moment when a specific user is nearby and can see the data. Glance uses a motion sensor to recognize the presence in the room.

CAN IT READ CERTAIN THINGS OUT LOUD?
No, not at the moment.

 

What’s next?

WILL THERE BE CONTINUED SUPPORT/UPDATES FOR THE APP?
Yes! We will continue our work on Glance to bring you more and more integrations and support.

WILL THE PRODUCT BE ON THE MARKET AFTER THE CAMPAIGN IS OVER?
Glance will be available on the market in Q2 2018.

DO YOU HAVE A WARRANTY?
Glance has 1 year warranty.

I WANT TO BECOME A DISTRIBUTOR. WHO SHOULD I CONTACT?
We’re so happy to hear that! Please support Glance by buying the retail pack, or contact us at info@glanceclock.com.

Choose Apps that you want to see on Glance It’s that simple! See Your Day in ColorConnect your calendar to Glance and see your day’s schedule colorfully represented on the clock face. Get prompt reminders about meetings, traffic conditions, events from your mailbox, and important dates (e.g. your mom’s birthday).Works with: Never Miss A Call, Text Or UBERDuring your busy day, Glance will gently alert you of incoming calls, texts, or UBER rides. This sleek device will even show you who is calling, and let you color-code your contacts so you can recognize who’s on the line—at a glance.Works with: Never Get Caught In The RainHow many times have you left the house and later noticed those rain clouds rolling in? With Glance, you’ll never get caught in bad weather. Stay up to date on chances of rain and the temperature as your Glance displays weather updates throughout the day.  Sync Glance With Smart Home And Amazon Alexa via IFTTTIf you have a smart home device, why not enhance its power? Glance is the perfect interface for visualizing the notifications and functions of your smart home device. For example, with Glance, you can give Amazon’s Alexa a face to match the voice. Ask Alexa a question and see the answer flash on your Glance. Stay Connected To What MattersNotifications can get tedious and annoying, to say the least. At the same time, however, staying connected is hugely important to modern life. Glance supports smart notifications from your favorite apps, reminders, ToDos and family events, so you control what notifications you get—staying connected to the things that matter most.Works via IFTTT with: Catch That Sunset, Wherever You AreWith Glance, you’ll never miss that gorgeous sunrise! No matter your schedule, Glance will wake you up just in time. You can set alarms to help you coordinate with people in different time zones, to see the sunset, or stay in tune with prayer times. Create Your Own Features Via IFTTT, Stringify And Open APIsGlance contains an amazing visual interface that can show you just about anything. However, if you can't find the feature you’re looking for, then you can create your own using open APIs. Add more value to Glance through IFTTT recipes and Stringify flows.  Glance is a beautiful piece of tech. But don’t be fooled, our team went through a number of iterations before we landed on this final design. And we must say, we are quite proud of the final product. It’s really amazing how Glance looks effortless on any wall, and feels totally sleek in your hands.To make Glance, we combined natural materials, giving the clock a cozy quality. We wanted to make sure that Glance is soft to the touch, so we gave it a smooth back that flows into a cold aluminum frame, finally meeting with the fabric clock face.When the lights go on they look like a small diamonds that make the clock magically amazing. To add a little spark, we placed bright full-color LEDs behind the clock face. Even though they are hidden when the clock is switched off, as soon as a notification pops up, the clock faces shows beautiful and crisp graphics.When a notification is ready, you can see it clearly in beautiful and bright colors. Doesn’t it look magical?  We were selected to participate in  TechCrunch's Hardware Battlefield.Las Vegas, NV, USA. January '16 HWTreck invited Glance to be a part of 2016's manufacturing tour.Shenzhen & Beijing, China. April'16 Glance showcased at CESAsiaShanghai, China. May '16 Our team participated in the PITCH competition at RISE ConferenceHong Kong, China. June '16 We even baked some yummy Glance cookies for our community   Here you can see the evolution of Glance very core. These PCBs might look the same, but the difference lies in the small details. We went through a number of significant changes and alterations before we got to our final version.Final prototype assembly: in just a matter of minutes, these scattered parts come together as a beautiful piece of technology.We worked hard to make the Glance display as bright and sharp as possible. Each prototype turned out much better than the previous one.   GeneralHOW DOES GLANCE WORK?Glance gets data from the cloud, where we do integrations with popular applications and smart devices. Using our App, you pick your favorite services and add information that you want to see displayed on your Glance. Day by day, Glance will analyze data and set up your personal profile. Based on this profile, Glance will determine what information should be displayed and when. You can also set up your own preferences for the information that you want to see on your Glance.DOES IT HAVE A BATTERY?Yes, Glance has a rechargeable battery and cable. The battery lasts for up to 3 months of operational time, it depends on how many notifications you set up. To avoid any charging issues, you can keep the clock plugged in, as it has a long and versatile charging cable.DOES THE CLOCK TICK?No, absolutely not! Glance is completely silent, thanks to the precise clock movement implemented in its construction.HOW MANY GLANCE CLOCKS SHOULD I GET FOR MY HOME?Glance can make your life at home or in the workplace much more efficient. You can get a clock for every room, or just a few to spread out here and there!HOW EASY IS IT TO SET-UP GLANCE?To set up Glance, you just need to download the app and choose your favorite apps to sync with the device.It’s so simple that even elderly people or kids can easily do it.HOW CAN I CONTROL THE CLOCK?The primary way of controlling Glance is with the companion app. The other option is to use voice control by connecting your Glance to Amazon Alexa via IFTTT service.HOW CAN I SELECT THE COLOR?There are 2 color options: modern Silver and elegant Graphite. You will have a chance to select the color of your choice during the ordering process. If we reach our stretch goal, then we might add a premium color, Copper.DO YOU OFFER DIFFERENT LANGUAGES ON THE CLOCK?You can set up different languages, as long as they have the same alphabet as English. The display does not support Chinese or Japanese characters at this time. IntegrationHOW MUCH DOES THE APP COST?The app will be free, of course.WHAT PHONES DOES  THE APP SUPPORT?Glance supports Apple devices with iOS 8+ with Bluetooth 4.0 and later.HOW MANY PHONES CAN I CONNECT TO THE CLOCK?The Glance works effectively with up to 5 phones. NotificationsHOW LONG DOES A NOTIFICATION REMAIN ON THE CLOCK FACE? It’s up to you! Just set up your preferences in the Glance app.HOW DOES IT WORK WHEN SEVERAL PEOPLE CONNECT TO ONE GLANCE?The cloud provides data insights and determines the exact moments when information should be shown. Glance shows insights at the moment when a specific user is nearby and can see the data. Glance uses a motion sensor to recognize the presence in the room.CAN IT READ CERTAIN THINGS OUT LOUD?No, not at the moment. What’s next?WILL THERE BE CONTINUED SUPPORT/UPDATES FOR THE APP?Yes! We will continue our work on Glance to bring you more and more integrations and support.WILL THE PRODUCT BE ON THE MARKET AFTER THE CAMPAIGN IS OVER?Glance will be available on the market in Q2 2018.DO YOU HAVE A WARRANTY?Glance has 1 year warranty.I WANT TO BECOME A DISTRIBUTOR. WHO SHOULD I CONTACT?We’re so happy to hear that! Please support Glance by buying the retail pack, or contact us at info@glanceclock.com.

story:
Any Type of Hair

We had ShowerShroom™ tested with all types of hair imaginable--long or short, thick or thin, curly or straight-- and the results were terrific every time. It even worked wonders with pet hair. We're ready to provide you with the solution to make clogged drains a thing of the past in your household. 

Pet Owners Rejoice

The ShowerShroom works great with dog and cat hair alike. Bathing a shedding furry friend can yield a ton of hair, but ShowerShroom handles it with ease. Yes, really! We're pet owners ourselves and we know how quickly drains can clog when you've got animals that shed whenever you bathe them. Keep your pets clean and your drains clear... for good.

Designed to Work

During the entire design process, our #1 focus was on making sure that the ShowerShroom did its job extremely well. We never want to settle for just "alright" performance on any design. It has to do what our customers expect it to do and it has to do it in a simple and intuitive way. Every decision made on design was made with that overriding purpose in mind. Take a closer look for yourself. 

Easy to Use

Our patent-pending ShowerShroom is designed to not only do its job flawlessly, it's also made to work with as little effort on your part as possible. The last thing we want is for our backers to have to bend over backwards to get it working or to have to clean it on a daily basis. With ShowerShroom, you set it and forget it for quite some time depending on how much long hair you or your fellow shower-takers shed at a time. Some testers have gone months without having to clean the ShowerShroom!  

 

 

 

 

 

The Perfect Gift

Just like we've done in the past, we make sure you receive beautifully-packaged finished products that you can give to a special someone whose life you'd like to make just a little easier. Whether it's for Mother's Day, Father's Day, or a special birthday, the ShowerShroom (or any of our products!) makes for a unique and problem-solving gift that your loved ones will appreciate. ShowerShroom will be available in three colors: Clean White, Neutral Gray, and Marina Blue.

TubShroom® for Your Bath Tub

Don't stop at your shower drain... our very first wildly successful product is called TubShroom and it was designed to protect your standard-sized bath tub drain from clogging. It catches your hair neatly out of sight without blocking the flow of water. TubShroom is currently available to bundle with your pledge in six fabulous colors: Clean White, Neutral Gray, Marina Blue, Organic Green, Autumn Orange, and Titan Clear.   

  

 

 

 

SinkShroom™ For Bathroom Sink Drains

For those of you who brush your hair over the sink drain, you know just how quickly these often-used drains can start slowing down. Those long hairs, in particular, clump up inside the drain until they form a barrier for water flow. Over time, such a blockage can lead to foul smells coming from your drains, not to mention making it nearly impossible to continue to use that drain. 

 

 

 

 

Timeline and Delivery Window

We're targeting a June 2017 delivery window for all our backers. We've attempted to keep the pledges as simple as possible while implementing bundle discounts for those who want to get add-ons with their ShowerShrooms. Our testing, prototyping and tooling stages have been completed and we're extremely satisfied with the results. We are now gearing up for production, and we expect that you will receive your orders in just 2-3 weeks. Thank you for going on this exciting ride with us once again. None of this is possible without you, the backers. Now let's go and step into a clog-free future together.

story:
Ginjot: a flexible, all in one, eco-friendly, innovative cleaning mop. The cleaning mop is easy to use, it cleans dirt from any surface, and most importantly its lightweight and multifunctional. With Ginjot, cleaning becomes a pleasure.

 

Ginjot has a washable, dual-sided microfiber pad, that deals with all kinds of surfaces. Inside there is a UV light placed, which clean 99,9% of any surface. Ginjot is flexible, meaning that it can rotate 360 degrees and clean any unreachable angle. The water spray, which is inserted in the cleaning mop, makes the cleaning process easier and helps to avoid carrying heavy water buckets. Most importantly, Gijot is made from recycled plastic and is solar-powered, which indicates its eco-friendliness. By choosing Ginjot you chose to preserve the environment.

 

 

Wet versus dry? Which one is more effective? Dry pads are good in removing dust and hair, whereas wet pads perfectly clean the surfaces making them sparkling. There is no need to keep two types of cleaning mop today, as Ginjot mop pads can be used both in wet and dry conditions

 

 

 

Microfibers are famous for enabling chemical-free cleaning, using only water. Another big difference between microfiber and other cleaning rags and cloths, is that microfiber cleans everything, from dust to hair. Additionally, there is no need to worry about scratching the surface while cleaning. Taking into consideration the fact that in average in every family there is at least one allergic member, microfibers are hypoallergenic, and can be a great choice for every member of the family.

 

Unlike other regular cleaning rags, microfiber has many advantages. First, microfibers work on smooth surfaces excellently with only using water and no chemicals, and effectively remove 99% of dirt from the surface. They are super absorptive, four times more effective than other cleaning cloths, and allow greater area to be cleaned. And most importantly, microfibers are reusable and long lasting, due to 200.000 fibers per square inch of product. They can be washed more than 100 times, with warm water or in washing machines, and they dry 2 times quicker than ordinary cleaning cloths.

 

 

 

 

 

The UV Sterilizer inside Ginjot, is used for clean any surface you want, through the ultraviolet light. It breaks down several types of chemical bonds and scrambles the structure of RNA and DNA, thus preventing the microorganism from multiplying. When the bacteria are unable to multiply, they are considered to be non-infectious.

 

 

 

The ergonomic handle of Ginjot makes it ten times easier and more comfortable to use. Rotating the bottom of the cleaning mop has never been this simple.

 

 

 

When you’re done with cleaning dirty surfaces, it is time to make it shine. By pushing just one button, dry mops can turn into wet in a few seconds. That’s how Ginjot spray gets into action.

 

 

 

 

 

Carrying heavy buckets of water is not necessary anymore. Ginjot addressed that point as well by inserting a 650 ml capacity bottle in the cleaning mop. That amount is fully enough to clean an area of 140 sq/m.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Ginjot is one of the fewest multifunctional cleaning mops that cleans not only the floor surface, but also walls, glass, fabric, etc. To put in other words, Ginjot cleans any kind of surface you wish.

 

 

Have you ever tried cleaning windows with mops? If not, then it’s time to try. Flexibility of Ginjot allows you to easily clean windows. And that is not enough, Ginjot easily gets rid of dirt and dust that can be removed from the surface of sofas, armchairs, chairs

 

Rotating and matching the mop with the angles is not a big deal anymore. Ginjot mop frame features a full 360° Swivel, meaning that each and every angle in your house will be clean.

 

Microfiber flat mops easily glide across the floor making mopping much smoother! It easily reaches zones under the furniture without much effort. With Gijot cleaning hidden zones is no longer a problem. 

 

 

 

Taking care of Ginjot pads is so easy. It can be washed both by hand and in the washing machine. The quality of pads is so high, that it can resist more than a hundred cycles of laundry. 

 

 

 

 

Since today the world is extremely polluted, which affects not only the environment but also our quality of life, we need to pay more attention to our behavior and products we use. To save our environment, we need to reuse and recycle most of the items we use. Therefore, we made Ginjot from fully recycled plastic. By recycling plastic, we reduce the amount of waste that’s going to be sent to landfills. Did you know that plastic takes about 1000 or more years to degrade? 

But recycling materials is not enough. It is also important to save energy. Why? Because while producing energy, emissions go into our atmosphere, thus polluting the air. Ginjot took care of that part too. We offer a solar-powered cleaning mop which takes its energy from the sun. Use Ginjot, save the world.

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
A vacuum attachment that cleans everything.

Dirt is to be found everywhere, so naturally also on delicate objects or in areas that are difficult, if not impossible to clean.

We also had that problem. So we began to think of ways to solve it! How can one construct a vacuum cleaner attachment that has the advantage of combining several methods of cleaning?

And then we had the idea: “What is not possible to do alone will be possible to do by many together.”

 Our Story

The Dusty-Brush Team is a young start-up with its place of business in Kreuzlingen, Switzerland. We are united with our enjoyment of technology, innovation and everything concerning our daily lives. We had the idea of Dusty-Brush in June 2015, and have been working on it since then, to make our vision a reality.

 

 

We have been involved with the evolution of development for many years. We work with machines that create a lot of dust. Our toolboxes and general objects were always getting dirty, and could only be cleaned with a lot of effort. In the search for a solution for a way to speed up this annoying work, we came up with the idea of Dusty-Brush. As with an ant colony, it takes working together to get the job done well. We transferred the idea to Dusty-Brush. “Many manage more than one” , was followed by considerations and drawings.

 

We developed our first prototypes………

……and began.

 

 

The results were surprisingly good. And suddenly we discovered the hidden potential in Dusty-Brush. We involved our neighbors, friends and relatives as testers, and received very positive feedback. Encouraged by the feedback, we then went on the search for a manufacturer. That the manufacturing process is not as easy as one would think, in looking back, we found this work to be very time consuming. We eventually had success and found an absolutely dependable and professional production location we could now use.

Dusty-Brush is 100% Made in Germany.

Dusty-Brush is 100% completely developed and tested. All of the production processes and chains of delivery have been organized and are waiting to be set into action.

Why you should become a part of Dusty-Brush

We want to show Dusty-Brush to the world. We want opinions and suggestions, especially from you Indiegogos. Everyone can find a use for Dusty-Brush.The potential is almost infinitely large. With your support we can bring our project to life, and really make a difference in our cleaning efforts. Become a part of Dusty-Brush and help a father and his son to enable their vision of the future to become true.

Bring Dusty Brush to life!

 

 Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!

 

  • Cleans faster and more effectively than standard cleaning products
  • Can get into hard-to-reach places
  • Saves time and money
  • Cleans delicate objects effortlessly
  • Is very sturdy. Can be deployed universally Lessens dust pollution in the home
  • Is antistatic

The standard cleaning products available today often have many limits and are not universally suitable to be used in many areas.

 

Areas of application

Dusty-Brush makes it possible for you to clean areas that were unthinkable before, from delicate objects to hard-to-reach corners, edges and grooves. Each one of us has his own special problem areas.

Convince yourself!

 

 

 

 

 How it works

“The brush that vacuums” was our idea.

From this idea grew a simple and genial principle.

The main thought behind this invention is, that instead of a single large opening there would be many small suction areas through many tubes. Through these the suction would be optimally distributed. Very small, fine areas could be cleaned and small parts and objects would not get lost.

 

Dusty-Brush is based on the principle of a brush. With a brush, you can clean almost any area. It fits onto all uneven surfaces and can be used anywhere.

The only disadvantage is, a brush cannot vacuum up dust.

 

 

 

 

It is important to us that with the number of the tubes, using a standard vacuum cleaner, the air flow remains the same. That creates the advantage that the vacuum cleaner is not unnecessarily overburdened. At the same time, the power of the vacuum cleaner is distributed evenly.

What creates the difference


First, the high number of tubes makes everything possible. Just like a brush, they attach themselves to every uneven surface.They can also vacuum the dirt out of the smallest grooves, cracks and hidden edges.

 

 

 

 

 

 Heavy-duty

Thanks to the special high-molecular weight thermoplastic polymer, it is possible to use much pressure. Dusty-Brush will not break and returns back to its original position. You can use it to get to the hard-to-reach places.

 

 

 

Universal

Our integrated adapter makes it possible to fit onto the current vacuum cleaner tubes.

 

Optional

Adapters can be added to as needed. Because just one size is not needed for every area, we can offer three different diameters for the tubes.

These are:

  • 1,8 mm - this is for very fine and delicate objects. Because of the small tube diameters, it has more tubes. The suction is very evenly distributed with this adapter.
  • 2,3 mm - This is the all-rounder. The suction is somewhat stronger and is distributed among fewer tubes. This is good for standard dirty areas.
  • 2,8 mm - This is the strongest. It has a very strong suction and is especially meant to be used for very dirty areas. It is ideal for cars and workshops.

 

So that you do not have to buy three completely different adapters, these are separable. That way, you can exchange to whatever adapter is needed for the different situations and areas of dirt.

It is also possible for us to offer adapters for different vacuum cleaners like Dyson and Vorwerk, without having to create a completely new nozzle.

 

 

 Dyson - Adapter

 

 

Antistatic

Our plastic does not create static electricity; therefore sensitive electronic devices are also protected. But because there is always a slight risk, we offer Dusty-Brush with an extra feature in the form of a grounding cable, when attached, to discharge this electricity. The electricity charge will be safely diverted and the electric machines will be kept safe.

 

 

 

 Cleaning

A non-stick coating prevents it from clogging. In case the tube does get clogged, you can clean it with a thin rod or stick. As an alternative, Dusty-Brush can also be rinsed out under running hot water. A cleaning rod is included in every package.

Ergonomic 

A comfortable position as well as an optimal coverage is guarantied through an angle of a minimum of 45 degrees.

The tapered end has the advantage that, just as with a feather duster or dusting product, one can also vacuum on smooth surfaces.

 

 For our best friends

There is enough suction when used in the hair growing direction to remove the dead skin cells without the Dusty-Brush attaching itself to the skin.

The tubes remove loose hair from your dog or cat, before they get distributed into the room. The hair just gets sucked into the vacuum cleaner instead.

It’s really great!

 

Dusty-Brush is also perfect for allergic and asthma sufferers. Combined with a vacuum made especially for the removal of fine dust, the fine dust pollution is greatly reduced. The dust is directly sucked into the vacuum without being stirred up, which has a positive effect in a hygienic household.

 

 

 

Pledges
story_txt:
A vacuum attachment that cleans everything.
Dirt is to be found everywhere, so naturally also on delicate objects or in areas that are difficult, if not impossible to clean.
We also had that problem. So we began to think of ways to solve it! How can one construct a vacuum cleaner attachment that has the advantage of combining several methods of cleaning?
And then we had the idea: “What is not possible to do alone will be possible to do by many together.”

 Our Story
The Dusty-Brush Team is a young start-up with its place of business in Kreuzlingen, Switzerland. We are united with our enjoyment of technology, innovation and everything concerning our daily lives. We had the idea of Dusty-Brush in June 2015, and have been working on it since then, to make our vision a reality.

 

 

We have been involved with the evolution of development for many years. We work with machines that create a lot of dust. Our toolboxes and general objects were always getting dirty, and could only be cleaned with a lot of effort. In the search for a solution for a way to speed up this annoying work, we came up with the idea of Dusty-Brush. As with an ant colony, it takes working together to get the job done well. We transferred the idea to Dusty-Brush. “Many manage more than one” , was followed by considerations and drawings.

 
We developed our first prototypes………

……and began.

 
 
The results were surprisingly good. And suddenly we discovered the hidden potential in Dusty-Brush. We involved our neighbors, friends and relatives as testers, and received very positive feedback. Encouraged by the feedback, we then went on the search for a manufacturer. That the manufacturing process is not as easy as one would think, in looking back, we found this work to be very time consuming. We eventually had success and found an absolutely dependable and professional production location we could now use.
Dusty-Brush is 100% Made in Germany.
Dusty-Brush is 100% completely developed and tested. All of the production processes and chains of delivery have been organized and are waiting to be set into action.
Why you should become a part of Dusty-Brush
We want to show Dusty-Brush to the world. We want opinions and suggestions, especially from you Indiegogos. Everyone can find a use for Dusty-Brush.The potential is almost infinitely large. With your support we can bring our project to life, and really make a difference in our cleaning efforts. Become a part of Dusty-Brush and help a father and his son to enable their vision of the future to become true.
Bring Dusty Brush to life!

 
 
 
 Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!

 


Cleans faster and more effectively than standard cleaning products
Can get into hard-to-reach places

Saves time and money 

Cleans delicate objects effortlessly 

Is very sturdy. Can be deployed universally Lessens dust pollution in the home
Is antistatic



The standard cleaning products available today often have many limits and are not universally suitable to be used in many areas.

 

Areas of application
Dusty-Brush makes it possible for you to clean areas that were unthinkable before, from delicate objects to hard-to-reach corners, edges and grooves. Each one of us has his own special problem areas.
Convince yourself!

 

 

 

 

 How it works
“The brush that vacuums” was our idea.
From this idea grew a simple and genial principle.
The main thought behind this invention is, that instead of a single large opening there would be many small suction areas through many tubes. Through these the suction would be optimally distributed. Very small, fine areas could be cleaned and small parts and objects would not get lost.

 

Dusty-Brush is based on the principle of a brush. With a brush, you can clean almost any area. It fits onto all uneven surfaces and can be used anywhere.
The only disadvantage is, a brush cannot vacuum up dust.

 

 

 

 
It is important to us that with the number of the tubes, using a standard vacuum cleaner, the air flow remains the same. That creates the advantage that the vacuum cleaner is not unnecessarily overburdened. At the same time, the power of the vacuum cleaner is distributed evenly.

What creates the difference

First, the high number of tubes makes everything possible. Just like a brush, they attach themselves to every uneven surface.They can also vacuum the dirt out of the smallest grooves, cracks and hidden edges.
 

 

 

 

 

 Heavy-duty
Thanks to the special high-molecular weight thermoplastic polymer, it is possible to use much pressure. Dusty-Brush will not break and returns back to its original position. You can use it to get to the hard-to-reach places.

 

 

 

Universal
Our integrated adapter makes it possible to fit onto the current vacuum cleaner tubes.

 

Optional
Adapters can be added to as needed. Because just one size is not needed for every area, we can offer three different diameters for the tubes.
These are:
1,8 mm - this is for very fine and delicate objects. Because of the small tube diameters, it has more tubes. The suction is very evenly distributed with this adapter.
2,3 mm - This is the all-rounder. The suction is somewhat stronger and is distributed among fewer tubes. This is good for standard dirty areas.

2,8 mm - This is the strongest. It has a very strong suction and is especially meant to be used for very dirty areas. It is ideal for cars and workshops.


 
So that you do not have to buy three completely different adapters, these are separable. That way, you can exchange to whatever adapter is needed for the different situations and areas of dirt.
It is also possible for us to offer adapters for different vacuum cleaners like Dyson and Vorwerk, without having to create a completely new nozzle.

 

 

 Dyson - Adapter

 

 

Antistatic
Our plastic does not create static electricity; therefore sensitive electronic devices are also protected. But because there is always a slight risk, we offer Dusty-Brush with an extra feature in the form of a grounding cable, when attached, to discharge this electricity. The electricity charge will be safely diverted and the electric machines will be kept safe.

 

 

 

 Cleaning

A non-stick coating prevents it from clogging. In case the tube does get clogged, you can clean it with a thin rod or stick. As an alternative, Dusty-Brush can also be rinsed out under running hot water. A cleaning rod is included in every package.

Ergonomic 
A comfortable position as well as an optimal coverage is guarantied through an angle of a minimum of 45 degrees.

The tapered end has the advantage that, just as with a feather duster or dusting product, one can also vacuum on smooth surfaces.

 

 For our best friends
There is enough suction when used in the hair growing direction to remove the dead skin cells without the Dusty-Brush attaching itself to the skin.
The tubes remove loose hair from your dog or cat, before they get distributed into the room. The hair just gets sucked into the vacuum cleaner instead.

It’s really great!

 

Dusty-Brush is also perfect for allergic and asthma sufferers. Combined with a vacuum made especially for the removal of fine dust, the fine dust pollution is greatly reduced. The dust is directly sucked into the vacuum without being stirred up, which has a positive effect in a hygienic household. 

 

 

 

Pledges

story:
Being fed up with false alarms? Disappointed with the battery performance? Angered about not getting clear images all the time? Annoyed with the setup that could take forever? Tired of the expensive subscription fee? Finally, here comes a video doorbell you can trust -- 360 Video Doorbell X3.        

Featuring four detection technologies, 360 X3 only reports you what matters. Radar sensor offers ultra-precise detection to pick up movement and track object trajectory, to avoid false alarms from traffic or pedestrians. This is complemented by a suite of passive infrared sensors, human detection, and facial recognition technologies to allow extremely accurate and fast readings while maintaining optimum battery life. And the 360 X3 let you customize the detection zone, so you can make sure it’s watching only the areas you intend it to, without recording vehicles or pedestrians passing by.    

        

Our proprietary algorithms can use our cutting edge image-recognition technology to distinguish between human and other sorts of movement, so you won’t get false alarms from falling leaves, vehicles, or animals.

 

We provide a wifi base station with Chime (worth $39) FOR FREE! It provides free 8GB local storage that is capable of storing up to 120-day videos or snapshots* for you to review, download and share at your convenience. You have free and full access to the local storage! And it also serves as a dual-band Wi-Fi amplifier with up to 984ft range*, extending your Wi-Fi coverage throughout your home, and ensuring two-way audio and visual calls through your doorbell are never dropped. The Chime comes with a US Standard plug, but we also provide both the UK and European standard conversion plugs.   


*The 120-day is tested when the doorbell records 10 motion clips every day and records for 15s every time.
*The range is tested in an open and unobstructed environment.  

 

The 360 X3 comes with a rechargeable battery (5000mAh), with a 6 months battery life* on a single charge. You can also choose the hardwired connection for continuous charging. Multiple means of preventing false-positives will help the doorbell to avoid burning through its battery on unnecessary recordings - saving only the most important interactions. Moreover, 360 provides an add-on battery pack that can be used to recharge the doorbell without disassembling or can be mounted to it for an astonishing 18 months of battery life* in total.

*The battery life is tested when the doorbell detects motion 20 times every day and records a 20s video clip every time.   

  

A video doorbell is only as good as the view it gives you, and the 360 X3 is top of the line. It features a state-of-the-art 5 Megapixel High-Resolution Camera to capture and preserve video in stunning 2496*1920 resolution so that you can even see the license plates on cars!

   

Our award-winning WDR (wide dynamic range) technology balances contrast, capturing startlingly clear details even in low light conditions or when figures are backlit. With the 360 X3 you’ll never be stuck guessing at backlit silhouettes again- you’ll always know what’s outside your door.

 

Never be left in the dark! Crystal clear night vision ensures you’ll always know who's come knocking at night.

 

Online shopping has never been more important, but your packages are vulnerable when they’re dropped off and you aren’t home. That’s why the 360 X3 features package arrival detection and pick up notification. The 360 X3 can automatically detect when there’s a package at your door and send you real-time notifications. And when someone picks up that package, you’ll be instantly notified, too.

Featuring facial recognition, the doorbell can actually distinguish between friends, family, or strangers, so you always know who’s been to your home.

 

Once something sets off the motion sensors, the 360 X3 immediately activates, capturing 10 to 30 seconds clips and sending them to you, instantly viewable in real-time and available for replay later. If necessary, you can share them or download them to your phone. 

 

When passive protection isn’t enough, get active! The 360 X3 features the auto-siren to deter suspects that arrive where they aren’t supposed to be while you’re asleep or away. The 360 X3 will also send you real-time notifications when the siren activates.

 

Concerned about keeping your data safe? All clips are encrypted with Banking Level Security (Chacha20) before being stored locally, or via cloud if you need more space by using the Amazon AWS server.

 

Although the 360 X3 only takes seconds to install, it’s almost irremovable without the right pin to uninstall it. And the doorbell will sound a siren and send an alert to your phone if anyone attempts to remove or disable it without authorization. Additionally, it will record any such attempts as evidence, so there’s no chance a criminal can get away.

 

Worried about installation? Don’t be! The 360 X3 can be installed in just seconds even by children and does not require professional help. You can choose between easy 3M adhesive installation to avoid damaging your wall, or drill installation for rough all surfaces.  

 

Link your 360 X3 account to a digital assistant like Alexa or Google Assistant for easy hands-free use! Check your front door, message, or video chat with your visitors all via voice control. Your digital assistant will instantly notify you when someone approaches and show a live view of your front door on your device whenever someone presses the doorbell.

 

 

 

We already finished the development of hardware, and entered into mass production. Here are some demo videos we prepared as you requested. Please note the app UI surface is not totally finalized yet, and we will keep updating more videos and product updates to you.

 

 

 
Thanks to Yanko design for reviewing the 360 Video Doorbell X3, Click through and learn more about us!
https://www.yankodesign.com/2021/02/01/this-sma...
 
the Gadget Flow released an article about the 360 Video Doorbell, let's check what they like about the 360 Video Doorbell X3!
https://thegadgetflow.com/portfolio/radar-senso...
 

We got a press released from China-Gadgets.de in Germany! Thanks for sharing the review. Let's see what he finds something new about the 360 Video Doorbell X3.

https://www.china-gadgets.de/360-video-doorbell...

 

Thanks to pplware from Portugal for sharing the review about 360 Video Doorbell X3 with us! come and see what he thinks about the 360 X3.

https://pplware.sapo.pt/gadgets/360-video-doorb...

 

Founded in 2005, 360 is known as a leading internet technology company providing security solutions for both enterprises and individuals, as well as technology-driven IoT products and solutions to bring online and offline protection for people's daily lives. 


360 Smart Life Group is a business group under 360 that focuses on R&D and innovation of smart devices and IoT solutions. It is committed to creating a safe and smart life for people all around the world and has created many successful smart products in home security, smart home, smart wearable, smart travel, safe communities, etc. Meanwhile, 360 Smart Life Group has offered competitive IoT solutions for companies in smart retail, video cloud platforms, and hotel apartment management fields, by combining the powerful 360 Security Brain with business scenarios. By far, 360 ships over 10 million products annually and supports over 100 million users globally.

Driven by the vision to create a smart and safe life for people across the world, 360 stays in the frontier of innovation.

Equipped with our leading technologies, 360 doorbells and security cameras were loved by our users and YouTubers!  

 

As a company experienced and pioneered in the IoT industry, 360 provides the most comprehensive smart life solutions to our users across the world. 360 products like Robot Vacuum Cleaners, smart doorbells, security cameras and etc. are popular among thousands of families and 360 was rewarded by the trust and love from our customers. Starting with 360 Video Doorbell X3, let 360 make a difference in your life.

 

 

Your contribution to us is a guaranteed purchase. According to the Indiegogo verification, we have already entered into the production stage, and the shipment will start in April. You will be notified as soon as we start shipping, and you will also be able to check the shipping status on your Indiegogo account.

story:
Thank you all! Our campaign has ended, but we will continue taking orders on our website!

www.hyperspacelight.com

 

After two years of precision hyper-engineering, we’re ready to bring you the most star-striking fusion of art and technology in the multiverse:

 

 

 

 

Harmonic, symphonic, electronic. Visualize and get lost in your music like never before with over 30 unique sound reactive patterns, specially designed to work with any kind of music. These patterns use a microphone to analyze musical lows, mids, and highs to create infinite ultra-responsive audio-visual variety. Don't just take our word for it, crank up the volume and check out the videos!

 
 

Choose from predefined color palettes or up to 3 custom colors

 

Adjust speed, intensity, and symmetry

 

Up close, the space inside the cube appears to expand into infinity. Get lost in hyperspace.

 

 

We've already delivered hundreds of HyperCubes in our first production run, and our customers are over the moon (or, more accurately, lost somewhere in hyperspace). Check out what some of our first backers have to say about the HyperCube!

 

  • Two models: HyperCube10 (10x10x10") & HyperCube15 (15x15x15")
  • 95 unique custom-coded patterns, and 3 modes
  • Randomly generated color palettes shift every 10s (adjustable)
  • LEDs: bright and color-saturated addressable LEDs, rated to last for 50,000+ hours
  • Windows: scratch-proof, shatter-proof, lightweight, optical-grade acrylic
  • Frame: sleek, high-durability PVC
  • Low power draw: average 6W / 12W for HC10 / HC15
  • 5V power supply included, with US outlet plug
  • 2.4 GHz WiFi connectivity for mobile app
  • 1 year warranty

 

 

Standard Operation

The HyperCube will blast out photons as soon as it's plugged in. By default it will play patterns from the "Kaleidoscopic" mode, changing pattern every 60 seconds and generating new colors every 10 seconds. Manually change pattern with a single press of the button on the control box, and change mode with a double press, or fully customize the experience with our app.

 

 

Things are going to go much quicker this time around. Components for the next 1000 HyperCubes are already in production!

 

 

We are two scientists with a passion for light, geometry, and technology!

TimM O’Connor (left) received his PhD in NanoEngineering from UCSD, holds a master’s in Physics, and a BS focused on Business/Entrepreneurship. Dylan Lovinger (right) received his PhD in Physics from UCSD, for his work in ultrafast laser spectroscopy. We are now both full time hyper-engineers! The HyperCube project is a merger of everything we love: the physics of light, technology, and radical art. We’re doing this because we want to illuminate the world. To share the mesmerizing beauty that emerges from the marriage of art and technology.

We have also recently brought on a strategic advisor: Vince Kadlubek. Vince is the co-founder and board director of Meow Wolf, a radical events and entertainment group now expanding to 4 locations across the US and valued at over $500M. Vince will be helping us expand our brand and market to intergalactic reaches! In addition, we are working closely with other advisors who have years of experience in manufacturing, logistics, and crowdfunding.

 

 

This project is significantly de-risked. We already have a viable product that we've delivered to hundreds of customers. All we need now is to finish production of the parts for batch 2, and assemble/ship them to you.

However no project is without risk. We are now ramping up our production and moving to a new assembly factory that can support our growth, which always comes with challenges. We have worked with this company for some of our components, and we have full trust in their ability to expand production with us. We have already received excellent HyperCube samples from them. With the assistance of our professional advisors and their expansive network, and our own capacity for problem solving (especially after all we've learned over the last two years), we can guarantee that you will receive the product you backed! And trust us, it looks even better in person!

And trust us, it looks even better in person!

story:
Mitte is the first of its kind smart home water system that purifies and enhances water through a process inspired by the natural water cycle. It works in two simple steps: first, it purifies water with a proprietary distillation-based method, then it enhances the purified water with essential minerals.

 

In 2015, Co-founder and CTO Faebian explored methods of water purification and mineralization as a side project to his university career. Inspired by the natural water cycle, he replicated the process in a machine. Two years later, that idea became the beautiful Mitte you see today.

 

 

 

"Some 21 mineral elements are known to be essential for humans." - World Health Organization, Report on Nutrients in Drinking Water, 2005. 

Water can be an essential source of minerals for the human body, and many minerals have higher bioavailability in water than in food, such as calcium and magnesium. However, other water purification systems remove important minerals in water along with the contaminants, creating water that’s only pure, but not mineralized.

 

Mitte solves this problem by using mineral cartridges to replicate the process that occurs in nature when water flows through rocks, picking up minerals along the way. This unique process adds back all the minerals and trace elements that other water purifiers remove, giving you water that’s not just clean, but also full of essential nutrients.

 

 

Our replaceable patent-pending mineral cartridges come in three varieties, creating waters with different mineral properties. Now you can personalize your water to suit your lifestyle and taste. Whether you prefer a clean balanced everyday water, a sophisticated high mineral hit, or high PH water for detox and fitness. There’s a Mitte to suit every need.

You can even specify the exact temperature (between 5 to 100 degrees Celsius, 41 to 212 Fahrenheit) and amount dispensed (between 50 to 1000 ml, 2 to 34 fl oz), effectively replacing your water kettle.

 

A soft water with a balanced neutral taste and zero sodium, mitte® Balance is an everyday water, perfect for baby food preparation and tea or coffee brewing. 

 

A crisp drinking water with a high mineral content and complex flavor profile. mitte® Vitality is great for those looking to benefit from essential minerals for improved physical and mental performance. 

 

A high-PH water rich in minerals and antioxidants, mitte® Alkaline helps combat acidity and fights free radicals in your body. It also eases recovery after intense physical activities, leading to increased energy levels and better health.

The Mitte app allows you to monitor current cartridge usage and set up (optional) demand-driven automatic ordering of new mineral cartridges. We will only send you a new cartridge when your current one is running low.

 

The truth is that our tap water is not as clean as we might like to think. It can contain contaminants such as bacteria, viruses, hormones, nitrates, fluorides and microplastics.

As a case in point, The Guardian recently published an article on the widespread contamination of microplastics in our tap water. ‘Billions of people globally are drinking water contaminated by plastic particles with 83% of all samples - and 94% of US samples - found to be polluted’. These microplastics remain in the body for years after consumption, with unknown consequences. 

 

The contamination is made very apparent with our machine. After purification, about 3% of the water that enters Mitte is collected as waste water. A brown cocktail of dirt, which otherwise ends up in our body. A side note: next to high concentrations of lead, Uranium (3x above the maximum allowance!) was discovered in our office’s tap water.

Our patent-pending (EU patent n° EP17154125) distillation chamber is based on the principle of a thermoelectric heat pump, driven by two Peltier elements. We have termed the system Peltier-driven-Distillation (PDD). Catchy, right? 

 

Your Mitte machine is part of a connected ecosystem. Mitte syncs up with the mobile app to further personalize the experience, giving you additional control and insights. 

 

The app enables you to:

  • Dispense water with specific water temperature and amount
  • Get real-time information on water quality and machine usage
  • Monitor mineral cartridge levels and manage cartridge ordering
  • and much more...
 
 

 

With Mitte in your kitchen you have your bottling facility for mineralized water at the push of a button. In fact, as you can choose different mineral cartridges, it’s more like having three.

 

Each cartridge produces 400 liters of mineralized water, enough to last around 3 months for a family of four. At a price of €40, €45, and €50 for mitte® Balance, Vitality, and Alkaline respectively, your Mitte water will cost between €0.10 ($0.12) and €0.13 ($0.15) per liter - cheaper and better than your overpriced bottled water brands.

 

The insatiable demand for bottled water is a huge problem. Plastic bottles are finding their way into the human food chain and polluting every natural system on the planet. A million plastic bottles are bought around the world every minute and the number will jump another 20% by 2021, creating an environmental crisis that will be as serious as climate change.

Mitte eliminates the need for plastic bottles, leading to a fundamental reduction in plastic waste, water waste, and carbon dioxide emissions.

 

Furthermore, we are looking at options of how to minimize our environmental impact by using bioplastics for our mineral cartridges and having a circular system, in which users send back their used cartridges.

 

 

Using the initial technology (based on the water cycle) as a starting point, Faebian and CEO Moritz began the process of turning the prototype - which was the size of a kitchen table - into a compact and efficient machine. They were soon joined by a passionate and experienced team from all over the world. The result is the high-performance Mitte that you see today.

 

For those who enjoy geeking out on the tech please click here.

 

 

Design is at the heart of what we believe in. We consider design not just the pretty shell (yes that’s also important), but also an elegant and user friendly solution to an important problem.

Mitte has been through hundreds of iterations over 18 months, from sketches and ideas to cardboard mocks-ups, 3-D prints and prototypes, all leading to our fully operational model. 

 

Mitte Specs Sheet 

 

Besides providing individual households with better water through Mitte, we also want to help bring safe water to the 844 million people in need around the world. We’ve made it our goal to create impact by partnering up with international nonprofit, Water.org.

 

For each liter of water consumed by a Mitte customer, we will make a donation to Water.org to help give access to safe water to people who need it. Learn more about how their market-driven financial solutions help families around the world get access to safe water and improved sanitation here.

 

We have been working on Mitte for over 18 months to create a connected eco-system: our hardware, app, mineral cartridges, and cloud back-end. The machine you see in the video and the ecosystem around it are real working prototypes. It’s exciting to see how far we’ve come, but now we're ready to start production and bring Mitte to the world.

So far we have:

  • Formed an awesome team in Berlin
  • Talked to hundreds of potential users
  • Built and tested 4 generations of prototypes 
  • Made sure all the materials are food-grade and comply with all regulations 
  • Determined ingredients and compositions of mineral cartridges based on user needs, in-depth research and lots of experiments 
  • Written and optimized thousands of lines of code for our firmware and cloud backend 
  • Built an App for both iOS and Android 
  • Engineered the system ready for mass production 
  • Partnered with an amazing manufacturer, who has produced products for Keurig and Lavazza
  • Carried out a successful Kickstarter campaign that is 360% funded

And these are our next steps:

  • Refine our engineering in a step that is called Design-for-Manufacture Engineering 
  • Create the tools required for mass production with our manufacturing partner 
  • Set up our first production run
  • Run a test production of the Alpha Units 
  • Improve lives with better water! 

 

 

15 people. 12 countries. 1 team in Berlin to solve a global problem. 

 

 

*Water contributes to the maintenance of normal physical and cognitive function, when consumed at least 2,0 L per day.

story:
The Dreame T20 is a lightweight, cordless vacuum cleaner that uses aviation-level engineering to bring world-class cleaning power to your home, car, or anywhere you need it. Its multiple filtering systems capture dust from your home and trap it with almost perfect effectiveness, releasing clean, fresh air into your home. From carpets and bedding to car seats and corners, the T20’s multifunction accessories leave dust with nowhere to hide. Dreame T20' s unique, patented innovations improve efficiency, portability, ease of use, and especially cleaning power; putting the best cleaning technologies available in your hands.

The Dreame T20 can generate up to 150 AW* suction power and 25K PA suction force. That ultra-strong suction power allows the T20 to clean deeper and more thoroughly than traditional vacuum cleaners. Quickly and easily clean up even untouchable places like gaps in wood or tile flooring, deep carpets, and even bed mites. 

 

The Dreame T20’s intelligent auto mode adjusts suction power across floor types. This ensures you get a deep clean throughout your home, while also preserving battery runtime and working lifetime.

There’s nothing worse than a vacuum that pumps dust back out into your room. That’s why the Dreame T20 utilizes advanced 12-cone cyclone separator technology to filter out dust, dirt, and hair. This cyclone filtration system works at 99.97% dust filtering efficiency, preventing dust from reentering your house and also preventing the filter itself from growing clogged, providing 63% longer filter life than traditional cartridges. 

In addition to the 12-cone cyclone separator, the Dreame T20 also uses a 5-stage filtration system which captures 99.97% of particles down to PM0.3 microns. This ensures that any dust you capture stays trapped, while the Dreame T20 releases clean, refreshing air.

Ever had a family’s worth of hair tangled in a vacuum roller? Not a problem for Dreame T20. Thanks to a set of hair tangle-free design built into the roller, which can peel off any hair that would get wrapped around the roller during operation, your Dreame T20 won’t have any issues, even when cleaning a house full of pets and people.

Feel trouble when switching between hard floors and carpet cleaning heads? No worry. Simply use this V-shaped all-surface brush head to deeply clean all types of floors. Its long and soft bristles help clean dirt and dust in the cracks of the hard floors, while the short and rigid nylon bristles can tap out hidden dust mites from the carpet effectively to save valuable time.

 

The Dreame T20 also features a specialized mite removal brush that makes it perfect for cleaning up cloth, pillows, and quilts. This easily accessible brush cleans deep into fabrics to remove even the most stubborn dirt, dust, and 99.9% of mites.

The Dreame comes with several handy brushes. The crevice nozzle, 2-in-1 brush, all-surface brush, and mite removal brush are all easy to use and easy to install. You’ll be able to handle anything! From marble floors to car seats and hard-to-reach corners, Dreame has you covered. Heading to the beach? Take the Dreame with you; you can keep sand out of your clothes and your car easily by switching the brushes.

Worried about marathon cleaning sessions? With swappable batteries you’ll get to double the runtime, more than 2 hours* of continuous use! And with a dual charging and wall-mounted storage dock, you’ll be able to charge both batteries at once, so you can always have a full backup ready to go. 

Our homes are full of different types of surfaces, each with different cleaning needs. But who wants to spend their time worrying over that? The Dreame T20 features four distinct cleaning modes that you can switch between at the press of a button, changing the suction level to fit any surface. Struggling with mites, or deep-cleaning shag carpeting? Max mode can clear it up in a snap. Curtains, car seats, or cushioning? Strong mode is what you need. Doing some light dusting? Try the Long-Lasting mode. And for everything else use our Automatic mode to adapt to your needs. By switching cleaning modes and brushes, you can optimize your power and cleaning time for any situation.

Our electronic lock trigger offers continuous or non-continuous modes, to suit your needs. Continuous mode activates at the press of a button, and stops until you press it again. Just tidying up here or there? Switch to non-continuous mode, and the motor works only as long as you’re pulling the trigger, and will stop as soon as you release.

Have a bad spill? Take care of it without getting your hands dirty! The Dreame Dust Cup is 0.6L larger in capacity than comparable models, and can be emptied with just one press before being washed. You can keep your hands clean the whole time. 

Need to clean the house, but afraid you’ll wake up your neighbour? The Dreame features 7-Stage noise reduction technology, so you can tidy up without fear of disturbing others in the next room. 

The advanced, lightweight design of the Dreame T20 weighs only 3.68lbs! This makes it easy to use, and easy to carry from room to room or floor to floor. Want to pack up the Dreame and take it in your trunk? Not a problem! 

 

We offer a 2-year warranty for the main components of the Dreame T20. Please note that the warranty period complies with the applicable consumer laws in different countries or areas. If your vacuum cleaner comes across any quality issue or requires any part or main unit replacement during the warranty period, please feel free to contact our after-sales team for help. We have service centers in China, Europe, the United States. Our email: Aftersales@dreame.tech. 

 

From now until the end of the Dreame T20 vacuum cleaner campaign, you can refer your friends to get free prizes. See below for prize options and rules:

 

  • Program 1: Share Kickbooster referral link, get 7% rebate


    Sign up on Kickbooster via the link below to get your personal referral link. For each order you refer successfully, you will receive 7% of the pledge amount as a cash reward. Check out the detailed rules by clicking the link below.


    Link:

         https://dreame-t20-cordless-vacuum.kickbooster.... 

Program 2: Share Indiegogo referral link, get FREE prizes


Copy your unique referral link on the top right of the campaign page. Share it with your friends, and you will receive a $19 filter package (refer 1 friend) or a $79 brush & mop package (refer 2 friends) after we confirm their order.

  • Note:

    1 - If you or your friend requests a refund before the project ends, you will be ineligible for the referral program and the prize or cash reward will NOT be sent to you.
    2 - Please note that you will be ineligible for the referral program if your link is shared in any Dreame official channel (campaign comment/FB group/FB ad, etc)
    3 - For the prize winners, you will find the winner list in the update section after the campaign ends. The accessory packages will be delivered to the winners together with the Dreame T20.
    4 - For the Kickbooster user, you will automatically receive the cash reward through the Kickbooster platform after the campaign ends. 

     

    * Dreame Team reserves the right to explain the Terms & Conditions at any point during the giveaway event.

You can purchase the combo of T20 + all-in- one extra package on our campaign page. For those who have already placed the order, just kindly click the links below to purchase the add-on perks. Great offers, limited quantity! Come and grab yours today!
*Please note that the add-on perk will be shipped together with your T20.

 

Washable Filter Package:

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/2612976/x/24...

 

Extra Battery:

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/2612976/x/24...

 

Brush & Mop Package:

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/2612976/x/24...

 

The long runtime up to 70 minutes of Dreame T20 does help improve your cleaning efficiency and save a lot of time in doing home chores.  What's more, with the second battery, the runtime of your T20 can extend up to 140 minutes! Dreame T20 covers your whole-house cleaning well.

The brush and mop package can be used for all common types of floors, such as hard wooden floor, tiles, vinyl, etc. With the package, users can not only thoroughly clean up the stubborn dust dirt hidden in the hard floors, but also can easily vacuum and mop the floors in one step to save time.

Dreame Technology, established in 2015, focuses on high-end cleaning appliances by leveraging astrodynamics technologies. At the end of 2017, we joined the Xiaomi Ecological Chain, as the driving force and leading enterprise of smart household cleaning appliances. 80% of the team members are R&D staffs, with a priority in tackling key technical obstacles. 

After years of hard work and research, Dreame has come up with a series of core inventions and more than 150 core patents, such as the high-speed motor, monocular machine vision, SLAM (simultaneous localization and mapping), and the multi-cone cyclone separation, among which multiple patents are in a global leading position. 

Our goal is to create best value high-end products. And that is the reason why Dreame has won the heart of consumers around world. So far Dreame has delivered over 1 million vacuum cleaners to happy owner all over the world. Since 3rd quarter of 2019, Dreame has become the NO.1 best-selling vacuum cleaner brand on Aliexpress, Spain. We strongly believe that more customers across the globe will join us in this vacuum cleaning tech revolution. 

Traditional vacuum cleaners with cords are heavy and not user-friendly. However, upgraded cordless vacuum cleaners often fell short on power when comparing to their chunky counterparts. Dreame has been committed to develop a cordless vacuum cleaner with the strongest power among its peers. Earlier this year, we firstly published Dreame V11 with 150AW suction power and 125000 RPM motor in Europe, which has been widely praised by our customers. This time we are excited to announce that its global version is launching on Indiegogo. Based on the same strong suction power as V11, Dreame T20 packs with smarter technologies, the intelligent all-surface brush can automatically adjust the suction according to different types of surface. Its swappable battery also doubles the runtime, helping you thoroughly clean the whole house with ease. During the campaign. We sincerely hope that many of you can join our Dreame Community from our Indiegogo campaign, where we could establish a strong and close connection through this platform, we are excited to hear all of your feedback and comments, so that we can constantly improve the product and provide you with better services.

Dreame T20 products have entered the mass production stage. As a leading enterprise of smart household cleaning appliances, we honor our brand and also cherish our relationship with the customers and we promise guaranteed delivery as an official team. 

 

*Free shipping will be available in the United States, United Kingdom, German, France, Italy, and Hong Kong.

*Dreame T20 comes with 4 power modes: Turbo - 90-150 AW / Auto - 30-57 AW / Med Mode - 30 - 36 AW / Eco - 13 - 17 AW. The auto power mode is powerful enough for daily use. You can also switch the power modes according to your needs. 

*The maximum operating time for turbo mode is 8 minutes, while for eco mode is 70 minutes. Battery life may also vary depending on operating environment.
