Sign up on Kickbooster via the link below to get your personal referral link. For each order you refer successfully, you will receive 7% of the pledge amount as a cash reward. Check out the detailed rules by clicking the link below.
Link:
         https://dreame-t20-cordless-vacuum.kickbooster.... Program 2: Share Indiegogo referral link, get FREE prizesCopy your unique referral link on the top right of the campaign page. Share it with your friends, and you will receive a $19 filter package (refer 1 friend) or a $79 brush & mop package (refer 2 friends) after we confirm their order.
Note:
1 - If you or your friend requests a refund before the project ends, you will be ineligible for the referral program and the prize or cash reward will NOT be sent to you.2 - Please note that you will be ineligible for the referral program if your link is shared in any Dreame official channel (campaign comment/FB group/FB ad, etc)3 - For the prize winners, you will find the winner list in the update section after the campaign ends. The accessory packages will be delivered to the winners together with the Dreame T20.4 - For the Kickbooster user, you will automatically receive the cash reward through the Kickbooster platform after the campaign ends. 
 
* Dreame Team reserves the right to explain the Terms & Conditions at any point during the giveaway event.
You can purchase the combo of T20 + all-in- one extra package on our campaign page. For those who have already placed the order, just kindly click the links below to purchase the add-on perks. Great offers, limited quantity! Come and grab yours today!*Please note that the add-on perk will be shipped together with your T20. Washable Filter Package: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/2612976/x/24... Extra Battery: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/2612976/x/24... Brush & Mop Package: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/2612976/x/24... The long runtime up to 70 minutes of Dreame T20 does help improve your cleaning efficiency and save a lot of time in doing home chores.  What's more, with the second battery, the runtime of your T20 can extend up to 140 minutes! Dreame T20 covers your whole-house cleaning well.The brush and mop package can be used for all common types of floors, such as hard wooden floor, tiles, vinyl, etc. With the package, users can not only thoroughly clean up the stubborn dust dirt hidden in the hard floors, but also can easily vacuum and mop the floors in one step to save time.Dreame Technology, established in 2015, focuses on high-end cleaning appliances by leveraging astrodynamics technologies. At the end of 2017, we joined the Xiaomi Ecological Chain, as the driving force and leading enterprise of smart household cleaning appliances. 80% of the team members are R&D staffs, with a priority in tackling key technical obstacles. After years of hard work and research, Dreame has come up with a series of core inventions and more than 150 core patents, such as the high-speed motor, monocular machine vision, SLAM (simultaneous localization and mapping), and the multi-cone cyclone separation, among which multiple patents are in a global leading position. Our goal is to create best value high-end products. And that is the reason why Dreame has won the heart of consumers around world. So far Dreame has delivered over 1 million vacuum cleaners to happy owner all over the world. Since 3rd quarter of 2019, Dreame has become the NO.1 best-selling vacuum cleaner brand on Aliexpress, Spain. We strongly believe that more customers across the globe will join us in this vacuum cleaning tech revolution. Traditional vacuum cleaners with cords are heavy and not user-friendly. However, upgraded cordless vacuum cleaners often fell short on power when comparing to their chunky counterparts. Dreame has been committed to develop a cordless vacuum cleaner with the strongest power among its peers. Earlier this year, we firstly published Dreame V11 with 150AW suction power and 125000 RPM motor in Europe, which has been widely praised by our customers. This time we are excited to announce that its global version is launching on Indiegogo. Based on the same strong suction power as V11, Dreame T20 packs with smarter technologies, the intelligent all-surface brush can automatically adjust the suction according to different types of surface. Its swappable battery also doubles the runtime, helping you thoroughly clean the whole house with ease. During the campaign. We sincerely hope that many of you can join our Dreame Community from our Indiegogo campaign, where we could establish a strong and close connection through this platform, we are excited to hear all of your feedback and comments, so that we can constantly improve the product and provide you with better services.Dreame T20 products have entered the mass production stage. As a leading enterprise of smart household cleaning appliances, we honor our brand and also cherish our relationship with the customers and we promise guaranteed delivery as an official team.  *Free shipping will be available in the United States, United Kingdom, German, France, Italy, and Hong Kong.*Dreame T20 comes with 4 power modes: Turbo - 90-150 AW / Auto - 30-57 AW / Med Mode - 30 - 36 AW / Eco - 13 - 17 AW. The auto power mode is powerful enough for daily use. You can also switch the power modes according to your needs. *The maximum operating time for turbo mode is 8 minutes, while for eco mode is 70 minutes. Battery life may also vary depending on operating environment.

story:
Kurt will take care of your herbs.

It is super simple! Just add water once per month, that's it! 

 

 

Handmade Scandinavian design. 

Kurt is handmade of old fishnets and reclaimed oak wood from Denmark, contributing a to circular economy.

 

 

 

 

Enjoy stress-free growing.

Grow your own herbs with seed kits or simply insert your favourite store-bought herbs and see them thrive! 

 

Your herbs will thrive. 

 

 

Our mission.

We are on a mission to combine a new sustainable food technology with Scandinavian design to bring nature back into your home. Kurt is our first design but many more will come. 

 

Featured in.

Plants meet Scandinavian design.

We were inspired to create a product that shows characteristics of our Danish heritage. With a focus on design and quality, trendsetting technology and a green consciousness, we brought Kurt to life. Kurt is not only your sustainable indoor garden but also a design piece that will brighten up your home.

 

From upcycled fishnets to fresh herbs. 

We minimise carbon footprint by recycling plastic from various Danish companies. The green plastic is from old fisher nets that are cleaned and recycled and the white plastic is from scrapped, unused plastic boxes. Instead of letting it get burned and release Co2 into the atmosphere, we recycle it, giving it a new life with Kurt.

 

“One (wo)man’s trash is another (wo)man’s treasure”. We use offcut oak wood from a local Danish wood production. By repurposing the wood and not letting it go to waste, no new trees are cut down to make Kurt.

 

 

Self-watering.

The self-watering system takes care of your herbs. Fill with water once a month, and let Kurt do the rest.

 

Grow light. 

Instead of using conventional purple grow light, we have developed one that has a cosy white hue and which is not only the best for your herbs and but also for your home!

 

How to grow.

You can grow with our sustainable seed kits that include everything you need to grow. Get it as an add-on when you buy Kurt and choose from our selection of basil, coriander, parsley, oregano, and chives. This add-on is only available to EU customers!

...Or simply insert plants from your local grocery and see them flourish!

 

 

 

 

Meet our team.

We are Danish, German and French, we are Pernille, Peter, Christian, Fenja and Mathieu, and we are passionate about making every home a little bit greener. We are not all expert gardeners, but all excited about the green change that is happening! We are happy that you want to share this journey with us and hope you will enjoy Kurt just as much as we do!

 

How it all started. 

I (Peter) realised how sustainable technology was taking over the food industry: Hydroponics made growing super fast with 90% less water, vertical farming was feeding cities, and NASA was using all of this to grow plants in space. 

 

I thought, there must be a way to combine these technologies to grow plants myself, in the comfort of my home, fast and easy. That's how Kurt came to life. Having a simple way of growing herbs in a sustainable Danish design using the latest within plant technology - is something I’m really proud of bringing to you. 

 

Now, thanks to your support, Kurt is becoming a reality! 

 

 

Shipping.

As it requires separate safety certifications, in each country we plan on selling to, we have primarily chosen only to ship to the USA and EU (Norway is included as European standards apply). If you don't reside within these specified countries, hit us with an email at hello@nordicgrow.dk, and we'll check if we can include your country!

As the USA restricts the import of seeds from the EU we will be finding another solution for our American backers. This will either be seeds locally from the USA or a replacement add-on pending the number of US backers.

 

We want to make sure that every single Kurt we ship out is in perfect condition. That means we will inspect all individual parts ourselves before shipping them out from Denmark.

Please note: If the shipping address is outside EU, customs and VAT may apply!

 

Safety.

We take safety very seriously and have taken every precaution to make sure that Kurt is safe to use. We have been guided by the Danish food & safety administration (Fødevarestyrelsen). The product is CE-certified and compliant with the European Standard for Low Voltage Directive (LVD) 2014/35/EU.

 

Risks and challenges.

Since creating the first Kurt we have learned a lot, but unforeseen challenges can always arise. We have built a solid network of suppliers and partners to make sure that we can tackle any obstacle. We keep the production within Denmark to be able to react quickly and to ensure Kurt’s quality ourselves.

 

Environmental commitments.

 

Long-lasting design.

We’ve designed our product to be durable by using high quality and long-lasting materials. The construction of the design allows for the individual pieces to be repaired or replaced if damaged or broken and contributes to the durability of Kurt.

 

Reusability and recyclability.

The various materials we use in our product are recyclable. Both the plastic and the wood can be repurposed after use. Kurt is designed to last, and designed to be recycled once he's not wanted anymore.

 

Sustainable materials.

We are using upcycled materials including recycled plastic and offcut oak wood of high quality. The oak wood is repurposed from a local Danish wood manufacturer who uses FSC certified wood. This means no new trees are cut down making a Kurt. The recycled plastic comes from different local sources in Denmark. One of those sources is the Danish company PLASTIX who recycles fishing nets. When thrown away, fishing nets are a danger for the ocean’s ecosystem but with Kurt, these nets will be given new life.

 

Environmentally friendly factories.

We have chosen to partner with suppliers that have sustainability at the heart of what they do. The recycled plastic is sustainably produced, and the wood is taken from repurposed offcuts. To minimize our carbon footprint we manufacture the product in Denmark to minimise supply chain transport.

story:
​

 

  • Exercise & Play - Let your pet keep moving by playing with our treat balls!  

 

  •  Eat & Rewards - Let them enjoy well-deserved treats while you're out!  

We all feel guilty when we spend all day at work knowing our pets are alone and bored at home with nothing fun to do until we come back and play with them. 

The many existing toys on the market have failed to resolve it. Conventional toys are boring for our pets. Likewise, automatic toys often intimidate pets.

 

TREATOI has proven to be the perfect solution: a feature-packed interactive pet care toy that keeps your pets entertained with rewards every few hours whether you're at home or not!

 

Interactive Solo Play

TREATOI loves to play with your pet almost as much as you do, but unlike you, it can give your pet attention every few hours. Program TREATOI to gently release its play and sensory treat balls regularly.  Your furry friend will be stimulated to play with them and will appreciate the attention.

Keeping your pet active and stimulated is only helpful if it can be done throughout the day. That’s why TREATOI is designed to be an interactive pet toy that can be customized to automatically dispense treat balls in intervals of 1-4 hours. 

According to the results of the survey on Kickstarter, we decided to offer one more time option of 30 minutes.  So TREATOI will have 5 LED lights as below:

 0.5, 1, 2, 3, 4 (30 minutes, 1 hour, 2 hours, 3 hours, 4 hours)

 

Regular Physical Exercise 

TREATOI’s unique balls are meant to be played with, and your friend will want to.  Choose from a selection of rope tugs, bells, or treat dispensers to keep your pal worked out.

TREATOIs unique exercise balls are a workout themselves.  They are as safe and robust as we could make them, and they need to be. Their exciting range of smells, sounds, and activities keep your pet busy, which in turn will keep your pet in great shape.

TREATOI offers you another possibility for keeping your pet busy without using too many treats. The treat balls are not just for treats — they can also be used for any of the four play accessories (rag, rope, mini bell, LED ball).

 

These play accessories are designed to stimulate and satisfy the pet’s five senses – sight, taste, touch, smell, and hearing.

 

 

*Both the transparent and mint balls can be deconstructed while the blue ball is one cohesive unit.

 

Regular Mental Exercise 

TREATOI’s comes with all the smells and bells your pal could want.  TREATOI will keep them exploring, guessing, and thinking, e.g., fully mentally active. 

This might surprise you, but while humans only have 5 million sensors in their noses (also known as olfactory receptors), dogs have 220 million sensors, and cats have 200 million sensors. 

As a result, research tells us that sense of smell is how dogs interpret the world, in the same way that humans use their vision. That’s why sniffing keeps them busy and prevents them from being bored.

TREATOI helps to activate their brain functions by allowing them to smell treats in the treat ball—a stimulus that naturally addresses their instinctive needs while also relieving stress, preventing dementia, and reducing the effects of separation anxiety.

 

Happy Daily Routine

With TREATOI balls having great smells, fun activities, and giving snacks, it’s as stimulating as your pet playpark. They’ll help your pet go from missing you to looking forward to playing time with TREATOI as it gives your pet attention. TREATOI will become a regular, positive part of their day, building their physical and mental health.

TREATOI can make your pet feel loved when you’re working or away.  TREATOI plays and stimulates your pet exactly as you would want to because you program TREATOI. TREATOI will get them active in mind and body, as it becomes a vital part of how they spend their day.

 

Perfect Slow Feeder 

TREATOI also helps prevent scarf-and-barf with food. It is superior to a multi-compartment timed feeder because cats and dogs have to work at getting all the food out of the balls so it can't eat it all immediately.

 

Strong, Durable & Eco-friendly

TREATOI has been created to be strong and durable— using a rigid material, polycarbonate for the structure, these balls are ready to roll and endure!

We also use a natural rubber material for the rubber interactive balls that is neither harmful to the environment nor the pet. This material is slip-proof and chewable which prevents pets from swallowing the balls. It’s also not harmful to the environment and our pets.

Our treat balls have holes on the top and the bottom, just in case.

 

Product Review 

 1) German version (English subtitles)

2) English version

 

How It Works 

TREATOI is designed to be quick and easy with only two simple steps.

 

STEP 1. 

Fill each ball with your furry friend’s favorite treats and play accessories (rag, rope, mini bell, LED ball).

STEP 2.

Place the balls into the dispenser and set the timer.

That’s it! TREATOI will dispense a treat ball at your set intervals for your pets to play with.

 

Easy To Clean

Cleaning is simple. Treat balls can be washed in warm water, and the dispenser can be wiped down with wet wipes.

COVID-19 has altered our daily lives and routines. Walking your dog outside is suddenly not as accessible as it once was. 

So whether you’re working from home and need a way to keep your pet entertained during the workday or simply trying to keep your dog active during the pandemic, TREATOI has you and your pet covered. 

Playing with TREATOI is just as fun and stimulating as going outside.

 

 

 

 

 

ROICO is a pet startup headquartered in Seoul, South Korea. ROICO's founder, Aram Jang, has a professional background in the marketing department of a multinational company. Her passion for animals eventually led her to become a certified professional dog trainer in the pet world in South Korea.

Now leading the TREATOI project, we have put together a team of different professionals committed to improving the lives of pets and their families throughout the world—and TREATOI is our first step towards accomplishing that goal!

With TREATOI, our team was selected as an outstanding startup enterprise by the local government, Siheung City, and The Ministry of SMEs and Startups(MSS) in South Korea.

 

 

We focus on what truly helps people and pets to live together, not just technology. Based on this mission, we provide high-quality, eco-friendly products and services. Join us on our journey!

story:
AI-Powered Smart Firewall Learns What “Normal” Looks Like & Blocks Unexpected Access

 

Protects All your Smart-Devices in 3 Ways

 

 

 

As Seen On

 

 

 

Vektor Solves Your Security Problems

 

 

The Easiest Way to Secure All Your Devices And Data

 

Vektor is a fundamentally new approach to network defense that can detect and eliminate malware infections weeks or months before traditional firewall and antivirus programs. Vektor works with your existing router to provide enhanced privacy and protection features that it lacks.

 

How Vektor Works

 

 

Click to Expand Features

 

 

  Advanced Firewall Protection 

At its core, the Q-Branch Vektor acts as an advanced firewall. It blocks incoming internet connections to devices on your home network unless you allow them. It watches what these devices are sending to the outside world, learns their expected behavior, and then raises an alarm when the device deviates from this pattern or connects to known bad sites. You can also easily restrict a device so that It can’t communicate with or compromise other devices In your home.

 

  Secures Core Network Services

Vector secures the core services of your home network so that attackers and observers cannot modify them in the background. It provides a secured DNS server that uses strong encryption to hide the sites you are visiting from observers, your ISP and other applications. Malware sites are blocked and you receive notification if any device on your network starts connecting to suspicious networks.

 

  Protects Your Smart Devices

Internet-connected ‘smart’ devices like security cameras and TVs have a horrible record of security vulnerabilities and are more likely to be under the control of an outside hacker than the person who purchased the device. Limit what these devices can connect to and who can connect back to that device: allow your connected device to communicate only with the manufacturer, or maybe prevent it from talking to systems outside your home network. We put you back in control of these devices!

 

  Transparent VPN Router and VPN Server

We enable you to send specific devices or your entire network through a Virtual Private Networking tunnel for privacy protection or to get around geo-blocking. No additional software to set up on your devices. Just flip a switch and the device uses the VPN tunnel for all connections. The built-in VPN server also lets you connect to your home network when you are out of the house, so even if you are traveling or in a coffee shop you get a secure tunnel back to your home network.

 

  Ad Blocking and Privacy Protection

Ads and web trackers can be blocked per-device or across your entire network without needing special browsers or extensions. The web trackers that follow you from site to site disappear and malware delivered through ad networks is no longer something that you need to worry about. This doesn’t just remove annoyances from your web browsing sessions, it speeds them up!

 

  Child-Safe Restrictions and Time Limits

Set restrictions and time limits on your child’s internet access. You can easily limit a tablet or laptop to kid-safe domains and know that they are protected. With scheduled access hours you can prevent a late-night Minecraft session, no more watching YouTube under the covers or after school. You can also set a weekly limit on total online time to help enforce screen time limits for your child.

 

  Continuous Network Monitoring

Vektor is constantly watching your home network 24/7 looking for problems. It notices when new systems are connected and give you the option of isolating these systems. In addition to scanning traffic Vektor is constantly checking all of the devices on your network to detect known vulnerabilities and will notify you if something needs to be blocked or updated for your safety.

 

  App Controlled and Easy to Use

Installation is as easy as plugging it into your network hub. There is no annoying web site to navigate to in your browser. Vektor is controlled via an app on your smartphone or tablet. A simple Interface lets you accomplish most standard security tasks, with advanced features available if you want to dig deeper. Push notifications inform you when a problem is noticed or a new device tries to connect to the inside of your network so that you can make the choice before bad things happen whether your at home or on the road.

 


How Do We Compare

 

 

You Need Counter-Intelligence on Your Side 24/7.

 

 

Your New Safe Setup

 


Controlled by Smart App for iOS and Android

 

The free iOS and Android app let you easily set up and manage Vektor.

Enable Safe, Private Browsing On All Devices

 

In addition to powerful cybersecurity features, the Vektor provides a virtual private networking router that uses your existing VPN account to extend protection to any device in your home—even those that normally do not support VPN software—such as a Smart TV or security cameras.

Create Temporary and VPN-Only WiFi Networks On Demand

 

With one click you can create a temporary network for guests so you don't need to share your home WiFi password. The Vektor can also create secure VPN-only WiFi networks to make the use of VPN tunneling as easily as switching WiFi networks.

 

See All Connected & Previous Connected Network Devices

 

Vektor shows you all devices that have access to your network, including devices you may have forgotten about. Control which devices join your network—even if they have the password.

 

Block Ads & Trackers That Slow You Down, Chew Up Bandwidth, & Invade Your Privacy

 

 

Control Internet Screen Time for Little Ones Without Blocking Yourself

 

 

The Most Advanced Home Protection Platform Available

 

 

 

 

1 Vektor + Lifetime Subscription = 1 Protected Home For Life

 

 

 

The Easiest Way to Secure All Your Devices And Data

 

FREE SHIPPING TO THE US

Vektor One EarlyBird Lifetime. Receive a lifetime subscription to enterprise-grade threat identification, updates on threat signatures, and updates for all future phishing, malware, and ad tracking. 

Vektor Two EarlyBirds Lifetime. Get 2 Vektor Units with Receive a lifetime subscription to enterprise-grade threat identification, updates on threat signatures, and updates for all future phishing, malware, and ad tracking.

 

Unboxing Vektor

 

 

Advanced Technical Specifications

 

 

We Created Vektor to Help You Fight Back

 

3.4 million computers have been taken hostage by ransomware. More than 2 million home routers have been compromised by hackers. Now, your devices won't be one of them. ​

Developed by the Head of Facebook’s Security Tools team, Vektor packs decades of experience at fighting some of the best hackers on the planet into a simple and powerful device to protect your home network.

We wanted a way to provide friends and family with the same strong network protection he built for the largest internet companies in the world.

So, we developed a custom hardware platform to bring this enterprise-grade security conveniently to your home.

Now, we want to share the results of that work with you.

 

We Are the Security Experts Behind Vektor

 

 


 

The Making Of

 

Our designs have been tested and proven. We have been working to perfect the technology, so it’s ready to bring home.

 

In Production for December Delivery!

 

 

 

Shipping

 

We are able to ship worldwide. VAT and GST not included. Please see product details for the shipping cost that applies to you.

With hundreds of people on the sign-up list, we've already placed an order for our first 1,000 units. We plan to ship beginning in December 2019. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.

By backing now on Indiegogo, you'll get to own one of the very first products off the line plus exclusive access to all future upgrades. This lifetime update is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity that we hope will get you as excited to protect your network as we are. This isn't something that we'll ever offer again!
story_txt:
AI-Powered Smart Firewall Learns What “Normal” Looks Like & Blocks Unexpected Access Protects All your Smart-Devices in 3 Ways   As Seen On   Vektor Solves Your Security Problems  The Easiest Way to Secure All Your Devices And Data Vektor is a fundamentally new approach to network defense that can detect and eliminate malware infections weeks or months before traditional firewall and antivirus programs. Vektor works with your existing router to provide enhanced privacy and protection features that it lacks. How Vektor Works  Click to Expand Features    Advanced Firewall Protection At its core, the Q-Branch Vektor acts as an advanced firewall. It blocks incoming internet connections to devices on your home network unless you allow them. It watches what these devices are sending to the outside world, learns their expected behavior, and then raises an alarm when the device deviates from this pattern or connects to known bad sites. You can also easily restrict a device so that It can’t communicate with or compromise other devices In your home.   Secures Core Network ServicesVector secures the core services of your home network so that attackers and observers cannot modify them in the background. It provides a secured DNS server that uses strong encryption to hide the sites you are visiting from observers, your ISP and other applications. Malware sites are blocked and you receive notification if any device on your network starts connecting to suspicious networks.   Protects Your Smart DevicesInternet-connected ‘smart’ devices like security cameras and TVs have a horrible record of security vulnerabilities and are more likely to be under the control of an outside hacker than the person who purchased the device. Limit what these devices can connect to and who can connect back to that device: allow your connected device to communicate only with the manufacturer, or maybe prevent it from talking to systems outside your home network. We put you back in control of these devices!   Transparent VPN Router and VPN ServerWe enable you to send specific devices or your entire network through a Virtual Private Networking tunnel for privacy protection or to get around geo-blocking. No additional software to set up on your devices. Just flip a switch and the device uses the VPN tunnel for all connections. The built-in VPN server also lets you connect to your home network when you are out of the house, so even if you are traveling or in a coffee shop you get a secure tunnel back to your home network.   Ad Blocking and Privacy ProtectionAds and web trackers can be blocked per-device or across your entire network without needing special browsers or extensions. The web trackers that follow you from site to site disappear and malware delivered through ad networks is no longer something that you need to worry about. This doesn’t just remove annoyances from your web browsing sessions, it speeds them up!   Child-Safe Restrictions and Time LimitsSet restrictions and time limits on your child’s internet access. You can easily limit a tablet or laptop to kid-safe domains and know that they are protected. With scheduled access hours you can prevent a late-night Minecraft session, no more watching YouTube under the covers or after school. You can also set a weekly limit on total online time to help enforce screen time limits for your child.   Continuous Network MonitoringVektor is constantly watching your home network 24/7 looking for problems. It notices when new systems are connected and give you the option of isolating these systems. In addition to scanning traffic Vektor is constantly checking all of the devices on your network to detect known vulnerabilities and will notify you if something needs to be blocked or updated for your safety.   App Controlled and Easy to UseInstallation is as easy as plugging it into your network hub. Push notifications inform you when a problem is noticed or a new device tries to connect to the inside of your network so that you can make the choice before bad things happen whether your at home or on the road.

story:
Bored at home? Missing the thrill of going to the movies? How about that adrenaline surge you experience at concerts?  
 
Ah, yes, those were good times.
 
What if there was a way for you to get all that excitement without having to:


 

Introducing Venue, the ultimate one-stop-shop for everything entertainment. Venue is the ultimate plug & play streaming media player that gives you access to:
 

 

You get access to all of this and more from the best seat in your house. 

Venue is the most value-packed streaming media player on the market. It’s the only player you’ll ever need to take control of all the entertainment you could possibly want.
 
What makes Venue a one-of-a-kind streaming experience is our special sauce – our patented Pay-Per-Viewer™ tech. The technology recreates the experience of going out to a ticketed show, but with the on-demand convenience, safety, and comfort of home.
 
There’s also no subscription fee or hidden costs with Venue, you only pay for the player and the content you’re watching, that’s it.

 

 

 

No more missing out on the movie theater experience. Venue lets you open one in your living room. Microwave up some popcorn and stream new movie releases from your couch.

No more toggling between players to satisfy your entertainment needs. All you need is Venue.

Enjoy watching content on:

 

Venue is the most value packed streaming player on the market because it runs on Pay Per Viewer™ tech, giving you access to live concerts, movies playing in theaters, and more. 
 
There’s no subscription fee for the Venue app — only pay for what you watch.


Venue gives you the opportunity to attend live concerts from your home where you're always in the front row.

 

Venue’s Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity and high speed processing makes loading and playing games a breeze. Venue also comes preloaded with gaming apps such as Google Stadia.


WFH meetings can be a snooze fest. Make them feel like fun with Venue. The player provides an immersive room-wide view for a next-level video call experience. Now, enjoy your work meetings in crisp HDR formats. Plus, the player comes pre-installed with popular video conferencing apps like Zoom and Google Meet. Aside from work, with the Venue 10ft+  experience, video calls connect the entire family. 

  

 

 

 

 

 

 

Venue is disrupting the streaming industry by giving you the best of both, scratch that, the best of all worlds.

Here is an exciting look at the types of content XCINEX will bring to the home. Watch theatrical release films, live concerts, musicals, boxing, MMA and much more:

*Content images are for placement purposes only.

At this time, Venue is in negotiations with major studios. Content release is pending legal agreements, but content quality is backed by our satisfaction guarantee. You'll love the premium ticketed entertainment Venue offers or you can return it for a full refund within 30 days. 

Ticket prices are determined by the content owners, so they'll be competitively priced based on geographic area, market, and demand. Plus, you won't have to pay for a babysitter or overpriced snacks & candy!

 

 

    

Watch founder Cihan Fuat Atkin demo the VENUE player and app features:

 

 

VENUE’s Pay-Per-Viewer tech brings the ultimate convenience to your home at ticket prices you’re used to. No need to overspend on the added costs of entertainment- babysitters, gas, parking, and overpriced concessions. With VENUE you will always have the best seat in the house.

 

Pay-Per-Viewer™ technology uses a small optical sensor for machine vision and uses AI to simply do a headcount of people watching. VENUE does not use facial recognition. We value your privacy, so we take every step to ensure user privacy is always protected with military grade encryption.


At randomized time intervals during the content stream, Venue will run a headcount of viewers, comparing the number of actual viewers (with eyes on the screen) to the number of tickets purchased. If a new viewer starts watching for a period of time, Venue will seamlessly pause the content until the number of tickets matches the number of viewers in the room. Venue is designed with user privacy in mind, and built to foster an immersive and premium experience you can share with your family and friends.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Early bird pricing is limited. Act now so you don't miss out!

 

1) VENUE Gamer

Want full control over your TV experience? Get VENUE plus an upgrade to a wireless keyboard remote with voice activation, plus premium headphones that give you full immersion in the entertainment of your choice. Scroll down for full specifications and features for add-on perks.

 

2) VENUE Family

Stop arguing over the remote and get VENUE with an upgraded wireless keyboard remote with voice activation. Say "VENUE" to log in and browse the latest in ticketed entertainment. 

 

3) VENUE Player

The VENUE player comes with a standard remote control. It's easy to install and in minutes you can browse ticketed entertainment from Blockbuster movie releases to MMA to Broadway shows. 

 

We wouldn't be where we are today without the experts and advisors who brought their talent and experience to the table and, most of all, who believed that we could reimagine the world of home entertainment. 

 

  

Our team brings together broad expertise in media, entertainment, and product development with seasoned talent joining us from Warner Bros., Sony, Paramount, VIZIO, Columbia Pictures, CBS, and Universal. 

The entire XCINEX team shares an obsessive love of entertainment, in all its forms. We also love solving problems. We decided to join our passions to come up with the ultimate upgrade in premium ticketed entertainment. 

   

To build an iconic product we can stand behind, we partnered with industry-leading vendors Verizon Media and Verimatrix to bring the world's most desired content to your living room with optimum quality and security. 

Top technology, manufacturing and design experts like Laritech, Pulse, and Arrow are ensuring the quality and sustainability of the final product. 

With the help of our early backers, VENUE will soon give members access to a brand new premium entertainment content experience at home.  

 

Venue is proudly designed and manufactured in the USA.  

 


FACTORY PHOTOS

 

WHY WE CHOSE INDIEGOGO

Indiegogo is a platform of passionate early adopters and tech enthusiasts who back products that provide ingenious solutions to everyday problems. With our goal of developing an innovative and new technology to release ticketed entertainment to the convenience of your home, Indiegogo is a natural fit for VENUE. We know this crowdfunding community will see the timeliness and value of our product, and will help us generate the excitement and traction necessary to complete our first line of units. 

With your support, we’re looking forward to shipping our VENUE streaming media player to you in Spring of 2021!  

 

RETURN POLICY/WARRANTY

See Indiegogo Terms of Use. Once you receive your player, VENUE has a 1-year warranty for manufacturing defects under normal usage with a 100% satisfaction guarantee and a 30-day money-back guarantee, so in the unlikely event that you are not pleased with the performance of your VENUE player or the content available, please send us a support ticket at info@xcinex.com.

 

RISKS & CHALLENGES

With any hardware-based product, unknown delays in manufacturing and production are the biggest risks. We’re extremely confident in our manufacturing partners, supply chain, and design teams to anticipate and adapt to any potential obstacles, even during a pandemic, to deliver VENUE in a timely fashion to our backers. 

 

In the event of any unforeseen delays, we will clearly communicate it through our campaign in the form of updates to make sure our backers are always aware.

 

ADD-ON PERKS

WIRELESS HEADPHONES

Specifications: 

Bluetooth 5.0 + ERD
Receiving distance: 15m
Horn size: 40mm
Frequency response: 20Hz-20KHz
Impedance: 30 OMEGA
Battery capacity: 400mA
Charging time: 2-3 hours
Endurance: 10 hours
Standby time: 300 hours
Size: 18x19x7.5cm
Weight: 228g

 

WIRELESS KEYBOARD REMOTE WITH VOICE ACTIVATION 

Features:
■ Air mouse pointer for easy navigation on your screen
■ 6 axes gyroscope and motion sensor for gaming control
■ Large keys on reverse side keyboard, great for searching
■ Infrared learning for turning your device ON and OFF
■ Voice control button with built-in microphone

Specifications: 
Acceleration Sensor: 3 axes gyroscope
Gyro-sensor: 3 axes g-sensor
Communication: 2.4 GHz
Working distance: 10-20m
Battery: Rechargeable lithium battery
Charging time: 1 hour
System: Compatible for Windows, Mac OS, Linux, Android
